atk-abh02a:19_0: Saddhamme gāravaṃ katvā, taṃ suṇātha samāhitāti.
atk-abh02a:20_3: viññāṇakkhandhoti idaṃ vibhaṅgappakaraṇassa ādibhūte khandhavibhaṅge suttantabhājanīyaṃ nāma.
atk-abh02a:20_5: Tena na tato heṭṭhā na uddhanti dasseti.
atk-abh02a:20_8: saddo sambahulesu ṭhānesu dissati – rāsimhi, guṇe,
atk-abh02a:20_13: mahāsamudde na sukaraṃ udakassa pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ –
atk-abh02a:20_14: ettakāni udakāḷhakānīti vā ettakāni udakāḷhakasatānīti vā ettakāni udakāḷhakasahassānīti vā ettakāni udakāḷhakasatasahassānīti vā,
atk-abh02a:20_15: atha kho asaṅkhyeyyo appameyyo mahāudakakkhandhotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatī”tiādīsu hi rāsito khandho nāma.
atk-abh02a:20_27: “Addasā kho bhagavā mahantaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamāna”nti.
atk-abh02a:20_32: Ayañhi khandhaṭṭho nāma piṇḍaṭṭho pūgaṭṭho ghaṭaṭṭho rāsaṭṭho.
atk-abh02a:20_35: lokasmiñhi iṇaṃ gahetvā codiyamānā ‘dvīhi khandhehi dassāma,
atk-abh02a:20_39: vedanākkhandhoti vedanārāsi vedanākoṭṭhāsoti iminā nayena saññākkhandhādīnaṃ attho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:21_0: Ettāvatā sammāsambuddho yvāyaṃ “cattāro ca mahābhūtā catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpa”nti atītānāgatapaccuppannādīsu
atk-abh02a:21_1: ekādasasu okāsesu vibhatto ‘pañcavīsati rūpakoṭṭhāsā’ti ca ‘channavuti rūpakoṭṭhāsā’ti ca evaṃpabhedo rūparāsi,
atk-abh02a:21_2: taṃ sabbaṃ paripiṇḍetvā rūpakkhandho nāmāti dassesi.
atk-abh02a:21_5: adukkhamasukhā vedanā”ti tesuyeva ekādasasu okāsesu vibhatto catubhūmikavedanārāsi,
atk-abh02a:21_6: taṃ sabbaṃ paripiṇḍetvā vedanākkhandho nāmāti dassesi.
atk-abh02a:21_8: manosamphassajā saññā”ti tesuyeva ekādasasu okāsesu vibhatto catubhūmikasaññārāsi,
atk-abh02a:21_9: taṃ sabbaṃ paripiṇḍetvā saññākkhandho nāmāti dassesi.
atk-abh02a:21_11: manosamphassajā cetanā”ti tesuyeva ekādasasu okāsesu vibhatto catubhūmikacetanārāsi,
atk-abh02a:21_12: taṃ sabbaṃ paripiṇḍetvā saṅkhārakkhandho nāmāti dassesi.
atk-abh02a:21_16: manoviññāṇadhātū”ti tesuyeva ekādasasu okāsesu vibhatto catubhūmikacittarāsi,
atk-abh02a:21_17: taṃ sabbaṃ paripiṇḍetvā viññāṇakkhandho nāmāti dassesi.
atk-abh02a:24_1: Idāni te rūpakkhandhādayo vibhajitvā dassetuṃ tattha katamo rūpakkhandhotiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:24_5: Idāni taṃ vibhajanto yaṃ kiñci rūpantiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:24_8: Evaṃ padadvayenāpi rūpassa anavasesapariggaho kato hoti.
atk-abh02a:25_0: Tattha kenaṭṭhena rūpanti? Ruppanaṭṭhena rūpaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-abh02a:27_2: kena kāraṇena taṃ rūpaṃ nāmāti attho.
atk-abh02a:27_4: Yasmā ruppati tasmā rūpanti vuccatīti attho.
atk-abh02a:27_5: Ruppatīti kuppati ghaṭṭīyati pīḷiyati bhijjatīti attho.
atk-abh02a:27_6: Evaṃ iminā ettakena ṭhānena ruppanaṭṭhena rūpaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:28_0: Sītenapi ruppatītiādīsu pana sītena tāva ruppanaṃ lokantarikaniraye pākaṭaṃ.
atk-abh02a:28_1: Tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇañhi cakkavāḷānaṃ antare ekeko lokantarikanirayo nāma hoti aṭṭhayojanasahassappamāṇo,
atk-abh02a:28_6: Te vagguliyo viya pabbatapāde dīghaputhulehi nakhehi laggitvā avaṃsirā olambanti.
atk-abh02a:28_7: Yadā saṃsappantā aññamaññassa hatthapāsagatā honti atha ‘bhakkho no laddho’ti maññamānā tattha byāvaṭā viparivattitvā lokasandhārake udake patanti,
atk-abh02a:28_8: sītavāte paharantepi pakkamadhukaphalāni viya chijjitvā udake patanti.
atk-abh02a:28_9: Patitamattāva accantakhārena sītodakena chinnacammanhārumaṃsaaṭṭhīhi bhijjamānehi tattatele patitapiṭṭhapiṇḍi viya paṭapaṭāyamānā vilīyanti.
atk-abh02a:28_12: Tattha hi sattā sītena bhinnacchinnasarīrā jīvitakkhayampi pāpuṇanti.
atk-abh02a:29_1: Tattha hi tattāya lohapathaviyā nipajjāpetvā pañcavidhabandhanādikaraṇakāle sattā mahādukkhaṃ anubhavanti.
atk-abh02a:30_0: Jighacchāya ruppanaṃ pettivisaye ceva dubbhikkhakāle ca pākaṭaṃ.
atk-abh02a:30_1: Pettivisayasmiñhi sattā dve tīṇi buddhantarāni kiñcideva āmisaṃ hatthena gahetvā mukhe pakkhipantā nāma na honti.
atk-abh02a:30_3: Dubbhikkhe kañjikamattampi alabhitvā maraṇappattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:31_1: Tattha hi sattā dve tīṇi buddhantarāni hadayatemanamattaṃ vā jivhātemanamattaṃ vā udakabinduṃ laddhuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-abh02a:31_2: ‘Pānīyaṃ pivissāmā’ti nadiṃ gatānampi nadī vālikātalaṃ sampajjati.
atk-abh02a:32_0: Eko kira kālakañjikaasuro pipāsaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto yojanagambhīravitthāraṃ mahāgaṅgaṃ otari.
atk-abh02a:32_4: Tassa udakasaddaṃ sutvā ito cito ca vicarantasseva ratti vibhāyi.
atk-abh02a:32_5: Atha naṃ pātova bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantā tiṃsamattā piṇḍacārikabhikkhū disvā –
atk-abh02a:32_19: Bhikkhū tiṃsamatte patte nīharitvā udakaṃ āharitvā āharitvā tassa mukhe āsiñciṃsu.
atk-abh02a:32_20: Tesaṃ tathā karontānaṃyeva velā upakaṭṭhā jātā.
atk-abh02a:32_25: tiṃsamattānaṃ ayyānaṃ tiṃsamattehi pattehi āsittaudakato aḍḍhapasatamattampi paragalagataṃ,
atk-abh02a:33_9: Ekā kira itthī marukantāre rattiṃ satthato ohīnā divā sūriye uggacchante vālikāya tappamānāya pāde ṭhapetuṃ asakkontī sīsato pacchiṃ otāretvā akkami.
atk-abh02a:33_10: Kamena pacchiyā uṇhābhitattāya ṭhātuṃ asakkontī tassā upari sāṭakaṃ ṭhapetvā akkami.
atk-abh02a:33_11: Tasmimpi santatte aṅkena gahitaṃ puttakaṃ adhomukhaṃ nipajjāpetvā kandantaṃ kandantaṃ akkamitvā saddhiṃ tena tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne uṇhābhitattā kālamakāsi.
atk-abh02a:34_0: Sarīsapāti ye keci dīghajātikā sarantā gacchanti.
atk-abh02a:34_1: Tesaṃ samphassena ruppanaṃ āsīvisadaṭṭhādīnaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:35_0: Idāni ‘yaṃ kiñci rūpa’nti padena saṃgahitaṃ pañcavīsatikoṭṭhāsachannavutikoṭṭhāsappabhedaṃ sabbampi rūpaṃ
atk-abh02a:35_2: Tato paraṃ tadeva ajjhattadukādīsu catūsu dukesu pakkhipitvā dassetuṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:35_3: Tato paraṃ sabbampetaṃ ekādasasu padesesu pariyādiyitvā dassitaṃ rūpaṃ ekato piṇḍaṃ katvā dassetuṃ tadekajjhantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:36_4: sabbampetaṃ vuttappakāraṃ rūpaṃ ruppanalakkhaṇasaṅkhāte ekavidhabhāve paññāya rāsiṃ katvā rūpakkhandho nāmāti vuccatīti.
atk-abh02a:36_5: Etena sabbampi rūpaṃ ruppanalakkhaṇe rāsibhāvūpagamanena rūpakkhandhoti dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:36_6: Na hi rūpato añño rūpakkhandho nāma atthi.
atk-abh02a:36_9: Na hi vedanādīhi aññe vedanākkhandhādayo nāma atthi.
atk-abh02a:37_1: Idāni ekekasmiṃ okāse pakkhittaṃ rūpaṃ visuṃ visuṃ bhājetvā dassento tattha katamaṃ rūpaṃ atītantiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:37_2: Tattha tatthāti ekādasasu okāsesu pakkhipitvā ṭhapitamātikāya bhummaṃ.
atk-abh02a:37_4: atītānāgatapaccuppannantiādinā nayena ṭhapitāya mātikāya yaṃ atītaṃ rūpanti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:37_7: Atītaṃ niruddhantiādīni padāni nikkhepakaṇḍassa atītattikabhājanīyavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttāneva.
atk-abh02a:37_8: Cattāro ca mahābhūtāti idaṃ atītanti vuttarūpassa sabhāvadassanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:37_9: Yathā cettha evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:37_11: atītarūpampi bhūtāni ceva bhūtāni upādāya nibbattarūpañca,
atk-abh02a:37_14: Na hi bhūtehi ceva bhūtāni upādāya pavattarūpato ca aññaṃ rūpaṃ nāma atthīti.
atk-abh02a:38_3: Cattāro ca mahābhūtā catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpanti.
atk-abh02a:39_0: Idaṃ pana atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ nāma suttantapariyāyato abhidhammaniddesatoti duvidhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:39_2: Paṭisandhito hi paṭṭhāya atītabhavesu nibbattaṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-abh02a:39_3: anantarabhave vā nibbattaṃ hotu kappakoṭisatasahassamatthake vā,
atk-abh02a:39_6: anantarabhave vā nibbattaṃ hotu kappakoṭisatasahassamatthake vā,
atk-abh02a:39_10: Tayo hi rūpassa khaṇā – uppādo, ṭhiti, bhaṅgoti.
atk-abh02a:39_11: Ime tayo khaṇe patvā niruddhaṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-abh02a:39_12: samanantaraniruddhaṃ vā hotu atīte kappakoṭisatasahassamatthake vā,
atk-abh02a:39_15: ekacittakkhaṇamattena vā asampattaṃ hotu anāgate kappakoṭisatasahassamatthake vā,
atk-abh02a:39_17: Ime tayo khaṇe sampattaṃ rūpaṃ pana paccuppannaṃ nāma.
atk-abh02a:39_19: evaṃ santepi abhidhammaniddeseneva atītānāgatapaccuppannarūpaṃ niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:40_1: idañhi rūpaṃ addhāsantatisamayakhaṇavasena catudhā atītaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:40_3: Addhāvasena tāva ekassa ekasmiṃ bhave paṭisandhito pubbe atītaṃ,
atk-abh02a:40_6: Santativasena sabhāgaekautusamuṭṭhānaṃ ekāhārasamuṭṭhānañca pubbāpariyavasena pavattamānampi paccuppannaṃ.
atk-abh02a:40_13: Tesaññeva pana utuāhāracittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ upatthambhakavasena tassa atītādibhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:40_14: Samayavasena ekamuhuttapubbaṇhasāyanharattidivādīsu samayesu santānavasena pavattamānaṃ taṃ taṃ samayaṃ paccuppannaṃ nāma.
atk-abh02a:42_1: Hīnadukaniddese tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānanti bahūsu sattesu sāmivacanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:42_2: Aparassāpi aparassāpīti hi vuccamāne divasampi kappasatasahassampi vadanto ettakameva vadeyya.
atk-abh02a:42_3: Iti satthā dvīheva padehi anavasese satte pariyādiyanto ‘tesaṃ tesaṃ sattāna’nti āha.
atk-abh02a:42_4: Ettakena hi sabbampi aparadīpanaṃ siddhaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:42_27: Atha vā manaṃ appāyati vaḍḍhetīti manāpaṃ,
atk-abh02a:43_6: Imasmiñhi pade akusalakammajavasena aniṭṭhā pañca kāmaguṇā vibhattā.
atk-abh02a:44_1: Imasmiṃ pana pade kusalakammajavasena iṭṭhā pañca kāmaguṇā vibhattā.
atk-abh02a:44_4: Yathā ca kammajesu evaṃ utusamuṭṭhānādīsupi iṭṭhāniṭṭhatā atthi evāti imasmiṃ duke iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ paṭivibhattanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:46_1: pañcasu kāmaguṇesu agganti vadāmi. Teva, mahārāja,
atk-abh02a:46_3: ekaccassa amanāpā honti. Teva, mahārāja, saddā, gandhā, rasā,
atk-abh02a:47_0: Evaṃ yasmā teyeva rūpādayo eko assādeti abhinandati,
atk-abh02a:47_6: Eko cete ‘iṭṭhā kantā manāpā’ti dakkhiṇato gaṇhāti,
atk-abh02a:47_8: Tasmā iṭṭhāniṭṭhaṃ nāma pāṭiyekkaṃ paṭivibhattaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:47_9: Paccantavāsīnañhi gaṇḍuppādāpi iṭṭhā honti kantā manāpā,
atk-abh02a:48_1: “kiṃ pana tvaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ paṭivibhattaṃ nāma natthīti vadesī”ti?
atk-abh02a:48_3: Puna tatheva yāvatatiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā pañho pucchitabbo –
atk-abh02a:48_11: kiṃ tattha annapānamālāgandhavilepanasayanacchādanasamiddhā pañca kāmaguṇā atthī’ti vatvā ‘natthī’ti
atk-abh02a:48_12: vutte ‘alaṃ tava nibbānenā’ti nibbānassa vaṇṇe kathiyamāne kujjhitvā ubho kaṇṇe thaketīti iṭṭhetaṃ.
atk-abh02a:48_13: Etassa pana vasena tava vāde nibbānaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:48_16: Saññāvipallāsena ca tadeva ārammaṇaṃ ekassa iṭṭhaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:49_3: Idañhi na atiissarānaṃ mahāsammatamahāsudassanadhammāsokādīnaṃ vasena vibhattaṃ.
atk-abh02a:49_6: Tesañhi kaṇājakabhattasitthānipi pūtimaṃsarasopi atimadhuro amatasadiso ca hoti.
atk-abh02a:49_7: Majjhimakānaṃ pana gaṇakamahāmattaseṭṭhikuṭumbikavāṇijādīnaṃ kālena iṭṭhaṃ kālena aniṭṭhaṃ labhamānānaṃ vasena vibhattaṃ.
atk-abh02a:50_13: Kiñcāpi hi micchādiṭṭhikā buddhaṃ vā saṅghaṃ vā mahācetiyādīni vā uḷārāni ārammaṇāni disvā akkhīni pidahanti,
atk-abh02a:51_0: Kiñcāpi gūthasūkarādayo gūthagandhaṃ ghāyitvā ‘khādituṃ labhissāmā’ti somanassajātā honti,
atk-abh02a:51_4: Bandhitvā varasayane sayāpitasūkaro ca kiñcāpi viravati,
atk-abh02a:52_4: suvaṇṇasūle uttāsitassa ca maṇiratanasuvaṇṇasūlāni cakkhudvāre iṭṭhāni honti,
atk-abh02a:52_7: Evaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhaṃ ekantato vipākeneva paricchijjatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:53_0: Taṃ taṃ vā panāti ettha na heṭṭhimanayo oloketabbo.
atk-abh02a:53_5: taṃ upādāya tiracchānesu nāgasupaṇṇānaṃ rūpaṃ paṇītaṃ nāma.
atk-abh02a:53_7: taṃ upādāya petānaṃ rūpaṃ paṇītaṃ nāma.
atk-abh02a:53_9: taṃ upādāya jānapadānaṃ rūpaṃ paṇītaṃ nāma.
atk-abh02a:53_11: taṃ upādāya gāmabhojakānaṃ rūpaṃ paṇītaṃ nāma.
atk-abh02a:53_13: taṃ upādāya janapadasāmikānaṃ rūpaṃ paṇītaṃ nāma.
atk-abh02a:53_15: taṃ upādāya padesarājūnaṃ rūpaṃ paṇītaṃ nāma.
atk-abh02a:53_17: taṃ upādāya cakkavattirañño rūpaṃ paṇītaṃ nāma.
atk-abh02a:53_19: taṃ upādāya bhummadevānaṃ rūpaṃ paṇītaṃ nāma.
atk-abh02a:53_21: taṃ upādāya cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ rūpaṃ paṇītaṃ nāma.
atk-abh02a:53_23: taṃ upādāya tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ rūpaṃ paṇītaṃ nāma…pe…
atk-abh02a:53_24: akaniṭṭhadevānaṃ pana rūpaṃ matthakappattaṃ paṇītaṃ nāma.
atk-abh02a:54_2: Imasmiṃ pana duke duppariggahaṭṭhena lakkhaṇaduppaṭivijjhatāya sukhumarūpaṃ dūreti kathitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:54_4: Kabaḷīkārāhārapariyosāne ca niyyātanaṭṭhānepi ‘idaṃ vuccati rūpaṃ dūre’ti na nīyyātitaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:54_10: Oḷārikarūpaṃ okāsato dūreti dassetuṃ aniyyātetvāva yaṃ vā panaññampītiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:54_16: Idaṃ vuccati rūpaṃ dūreti idaṃ paṇṇarasavidhaṃ sukhumarūpaṃ lakkhaṇato dūre,
atk-abh02a:54_17: dasavidhaṃ pana oḷārikarūpaṃ yevāpanakavasena okāsato dūreti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:55_0: Idaṃ vuccati rūpaṃ santiketi idaṃ dasavidhaṃ oḷārikarūpaṃ lakkhaṇato santike,
atk-abh02a:55_1: pañcadasavidhaṃ pana sukhumarūpaṃ yevāpanakavasena okāsato santiketi vuccati.
atk-abh02a:55_2: Kittakato paṭṭhāya pana rūpaṃ okāsavasena santike nāma?
atk-abh02a:55_4: Pakatikathāya kathentānaṃ dvādasahattho savanūpacāro nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:55_7: Tattha sukhumarūpaṃ dūre hontaṃ lakkhaṇatopi okāsatopi dūre hoti;
atk-abh02a:55_8: santike hontaṃ pana okāsatova santike hoti,
atk-abh02a:55_10: Oḷārikarūpaṃ santike hontaṃ lakkhaṇatopi okāsatopi santike hoti;
atk-abh02a:56_0: Taṃ taṃ vā panāti ettha na heṭṭhimanayo oloketabbo.
atk-abh02a:56_2: Idha pana na lakkhaṇato dūraṃ bhindati,
atk-abh02a:59_1: Vedanākkhandhaniddesādīsu heṭṭhā vuttasadisaṃ pahāya apubbameva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-abh02a:59_3: Sukhā vedanātiādīni atītādivasena niddiṭṭhavedanaṃ sabhāvato dassetuṃ vuttāni.
atk-abh02a:59_7: Adukkhamasukhā pana cakkhādayo pasādakāye sandhāya pariyāyena ‘atthi kāyikā,
atk-abh02a:60_4: Khaṇādivasena khaṇattayapariyāpannā pubbantāparantamajjhagatā sakiccañca kurumānā vedanā paccuppannā.
atk-abh02a:60_7: Tattha khaṇādivasena atītādibhāvaṃ sandhāya ayaṃ niddeso katoti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:61_1: Oḷārikasukhumaniddese akusalā vedanātiādīni jātito oḷārikasukhumabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttāni.
atk-abh02a:61_5: Tattha akusalā tāva sadarathaṭṭhena dukkhavipākaṭṭhena ca oḷārikā.
atk-abh02a:62_6: Sukhañhi uppajjamānaṃ sakalasarīraṃ khobhentaṃ āluḷentaṃ abhisandayamānaṃ maddayamānaṃ chādayamānaṃ sītodakaghaṭena āsiñcayamānaṃ viya uppajjati.

atk-abh02a:63_0: Tattha eko neva kusalattike kovido hoti,
atk-abh02a:63_7: adukkhamasukhā vedanā sukhumā”ti hi vedanāttike vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:63_10: Sā hi kusalāpi atthi akusalāpi abyākatāpi.
atk-abh02a:64_1: abyākatā vedanā sukhumā”ti yaṃ pana kusalattike vuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:64_4: Sā hi sukhāpi atthi dukkhāpi adukkhamasukhāpi.
atk-abh02a:64_10: Kusalattikassa pana āgataṭṭhāne vedanāttikaṃ anoloketvā vedanāttikassa āgataṭṭhāne kusalattikaṃ anoloketvā kusalādīnaṃ kusalattikalakkhaṇena,
atk-abh02a:64_11: sukhādīnaṃ vedanāttikalakkhaṇena oḷārikasukhumataṃ kathento na bhindati nāma.
atk-abh02a:65_3: vipākā antamaso dvipañcaviññāṇasahajātāpi samānā sukhumā nāma hotī’ti vadati.
atk-abh02a:65_4: So evarūpaṃ santaṃ paṇītaṃ lokuttaravedanaṃ oḷārikaṃ nāma karonto,
atk-abh02a:65_5: dvipañcaviññāṇasampayuttaṃ ahetukaṃ hīnaṃ jaḷaṃ vedanaṃ sukhumaṃ nāma karonto ‘tikaṃ rakkhissāmī’ti bhūmantaraṃ bhindati nāma.
atk-abh02a:65_6: Tattha tattha bhūmiyaṃ kusalaṃ pana taṃtaṃbhūmivipākeneva saddhiṃ yojetvā kathento na bhindati nāma.
atk-abh02a:65_12: Iminā nīhārena kathento na bhindati nāma.
atk-abh02a:66_8: “sammāsambuddhena abhidhammaṃ patvā ekapadassāpi dvinnampi padānaṃ āgataṭṭhāne nayaṃ dātuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne nayo adinno nāma natthi,

atk-abh02a:72_5: Bhedato pana ahetukādivasena bhinnāya kāmāvacarakiriyāya ahetukakiriyavedanā oḷārikā,

atk-abh02a:73_3: Sacepi hi akusalādivedanāsamaṅgino dukkhādivedanāsamaṅgino ca tayo tayo janā ekamañce nisinnā honti,

atk-abh02a:73_6: Akusalā pana akusalāya sabhāgaṭṭhena sarikkhaṭṭhena ca santike nāma.
atk-abh02a:73_8: Sacepi hi akusalādivedanāsamaṅgīsu tīsu janesu eko kāmabhave,

atk-abh02a:74_0: Taṃ taṃ vā panāti ettha heṭṭhimanayaṃ anoloketvā taṃ taṃ vāpanavaseneva kathetabbaṃ.

atk-abh02a:77_1: Saññākkhandhaniddese yā kāci saññāti catubhūmikasaññaṃ pariyādiyati.
atk-abh02a:77_2: Cakkhusamphassajā saññātiādīni atītādivasena niddiṭṭhasaññaṃ sabhāvato dassetuṃ vuttāni.
atk-abh02a:77_3: Tattha cakkhusamphassato cakkhusamphassasmiṃ vā jātā cakkhusamphassajā nāma.
atk-abh02a:78_1: Oḷārikadukaniddese paṭighasamphassajāti sappaṭighe cakkhupasādādayo vatthuṃ katvā sappaṭighe rūpādayo ārabbha uppanno phasso paṭighasamphasso nāma.
atk-abh02a:78_2: Tato tasmiṃ vā jātā paṭighasamphassajā nāma.
atk-abh02a:78_9: sappaṭighāni ca ārammaṇāni ārabbha uppattito esā paṭighasamphassajā saññāti vuttā.
atk-abh02a:79_0: Adhivacanasamphassajā saññātipi pariyāyena etissā nāmaṃ hotiyeva.
atk-abh02a:79_1: Tayo hi arūpino khandhā sayaṃ piṭṭhivaṭṭakā hutvā attanā sahajātāya saññāya adhivacanasamphassajā saññātipi nāmaṃ karonti.
atk-abh02a:79_2: Nippariyāyena pana paṭighasamphassajā saññā nāma pañcadvārikasaññā,
atk-abh02a:79_4: Tattha pañcadvārikasaññā oloketvāpi jānituṃ sakkāti oḷārikā.
atk-abh02a:80_1: dve kira itthiyo nisīditvā suttaṃ kantanti.
atk-abh02a:80_2: Dvīsu daharesu gāme carantesu eko purato gacchanto ekaṃ itthiṃ olokesi.
atk-abh02a:80_3: Itarā taṃ pucchi ‘kasmā nu kho taṃ eso olokesī’ti?
atk-abh02a:80_6: Tesupi gāme caritvā āsanasālāya nisinnesu itaro bhikkhu taṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchi –
atk-abh02a:80_11: Evaṃ pañcadvārikasaññā oloketvāpi jānituṃ sakkāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:80_14: Manodvārikasaññā pana ekamañce vā ekapīṭhe vā nisīditvāpi aññaṃ cintentaṃ vitakkentañca ‘kiṃ cintesi,
atk-abh02a:80_15: kiṃ vitakkesī’ti pucchitvā tassa vacanavaseneva jānitabbato sukhumā.
atk-abh02a:83_1: Saṅkhārakkhandhaniddese ye keci saṅkhārāti catubhūmikasaṅkhāre pariyādiyati.

atk-abh02a:83_8: Taṃsampayuttasaṅkhārā pana tāya gahitāya gahitāva honti.
atk-abh02a:86_1: Viññāṇakkhandhaniddese yaṃ kiñci viññāṇanti catubhūmakaviññāṇaṃ pariyādiyati.
atk-abh02a:86_2: Cakkhuviññāṇantiādīni atītādivasena niddiṭṭhaviññāṇaṃ sabhāvato dassetuṃ vuttāni.
atk-abh02a:90_4: gabbhaseyyakasattānañhi paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcakkhandhā apacchāapure ekato pātubhavanti.
atk-abh02a:90_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe pātubhūtā kalalasaṅkhātā rūpasantati parittā hoti.
atk-abh02a:90_6: Khuddakamakkhikāya ekavāyāmena pātabbamattāti vatvā puna ‘atibahuṃ etaṃ,
atk-abh02a:90_7: saṇhasūciyā tele pakkhipitvā ukkhittāya paggharitvā agge ṭhitabindumatta’nti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:90_8: Tampi paṭikkhipitvā ‘ekakese telato uddharitvā gahite tassa paggharitvā agge ṭhitabindumatta’nti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:90_9: Tampi paṭikkhipitvā ‘imasmiṃ janapade manussānaṃ kese aṭṭhadhā phālite tato ekakoṭṭhāsappamāṇo uttarakurukānaṃ keso;
atk-abh02a:90_10: tassa pasannatilatelato uddhaṭassa agge ṭhitabindumatta’nti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:90_13: tassā ekaaṃsuno pasannatilatele pakkhipitvā uddhaṭassa paggharitvā agge ṭhitabindumatta’nti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:90_14: Taṃ panetaṃ acchaṃ hoti vippasannaṃ anāvilaṃ parisuddhaṃ pasannatilatelabindusamānavaṇṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:93_0: Evaṃ parittāya rūpasantatiyā tīṇi santatisīsāni honti –

atk-abh02a:94_5: Evaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcakkhandhā paripuṇṇā honti.

atk-abh02a:95_2: Opapātikānañhi paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe heṭṭhā vuttāni tīṇi,
atk-abh02a:95_6: Evaṃ paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃ opapātikānaṃ samasattati ceva samasaṭṭhi ca kammajarūpāni rūpakkhandho nāma.
atk-abh02a:95_8: Evaṃ opapātikānaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcakkhandhā paripuṇṇā honti.
atk-abh02a:96_0: ‘Pubbāparato’ti evaṃ pana gabbhaseyyakānaṃ apacchāapure uppannesu pañcasu khandhesu kiṃ rūpaṃ paṭhamaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti udāhu arūpanti?
atk-abh02a:96_7: cattāri arūppavipākānīti soḷasa cittāni rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpenti.
atk-abh02a:96_8: Tattha paṭisandhicittaṃ tāva vatthuno dubbalatāya appatiṭṭhitatāya paccayavekallatāya āgantukatāya ca rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh02a:96_9: Tattha hi sahajātaṃ vatthu uppādakkhaṇe dubbalaṃ hotīti vatthuno dubbalatāya rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh02a:96_10: Yathā ca papāte patanto puriso aññassa nissayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh02a:96_11: evaṃ etampi kammavegakkhittattā papāte patamānaṃ viya appatiṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:97_1: Tassa vatthu purejātaṃ hutvā paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh02a:97_4: Yatrāpi vatthu purejātaṃ hutvā paccayo bhavituṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh02a:97_6: tatrāpi cittaṃ aṅgato aparihīnaṃyeva rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh02a:97_7: Yadi hi cittaṃ ṭhānakkhaṇe vā bhaṅgakkhaṇe vā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeyya,
atk-abh02a:97_9: Na pana cittaṃ tasmiṃ khaṇadvaye rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh02a:97_10: Yathā pana ahicchattakamakulaṃ pathavito uṭṭhahantaṃ paṃsucuṇṇaṃ gahetvāva uṭṭhahati,
atk-abh02a:97_11: evaṃ cittaṃ purejātaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya uppādakkhaṇe aṭṭha rūpāni gahetvāva uṭṭhahati.
atk-abh02a:97_12: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ca vatthu purejātaṃ hutvā paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkotīti paccayavekallatāyapi paṭisandhicittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh02a:98_0: Yathā ca āgantukapuriso agatapubbaṃ padesaṃ gato aññesaṃ –
atk-abh02a:98_2: antogāme vo annapānagandhamālādīni dassāmī’ti vattuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh02a:98_4: evameva paṭisandhicittaṃ āgantukanti attano āgantukatāyapi rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh02a:98_5: Apica samatiṃsa kammajarūpāni cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ ṭhānaṃ gahetvā ṭhitānītipi paṭisandhicittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh02a:99_0: Khīṇāsavassa pana cuticittaṃ vaṭṭamūlassa vūpasantattā na samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh02a:99_1: Tassa hi sabbabhavesu vaṭṭamūlaṃ vūpasantaṃ abhabbuppattikaṃ punabbhave paveṇī nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:99_2: Sotāpannassa pana satta bhave ṭhapetvā aṭṭhameva vaṭṭamūlaṃ vūpasantaṃ.
atk-abh02a:99_3: Tasmā tassa cuticittaṃ sattasu bhavesu rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
atk-abh02a:99_6: Khīṇāsavassa sabbabhavesu vaṭṭamūlassa vūpasantattā neva samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh02a:100_2: hetu natthīti cittaṅgaṃ dubbalaṃ hotīti cittaṅgadubbalatāya tāni rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpenti.
atk-abh02a:100_3: Cattāri arūpavipākāni tasmiṃ bhave rūpassa natthitāya rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpenti.
atk-abh02a:100_5: yāni aññānipi tasmiṃ bhave aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalāni,
atk-abh02a:100_12: tānipi tattha rūpassa natthitāya eva rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpenti.
atk-abh02a:101_3: Sā ṭhānaṃ patvā aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh02a:101_6: Tasmiṃ dharanteyeva soḷasa cittāni uppajjitvā nirujjhanti.
atk-abh02a:101_7: Tesu paṭisandhianantaraṃ paṭhamabhavaṅgacittaṃ uppādakkhaṇeyeva aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh02a:101_10: Kabaḷīkārāhāropi ṭhānaṃ patvā aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh02a:103_0: Tena so tattha yāpeti, mātukucchigato naro”ti. ;
atk-abh02a:104_0: Evaṃ kucchigato dārako mātarā ajjhohaṭaannapānaojāya yāpeti.
atk-abh02a:104_6: ekassa vā dvinnaṃ vā sattāhānaṃ gatakāle patiṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a:104_7: Tato pana pure vā patiṭṭhātu pacchā vā;
atk-abh02a:104_8: yadā mātarā ajjhohaṭaannapānaojā dārakassa sarīre patiṭṭhāti,
atk-abh02a:105_0: Opapātikassāpi pakatipaṭiyattānaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyānaṃ atthiṭṭhāne nibbattassa tāni gahetvā ajjhoharato ṭhānappattā ojā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh02a:106_0: Evaṃ pañcavīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu dveva rūpāni rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti –
atk-abh02a:106_4: Tattha rūpaṃ uppādakkhaṇe ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe ca dubbalaṃ,
atk-abh02a:106_6: Cittaṃ ṭhānakkhaṇe ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe ca dubbalaṃ,
atk-abh02a:106_9: Atīte kappakoṭisatasahassamatthakepi hi āyūhitaṃ kammaṃ etarahi paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:106_10: Etarahi āyūhitaṃ anāgate kappakoṭisatasahassapariyosānepi paccayo hotīti.
atk-abh02a:107_4: Rūpe dharanteyeva soḷasa cittāni uppajjitvā nirujjhanti.
atk-abh02a:107_5: Taṃ pana sattarasamena cittena saddhiṃ nirujjhati.
atk-abh02a:107_6: Yathā hi puriso ‘phalaṃ pātessāmī’ti muggarena rukkhasākhaṃ pahareyya,
atk-abh02a:107_7: phalāni ca pattāni ca ekakkhaṇeyeva vaṇṭato mucceyyuṃ.
atk-abh02a:107_8: Tattha phalāni attano bhārikatāya paṭhamataraṃ pathaviyaṃ patanti,
atk-abh02a:107_10: Evameva muggarappahārena pattānañca phalānañca ekakkhaṇe vaṇṭato muttakālo viya paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpārūpadhammānaṃ ekakkhaṇe pātubhāvo;
atk-abh02a:107_11: phalānaṃ bhārikatāya paṭhamataraṃ pathaviyaṃ patanaṃ viya rūpe dharanteyeva soḷasannaṃ cittānaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhanaṃ;
atk-abh02a:107_12: pattānaṃ lahukatāya pacchā pathaviyaṃ patanaṃ viya rūpassa sattarasamena cittena saha nirujjhanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:108_2: rūpaṃ pana arūpaṃ arūpaṃ vā rūpaṃ ohāya pavattituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-abh02a:108_7: Tesu ekato maggaṃ gacchantesu yāva dīghapādo ekapadavāraṃ akkamati,
atk-abh02a:108_8: tāva itaro pade padaṃ akkamitvā soḷasapadavārena gacchati.
atk-abh02a:108_9: Dīghapādo lakuṇṭakapādassa soḷasa padavāre attano pādaṃ añchitvā ākaḍḍhitvā ekameva padavāraṃ karoti.
atk-abh02a:108_10: Iti ekopi ekaṃ atikkamituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh02a:108_15: dīghapādassa ekaṃ padavāraṃ akkamaṇakāle itarassa soḷasapadavāraakkamanaṃ viya rūpe dharanteyeva arūpadhammesu
atk-abh02a:108_17: dvinnaṃ purisānaṃ lakuṇṭakapādapurisassa soḷasa padavāre itarassa attano pādaṃ añchitvā ākaḍḍhitvā ekapadavārakaraṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:108_18: viya rūpassa sattarasamena cittena saddhiṃ nirujjhanaṃ;
atk-abh02a:108_19: dvinnaṃ purisānaṃ aññamaññaṃ anohāya ekappamāṇeneva gamanaṃ viya arūpassa rūpaṃ rūpassa arūpaṃ anohāya ekappamāṇeneva pavattananti.
atk-abh02a:109_5: Tesu ekekassa uppādaṭṭhitibhaṅgavasena tayo tayo khaṇā.
atk-abh02a:109_6: Tattha ekekassa cittassa tīsu tīsu khaṇesu samatiṃsa samatiṃsa kammajarūpāni uppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:109_7: Tesu paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇe samuṭṭhitaṃ kammajarūpaṃ sattarasamassa bhavaṅgacittassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva nirujjhati;
atk-abh02a:109_10: Evaṃ dutiyabhavaṅgacittaṃ ādiṃ katvā attano attano sattarasamena cittena saddhiṃ yojetvā nayo netabbo.
atk-abh02a:109_13: Sā panesā rattiñca divā ca khādantānampi bhuñjantānampi suttānampi pamattānampi nadīsoto viya ekantaṃ pavattati yevāti.
atk-abh02a:110_1: Tattha āyusaṃkhārapariyosāne soḷasannaṃ cittānaṃ vāre sati heṭṭhāsoḷasakaṃ uparisoḷasakanti dve ekato yojetabbāni.
atk-abh02a:110_2: Heṭṭhāsoḷasakasmiñhi paṭhamacittassa uppādakkhaṇe samuṭṭhitaṃ samatiṃsakammajarūpaṃ uparisoḷasakasmiṃ paṭhamacittassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva nirujjhati;
atk-abh02a:110_3: ṭhitikkhaṇe samuṭṭhitaṃ tassa ṭhitikkhaṇeyeva bhaṅgakkhaṇe samuṭṭhitaṃ tassa bhaṅgakkhaṇeyeva nirujjhati.
atk-abh02a:110_5: soḷasamacittassa uppādakkhaṇe samuṭṭhitaṃ samatiṃsakammajarūpaṃ cuticittassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva nirujjhati;
atk-abh02a:110_10: sattā akkhayā avayā ajarā amarā nāma bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-abh02a:111_0: Ettha pana yadetaṃ ‘sattarasamassa bhavaṅgacittassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva nirujjhatī’tiādinā nayena ‘ekassa
atk-abh02a:111_1: cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ rūpaṃ aññassa uppādakkhaṇe nirujjhatī’ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatattā vuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:111_6: Cittasamuṭṭhānarūpañca cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppajjitvā yāva aññāni soḷasa cittāni uppajjanti tāva tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh02a:111_10: na kassaci cittassa uppādakkhaṇe vā ṭhitikkhaṇe vā nirujjhati,
atk-abh02a:111_11: nāpi ṭhitikkhaṇe vā bhaṅgakkhaṇe vā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:111_12: Esā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa dhammatāti niyamato cittasaṅkhārena saddhiṃ ekakkhaṇe nirujjhanato “āmantā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:112_0: Yo cāyaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānassa khaṇaniyamo vutto kammādisamuṭṭhānassāpi ayameva khaṇaniyamo.
atk-abh02a:112_1: Tasmā paṭisandhicittena sahuppannaṃ kammajarūpaṃ tato paṭṭhāya sattarasamena saddhiṃ nirujjhati.
atk-abh02a:112_2: Paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe uppannaṃ aṭṭhārasamassa uppādakkhaṇe nirujjhati.
atk-abh02a:112_3: Paṭisandhicittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppannaṃ aṭṭhārasamassa ṭhānakkhaṇe nirujjhatīti iminā nayenettha yojanā kātabbā.
atk-abh02a:113_0: ‘Ekuppādaekanirodhato’ti rūpaṃ pana rūpena saha ekuppādaṃ ekanirodhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:114_1: Imassa hi uddhaṃ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā tacapariyantassa sarīrassa tattha tattha catusantatirūpaṃ ghanapuñjabhāvena vattati.
atk-abh02a:114_3: Yathā pana upacikarāji vā kipillikarāji vā olokiyamānā ekābaddhā viya hoti,
atk-abh02a:114_5: Aññissā hi sīsasantike aññissā sīsampi udarampi pādāpi,
atk-abh02a:114_6: aññissā udarasantike aññissā sīsampi udarampi pādāpi,
atk-abh02a:114_7: aññissā pādasantike aññissā sīsampi udarampi pādāpi honti.
atk-abh02a:114_8: Evameva catusantatirūpānampi aññassa uppādakkhaṇe aññassa uppādopi hoti ṭhitipi bhaṅgopi,
atk-abh02a:114_9: aññassa ṭhitikkhaṇe aññassa uppādopi hoti ṭhitipi bhaṅgopi,
atk-abh02a:114_10: aññassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe aññassa uppādopi hoti ṭhitipi bhaṅgopi.
atk-abh02a:115_10: Nirodhasamāpatti lokiyalokuttarāti vā saṅkhatāsaṅkhatāti vā parinipphannāparinipphannāti vā na vattabbā.
atk-abh02a:117_0: Evaṃ pakiṇṇakato khandhe viditvā puna etesuyeva –
atk-abh02a:123_9: cattāro sammappadhānā”ti vā “dānakathaṃ sīlakatha”nti vā evamādi desanākkamo.
atk-abh02a:123_10: Tesu idha uppattikkamo tāva na yujjati,
atk-abh02a:124_1: Abhedena hi yaṃ pañcasu khandhesu attaggāhapatitaṃ veneyyajanaṃ samūhaghanavinibbhogadassanena attaggāhato
atk-abh02a:124_2: mocetukāmo bhagavā hitakāmo tassa janassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ cakkhuādīnampi visayabhūtaṃ oḷārikaṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-abh02a:124_5: yaṃ vedayati taṃ sañjānātīti evaṃ vedanāvisayassa ākāraggāhikaṃ saññaṃ,
atk-abh02a:124_7: tesaṃ vedanādīnaṃ nissayaṃ adhipatibhūtañca viññāṇanti evaṃ tāva ‘kamato’ vinicchayanayo viññātabbo.
atk-abh02a:127_0: Ettha ca yathā vedanādayo anāsavāpi sāsavāpi atthi,
atk-abh02a:127_2: Yasmā panassa rāsaṭṭhena khandhabhāvo yujjati tasmā khandhesu vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:127_3: Yasmā rāsaṭṭhena ca sāsavaṭṭhena ca upādānakkhandhabhāvo yujjati tasmā upādānakkhandhesu vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:127_6: ‘Upādānakkhandhā’ti ettha ca upādānagocarā khandhā upādānakkhandhāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh02a:127_7: Idha pana sabbepete ekajjhaṃ katvā khandhāti adhippetā.
atk-abh02a:128_0: ‘Anūnādhikato’ti kasmā pana bhagavatā pañceva khandhā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti?
atk-abh02a:128_4: Anekappabhedesu hi saṅkhatadhammesu sabhāgavasena saṅgayhamānesu rūpaṃ rūpasabhāgasaṅgahavasena eko khandho hoti,
atk-abh02a:128_12: sati rūpaṃ upādāya rūpaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati –
atk-abh02a:128_17: Viññāṇe sati viññāṇaṃ upādāya viññāṇaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati –
atk-abh02a:128_22: Yepi caññe sīlādayo pañca dhammakkhandhā vuttā,
atk-abh02a:129_0: ‘Upamāto’ti ettha hi gilānasālūpamo rūpupādānakkhandho gilānūpamassa viññāṇupādānakkhandhassa vatthudvārārammaṇavasena nivāsanaṭṭhānato,
atk-abh02a:129_5: Tathā “akusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti dukkhasahagata”nti.
atk-abh02a:130_0: ‘Daṭṭhabbato dvidhā’ti saṅkhepato vitthārato cāti evaṃ dvidhā daṭṭhabbato pettha vinicchayanayo viññātabbo.
atk-abh02a:130_1: Saṅkhepato hi pañcupādānakkhandhā āsivisūpame vuttanayena ukkhittāsikapaccatthikato,
atk-abh02a:131_0: Vitthārato panettha pheṇapiṇḍo viya rūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:135_0: Tattha rūpādīnaṃ pheṇapiṇḍādīhi evaṃ sadisatā veditabbā –
atk-abh02a:135_1: yathā hi pheṇapiṇḍo nissārova evaṃ rūpampi niccasāradhuvasāraattasāravirahena nissārameva.
atk-abh02a:135_2: Yathā ca so ‘iminā pattaṃ vā thālakaṃ vā karissāmī’ti gahetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-abh02a:135_4: evaṃ rūpampi ‘nicca’nti vā ‘dhuva’nti vā ‘aha’nti vā ‘mama’nti vā gahetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-abh02a:136_0: Yathā vā pana pheṇapiṇḍo chiddāvachiddo anekasandhighaṭito bahūnnaṃ udakasappādīnaṃ pāṇānaṃ āvāso,
atk-abh02a:136_3: Tadeva tesaṃ sūtigharampi vaccakuṭipi gilānasālāpi susānampi.
atk-abh02a:136_4: Na te aññattha gantvā gabbhavuṭṭhānādīni karonti.
atk-abh02a:136_6: Yathā ca pheṇapiṇḍo āditova badarapakkamatto hutvā anupubbena pabbatakūṭamattopi hoti,
atk-abh02a:136_7: evaṃ rūpampi ādito kalalamattaṃ hutvā anupubbena byāmamattampi gomahiṃsahatthiādīnaṃ vasena pabbatakūṭamattampi hoti,
atk-abh02a:136_15: antarā pana abhejjamānampi vassasatāyukānaṃ vassasataṃ patvā avassameva bhijjati,
atk-abh02a:137_4: na sakkā taṃ gahetvā phalakaṃ vā āsanaṃ vā kātuṃ,
atk-abh02a:137_11: Yathā pana tasmiṃ tasmiṃ udakabindumhi pubbuḷo uppajjati ceva nirujjhati ca,
atk-abh02a:137_13: evaṃ vedanāpi uppajjati ceva nirujjhati ca,
atk-abh02a:137_18: udakajallakaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā puṭaṃ katvā gahaṇavātañcāti cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca uppajjati;
atk-abh02a:138_2: na hi sakkā taṃ gahetvā pivituṃ vā nhāyituṃ vā bhājanaṃ vā pūretuṃ.
atk-abh02a:138_5: evaṃ nīlasaññādibhedā saññāpi nīlādianubhavanatthāya phandati vipphandati.
atk-abh02a:139_2: Yatheva hi kadalikkhandhato kiñci gahetvā na sakkā gopānasīādīnamatthāya upanetuṃ,
atk-abh02a:139_4: evaṃ saṅkhārāpi na sakkā niccādivasena gahetuṃ,
atk-abh02a:140_5: Teneva hi cittena puriso āgato viya,
atk-abh02a:140_13: yaṃ kiñcideva ‘idaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ rajataṃ muttā’tipi gahāpeti.
atk-abh02a:140_22: Visesato ca subhārammaṇampi oḷārikampi ajjhattikarūpaṃ asubhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:140_23: Vedanā tīhi dukkhatāhi avinimuttato dukkhāti saññāsaṅkhārā avidheyyato anattāti viññāṇaṃ udayabbayadhammato aniccanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:141_0: ‘Evaṃ passantassatthasiddhito’ti evañca saṅkhepavitthāravasena dvidhā passato yā atthasiddhi hoti,
atk-abh02a:141_3: saṅkhepato tāva pañcupādānakkhandhesu ukkhittāsikapaccatthikādibhāvena passanto khandhehi na vihaññati.
atk-abh02a:141_4: Vitthārato pana rūpādīni pheṇapiṇḍādisadisabhāvena passanto na asāresu sāradassī hoti.
atk-abh02a:141_5: Visesato ca ajjhattikarūpaṃ asubhato passanto kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ parijānāti,
atk-abh02a:141_19: Saññaṃ saṅkhāre ca anattato passanto manosañcetanāhāraṃ parijānāti,
atk-abh02a:146_2: Tattha rūpakkhandhaniddeso heṭṭhā rūpakaṇḍe vitthāritanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:147_6: Iminā upāyena kusalapadādīhi vuttā vedanā jānitabbā.
atk-abh02a:147_13: Somanassindriyaṃ chaṭṭhavatthukaṃ vā avatthukaṃ vā tebhūmakaṃ.
atk-abh02a:147_17: Tattha purimā pañca vedanā pañcappasādavatthukā kāmāvacarāva chaṭṭhā avatthukā vā savatthukā vā catubhūmikā.
atk-abh02a:148_6: Aṭṭhavidhabhede tāya saddhiṃ kāyasamphassajāpi sukhā dukkhāti dvidhā bhinnā.
atk-abh02a:148_7: Navavidhabhede sattavidhe vuttā manoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā kusalādivasena tidhā bhinnā.
atk-abh02a:148_8: Dasavidhabhede aṭṭhavidhe vuttā manoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā kusalādivaseneva tidhā bhinnā.
atk-abh02a:149_1: Sattavidhaaṭṭhavidhanavavidhabhedesu pana nayaṃ dātuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne nayo dinno.
atk-abh02a:149_2: Abhidhammañhi patvā tathāgatena nayaṃ dātuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne nayo adinno nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:150_0: Satthā hi imasmiṃ abhidhammabhājanīye vedanākkhandhaṃ bhājento tike gahetvā dukesu pakkhipi,
atk-abh02a:150_2: tike ca duke ca ubhatovaḍḍhananīhārena āhari;
atk-abh02a:150_6: bahuvidhenāti sabbathāpi bahuvidhena vedanākkhandhaṃ dassesi. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:150_8: Dhammaṃ sotuṃ nisinnadevaparisāya hi ye devaputtā tike ādāya dukesu pakkhipitvā kathiyamānaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ sakkonti,
atk-abh02a:150_10: Ye itarehi ākārehi kathiyamānaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ sakkonti,
atk-abh02a:150_13: Sammāsambuddho pana attano mahāvisayatāya tike vā dukesu pakkhipitvā,
atk-abh02a:150_16: yathā yathā icchati tathā tathā desetuṃ sakkoti.
atk-abh02a:151_0: Tattha tike ādāya dukesu pakkhipitvā desitavāro dukamūlako nāma.
atk-abh02a:151_1: Duke ādāya tikesu pakkhipitvā desitavāro tikamūlako nāma.
atk-abh02a:151_2: Tike ca duke ca ubhato vaḍḍhetvā desitavāro ubhatovaḍḍhitako nāma.
atk-abh02a:151_3: Avasāne sattavidhenātiādivāro bahuvidhavāro nāmāti ime tāva cattāro mahāvārā.
atk-abh02a:152_0: Tattha dukamūlake dukesu labbhamānena ekekena dukena saddhiṃ tikesu alabbhamāne vedanāttikapītittikasanidassanattike apanetvā,
atk-abh02a:152_3: Te sabbepi pāḷiyaṃ saṃkhipitvā tattha tattha dassetabbayuttakaṃ dassetvā vuttā.
atk-abh02a:153_0: Tikamūlakepi tikesu labbhamānena ekekena tikena saddhiṃ dukesu alabbhamāne paṭhamadukādayo duke apanetvā,
atk-abh02a:153_1: sese labbhamānake sahetukadukādayo paññāsa duke yojetvā,
atk-abh02a:153_3: Tepi sabbe pāḷiyaṃ saṅkhipitvā tattha tattha dassetabbayuttakaṃ dassetvā vuttā.
atk-abh02a:154_0: Ubhatovaḍḍhitake duvidhabhede dutiyadukaṃ tividhabhede ca paṭhamatikaṃ ādiṃ katvā labbhamānehi ekūnavīsatiyā
atk-abh02a:154_1: dukehi labbhamāne ekūnavīsatitike yojetvā dutiyadukapaṭhamatikayojanavārādayo ekūnavīsativārā vuttā.
atk-abh02a:154_2: Esa dukatikānaṃ vasena ubhatovaḍḍhitattā ubhatovaḍḍhitako nāma tatiyo mahāvāro.
atk-abh02a:155_0: Bahuvidhavārassa sattavidhaniddese ādito paṭṭhāya labbhamānesu ekūnavīsatiyā tikesu ekekena saddhiṃ catasso
atk-abh02a:155_2: Catuvīsatividhaniddesepi tesaṃyeva tikānaṃ vasena ekūnavīsativārā vuttā.
atk-abh02a:155_4: Tiṃsavidhavāro ekoyevāti sabbepi aṭṭhapaññāsa vārā honti.
atk-abh02a:156_2: Catuvīsatividhaniddese cakkhusamphassapaccayā vedanākkhandho atthi kusaloti kāmāvacaraaṭṭhakusalacittavasena veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:156_7: dasa kāmāvacarakiriyāti catuvīsatiyā cittānaṃ vasena veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:157_0: Tattha aṭṭha kusalāni dvādasa akusalāni ca javanavasena labbhanti.
atk-abh02a:158_0: Manodvāre pana atthi kusaloti catubhūmakakusalavasena kathitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:158_9: tebhūmakakiriyā ceva sāmaññaphalāni ca javanavaseneva labbhanti.
atk-abh02a:158_10: Tāni sattavidhādīsu yattha katthaci ṭhatvā kathetuṃ vaṭṭanti.
atk-abh02a:158_11: Tiṃsavidhe pana ṭhatvā dīpiyamānāni sukhadīpanāni hontīti tiṃsavidhasmiṃyeva ṭhatvā dīpayiṃsu.
atk-abh02a:159_0: Etāni hi sabbānipi cittāni cakkhudvāre upanissayakoṭiyā,
atk-abh02a:159_6: Idha bhikkhu vihāracārikaṃ caramāno kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ disvā ‘kiṃ nāmeta’nti pucchitvā ‘kasiṇamaṇḍala’nti vutte puna ‘kiṃ iminā karontī’ti pucchati.
atk-abh02a:159_11: Ajjhāsayasampanno kulaputto ‘bhāriyaṃ eta’nti asallakkhetvā ‘mayāpi esa guṇo nibbattetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-abh02a:159_12: na kho pana sakkā esa nipajjitvā niddāyantena nibbattetuṃ,
atk-abh02a:159_13: āditova vīriyaṃ kātuṃ sīlaṃ sodhetuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti cintetvā sīlaṃ sodheti.
atk-abh02a:159_14: Tato sīle patiṭṭhāya dasa palibodhe upacchinditvā,
atk-abh02a:159_24: maggaphalavedanā lokuttarāti evaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ catubhūmikavedanānibbattiyā balavapaccayo hotīti catubhūmikavedanā cakkhusamphassapaccayā nāma jātā.
atk-abh02a:160_0: Cakkhudvāre pana rūpe āpāthagate ‘iṭṭhe me ārammaṇe rāgo uppanno,
atk-abh02a:160_7: thāmagatassa anusayo uppanno’ti pariggahe ṭhito kulaputto attano kilesuppattiṃ ñatvā ‘ime me kilesā vaḍḍhamānā anayabyasanāya saṃvattissanti,
atk-abh02a:160_8: handa ne niggaṇhāmī’ti cintetvā ‘na kho pana sakkā nipajjitvā niddāyantena kilese niggaṇhituṃ;
atk-abh02a:160_9: āditova vīriyaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati sīlaṃ sodhetu’nti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh02a:160_12: maggaphalavedanā lokuttarāti evaṃ rūpārammaṇe uppannaṃ kilesaṃ samatikkamitvā gatāti catubhūmikavedanā cakkhusamphassapaccayā nāma jātā.
atk-abh02a:161_0: Cakkhudvāre pana rūpe āpāthagate eko evaṃ pariggahaṃ paṭṭhapeti –
atk-abh02a:161_2: Tato naṃ ‘bhūtanissita’nti ñatvā cattāri mahābhūtāni upādārūpañca rūpanti pariggaṇhāti,
atk-abh02a:161_4: Tato sappaccayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ parigaṇhitvā tīṇi lakkhaṇāni āropetvā vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā saṅkhāre sammasitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh02a:161_7: maggaphalavedanā lokuttarāti evaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ sammasitvā nibbattitāti ayaṃ vedanā cakkhusamphassapaccayā nāma jātā.
atk-abh02a:162_1: ‘kasiṇaparikammaṃ kira katvā samāpattiyo uppādetvā samāpattipadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇantī’ti.
atk-abh02a:162_2: Ajjhāsayasampanno kulaputto ‘bhāriyaṃ eta’nti asallakkhetvā ‘mayāpi esa guṇo nibbattetuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti purimanayeneva paṭipajjitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh02a:162_5: maggaphalavedanā lokuttarāti evaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ catubhūmikavedanā nibbattiyā balavapaccayo hotīti catubhūmikavedanā sotasamphassapaccayā nāma jātā.
atk-abh02a:163_0: Sotadvāre pana sadde āpāthagateti sabbaṃ cakkhudvāre vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:163_1: Evaṃ saddārammaṇe uppannaṃ kilesaṃ samatikkamitvā gatāti catubhūmikavedanā sotasamphassapaccayā nāma jātā.
atk-abh02a:164_0: Sotadvāre pana sadde āpāthagate eko evaṃ pariggahaṃ paṭṭhapeti –
atk-abh02a:164_1: ayaṃ saddo kiṃ nissitoti sabbaṃ cakkhudvāre vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:164_2: Evaṃ saddārammaṇaṃ sammasitvā nibbattitāti ayaṃ vedanā sotasamphassapaccayā nāma jātā.
atk-abh02a:165_0: Ghānajivhākāyadvāresu pana gandhārammaṇādīsu āpāthagatesu ‘iṭṭhe me ārammaṇe rāgo uppanno’ti sabbaṃ cakkhudvāre vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:165_1: Evaṃ gandhārammaṇādīsu uppannaṃ kilesaṃ samatikkamitvā gatāti catubhūmikavedanā ghānajivhākāyasamphassapaccayā nāma jātā.
atk-abh02a:166_0: Ghānadvārādīsu pana gandhādīsu āpāthagatesu eko evaṃ pariggahaṃ paṭṭhapeti –
atk-abh02a:166_3: idaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ kiṃ nissita’nti sabbaṃ cakkhudvāre vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:166_4: Evaṃ gandhārammaṇādīni sammasitvā nibbattitāti ayaṃ vedanā ghānajivhākāyasamphassapaccayā nāma jātā.
atk-abh02a:167_4: na kho pana sakkā nipajjitvā niddāyantena jātiādīhi muccituṃ,
atk-abh02a:167_5: āditova vīriyaṃ kātuṃ sīlaṃ sodhetuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti cintetvā cakkhudvāre vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh02a:167_8: maggaphalavedanā lokuttarāti evaṃ jātijarābyādhimaraṇaṃ catubhūmikavedanānibbattiyā balavapaccayo hotīti
atk-abh02a:168_0: Manodvāre pana dhammārammaṇe āpāthagateti sabbaṃ cakkhudvāre vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:168_1: Evaṃ dhammārammaṇe uppannaṃ kilesaṃ samatikkamitvā gatāti catubhūmikavedanā manosamphassapaccayā nāma jātā.
atk-abh02a:169_0: Manodvāre pana dhammārammaṇe āpāthagate eko evaṃ pariggahaṃ paṭṭhapeti –
atk-abh02a:169_5: So cattāri mahābhūtāni upādārūpañca rūpanti pariggaṇhāti,
atk-abh02a:169_7: Tato sappaccayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ pariggaṇhitvā tīṇi lakkhaṇāni āropetvā vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā saṅkhāre sammasitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh02a:169_10: maggaphalavedanā lokuttarāti evaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ sammasitvā nibbattitāti ayaṃ vedanā manosamphassapaccayā nāma jātā.
atk-abh02a:169_12: Yā panetā sabbesampi catuvīsatividhādīnaṃ vārānaṃ pariyosānesu cakkhusamphassajā vedanā…pe…
atk-abh02a:169_13: manosamphassajā vedanāti cha cha vedanā vuttā,
atk-abh02a:171_3: Saṅkhārakkhandhaniddese phassassāpi saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannattā phassasampayuttoti avatvā cittasampayuttoti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:171_7: Na hi sakkā viññāṇaṃ manosamphassajanti niddisituṃ.
atk-abh02a:171_9: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi khandhānaṃ niddeseyeva vedanākkhandhaniddesato atirekatikadukā laddhā.
atk-abh02a:174_6: taṃ sabbaṃ pucchitvā vissajjane “rūpakkhandho abyākato”tiādinā nayena yaṃ labbhati tadeva uddhaṭanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:174_7: Yattha yattha ca ‘eko khandho’ti vā ‘dve khandhā’ti vā paricchedaṃ akatvā “siyā uppannā,
atk-abh02a:174_9: tattha tattha pañcannampi khandhānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:174_10: Seso tesaṃ tesaṃ khandhānaṃ kusalādivibhāgo heṭṭhā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttoyeva.
atk-abh02a:175_0: Ārammaṇattikesu pana cattāro khandhā pañcapaṇṇāsa kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha rajjantassa dussantassa muyhantassa
atk-abh02a:175_1: saṃvarantassa sammasantassa paccavekkhantassa ca parittārammaṇā honti,
atk-abh02a:175_2: sattavīsati rūpārūpāvacaradhamme ārabbha rajjantassa dussantassa muyhantassa saṃvarantassa pariggahaṃ paṭṭhapentassa mahaggatārammaṇā,
atk-abh02a:176_2: maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhaṇakāle ārammaṇādhipatinā maggādhipatino,
atk-abh02a:176_3: vīriyajeṭṭhakaṃ vā vīmaṃsajeṭṭhakaṃ vā maggaṃ bhāventassa sahajātādhipatinā maggādhipatino,
atk-abh02a:176_4: chandajeṭṭhakaṃ pana cittajeṭṭhakaṃ vā bhāventassa navattabbārammaṇā nāma honti.
atk-abh02a:177_0: Atītāni pana khandhadhātuāyatanāni ārabbha rajjantassa dussantassa muyhantassa saṃvarantassa pariggahaṃ paṭṭhapentassa atītārammaṇā honti,
atk-abh02a:177_3: paññattiṃ vā nibbānaṃ vā paccavekkhantassa navattabbārammaṇā honti.
atk-abh02a:178_0: Tathā attano khandhadhātuāyatanāni ārabbha rajjantassa dussantassa muyhantassa saṃvarantassa pariggahaṃ paṭṭhapentassa ajjhattārammaṇā honti,
atk-abh02a:178_1: paresaṃ khandhadhātuāyatanāni ārabbha evaṃ pavattentassa bahiddhārammaṇā,
atk-abh02a:178_3: kālena ajjhattaṃ kālena bahiddhā dhammesu evaṃ pavattentassa ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā,
atk-abh02a:179_0: Iti bhagavā imaṃ khandhavibhaṅgaṃ suttantabhājanīyādivasena tayo parivaṭṭe nīharitvā bhājento dassesi.
atk-abh02a:184_1: Idāni tadanantare āyatanavibhaṅganiddese suttantabhājanīyaṃ tāva dassento dvādasāyatanāni cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanantiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:188_3: Cakkhurūpādīsu hi taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādinā kiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭṭenti vāyamantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:188_4: Te ca pana āyabhūte dhamme etāni tanonti vitthārentīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:188_5: Idañca anamatagge saṃsāre pavattaṃ atīva āyataṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ yāva na nivattati tāva nayanteva,
atk-abh02a:188_7: Iti sabbepi me dhammā āyatanato āyānaṃ tananato āyatassa ca nayanato ‘āyatanaṃ āyatana’nti vuccanti.
atk-abh02a:189_5: Tathā hi loke “issarāyatanaṃ vāsudevāyatana”ntiādīsu nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ āyatananti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:189_7: Sāsane pana “manorame āyatane sevanti naṃ vihaṅgamā”tiādīsu samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:189_9: “Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane”tiādīsu kāraṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:190_0: Cakkhurūpādīsu cāpi te te cittacetasikā dhammā nivasanti tadāyattavuttitāyāti cakkhādayo nesaṃ nivāsanaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:190_1: Cakkhādīsu ca te ākiṇṇā taṃ nissitattā tadārammaṇattā cāti cakkhādayo nesaṃ ākaro.
atk-abh02a:190_12: kāraṇaṭṭhenāti imehi kāraṇehi ete dhammā ‘āyatanaṃ āyatana’nti vuccanti.
atk-abh02a:190_13: Tasmā yathāvuttenatthena cakkhu ca taṃ āyatanañcāti cakkhāyatanaṃ…pe…
atk-abh02a:190_14: dhammā ca te āyatanañcāti dhammāyatananti evaṃ tāvettha ‘atthato’ viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a:191_1: Tāni ca pana nesaṃ lakkhaṇāni heṭṭhā rūpakaṇḍaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a:192_3: Evaṃ sati dhammāyatanamicceva avatvā kasmā dvādasāyatanāni vuttānīti ce?
atk-abh02a:192_5: Idha channaṃ viññāṇakāyānaṃ dvārabhāvena ārammaṇabhāvena ca vavatthānato ayameva tesaṃ bhedo hotīti dvādasa vuttāni.
atk-abh02a:192_11: Iti channaṃ viññāṇakāyānaṃ uppattidvārārammaṇavavatthānato dvādasa vuttānīti.
atk-abh02a:193_0: ‘Kamato’ti idhāpi pubbe vuttesu uppattikkamādīsu desanākkamova yujjati.
atk-abh02a:193_1: Ajjhattikesu hi āyatanesu sanidassanasappaṭighavisayattā cakkhāyatanaṃ pākaṭanti paṭhamaṃ desitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:193_3: Atha vā dassanānuttariyasavanānuttariyahetubhāvena bahūpakārattā ajjhattikesu cakkhāyatanasotāyatanāni paṭhamaṃ desitāni.
atk-abh02a:193_6: Cakkhādīnaṃ pana gocarattā tassa tassa anantarāni bāhiresu rūpāyatanādīni.
atk-abh02a:193_7: Apica viññāṇuppattikāraṇavavatthānatopi ayameva tesaṃ kamo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:193_8: Vuttañhetaṃ “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe…
atk-abh02a:193_9: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇa”nti evaṃ ‘kamato’pettha viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a:194_0: ‘Saṅkhepavitthārā’ti saṅkhepato hi manāyatanassa ceva dhammāyatanekadesassa ca nāmena,
atk-abh02a:194_1: tadavasesānañca āyatanānaṃ rūpena saṅgahitattā dvādasāpi āyatanāni nāmarūpamattameva honti.
atk-abh02a:195_0: Vitthārato pana ajjhattikesu tāva cakkhāyatanaṃ jātivasena cakkhupasādamattameva,
atk-abh02a:196_0: ‘Daṭṭhabbato’ti ettha pana sabbānevetāni āyatanāni anāgamanato aniggamanato ca daṭṭhabbāni.
atk-abh02a:196_1: Na hi tāni pubbe udayā kutoci āgacchanti,
atk-abh02a:196_9: ‘aho vata amhākaṃ sāmaggiyā viññāṇaṃ nāma uppajjeyyā’ti,
atk-abh02a:196_10: na ca tāni viññāṇuppādanatthaṃ dvārabhāvena vatthubhāvena ārammaṇabhāvena vā īhanti,
atk-abh02a:196_12: atha kho dhammatāvesā yaṃ cakkhurūpādīnaṃ sāmaggiyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīni sambhavanti.
atk-abh02a:196_14: Apica ajjhattikāni suññagāmo viya daṭṭhabbāni dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvavirahitattā,
atk-abh02a:196_19: Apica ajjhattikāni cha pāṇakā viya daṭṭhabbāni,
atk-abh02a:197_0: Idāni tesaṃ vipassitabbākāraṃ dassetuṃ cakkhuṃ aniccantiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:197_1: Tattha cakkhu tāva hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:198_1: Yasmā vā etaṃ uppannaṃ ṭhitiṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh02a:199_1: Yasmā vā etaṃ uppannaṃ ṭhitiṃ mā pāpuṇātu,
atk-abh02a:199_3: jarappataṃ mā bhijjatūti imesu tīsu ṭhānesu kassaci vasavattibhāvo natthi,
atk-abh02a:200_13: Cakkhu pana cakkhu ceva anattā cāti.
atk-abh02a:201_0: Imasmiṃ pana suttantabhājanīye tathāgatena kiṃ dassitanti?
atk-abh02a:201_2: Sammāsambuddho hi anattalakkhaṇaṃ dassento aniccena vā dasseti,
atk-abh02a:201_9: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:201_11: cakkhu attāti yo vadeyya iti cakkhu anattā”ti.
atk-abh02a:201_23: rūpaṃ anattā tasmā rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvattati;
atk-abh02a:201_26: evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī”ti imasmiṃ sutte dukkhena anattalakkhaṇaṃ dassesi. “Rūpaṃ,
atk-abh02a:201_32: na meso attā”tiādīsu aniccadukkhehi anattalakkhaṇaṃ dassesi. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:202_0: Hatthato hi taṭṭake vā sarake vā kismiñcideva vā patitvā bhinne ‘aho anicca’nti vadanti.
atk-abh02a:202_2: Attabhāvasmiṃ pana gaṇḍapiḷakādīsu vā uṭṭhitāsu khāṇukaṇṭakādīhi vā viddhāsu ‘aho dukkha’nti vadanti.
atk-abh02a:202_4: Anattalakkhaṇaṃ apākaṭaṃ andhakāraṃ avibhūtaṃ duppaṭivijjhaṃ duddīpanaṃ duppaññāpanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:202_5: Aniccadukkhalakkhaṇāni uppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ anuppādā vā paññāyanti.
atk-abh02a:202_8: Mahiddhikā hi mahānubhāvā tāpasaparibbājakā sarabhaṅgasatthārādayopi ‘aniccaṃ dukkha’nti vattuṃ sakkonti,
atk-abh02a:202_10: Sace hi te sampattaparisāya anattāti vattuṃ sakkuṇeyyuṃ,
atk-abh02a:202_15: Tasmā satthā anattalakkhaṇaṃ dassento aniccena vā dassesi,
atk-abh02a:202_18: Idha pana taṃ aniccadukkhehi dassesīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:203_0: Imāni pana lakkhaṇāni kissa amanasikārā appaṭivedhā,
atk-abh02a:203_12: Udayabbayaṃ pana pariggahetvā santatiyā vikopitāya aniccalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a:203_13: Abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṃ manasikatvā iriyāpathe ugghāṭite dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a:203_14: Nānādhātuyo vinibbhujitvā ghanavinibbhoge kate anattalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a:204_8: “Yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti vacanato pana tadeva khandhapañcakaṃ dukkhaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:204_11: “Yaṃ dukkhaṃ taṃ anattā”ti pana vacanato tadeva khandhapañcakaṃ anattā. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:204_18: aṭṭhārasa dhātuyoti idañhi sabbampi aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā nāma.
atk-abh02a:208_1: Abhidhammabhājanīye yathā heṭṭhā vipassakānaṃ upakāratthāya “cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpāyatana”nti yugalato āyatanāni vuttāni,
atk-abh02a:208_2: tathā avatvā ajjhattikabāhirānaṃ sabbākārato sabhāvadassanatthaṃ “cakkhāyatanaṃ sotāyatana”nti evaṃ ajjhattikabāhiravavatthānanayena vuttāni.
atk-abh02a:209_0: 156. Tesaṃ niddesavāre tattha katamaṃ cakkhāyatanantiādīni heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a:210_1: Yaṃ panetaṃ dhammāyatananiddese “tattha katamā asaṅkhatā dhātu?
atk-abh02a:211_8: idaṃ vuccati nibbāna”nti etaṃ jambukhādakasuttaṃ āharitvā ‘iminā suttena veditabbaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ nibbānaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-abh02a:211_11: ‘kiṃ pana yathā cetaṃ suttaṃ tathā attho’ti?
atk-abh02a:211_23: idaṃ vuccati arahatta”nti idaṃ tassevānantaraṃ ābhatasuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:212_3: Nibbānaṃ sacchikatvā viharanto dhammasenāpati nibbānaṃ pucchitopi arahattaṃ pucchitopi kilesakkhayameva āha.
atk-abh02a:212_4: Kiṃ pana nibbānañca arahattañca ekaṃ udāhu nāna’nti?
atk-abh02a:212_6: Ko ettha tayā atibahuṃ cuṇṇīkaraṇaṃ karontena attho’?
atk-abh02a:212_8: Nanu ñāte sādhu hotī’ti evaṃ punappunaṃ pucchito vañcetuṃ asakkonto āha –
atk-abh02a:212_9: ‘rāgādīnaṃ khīṇante uppannattā arahattaṃ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo’ti vuccatīti.
atk-abh02a:212_12: Lañjaṃ datvāpi taṃ vadāpento etadeva vadāpeyya.
atk-abh02a:212_13: Yatheva ca te etaṃ vibhajitvā kathitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:212_15: nibbānañhi āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti nibbānaṃ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:213_0: Sace evaṃ vutte saññattiṃ gacchati iccetaṃ kusalaṃ; no ce,
atk-abh02a:213_4: Dosakkhayo nāma dosasseva khayo udāhu rāgamohānampi?
atk-abh02a:213_5: Mohakkhayo nāma mohasseva khayo udāhu rāgadosānampī’ti?
atk-abh02a:214_4: tiṇṇaṃ akusalamūlānaṃ khaye tīṇi nibbānāni honti,
atk-abh02a:214_12: diyaḍḍhakilesasahassassa khaye pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ nibbānanti bahūni nibbānāni honti.
atk-abh02a:214_14: Evaṃ pana aggahetvā nibbānaṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṃ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:215_0: Sace pana evaṃ vuttepi na sallakkheti,
atk-abh02a:215_4: Tava vāde acchadīpimigamakkaṭādayo nibbānappattā nāma honti.
atk-abh02a:215_7: Evaṃ pana aggahetvā nibbānaṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṃ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:216_0: Sace pana evaṃ vuttepi na sallakkheti,
atk-abh02a:216_14: Tvaṃ akhīṇesuyeva kilesesu kilesakkhayaṃ nibbānaṃ paññapesi,
atk-abh02a:216_17: Evaṃ pana aggahetvā nibbānaṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṃ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:217_0: Sace pana evaṃ vuttepi na sallakkheti,
atk-abh02a:217_8: ‘khīṇāti vā khīyissantīti vā vattuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-abh02a:217_13: Maggo katamaṃ kilesakkhayaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā katame kilese khepeti?
atk-abh02a:217_15: Nibbānaṃ pana āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṃ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:218_6: “Evaṃ avijjā ca taṇhā ca taṃ āgamma,
atk-abh02a:219_0: Idhāpi dasāyatanāni kāmāvacarāni, dve pana catubhūmakāni lokiyalokuttaramissakānīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a:222_1: Idhāpi pañhāpucchake yaṃ labbhati yañca na labbhati,
atk-abh02a:222_2: taṃ sabbaṃ pucchitvā labbhamānavaseneva vissajjanaṃ vuttaṃ;
atk-abh02a:222_5: Idha pana dasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ rūpabhāvena abyākatatā veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:222_6: Dvinnaṃ āyatanānaṃ khandhavibhaṅge catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ viya kusalādibhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:222_7: Kevalañhi cattāro khandhā sappaccayāva saṅkhatāva dhammāyatanaṃ pana “siyā appaccayaṃ,
atk-abh02a:222_9: Ārammaṇattikesu ca anārammaṇaṃ sukhumarūpasaṅkhātaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ na-
atk-abh02a:222_11: Tañca kho anārammaṇattā na parittādibhāvena navattabbadhammārammaṇattāti ayamettha viseso.
atk-abh02a:222_13: Idhāpi hi cattāro khandhā viya dvāyatanā pañcapaṇṇāsa kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha rajjantassa dussantassa
atk-abh02a:222_14: muyhantassa saṃvarantassa sammasantassa paccavekkhantassa ca parittārammaṇāti sabbaṃ khandhesu vuttasadisamevāti.
atk-abh02a:227_1: Idāni tadanantare dhātuvibhaṅge sabbā dhātuyo chahi chahi dhātūhi saṅkhipitvā tīhi chakkehi suttantabhājanīyaṃ dassento cha dhātuyotiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:227_6: suññataṭṭho nāma nissattaṭṭhoti evaṃ sabhāvasuññatanissattaṭṭhena pathavīyeva dhātu pathavīdhātu.
atk-abh02a:228_2: Ayaṃ pathavīdhātu nāma na ekā eva ajjhattikabāhirabhedena pana dve dhātuyo evāti attho.
atk-abh02a:228_8: Idāni taṃ sabhāvākārato dassetuṃ kakkhaḷantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:228_15: Sarīraṭṭhakañhi kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ vā hotu mā vā,
atk-abh02a:228_17: ādinnaggahitaparāmaṭṭhavasena pana sabbampetaṃ upādinnamevāti dassetuṃ “ajjhattaṃ upādinna”nti āha.
atk-abh02a:229_0: Idāni tameva pathavīdhātuṃ vatthuvasena dassetuṃ seyyathidaṃ kesā lomātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:229_3: yā sā ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu sā katamā?
atk-abh02a:229_4: Yaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ nāma taṃ katamanti?
atk-abh02a:229_5: Kesā lomātiādi tassā ajjhattikāya pathavīdhātuyā vatthuvasena pabhedadassanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:229_7: kesā nāma ajjhattā upādinnā sarīraṭṭhakā kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇā imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso.
atk-abh02a:229_10: Idha pana avuttampi paṭisambhidāmagge pāḷiāruḷhaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ āharitvā matthaluṅgaṃ nāma ajjhattaṃ upādinnaṃ
atk-abh02a:229_11: sarīraṭṭhakaṃ kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇaṃ imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso.
atk-abh02a:229_12: Parato āpodhātuādīnaṃ niddese pittādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:230_2: Imasmiṃ pana dhātumanasikāre kammaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā uttamatthaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇitukāmena kiṃ kattabbaṃ?
atk-abh02a:230_6: Visuddhasīlena pana sīle patiṭṭhāya dasa pubbapalibodhā chinditabbā.
atk-abh02a:230_9: Ācariyenāpi dhātumanasikārakammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhāpentena sattavidhaṃ uggahakosallaṃ dasavidhañca manasikārakosallaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:230_10: Antevāsikenāpi ācariyassa santike bahuvāre sajjhāyaṃ katvā nijjaṭaṃ paguṇaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:230_12: “ādikammikena bhikkhunā jarāmaraṇā muccitukāmena sattahākārehi uggahakosallaṃ icchitabbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:231_2: paricchedatoti imehi sattahākārehi imasmiṃ dhātumanasikārakammaṭṭhāne ‘uggahakosallaṃ’ icchitabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:231_10: tayo ca suttantāti imehi dasahākārehi ‘manasikārakosallaṃ’ icchitabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:232_0: Evaṃ uggahitakammaṭṭhānena pana visuddhimagge vutte aṭṭhārasa senāsanadose vajjetvā pañcaṅgasamannāgate
atk-abh02a:232_1: senāsane vasantena attanāpi pañcahi padhāniyaṅgehi samannāgatena pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantena
atk-abh02a:232_3: Manasikarontena ca vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena kesādīsu ekekakoṭṭhāsaṃ manasikaritvā avasāne evaṃ manasikāro pavattetabbo –
atk-abh02a:232_5: Tattha yathā vammikamatthake jātesu kuṇṭhatiṇesu na vammikamatthako jānāti ‘mayi kuṇṭhatiṇāni jātānī’ti,
atk-abh02a:232_7: evameva na sīsakaṭāhapaliveṭhanacammaṃ jānāti ‘mayi kesā jātā’ti,
atk-abh02a:232_10: Iti kesā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:233_1: Tattha yathā suññagāmaṭṭhāne jātesu dabbatiṇesu na suññagāmaṭṭhānaṃ jānāti ‘mayi dabbatiṇāni jātānī’ti,
atk-abh02a:233_3: evameva na sarīraveṭhanacammaṃ jānāti ‘mayi lomā jātā’ti,
atk-abh02a:233_6: Iti lomā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:234_1: Tattha yathā kumārakesu daṇḍakehi madhukaṭṭhike vijjhitvā kīḷantesu na daṇḍakā jānanti ‘amhesu madhukaṭṭhikā ṭhapitā’ti,
atk-abh02a:234_3: evameva na aṅguliyo jānanti ‘amhākaṃ aggesu nakhā jātā’ti,
atk-abh02a:234_4: nāpi nakhā jānanti ‘mayaṃ aṅgulīnaṃ aggesu jātā’ti.
atk-abh02a:234_6: Iti nakhā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:235_1: Tattha yathā vaḍḍhakīhi pāsāṇaudukkhalesu kenacideva silesajātena bandhitvā ṭhapitathambhesu na udukkhalāni jānanti ‘amhesu thambhā ṭhitā’ti,
atk-abh02a:235_3: evameva na hanukaṭṭhikā jānanti ‘amhesu dantā jātā’ti,
atk-abh02a:235_6: Iti dantā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:236_1: Tattha yathā allagocammapariyonaddhāya mahāvīṇāya na mahāvīṇā jānāti ‘ahaṃ allagocammena pariyonaddhā’ti,
atk-abh02a:236_3: evameva na sarīraṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ tacena pariyonaddha’nti,
atk-abh02a:236_6: Iti taco nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:237_1: Tattha yathā mahāmattikāya littāya bhittiyā na bhitti jānāti ‘ahaṃ mahāmattikāya littā’ti,
atk-abh02a:237_3: evameva na aṭṭhisaṅghāṭo jānāti ‘ahaṃ navamaṃsapesisatappabhedena maṃsena litto’ti,
atk-abh02a:237_6: Iti maṃsaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:238_1: Tattha yathā vallīhi vinaddhesu kuṭṭadārūsu na kuṭṭadārūni jānanti ‘mayaṃ vallīhi vinaddhānī’ti,
atk-abh02a:238_3: evameva na aṭṭhīni jānanti ‘mayaṃ nhārūhi ābaddhānī’ti,
atk-abh02a:238_6: Iti nhāru nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:240_0: Tattha yathā iṭṭhakadārugomayādisañcayesu na heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā jānanti ‘mayaṃ uparime uparime ukkhipitvā ṭhitā’ti,
atk-abh02a:240_1: nāpi uparimā uparimā jānanti ‘mayaṃ heṭṭhimesu heṭṭhimesu patiṭṭhitā’ti,
atk-abh02a:240_2: evameva na paṇhikaṭṭhi jānāti ‘ahaṃ gopphakaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:240_3: na gopphakaṭṭhi jānāti ‘ahaṃ jaṅghaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:240_4: na jaṅghaṭṭhi jānāti ‘ahaṃ ūruṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:240_5: na ūruṭṭhi jānāti ‘ahaṃ kaṭiṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:240_6: na kaṭiṭṭhi jānāti ‘ahaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:240_7: na piṭṭhikaṇṭako jānāti ‘ahaṃ gīvaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhito’ti,
atk-abh02a:240_8: na gīvaṭṭhi jānāti ‘ahaṃ sīsaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:240_17: Iti aṭṭhi nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:241_0: Aṭṭhimiñjaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantare ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:241_1: Tattha yathā veḷupabbādīnaṃ anto pakkhittesu sinnavettaggādīsu na veḷupabbādīni jānanti ‘amhesu vettaggādīni pakkhittānī’ti,
atk-abh02a:241_3: evameva na aṭṭhīni jānanti ‘amhākaṃ anto aṭṭhimiñjaṃ ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:241_4: nāpi aṭṭhimiñjaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ anto ṭhita’nti.
atk-abh02a:241_6: Iti aṭṭhimiñjaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:242_0: Vakkaṃ galavāṭakato nikkhantena ekamūlena thokaṃ gantvā dvidhā bhinnena thūlanhārunā vinibaddhaṃ hutvā hadayamaṃsaṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:242_1: Tattha yathā vaṇṭupanibaddhe ambaphaladvaye na vaṇṭaṃ jānāti ‘mayā ambaphaladvayaṃ upanibaddha’nti,
atk-abh02a:242_3: evameva na thūlanhāru jānāti ‘mayā vakkaṃ upanibaddha’nti,
atk-abh02a:242_6: Iti vakkaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:243_1: Tattha yathā jiṇṇasandamānikapañjarabbhantaraṃ nissāya ṭhapitāya maṃsapesiyā na jiṇṇasandamānikapañjarabbhantaraṃ
atk-abh02a:243_3: nāpi maṃsapesi jānāti ‘ahaṃ jiṇṇasandamānikapañjarabbhantaraṃ nissāya ṭhitā’ti,
atk-abh02a:243_4: evameva na uraṭṭhipañjarabbhantaraṃ jānāti ‘maṃ nissāya hadayaṃ ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:243_5: nāpi hadayaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ uraṭṭhipañjarabbhantaraṃ nissāya ṭhita’nti.
atk-abh02a:243_7: Iti hadayaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:244_0: Yakanaṃ antosarīre dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ abbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:244_1: Tattha yathā ukkhalikapālapassamhi lagge yamakamaṃsapiṇḍe na ukkhalikapālapassaṃ jānāti ‘mayi yamakamaṃsapiṇḍo laggo’ti,
atk-abh02a:244_3: evameva na thanānaṃ abbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ jānāti ‘maṃ nissāya yakanaṃ ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:244_4: nāpi yakanaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ thanānaṃ abbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya ṭhita’nti.
atk-abh02a:244_6: Iti yakanaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:245_0: Kilomakesu paṭicchannakilomakaṃ hadayañca vakkañca parivāretvā ṭhitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:245_1: apaṭicchannakilomakaṃ sakalasarīre cammassa heṭṭhato maṃsaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:245_2: Tattha yathā pilotikapaliveṭhite maṃse na maṃsaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ pilotikāya paliveṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:245_4: evameva na vakkahadayāni sakalasarīre maṃsañca jānāti ‘ahaṃ kilomakena paṭicchanna’nti,
atk-abh02a:245_5: nāpi kilomakaṃ jānāti ‘mayā vakkahadayāni sakalasarīre maṃsañca paṭicchanna’nti.
atk-abh02a:245_7: Iti kilomakaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:246_0: Pihakaṃ hadayassa vāmapasse udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:246_1: Tattha yathā koṭṭhakamatthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitāya gomayapiṇḍiyā na koṭṭhakamatthakapassaṃ jānāti ‘gomayapiṇḍi maṃ nissāya ṭhitā’ti,
atk-abh02a:246_2: nāpi gomayapiṇḍi jānāti ‘ahaṃ koṭṭhakamatthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitā’ti,
atk-abh02a:246_3: evameva na udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ jānāti ‘pihakaṃ maṃ nissāya ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:246_4: nāpi pihakaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhita’nti.
atk-abh02a:246_6: Iti pihakaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:247_0: Papphāsaṃ sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ abbhantare hadayañca yakanañca uparichādetvā olambantaṃ ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:247_1: Tattha yathā jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantare olambamāne sakuṇakulāvake na jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantaraṃ jānāti ‘mayi sakuṇakulāvako olambamāno ṭhito’ti,
atk-abh02a:247_2: nāpi sakuṇakulāvako jānāti ‘ahaṃ jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantare olambamāno ṭhito’ti,
atk-abh02a:247_3: evameva na sarīrabbhantaraṃ jānāti ‘mayi papphāsaṃ olambamānaṃ ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:247_4: nāpi papphāsaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ evarūpe sarīrabbhantare olambamānaṃ ṭhita’nti.
atk-abh02a:247_6: Iti papphāsaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:248_1: Tattha yathā lohitadoṇikāya obhujitvā ṭhapite chinnasīsadhamanikaḷevare na lohitadoṇi jānāti ‘mayi dhamanikaḷevaraṃ ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:248_3: evameva na sarīrabbhantaraṃ jānāti ‘mayi antaṃ ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:248_6: Iti antaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:249_0: Antaguṇaṃ antantare ekavīsati antabhoge bandhitvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:249_1: Tattha yathā pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ sibbetvā ṭhitesu rajjukesu na pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ jānāti ‘rajjukā maṃ sibbetvā ṭhitā’ti,
atk-abh02a:249_2: nāpi rajjukā jānanti ‘mayaṃ pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ sibbetvā ṭhitā’ti,
atk-abh02a:249_3: evameva na antaṃ jānāti ‘antaguṇaṃ maṃ ābandhitvā ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:249_4: nāpi antaguṇaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ antaṃ bandhitvā ṭhita’nti.
atk-abh02a:249_6: Iti antaguṇaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:250_1: Tattha yathā suvānadoṇiyaṃ ṭhite suvānavamathumhi na suvānadoṇi jānāti ‘mayi suvānavamathu ṭhito’ti,
atk-abh02a:250_3: evameva na udaraṃ jānāti ‘mayi udariyaṃ ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:250_6: Iti udariyaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:251_1: Tattha yathā veḷupabbe omadditvā pakkhittāya saṇhapaṇḍumattikāya na veḷupabbaṃ jānāti ‘mayi paṇḍumattikā ṭhitā’ti,
atk-abh02a:251_3: evameva na pakkāsayo jānāti ‘mayi karīsaṃ ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:251_6: Iti karīsaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:252_1: Tattha yathā purāṇalābukaṭāhe pakkhittāya piṭṭhapiṇḍiyā na lābukaṭāhaṃ jānāti ‘mayi piṭṭhapiṇḍi ṭhitā’ti,
atk-abh02a:252_3: evameva na sīsakaṭāhabbhantaraṃ jānāti ‘mayi matthaluṅgaṃ ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:252_6: Iti matthaluṅgaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
atk-abh02a:253_0: Yaṃ vā panaññampīti iminā āpokoṭṭhāsādīsu tīsu anugataṃ pathavīdhātuṃ lakkhaṇavasena yevāpanakaṃ pathaviṃ katvā dasseti.
atk-abh02a:254_5: Tattha ayo, sajjhu, suvaṇṇaṃ, tipu, sīsaṃ,
atk-abh02a:254_17: Tesu pañca jātilohāni pāḷiyaṃ visuṃ vuttāneva.
atk-abh02a:254_19: vekantakalohanti imehi pana dvīhi jātilohehi saddhiṃ sesaṃ sabbampi idha lohanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:255_4: Maṇīti ṭhapetvā pāḷiāgate veḷuriyādayo seso jotirasādibhedo sabbopi maṇi.
atk-abh02a:255_15: Tiṇādīsu bahisārā antamaso nāḷikerādayopi tiṇaṃ nāma.
atk-abh02a:255_17: Sakkharāti muggamattato yāva muṭṭhippamāṇā marumbā sakkharā nāma.
atk-abh02a:255_21: Pāsāṇoti antomuṭṭhiyaṃ asaṇṭhahanato paṭṭhāya hatthippamāṇaṃ asampatto pāsāṇo nāma.
atk-abh02a:255_22: Hatthippamāṇato paṭṭhāya pana upari pabbato nāma.
atk-abh02a:255_23: Yaṃ vā panāti iminā tālaṭṭhi- nāḷikera-
atk-abh02a:255_25: Yā ca ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu yā ca bāhirāti iminā dvepi pathavīdhātuyo kakkhaḷaṭṭhena lakkhaṇato ekā pathavīdhātu evāti dasseti.
atk-abh02a:256_7: Pittaṃ semhantiādīnipi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena pariggahetvā dhātuvaseneva manasikātabbāni.
atk-abh02a:257_1: pittesu hi abaddhapittaṃ jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhaṃ sakalasarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:257_3: Tattha yathā pūvaṃ byāpetvā ṭhite tele na pūvaṃ jānāti ‘telaṃ maṃ byāpetvā ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:257_4: nāpi telaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ pūvaṃ byāpetvā ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:257_5: evameva na sarīraṃ jānāti ‘abaddhapittaṃ maṃ byāpetvā ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:257_6: nāpi abaddhapittaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ sarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhita’nti.
atk-abh02a:257_7: Yathā ca vassodakena puṇṇe kosātakīkosake na kosātakīkosako jānāti ‘mayi vassodakaṃ ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:257_9: evameva na pittakosako jānāti mayi baddhapittaṃ ṭhitanti,
atk-abh02a:257_12: Iti pittaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
atk-abh02a:258_1: Tattha yathā upari sañjātapheṇapaṭalāya candanikāya na candanikā jānāti ‘mayi pheṇapaṭalaṃ ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:258_3: evameva na udarapaṭalaṃ jānāti ‘mayi semhaṃ ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:258_6: Iti semhaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
atk-abh02a:259_1: yattha yattheva khāṇukaṇṭakappaharaṇaaggijālādīhi abhihaṭe sarīrappadese lohitaṃ saṇṭhahitvā paccati,
atk-abh02a:259_4: Tattha yathā pharasuppahārādivasena paggharitaniyāse rukkhe na rukkhassa pharasuppahārādippadesā jānanti ‘amhesu niyyāso ṭhito’ti,
atk-abh02a:259_5: nāpi niyyāso jānāti ‘ahaṃ rukkhassa pharasuppahārādippadesesu ṭhito’ti,
atk-abh02a:259_6: evameva na sarīrassa khāṇukaṇṭakādīhi abhihaṭappadesā jānanti ‘amhesu pubbo ṭhito’ti,
atk-abh02a:259_7: nāpi pubbo jānāti ‘ahaṃ tesu padesesu ṭhito’ti.
atk-abh02a:259_9: Iti pubbo nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
atk-abh02a:260_0: Lohitesu saṃsaraṇalohitaṃ abaddhapittaṃ viya sakalasarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:260_1: Sannicitalohitaṃ yakanaṭṭhānassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ pūretvā ekapattapūraṇappamāṇaṃ vakkahadayayakanapapphāsāni tementaṃ ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:260_3: Itaraṃ pana yathā jajjarakapālaṭṭhe udake heṭṭhā leḍḍukhaṇḍāni temayamāne na leḍḍukhaṇḍāni jānanti ‘mayaṃ udakena temiyamānā ṭhitā’ti,
atk-abh02a:260_5: evameva na yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṭṭhānaṃ vakkādīni vā jānanti ‘mayi lohitaṃ ṭhitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:260_7: nāpi lohitaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ pūretvā vakkādīni temayamānaṃ ṭhita’nti.
atk-abh02a:260_9: Iti lohitaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
atk-abh02a:261_0: Sedo aggisantāpādikālesu kesalomakūpavivarāni pūretvā tiṭṭhati ceva paggharati ca.
atk-abh02a:261_1: Tattha yathā udakā abbūḷhamattesu bhisamuḷālakumudanāḷakalāpesu na bhisādikalāpavivarāni jānanti ‘amhehi udakaṃ paggharatī’ti,
atk-abh02a:261_2: nāpi bhisādikalāpavivarehi paggharantaṃ udakaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ bhisādikalāpavivarehi paggharāmī’ti,
atk-abh02a:261_3: evameva na kesalomakūpavivarāni jānanti ‘amhehi sedo paggharatī’ti,
atk-abh02a:261_6: Iti sedo nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
atk-abh02a:262_0: Medo thūlassa sakalasarīraṃ pharitvā kisassa jaṅghamaṃsādīni nissāya ṭhito patthinnasneho.
atk-abh02a:262_1: Tattha yathā haliddipilotikapaṭicchanne maṃsapuñje na maṃsapuñjo jānāti ‘maṃ nissāya haliddipilotikā ṭhitā’ti,
atk-abh02a:262_2: nāpi haliddipilotikā jānāti ‘ahaṃ maṃsapuñjaṃ nissāya ṭhitā’ti,
atk-abh02a:262_3: evameva na sakalasarīre jaṅghādīsu vā maṃsaṃ jānāti ‘maṃ nissāya medo ṭhito’ti,
atk-abh02a:262_4: nāpi medo jānāti ‘ahaṃ sakalasarīre jaṅghādīsu vā maṃsaṃ nissāya ṭhito’ti.
atk-abh02a:262_6: Iti medo nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto patthinnasneho patthinnayūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
atk-abh02a:263_0: Assu yadā sañjāyati tadā akkhikūpake pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā.
atk-abh02a:263_1: Tattha yathā udakapuṇṇesu taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesu na taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakā jānanti ‘amhesu udakaṃ ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:263_3: evameva na akkhikūpakā jānanti ‘amhesu assu ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:263_6: Iti assu nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
atk-abh02a:264_1: Tattha yathā pakkhittatele ācāme na ācāmo jānāti ‘maṃ telaṃ ajjhottharitvā ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:264_2: nāpi telaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ ācāmaṃ ajjhottharitvā ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:264_3: evameva na hatthatalādippadeso jānāti ‘maṃ vasā ajjhottharitvā ṭhitā’ti,
atk-abh02a:264_4: nāpi vasā jānāti ‘ahaṃ hatthatalādippadese ajjhottharitvā ṭhitā’ti.
atk-abh02a:264_6: Iti vasā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
atk-abh02a:265_0: Kheḷo tathārūpe kheḷuppattipaccaye sati ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā jivhāya tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh02a:265_1: Tattha yathā abbocchinnaudakanissande nadītīrakūpake na kūpatalaṃ jānāti ‘mayi udakaṃ santiṭṭhatī’ti,
atk-abh02a:265_3: evameva na jivhātalaṃ jānāti ‘mayi ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā kheḷo ṭhito’ti,
atk-abh02a:265_4: nāpi kheḷo jānāti ‘ahaṃ ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā jivhātale ṭhito’ti.
atk-abh02a:265_6: Iti kheḷo nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
atk-abh02a:266_0: Siṅghāṇikā yadā sañjāyati tadā nāsāpuṭe pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā.
atk-abh02a:266_1: Tattha yathā pūtidadhibharitāya sippikāya na sippikā jānāti ‘mayi pūtidadhi ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:266_3: evameva na nāsāpuṭā jānanti ‘amhesu siṅghāṇikā ṭhitā’ti,
atk-abh02a:266_6: Iti siṅghāṇikā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
atk-abh02a:267_0: Lasikā aṭṭhikasandhīnaṃ abbhañjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā asītisatasandhīsu ṭhitā.
atk-abh02a:267_1: Tattha yathā telabbhañjite akkhe na akkho jānāti ‘maṃ telaṃ abbhañjitvā ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:267_2: nāpi telaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ akkhaṃ abbhañjitvā ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:267_3: evameva na asītisatasandhayo jānanti ‘lasikā amhe abbhañjitvā ṭhitā’ti,
atk-abh02a:267_4: nāpi lasikā jānāti ‘ahaṃ asītisatasandhayo abbhañjitvā ṭhitā’ti.
atk-abh02a:267_6: Iti lasikā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
atk-abh02a:268_1: Tattha yathā candanikāya pakkhitte adhomukhe ravaṇaghaṭe na ravaṇaghaṭo jānāti ‘mayi candanikāraso ṭhito’ti,
atk-abh02a:268_3: evameva na vatthi jānāti ‘mayi muttaṃ ṭhita’nti,
atk-abh02a:268_6: Iti muttaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
atk-abh02a:268_7: Yaṃ vā panāti avasesesu tīsu koṭṭhāsesu āpodhātuṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:269_0: Bāhiraāpodhātuniddese mūlaṃ paṭicca nibbatto raso mūlaraso nāma.
atk-abh02a:269_3: Yathā pana bhesajjasikkhāpade evamidha niyamo natthi.
atk-abh02a:269_8: Yaṃ vā panāti himodakakappavināsakaudakapathavīsandhārakaudakādīni idha yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhāni.
atk-abh02a:270_10: Yena ca jīrīyatīti yena ayaṃ kāyo jīrīyati,
atk-abh02a:270_12: Yena ca pariḍayhatīti yena kuppitena ayaṃ kāyo ḍayhati,
atk-abh02a:270_13: so ca puggalo ‘ḍayhāmi ḍayhāmī’ti kandanto satadhotasappigosītacandanādilepanañceva tālavaṇṭavātañca paccāsīsati.
atk-abh02a:270_14: Yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchatīti yenetaṃ asitaṃ vā odanādi,
atk-abh02a:270_17: sāyitaṃ vā ambapakkamadhuphāṇitādi sammā paripākaṃ gacchati,
atk-abh02a:270_19: Ettha ca purimā tayo tejodhātū catusamuṭṭhānā,
atk-abh02a:271_2: ayaṃ imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto paripācanākāro tejodhātū’ti manasi karoti;
atk-abh02a:271_6: ayaṃ imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto paripācanākāro tejodhātū’ti manasi karoti.
atk-abh02a:271_7: Yaṃ vā panāti imasmiṃ sarīre pākatiko eko utu atthi,
atk-abh02a:272_0: Bāhiratejodhātuniddese kaṭṭhaṃ paṭicca pajjalito kaṭṭhupādāno aggi kaṭṭhaggi nāma.
atk-abh02a:272_4: Aggisantāpoti jālāya vā vītaccikaṅgārānaṃ vā santāpo.
atk-abh02a:272_8: Yaṃ vā panāti petaggi kappavināsaggi nirayaggiādayo idha yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā.
atk-abh02a:273_4: Uddhaṅgamā vātāti uggārahikkādi pavattakā uddhaṃ ārohanavātā.
atk-abh02a:273_8: Aṅgamaṅgānusārino vātāti dhamanijālānusārena sakalasarīre aṅgamaṅgāni anusaṭā samiñjanapasāraṇādinibbattakā vātā.
atk-abh02a:273_9: Satthakavātāti sandhibandhanāni kattariyā chindantā viya pavattavātā.
atk-abh02a:274_1: idha bhikkhu uddhaṅgamādibhede vāte uddhaṅgamādivasena pariggahetvā ‘uddhaṅgamā vātā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre
atk-abh02a:274_2: pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto vitthambhanākāro vāyodhātū’ti manasi karoti.
atk-abh02a:274_4: Yaṃ vā panāti sese vāyokoṭṭhāse anugatā vātā idha yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā.
atk-abh02a:275_0: Bāhiravāyodhātuniddese puratthimā vātāti puratthimadisato āgatā vātā.
atk-abh02a:275_3: Arajā vātāti rajavirahitā suddhā arajā nāma.
atk-abh02a:275_14: Kāmañca imepi pakkhavātāva ussadavasena pana visuṃ gahitā.
atk-abh02a:275_15: Tālavaṇṭavātāti tālapaṇṇehi vā aññena vā kenaci maṇḍalasaṇṭhānena samuṭṭhāpitā vātā.
atk-abh02a:275_17: Imāni ca tālavaṇṭavidhūpanāni anuppannampi vātaṃ uppādenti,
atk-abh02a:275_19: Yaṃ vā panāti idha pāḷiāgate ṭhapetvā sesavātā yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā.
atk-abh02a:276_9: Tattha kaṇṇacchiddanti kaṇṇasmiṃ chiddaṃ vivaraṃ maṃsalohitehi asamphuṭṭhokāso.
atk-abh02a:276_11: Yenāti yena vivarena etaṃ asitādibhedaṃ ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ ajjhoharati,
atk-abh02a:276_13: Yatthāti yasmiṃ antoudarapaṭalasaṅkhāte okāse etadeva catubbidhaṃ ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh02a:276_14: Yenāti yena vivarena sabbampetaṃ vipakkaṃ kasaṭabhāvaṃ āpannaṃ nikkhamati,
atk-abh02a:276_15: taṃ udarapaṭalato yāva karīsamaggā vidatthicaturaṅgulamattaṃ chiddaṃ maṃsalohitehi asamphuṭṭhaṃ nissaṭaṃ ākāsadhātūti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:276_16: Yaṃ vā panāti ettha cammantaraṃ maṃsantaraṃ nhāruntaraṃ aṭṭhintaraṃ lomantaranti idaṃ sabbaṃ yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:277_0: Bāhirakaākāsadhātuniddese asamphuṭṭhaṃ catūhi mahābhūtehīti catūhi mahābhūtehi nissaṭaṃ bhittichiddakavāṭachiddādikaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:277_1: Iminā yasmiṃ ākāse parikammaṃ karontassa catukkapañcakajjhānāni uppajjanti taṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:278_3: Iti imāsu chasu dhātūsu pariggahitāsu aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo pariggahitāva honti. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh02a:278_6: viññāṇadhātuggahaṇena tassā purecārikapacchācārikattā manodhātu gahitāva hoti.
atk-abh02a:278_11: Evaṃ sotaviññāṇadhātuādiggahaṇena sotadhātuādayoti aṭṭhārasāpi gahitāva honti.
atk-abh02a:278_12: Tāsu dasahi dhātūhi rūpapariggaho kathito hoti.
atk-abh02a:278_22: Taṃpajānano maggo maggasaccanti idaṃ catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ aṭṭhārasadhātuvasena abhiniviṭṭhassa bhikkhuno
atk-abh02a:278_23: yāva arahattā matthakaṃ pāpetvā nigamanaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:279_1: Idāni dutiyachakkaṃ dassento aparāpi cha dhātuyotiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:279_2: Tattha sukhadhātu dukkhadhātūti kāyappasādavatthukāni sukhadukkhāni sappaṭipakkhavasena yugaḷakato dassitāni.
atk-abh02a:279_5: Yattakaṃ sukhena pharitaṭṭhānaṃ tattakaṃ dukkhaṃ pharati.
atk-abh02a:279_6: Yattakaṃ dukkhena pharitaṭṭhānaṃ tattakaṃ sukhaṃ pharati.
atk-abh02a:279_7: Somanassadhātu domanassadhātūti idampi tatheva yugaḷakaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh02a:279_10: Yattakaṃ somanassena pharitaṭṭhānaṃ tattakaṃ domanassaṃ pharati.
atk-abh02a:279_11: Yattakaṃ domanassena pharitaṭṭhānaṃ tattakaṃ somanassaṃ pharati.
atk-abh02a:280_0: Upekkhādhātu avijjādhātūti idaṃ pana dvayaṃ sarikkhakavasena yugaḷakaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh02a:280_5: Somanassadomanassadhātuggahaṇena taṃ sampayuttā manoviññāṇadhātu gahitā hoti.
atk-abh02a:280_8: tāsaṃyeva vatthārammaṇabhūtā cakkhudhāturūpadhātuādayo ca gahitāti evaṃ aṭṭhārasapi dhātuyo gahitāva honti.
atk-abh02a:280_9: Idāni tāsu dasahi dhātūhi rūpapariggahotiādi sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:280_10: Evampi ekassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā matthakaṃ pāpetvā nigamanaṃ kathitaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:280_11: Tattha katamā sukhadhātu yaṃ kāyikaṃ sātanti ādīni heṭṭhā vuttanayāneva.
atk-abh02a:281_3: Tattha kilesakāmaṃ sandhāya kāmapaṭisaṃyuttā dhātu kāmadhātu,
atk-abh02a:281_15: Ayaṃ pana heṭṭhā anāgatattā evaṃ atthādivibhāgato veditabbā –
atk-abh02a:282_1: Idāni tamevatthaṃ dassetuṃ tattha katamā kāmadhātūti padabhājanaṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:283_4: Ettha ca purimehi tīhi upacārappattāpi appanāpatāpi mettā kathitā,
atk-abh02a:284_5: Ubhayatthāpi ca pariyosānapade mettākaruṇāti cetovimuttivisesanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:285_0: Ettha ca kāmavitakko sattesupi uppajjati saṅkhāresupi.
atk-abh02a:285_2: Byāpādo pana sattesu uppannoyeva kammapathaṃ bhindati, na itaro.
atk-abh02a:285_7: Kāmadhātuyāyeva pana nīharitvā nīharitvā dvepi etā dassitāti.
atk-abh02a:285_9: Ṭhapetvā pana byāpādavihiṃsādhātuyo sesā sabbāpi kāmadhātu evāti.
atk-abh02a:285_12: Nekkhammadhātuto pana nīharitvā nīharitvā tadubhayampi dassitanti ayametthāpi sabbasaṅgāhikakathā.
atk-abh02a:285_13: Ṭhapetvā abyāpādaavihiṃsādhātuyo avasesā nekkhammadhātūti ayaṃ asambhinnakathā nāma.
atk-abh02a:286_0: Imāhi ca chahi dhātūhi pariggahitā hi aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo pariggahitāva honti.
atk-abh02a:286_1: Sabbāpi hi tā kāmadhātutova nīharitvā nīharitvā labhāpetabbā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyova hontīti tiṇṇaṃ chakkānaṃ vasena aṭṭhārasa honti.
atk-abh02a:286_2: Evaṃ pana aggahetvā ekekasmiṃ chakke vuttanayena aṭṭhārasa aṭṭhārasa katvā sabbānipi tāni aṭṭhārasakāni
atk-abh02a:286_4: Iti imasmiṃ suttantabhājanīye soḷasa dhātuyo kāmāvacarā,
atk-abh02a:286_5: dve tebhūmikāti evamettha sammasanacārova kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:289_1: Abhidhammabhājanīye sarūpeneva sabbāpi dhātuyo dassento aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo –
atk-abh02a:292_2: Cakkhussa viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇanti evamādinā tāva nayena cakkhādīnaṃ visesatthato veditabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a:292_6: Lokiyā hi dhātuyo kāraṇabhāvena vavatthitā hutvā suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo viya suvaṇṇarajatādiṃ anekappakāraṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ vidahanti;
atk-abh02a:292_7: bhārahārehi ca bhāro viya sattehi dhīyante dhārīyanteti attho.
atk-abh02a:292_9: Etāhi ca karaṇabhūtāhi saṃsāradukkhaṃ sattehi anuvidhīyati;
atk-abh02a:292_11: Iti cakkhādīsu ekeko dhammo yathāsambhavaṃ vidahati dhīyatetiādiatthavasena dhātūti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:293_0: Apica yathā titthiyānaṃ attā nāma sabhāvato natthi,
atk-abh02a:293_2: Etā pana attano sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyo.
atk-abh02a:293_3: Yathā ca loke vicittā haritālamanosilādayo silāvayavā dhātuyoti vuccanti,
