atk-abh02a:293_6: Yathā vā sarīrasaṅkhātassa samudāyassa avayavabhūtesu rasasoṇitādīsu aññamaññaṃ visabhāgalakkhaṇaparicchinnesu dhātusamaññā,
atk-abh02a:293_7: evametesupi pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātassa attabhāvassa avayavesu dhātusamaññā veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:293_13: Tasmā yathāvuttenatthena cakkhu ca taṃ dhātu cāti cakkhudhātu …pe…
atk-abh02a:293_14: manoviññāṇañca taṃ dhātu cāti manoviññāṇadhātūti evaṃ tāvettha atthato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a:294_1: Tāni ca pana tesaṃ lakkhaṇādīni heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a:295_0: ‘Kamato’ti idhāpi pubbe vuttesu uppattikkamādīsu desanākkamova yujjati.
atk-abh02a:297_0: Evaṃ sati sabbāsaṃ vasena paricchedaṃ akatvā kasmā aṭṭhārasāti ayameva paricchedo katoti ce?
atk-abh02a:297_7: kusalavipākārammaṇā vā rūpādayo eva subhadhātūti rūpādimattamevesā.
atk-abh02a:297_17: yathāha “heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā uparito paranimmitavasavattideve antokaritvā yaṃ etasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:297_18: antare etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā, rūpā, vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā,
atk-abh02a:297_22: “sabbepi kusalā dhammā nekkhammadhātū”ti vā vacanato manoviññāṇadhātupi hotiyeva.
atk-abh02a:298_2: Majjhimapaṇītā cakkhādayo majjhimā ceva paṇītā ca dhātū.
atk-abh02a:298_4: Lokiyā kusalābyākatā ubhopi cakkhudhātuādayo ca majjhimadhātu.
atk-abh02a:298_12: Iti sabhāvato vijjamānānaṃ sabbadhātūnaṃ tadantogadhattā aṭṭhāraseva vuttāti.
atk-abh02a:299_0: Apica vijānanasabhāve viññāṇe jīvasaññīnaṃ jīvasaññāsamūhanatthampi aṭṭhāraseva vuttā.
atk-abh02a:299_1: Santi hi sattā vijānanasabhāve viññāṇe jīvasaññino.
atk-abh02a:299_3: cakkhurūpādipaccayāyattavuttitāya aniccatañca pakāsetvā dīgharattānusayitaṃ jīvasaññaṃ samūhanitukāmena bhagavatā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo pakāsitā.
atk-abh02a:299_6: ye ca imāya nātisaṅkhepavitthārāya desanāya veneyyā sattā,
atk-abh02a:305_0: ‘Saṅkhato’ti cakkhudhātu tāva jātito eko dhammotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati cakkhupasādavasena.
atk-abh02a:305_2: Phoṭṭhabbadhātu pana pathavītejovāyovasena tayo dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh02a:305_3: Cakkhuviññāṇadhātu kusalākusalavipākavasena dve dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh02a:305_5: Manodhātu pana pañcadvārāvajjanakusalākusalavipākasampaṭicchanavasena tayo dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh02a:305_8: asaṅkhatāya ca dhātuyā vasena vīsatidhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh02a:305_9: Manoviññāṇadhātu sesakusalākusalābyākataviññāṇavasena chasattatidhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti evamettha ‘saṅkhato’ veditabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a:306_1: So panetesaṃ paccayabhāvo niddesavāre āvi bhavissati.
atk-abh02a:307_1: Sabbā eva hi saṅkhatā dhātuyo pubbantāparantavivittato,
atk-abh02a:307_4: Visesato panettha bheritalaṃ viya cakkhudhātu daṭṭhabbā,
atk-abh02a:308_0: Manodhātu pana yathāsambhavato cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīnaṃ purecarānucarā viya daṭṭhabbā.
atk-abh02a:308_1: Dhammadhātuyā vedanākkhandho sallamiva sūlamiva ca daṭṭhabbo;
atk-abh02a:308_3: puthujjanānaṃ vā saññā āsādukkhajananato rittamuṭṭhi viya,
atk-abh02a:308_5: saṅkhārā paṭisandhiyaṃ pakkhipanato aṅgārakāsuyaṃ khipanakapuriso viya,
atk-abh02a:309_0: Asaṅkhatā pana dhātu amatato santato khemato ca daṭṭhabbā. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:309_2: Manoviññāṇadhātu gahitārammaṇaṃ muñcitvāpi aññaṃ gahetvāva pavatanato vanamakkaṭo viya,
atk-abh02a:310_1: Niddesavāre cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe cāti idañca dvayaṃ paṭicca aññañca kiriyāmanodhātuñceva sampayuttakhandhattayañcāti attho.
atk-abh02a:310_6: Tasmā esā cakkhuviññāṇadhātu ime cattāro paṭicca uppajjati nāma.
atk-abh02a:311_1: Tajjā manodhātūti tasmiṃ ārammaṇe jātā kusalākusalavipākato duvidhā manodhātu sampaṭicchanakiccā.
atk-abh02a:311_2: Sabbadhammesu vā pana paṭhamasamannāhāroti etesu cakkhuviññāṇādīsu sabbadhammesu uppajjamānesu paṭhamasamannāhāro;
atk-abh02a:311_3: cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīnaṃ vā ārammaṇasaṅkhātesu sabbadhammesu paṭhamasamannāhāroti ayamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:312_2: Tasmā manodhātuyāpi manoviññāṇadhātuyāpīti ayamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:312_3: Tena yā ca vipākamanodhātuyā uppajjitvā niruddhāya samanantarā uppajjati santīraṇakiccā vipākamanoviññāṇadhātu,
atk-abh02a:312_4: yā ca tassā uppajjitvā niruddhāya samanantarā uppajjati voṭṭhabbanakiccā kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātu,
atk-abh02a:312_5: yā ca tassā uppajjitvā niruddhāya samanantarā uppajjati javanakiccā manoviññāṇadhātu –
atk-abh02a:313_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne hatthe gahitapañhaṃ nāma gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-abh02a:313_1: Mahādhammarakkhitatthero kira nāma dīghabhāṇakābhayattheraṃ hatthe gahetvā āha –
atk-abh02a:313_2: ‘paṭiccāti nāma āgataṭṭhāne āvajjanaṃ visuṃ na kātabbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:313_6: Imasmiṃ pana abhidhammabhājanīye soḷasa dhātuyo kāmāvacarā,
atk-abh02a:316_1: Pañhāpucchake aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusāreneva kusalādibhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:316_2: Ārammaṇattikesu pana cha dhātuyo parittārammaṇāti idaṃ pana pañcannaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ manodhātuyā
atk-abh02a:316_3: ca ekantena pañcasu rūpārammaṇādīsu pavattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:316_4: Dve dhātuyoti vuttānaṃ pana dhammadhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ manāyatanadhammāyatanesu vuttanayeneva parittārammaṇāditā veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:316_5: Iti imasmimpi pañhāpucchake soḷasa dhātuyo kāmāvacarā,
atk-abh02a:316_7: Evamayaṃ dhātuvibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṃ nīharitvāva bhājetvā desitoti.
atk-abh02a:324_0: Kamato ariyasaccesu, yaṃ ñāṇaṃ tassa kiccato;
atk-abh02a:328_0: Tattha ‘vibhāgato’ti dukkhādīnañhi cattāro cattāro atthā vibhattā tathā avitathā anaññathā,
atk-abh02a:328_6: ime cattāro dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.
atk-abh02a:328_19: ime cattāro maggassa maggaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā”ti.
atk-abh02a:328_25: Iti evaṃ vibhattānaṃ catunnaṃ catunnaṃ atthānaṃ vasena dukkhādīni veditabbānīti.
atk-abh02a:329_0: ‘Nibbacanalakkhaṇādippabhedato’ti ettha pana ‘nibbacanato’ tāva idha ‘du’iti ayaṃ saddo kucchite dissati;
atk-abh02a:329_6: Tasmā kucchitattā tucchattā ca dukkhanti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:329_7: ‘Saṃ’iti ca ayaṃ saddo “samāgamo sameta”ntiādīsu saṃyogaṃ dīpeti;
atk-abh02a:329_11: Iti dukkhassa saṃyoge uppattikāraṇattā dukkhasamudayanti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:330_0: Tatiyasaccaṃ pana yasmā ‘ni’saddo abhāvaṃ ‘rodha’saddo ca cārakaṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh02a:330_1: tasmā abhāvo ettha saṃsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa sabbagatisuññattā,
atk-abh02a:330_2: samadhigate vā tasmiṃ saṃsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa abhāvo hoti tappaṭipakkhattātipi dukkhanirodhanti vuccati,
atk-abh02a:330_4: Catutthasaccaṃ pana yasmā etaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchati ārammaṇavasena tadabhimukhībhūtattā,
atk-abh02a:331_16: Atha vā etesaṃ abhisambuddhattā ariyabhāvasiddhitopi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha –
atk-abh02a:331_19: catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho ‘ariyo’ti vuccatī”ti.
atk-abh02a:331_20: Apica kho pana ariyāni saccānītipi ariyasaccāni;
atk-abh02a:331_21: ariyānīti tathāni avitathāni avisaṃvādakānīti attho. Yathāha –
atk-abh02a:332_14: Tathā saṅkhatataṇhāasaṅkhatadassanalakkhaṇāni cāti evamettha ‘lakkhaṇādippabhedato’ vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:333_0: ‘Atthatthuddhārato cevā’ti ettha pana atthato tāva ko saccaṭṭhoti ce?
atk-abh02a:333_3: titthiyānaṃ attāva anupalabbhasabhāvo ca na hoti;
atk-abh02a:333_4: atha kho bādhanapabhavasantiniyyānappakārena tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvena ariyañāṇassa gocaro hotiyeva;
atk-abh02a:333_6: lokapakati viya ca tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo saccaṭṭhoti veditabbo. Yathāha –
atk-abh02a:334_0: Nābādhakaṃ yato dukkhaṃ, dukkhā aññaṃ na bādhakaṃ;
atk-abh02a:336_0: Taṃ vinā nāññato dukkhaṃ, na hoti na ca taṃ tato;
atk-abh02a:338_0: Nāññā nibbānato santi, santaṃ na ca na taṃ yato;
atk-abh02a:340_0: Maggā aññaṃ na niyyānaṃ, aniyyāno na cāpi so;
atk-abh02a:345_8: “Ekañhi saccaṃ na dutiyamatthī”tiādīsu paramatthasacce nibbāne ceva magge ca.
atk-abh02a:345_10: Svāyamidhāpi ariyasacce vattatīti evamettha ‘atthuddhārato’pi vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:346_4: na hi etehi aññaṃ adhikaṃ vā etesaṃ vā ekampi apanetabbaṃ sambhoti. Yathāha – “idha,
atk-abh02a:346_6: āgaccheyya samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ‘netaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ,
atk-abh02a:346_7: aññaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ yaṃ samaṇena gotamena desitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:346_8: Ahametaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ paññapessāmī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”tiādi.
atk-abh02a:346_12: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃ vadeyya ‘netaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ,
atk-abh02a:346_14: Ahametaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ paccakkhāya aññaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ paññapessāmī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”tiādi.
atk-abh02a:348_1: Ettha ca oḷārikattā sabbasattasādhāraṇattā ca suviññeyyanti dukkhasaccaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:348_5: Bhavasukhassādagadhitānaṃ vā sattānaṃ saṃvegajananatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ dukkhamāha.
atk-abh02a:348_8: ito pana hotīti ñāpanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ samudayaṃ.
atk-abh02a:348_9: Tato sahetukena dukkhena abhibhūtattā saṃviggamānasānaṃ dukkhanissaraṇagavesīnaṃ nissaraṇadassanena assāsajananatthaṃ nirodhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:348_10: Tato nirodhādhigamatthaṃ nirodhasampāpakaṃ magganti evamettha ‘kamato’ vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:349_0: ‘Ariyasaccesu yaṃ ñāṇaṃ tassa kiccato’ti saccañāṇakiccatopi vinicchayo veditabboti attho.
atk-abh02a:349_3: Tattha anubodhañāṇaṃ lokiyaṃ anussavādivasena nirodhe magge ca pavattati.
atk-abh02a:349_4: Paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ nirodhārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccato cattāripi saccāni paṭivijjhati. Yathāha – “yo,
atk-abh02a:349_10: tattha dukkhañāṇaṃ pariyuṭṭhānābhibhavanavasena pavattamānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ nivatteti,
atk-abh02a:349_14: dukkhañāṇaṃ vā dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvarahitesu khandhesu dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvasaññāsaṅkhātaṃ phale vippaṭipattiṃ,
atk-abh02a:349_15: samudayañāṇaṃ issarappadhānakālasabhāvādīhi loko pavattatīti akāraṇe kāraṇābhimānappavattaṃ hetumhi vippaṭipattiṃ,
atk-abh02a:349_17: maggañāṇaṃ kāmasukhallikaattakilamathānuyogappabhede avisuddhimagge visuddhimaggaggāhavasena pavattaṃ upāye vippaṭipattiṃ nivatteti.
atk-abh02a:350_0: Loke lokappabhave, lokatthagame sive ca tadupāye;
atk-abh02a:351_0: Sammuyhati tāva naro, na vijānāti yāva saccānīti.
atk-abh02a:353_10: sabbesaṃyeva vā etesaṃ sammāvācākammantājīvānaṃ ariyakantasīlattā sīlassa ca saddhāhatthena paṭiggahetabbattā
atk-abh02a:355_5: Tattha maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti vacanato saṅkhāradukkhatāya dukkhaṃ na ariyasaccaṃ.
atk-abh02a:355_7: Itaraṃ pana ariyasaccadvayaṃ siyā dukkhaṃ aniccato,
atk-abh02a:355_8: na pana yassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathatthena.
atk-abh02a:355_9: Sabbākārena pana upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca aññatra taṇhāya.
atk-abh02a:355_10: Maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca yassa pariññatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathatthena neva dukkhaṃ na ariyasaccaṃ.
atk-abh02a:355_11: Evaṃ samudayādīsupi yathāyogaṃ yojetvā ‘catukkato’pettha vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:356_0: ‘Suññatekavidhādīhī’ti ettha suññato tāva paramatthena hi sabbāneva saccāni vedakakārakanibbutagamakābhāvato suññānīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a:357_0: Dukkhameva hi na koci dukkhito, kārako na kiriyāva vijjati;
atk-abh02a:358_0: Atthi nibbuti na nibbuto pumā, maggamatthi gamako na vijjatīti.
atk-abh02a:362_2: Phalasuñño vā ettha hetu samudaye dukkhassābhāvato magge ca nirodhassa,
atk-abh02a:362_3: na phalena sagabbho pakativādīnaṃ pakati viya.
atk-abh02a:362_5: na hetusamavetaṃ hetuphalaṃ hetuphalasamavāyavādīnaṃ dviaṇukādīni viya.
atk-abh02a:363_0: Tayamidha nirodhasuññaṃ, tayena tenāpi nibbuti suññā;
atk-abh02a:364_0: Suñño phalena hetu, phalampi taṃ hetunā suññanti.
atk-abh02a:366_20: Ayañhi sappadesattā nagaraṃ viya rajjena nippadesehi tīhi khandhehi saṅgahito. Yathāha –
atk-abh02a:367_2: ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena tayo khandhā saṅgahitā.
atk-abh02a:368_2: Kiñcāpi hi pāḷiyaṃ sīlakkhandheti bhummena niddeso kato,
atk-abh02a:368_4: Sammāvāyāmādīsu pana tīsu samādhi attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh02a:368_5: vīriye pana paggahakiccaṃ sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṃ sādhentiyā laddhūpakāro hutvā sakkoti.
atk-abh02a:369_1: yathā hi nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmāti uyyānaṃ paviṭṭhesu tīsu sahāyesu eko supupphitaṃ campakarukkhaṃ disvā hatthaṃ ukkhipitvāpi gahetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya.
atk-abh02a:369_3: So tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvāpi kampamāno gahetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya.
atk-abh02a:369_5: So ekassa piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvā ekassa aṃsakūṭaṃ olubbha yathāruci pupphāni ocinitvā piḷandhitvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷeyya.
atk-abh02a:370_0: Ekato uyyānaṃ paviṭṭhā tayo sahāyā viya hi ekato jātā sammāvāyāmādayo tayo dhammā,
atk-abh02a:370_2: hatthaṃ ukkhipitvāpi gahetuṃ asakkonto viya attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṃ asakkonto samādhi,
atk-abh02a:370_5: Yathā tesu ekassa piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvā ekassa aṃsakūṭaṃ olubbha itaro yathāruci pupphaṃ gahetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh02a:370_6: evameva vīriye paggahakiccaṃ sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṃ sādhentiyā laddhūpakāro samādhi sakkoti ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṃ.
atk-abh02a:371_0: Sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappesupi paññā attano dhammatāya ‘aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā’ti ārammaṇaṃ nicchetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh02a:371_1: vitakke pana ākoṭetvā ākoṭetvā dente sakkoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh02a:371_2: Yathā hi heraññiko kahāpaṇaṃ hatthe ṭhapetvā sabbabhāgesu oloketukāmo samānopi na cakkhutaleneva parivattetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh02a:371_3: aṅgulipabbehi pana parivattetvā parivattetvā ito cito ca oloketuṃ sakkoti;
atk-abh02a:371_4: evameva na paññā attano dhammatāya aniccādivasena ārammaṇaṃ nicchetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh02a:371_5: abhiniropanalakkhaṇena pana āhananapariyāhananarasena vitakkena ākoṭentena viya parivattentena viya ca ādāya ādāya dinnameva nicchetuṃ sakkoti.
atk-abh02a:371_6: Tasmā idhāpi sammādiṭṭhiyeva sajātito paññākkhandhena saṅgahitā,
atk-abh02a:371_8: Iti imehi tīhi khandhehi maggo saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh02a:372_0: Apica sabbāneva saccāni ekavidhāni avitathattā abhiññeyyattā vā,
atk-abh02a:372_2: tividhāni dassanabhāvanāhi pahātabbato appahātabbato nevapahātabbanāpahātabbato ca,
atk-abh02a:373_0: ‘Sabhāgavisabhāgato’ti sabbāneva ca saccāni aññamaññaṃ sabhāgāni avitathato attasuññato dukkarapaṭivedhato ca. Yathāha –
atk-abh02a:374_1: katamaṃ nu kho dukkarataraṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ vā –
atk-abh02a:374_2: yo dūratova sukhumena tālacchiggaḷena asanaṃ atipāteyya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ avirādhitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:374_3: yo vā sattadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭivijjheyyā”ti? “Etadeva, bhante,
atk-abh02a:374_5: yo sattadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭivijjheyyā”ti.
atk-abh02a:374_7: duppaṭivijjhataraṃ paṭivijjhanti ye idaṃ dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ paṭivijjhanti…pe…
atk-abh02a:375_1: Purimāni ca dve sabhāgāni duravagāhatthena gambhīrattā lokiyattā sāsavattā ca,
atk-abh02a:375_3: Pacchimānipi dve sabhāgāni gambhīratthena duravagāhattā lokuttarattā anāsavattā ca,
atk-abh02a:376_0: Iti evaṃ pakārehi, nayehi ca vicakkhaṇo;
atk-abh02a:381_1: Idāni saṅkhepato uddiṭṭhāni dukkhādīni vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ayaṃ tattha katamaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ jātipi dukkhāti niddesavāro āraddho.
atk-abh02a:381_3: jātiyā dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo; jarā, maraṇaṃ, soko, paridevo, dukkhaṃ,
atk-abh02a:382_0: Tattha dukkhassa ariyasaccassa kathanatthāya ayaṃ mātikā –
atk-abh02a:383_0: Tattha kāyikacetasikā dukkhavedanā sabhāvato ca nāmato ca dukkhattā ‘dukkhadukkhaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh02a:383_2: Upekkhāvedanā ceva avasesā ca tebhūmakā saṅkhārā udayabbayapīḷitattā ‘saṅkhāradukkhaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh02a:383_4: Tasmā ete dhammā dukkhasaccapariyāpannattena saṅkhāradukkhaṃ nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:383_5: Kaṇṇasūladantasūlarāgajapariḷāhadosajapariḷāhādi kāyikacetasiko ābādho pucchitvā jānitabbato upakkamassa ca apākaṭabhāvato ‘paṭicchannadukkhaṃ’ nāma,
atk-abh02a:383_7: Dvattiṃsakammakāraṇādisamuṭṭhāno ābādho apucchitvāva jānitabbato upakkamassa ca pākaṭabhāvato ‘appaṭicchannadukkhaṃ’ nāma,
atk-abh02a:383_9: Ṭhapetvā dukkhadukkhaṃ sesaṃ dukkhasaccavibhaṅge āgataṃ jātiādi sabbampi tassa tassa dukkhassa vatthubhāvato ‘pariyāyadukkhaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh02a:384_0: Tattha pariyāyadukkhaṃ nippariyāyadukkhanti imasmiṃ padadvaye ṭhatvā dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ kathetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:384_1: Ariyasaccañca nāmetaṃ pāḷiyaṃ saṅkhepatopi āgacchati vitthāratopi.
atk-abh02a:384_2: Saṅkhepato āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhepenapi vitthārenapi kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:384_3: Vitthārato āgataṭṭhāne pana vitthāreneva kathetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-abh02a:384_5: Taṃ idaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne vitthārena āgatanti vitthāreneva kathetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:384_6: Tasmā yaṃ taṃ niddesavāre “tattha katamaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ?
atk-abh02a:384_10: Yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jāti sañjātī”ti imassa pana padabhājanīyassa vasena veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a:385_2: tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānanti ayaṃ saṅkhepato anekesaṃ sattānaṃ sādhāraṇaniddeso.
atk-abh02a:385_4: yā somadattassa jātīti evañhi divasampi kathiyamāne neva sattā pariyādānaṃ gacchanti,
atk-abh02a:385_6: Imehi pana dvīhi padehi na koci satto apariyādinno hoti,
atk-abh02a:385_10: Tamhi tamhīti ayaṃ jātigativasena anekesaṃ sattanikāyānaṃ sādhāraṇaniddeso.
atk-abh02a:386_5: “Tiriyā nāma tiṇajāti nābhiyā uggantvā nabhaṃ āhacca ṭhitā ahosī”ti ettha paññattiyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:386_29: Te hi pākaṭā eva hutvā nibbattanti.
atk-abh02a:387_1: Khandhā eva hi paramatthato pātubhavanti, na sattā.
atk-abh02a:387_6: Āyatanānanti ettha tatra tatra uppajjamānāyatanavasena saṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:387_8: pātubhavantāneva hi tāni paṭiladdhāni nāma honti.
atk-abh02a:387_9: Ayaṃ vuccati jātīti ayaṃ jāti nāma kathiyati.
atk-abh02a:387_10: Sā panesā tattha tattha bhave paṭhamābhinibbattilakkhaṇā,
atk-abh02a:388_0: Idāni ‘jātiyā dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ayañhi jāti sayaṃ na dukkhā,
atk-abh02a:388_3: Yaṃ taṃ bālapaṇḍitasuttādīsu bhagavatāpi upamāvasena pakāsitaṃ āpāyikaṃdukkhaṃ,
atk-abh02a:388_4: yañca sugatiyaṃ manussaloke gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:388_7: ayañhi satto mātukucchimhi nibbattamāno na uppalapadumapuṇḍarīkādīsu nibbattati.
atk-abh02a:388_8: Atha kho heṭṭhā āmāsayassa upari pakkāsayassa udarapaṭalapiṭṭhikaṇḍakānaṃ vemajjhe paramasambādhe tibbandhakāre
atk-abh02a:388_11: So tattha nibbatto dasa māse mātukucchisambhavena usmanā puṭapākaṃ viya paccamāno piṭṭhapiṇḍi viya sediyamāno
atk-abh02a:389_0: Yaṃ pana so mātu sahasā upakkhalanagamananisīdanauṭṭhānaparivattanādīsu surādhuttahatthagato eḷako viya
atk-abh02a:389_1: ahiguṇṭhikahatthagato sappapotako viya ca ākaḍḍhanaparikaḍḍhanaodhunananiddhunanādinā upakkamena adhimattaṃ
atk-abh02a:390_0: Yaṃ panassa mūḷhagabbhāya mātuyā mittāmaccasuhajjādīhipi adassanārahe dukkhuppattiṭṭhāne chedanaphālanādīhi dukkhaṃ uppajjati –
atk-abh02a:390_2: Yaṃ vijāyamānāya mātuyā kammajehi vātehi parivattetvā narakapapātaṃ viya atibhayānakaṃ yonimaggaṃ paṭipātiyamānassa
atk-abh02a:390_3: paramasambādhena yonimukhena tāḷacchiggaḷena viya nikkaḍḍhiyamānassa mahānāgassa narakasattassa viya
atk-abh02a:390_9: Yaṃ tato paraṃ pavattiyaṃ attanāva attānaṃ vadhantassa,
atk-abh02a:391_0: Yaṃ pana parato vadhabandhanādīni anubhavantassa dukkhaṃ uppajjati –
atk-abh02a:391_2: Iti imassa sabbassāpi dukkhassa ayaṃ jāti vatthumeva hotīti.
atk-abh02a:398_0: Yaṃ taṃ kathaṃ tattha bhaveyya jātiṃ,
atk-abh02a:406_0: Na taṃ bhave tattha na cassa jāti,
atk-abh02a:412_0: Kiṃ bhāsitena bahunā nanu yaṃ kuhiñci,
atk-abh02a:417_5: Ayañhi jarāti iminā padena sabhāvato dīpitā,
atk-abh02a:417_11: Valittacatāti iminā maṃsaṃ milāpetvā tace valittabhāvakaraṇakiccato dīpitā.
atk-abh02a:417_12: Tenassā ime khaṇḍiccanti ādayo tayo kālātikkame kiccaniddesā.
atk-abh02a:417_13: Tehi imesaṃ vikārānaṃ dassanavasena pākaṭībhūtāti pākaṭajarā dassitā.
atk-abh02a:417_14: Yatheva hi udakassa vā vātassa vā aggino vā tiṇarukkhādīnaṃ saṃsaggapalibhaggatāya vā jhāmatāya vā gatamaggo pākaṭo hoti,
atk-abh02a:417_15: na ca so gatamaggo tāneva udakādīni,
atk-abh02a:417_16: evameva jarāya dantādīsu khaṇḍiccādivasena gatamaggo pākaṭo,
atk-abh02a:418_0: Āyuno saṃhāni indriyānaṃ paripākoti imehi pana padehi kālātikkameyeva abhibyattāya āyukkhayacakkhādiindriyaparipākasaṅkhātāya pakatiyā dīpitā.
atk-abh02a:418_2: Tattha yasmā jaraṃ pattassa āyu hāyati tasmā jarā “āyuno saṃhānī”ti phalūpacārena vuttā.
atk-abh02a:418_3: Yasmā daharakāle suppasannāni sukhumampi attano visayaṃ sukheneva gaṇhanasamatthāni cakkhādīni indriyāni
atk-abh02a:418_4: jaraṃ pattassa paripakkāni āluḷitāni avisadāni oḷārikampi attano visayaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthāni honti,
atk-abh02a:419_0: Sā panesā evaṃ niddiṭṭhā sabbāpi jarā pākaṭā paṭicchannāti duvidhā hoti.
atk-abh02a:419_1: Tattha dantādīsu khaṇḍādibhāvadassanato rūpadhammesu jarā ‘pākaṭajarā’ nāma.
atk-abh02a:419_2: Arūpadhammesu pana jarā tādisassa vikārassa adassanato ‘paṭicchannajarā’ nāma.
atk-abh02a:419_5: Taṃ cakkhunā disvā manodvārena cintetvā “ime dantā jarāya pahaṭā”ti jaraṃ jānāti,
atk-abh02a:419_6: udakaṭṭhāne baddhāni gosiṅgādīni oloketvā heṭṭhā udakassa atthibhāvaṃ jānanaṃ viya.
atk-abh02a:419_7: Puna avīci savīcīti evampi ayaṃ jarā duvidhā hoti.
atk-abh02a:419_8: Tattha maṇikanakarajatapavāḷacandasūriyādīnaṃ mandadasakādīsu pāṇīnaṃ viya ca pupphaphalapallavādīsu
atk-abh02a:419_9: apāṇīnaṃ viya ca antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ dubbiññeyyattā jarā ‘avīcijarā’ nāma,
atk-abh02a:419_11: Tato aññesu pana yathāvuttesu antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ suviññeyyattā jarā ‘savīcijarā’ nāma.
atk-abh02a:420_3: Tesu pana patitesu puna dantā uṭṭhahanti.
atk-abh02a:420_6: Kesā pana paṭhamameva tambāpi honti kāḷakāpi setāpi.
atk-abh02a:420_15: Ayaṃ vuccati jarāti ayaṃ jarā nāma kathiyati.
atk-abh02a:421_0: ‘Jarāya dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana ayampi sayaṃ na dukkhā,
atk-abh02a:421_4: Jiṇṇassa hi attabhāvo jarasakaṭaṃ viya dubbalo hoti,
atk-abh02a:421_5: ṭhātuṃ vā gantuṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā vāyamantassa balavaṃ kāyadukkhaṃ uppajjati;
atk-abh02a:421_7: Iti imesaṃ dvinnampi dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvena dukkhāti veditabbā. Apica –
atk-abh02a:426_0: Pappoti dukkhaṃ yaṃ macco, kāyikaṃ mānasaṃ tathā;
atk-abh02a:427_0: Sabbametaṃ jarāhetu, yasmā tasmā jarā dukhāti.
atk-abh02a:429_5: Antaradhānanti ghaṭassa viya bhinnassa bhinnānaṃ cutikhandhānaṃ yena kenaci pariyāyena ṭhānābhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:430_3: Khandhesu pana bhijjamānesu satto marati bhinnesu matoti vohāro hoti.
atk-abh02a:430_13: Ettha ca kaḷevarassa nikkhepakaraṇato maraṇaṃ “kaḷevarassa nikkhepo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:431_0: Jīvitindriyassa upacchedoti iminā indriyabaddhasseva maraṇaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-abh02a:431_4: Atthato pana evarūpāni vacanāni sassādīnaṃ khayavayabhāvameva dīpenti.
atk-abh02a:431_5: Idaṃ vuccati maraṇanti idaṃ sabbampi maraṇaṃ nāma kathiyati.
atk-abh02a:433_0: ‘Maraṇassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana idampi sayaṃ na dukkhaṃ,
atk-abh02a:433_6: Iti imesaṃ dvinnampi dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvena dukkhanti veditabbaṃ. Api ca –
atk-abh02a:441_0: Apica imāni jātijarāmaraṇāni nāma imesaṃ sattānaṃ vadhakapaccāmittā viya otāraṃ gavesantāni vicaranti.
atk-abh02a:441_1: Yathā hi purisassa tīsu paccāmittesu otārāpekkhesu vicarantesu eko vadeyya –
atk-abh02a:441_2: “ahaṃ asukaaraññassa nāma vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā etaṃ ādāya tattha gamissāmi,
atk-abh02a:441_4: Dutiyo vadeyya “ahaṃ tava etaṃ gahetvā gatakāle pothetvā dubbalaṃ karissāmi,
atk-abh02a:441_7: “tayā etasmiṃ pothetvā dubbale kate tiṇhena asinā sīsacchedanaṃ nāma mayhaṃ bhāro hotū”ti.
atk-abh02a:442_0: Tattha paṭhamapaccāmittassa araññassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā taṃ ādāya tattha gatakālo viya suhajjañātimaṇḍalato
atk-abh02a:442_1: nikkaḍḍhitvā yattha katthaci nibbattāpanaṃ nāma jātiyā kiccaṃ.
atk-abh02a:442_2: Dutiyassa pothetvā dubbalakaraṇaṃ viya nibbattakkhandhesu nipatitvā parādhīnamañcaparāyaṇabhāvakaraṇaṃ jarāya kiccaṃ.
atk-abh02a:442_3: Tatiyassa tiṇhena asinā sīsacchedanaṃ viya jīvitakkhayapāpanaṃ maraṇassa kiccanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:443_1: Jarādukkhaṃ tattha annapānarahitassa dubbalyaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:443_2: Maraṇadukkhaṃ dubbalassa iriyāpathapavattane vihataparakkamassa vāḷādīhi anayabyasanāpādanaṃ viya daṭṭhabbanti.
atk-abh02a:445_5: Tena ñātibyasanena phuṭṭhassāti ajjhotthaṭassa abhibhūtassa samannāgatassāti attho.
atk-abh02a:445_11: rogo hi ārogyaṃ byasati vināsetīti byasanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:445_14: Sammādiṭṭhiṃ vināsayamānā uppannā diṭṭhiyeva byasanaṃ diṭṭhibyasanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:445_17: Purimāni ca tīṇi neva kusalāni na akusalāni.
atk-abh02a:446_0: Aññataraññatarenāti gahitesu vā yena kenaci aggahitesu vā mittāmaccabyasanādīsu yena kenaci.
atk-abh02a:446_2: Aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammenāti yena kenaci sokadukkhassa uppattihetunā.
atk-abh02a:446_9: So hi abbhantare sukkhāpento viya parisukkhāpento viya uppajjatīti “antosoko antoparisoko”ti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:447_1: Soko hi uppajjamāno aggi viya cittaṃ jhāpeti paridahati,
atk-abh02a:447_7: Ayaṃ vuccati sokoti ayaṃ soko nāma kathiyati.
atk-abh02a:447_8: So panāyaṃ kiñcāpi atthato domanassavedanāva hoti,
atk-abh02a:448_0: ‘Sokassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana ayaṃ sabhāvadukkhattā ceva dukkhassa ca vatthubhāvena dukkhoti vutto.
atk-abh02a:448_3: Sokavegena hi hadaye mahāgaṇḍo uṭṭhahitvā paripaccitvā bhijjati,
atk-abh02a:448_7: ettakā me bhogā”ti cintentassa ca balavaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:448_8: Iti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvenapesa dukkhoti veditabbo. Apica –
atk-abh02a:449_0: Sattānaṃ hadayaṃ soko, sallaṃ viya vitujjati;
atk-abh02a:452_0: Dukkhampi vividhaṃ yasmā, tasmā dukkhoti vuccatīti.
atk-abh02a:454_2: mayhaṃ putto’ti evaṃ ādissa ādissa devanti rodanti etenāti ādevo.
atk-abh02a:454_3: Taṃ taṃ vaṇṇaṃ parikittetvā parikittetvā devanti etenāti paridevo.
atk-abh02a:454_4: Tato parāni dve dve padāni purimadvayasseva ākārabhāvaniddesavasena vuttāni.
atk-abh02a:454_11: Ayaṃ vuccati paridevoti ayaṃ paridevo nāma kathiyati.
atk-abh02a:455_0: ‘Paridevassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana ayampi sayaṃ na dukkho,
atk-abh02a:455_2: Paridevanto hi attano khandhaṃ muṭṭhīhi potheti,
atk-abh02a:455_6: ‘Ettakā me ñātayo khayaṃ vayaṃ abbhatthaṃ gatā’tiādīni cinteti.
atk-abh02a:455_8: Iti imesaṃ dvinnampi dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvena dukkhoti veditabbo. Apica –
atk-abh02a:461_1: Dukkhadomanassaniddesā heṭṭhā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vaṇṇitattā pākaṭā eva.
atk-abh02a:462_1: domanassassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana ubhayampetaṃ sayañca dukkhattā kāyikacetasikadukkhānañca vatthubhāvena dukkhanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:462_4: vaṇamukhehi puḷuvakesu nikkhamantesu balavaṃ kāyadukkhaṃ uppajjati;
atk-abh02a:462_5: nānāraṅgarattavatthamanuññālaṅkāraṃ nakkhattaṃ kīḷantaṃ mahājanaṃ disvā balavadomanassaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:462_6: Evaṃ tāva dukkhassa dvinnampi dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvo veditabbo. Apica –
atk-abh02a:463_0: Pīḷeti kāyikamidaṃ, dukkhaṃ dukkhañca mānasaṃ bhiyyo;
atk-abh02a:464_0: Janayati yasmā tasmā, dukkhanti visesato vuttanti.
atk-abh02a:465_0: Cetodukkhasamappitā pana kese pakiriya urāni patipisenti,
atk-abh02a:465_8: Taṃ taṃ viparītaṃ vatthuṃ tathā tathā vippaṭisārino pariḍayhamānacittā cintenti.
atk-abh02a:465_9: Evaṃ domanassassa ubhinnampi dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvo veditabbo. Apica –
atk-abh02a:466_0: Pīḷeti yato cittaṃ, kāyassa ca pīḷanaṃ samāvahati;
atk-abh02a:469_6: Ayaṃ vuccati upāyāsoti ayaṃ upāyāso nāma kathiyati.
atk-abh02a:470_0: ‘Upāyāsassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana ayampi sayaṃ na dukkho,
atk-abh02a:470_2: Kupitena hi raññā issariyaṃ acchinditvā hataputtabhātikānaṃ āṇattavadhānaṃ bhayena aṭaviṃ pavisitvā nilīnānaṃ
atk-abh02a:470_3: mahāvisādappattānaṃ dukkhaṭṭhānena dukkhaseyyāya dukkhanisajjāya balavaṃ kāyadukkhaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:470_5: ettakā bhogā naṭṭhā’ti cintentānaṃ balavadomanassaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:470_6: Iti imesaṃ dvinnampi dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvena dukkhoti veditabboti. Apica –
atk-abh02a:471_0: Cittassa paridahanā, kāyassa visādanā ca adhimattaṃ;
atk-abh02a:472_0: Yaṃ dukkhamupāyāso, janeti dukkho tato vutto.
atk-abh02a:473_0: Ettha ca mandagginā antobhājaneyeva telādīnaṃ pāko viya soko.
atk-abh02a:473_1: Tikkhagginā paccamānassa bhājanato bahinikkhamanaṃ viya paridevo.
atk-abh02a:473_2: Bahinikkhantāvasesassa nikkhamitumpi appahontassa antobhājaneyeva yāva parikkhayā pāko viya upāyāso daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh02a:475_13: Catūhi yogehi khemaṃ nibbhayaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ na icchanti,
atk-abh02a:475_14: sabhayaṃ vaṭṭameva nesaṃ kāmenti icchantīti āyogakkhemakāmā.
atk-abh02a:476_0: Apica saddhādīnaṃ vuddhisaṅkhātassa atthassa akāmanato tesaṃyeva hānisaṅkhātassa anatthassa ca kāmanato anatthakāmā.
atk-abh02a:476_1: Saddhādīnaṃyeva upāyabhūtassa hitassa akāmanato saddhāhāniādīnaṃ upāyabhūtassa ahitassa ca kāmanato ahitakāmā.
atk-abh02a:476_2: Phāsukavihārassa akāmanato aphāsukavihārassa ca kāmanato aphāsukakāmā.
atk-abh02a:476_3: Yassa kassaci nibbhayassa akāmanato bhayassa ca kāmanato ayogakkhemakāmāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh02a:477_5: Saṅkhāravasena pana yaṃ labbhati taṃ gahetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:477_6: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ appiyasampayogo nāma kathiyati.
atk-abh02a:478_0: So atthato eko dhammo nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:478_1: Kevalaṃ appiyasampayuttānaṃ duvidhassāpi dukkhassa vatthubhāvato dukkhoti vutto.
atk-abh02a:478_2: Aniṭṭhāni hi vatthūni samodhānagatāni vijjhanachedanaphālanādīhi kāyikampi dukkhaṃ uppādenti,
atk-abh02a:479_0: Disvāva appiye dukkhaṃ, paṭhamaṃ hoti cetasi;
atk-abh02a:484_2: Mātā vātiādi panettha atthakāme sarūpena dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:484_11: Ayaṃ amhākaṃ ajjhattikoti evaṃ jānanti ñāyantīti vā ñātī.
atk-abh02a:484_14: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ piyehi vippayogo nāma kathiyati.
atk-abh02a:485_0: So atthato eko dhammo nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:485_1: Kevalaṃ piyavippayuttānaṃ duvidhassāpi dukkhassa vatthubhāvato dukkhoti vutto.
atk-abh02a:485_2: Iṭṭhāni hi vatthūni viyujjamānāni sarīrassa sosanamilāpanādibhāvena kāyikampi dukkhaṃ uppādenti,
atk-abh02a:487_0: Bālā yato tato yaṃ, dukkhoti mato piyaviyogoti.
atk-abh02a:489_4: Na kho panetaṃ icchāya pattabbanti yaṃ etaṃ “aho vata mayaṃ na jātidhammā assāma,
atk-abh02a:489_5: na ca vata no jāti āgaccheyyā”ti evaṃ pahīnasamudayesu sādhūsu vijjamānaṃ ajātidhammattaṃ,
atk-abh02a:489_6: parinibbutesu ca vijjamānaṃ jātiyā anāgamanaṃ icchitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:489_7: taṃ icchantassāpi maggabhāvanāya vinā apattabbato anicchantassa ca bhāvanāya pattabbato na icchāya pattabbaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:489_10: Yampicchanti yenapi dhammena alabbhaneyyaṃ vatthuṃ icchanto na labhati,
atk-abh02a:489_13: Evamettha alabbhaneyyavatthūsu icchāva “yampicchaṃ na labhati tampi dukkha”nti vuttā.
atk-abh02a:490_0: Dvinnaṃ pana dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvato dukkhāti vuttā.
atk-abh02a:490_1: Ekacco hi rājā bhavissatīti sambhāvito hoti.
atk-abh02a:490_2: So chinnabhinnagaṇena parivārito pabbatavisamaṃ vā vanagahanaṃ vā pavisati.
atk-abh02a:490_3: Atha rājā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā balakāyaṃ peseti.
atk-abh02a:490_4: So rājapurisehi nihataparivāro sayampi laddhappahāro palāyamāno rukkhantaraṃ vā pāsāṇantaraṃ vā pavisati.
atk-abh02a:490_7: Atha naṃ samantato kāḷakipillikādayo pāṇā parivāretvā gaṇhanti.
atk-abh02a:490_9: ‘Maṃ ekaṃ nissāya ettakā ñātī ca bhogā ca vinaṭṭhā’ti cintentassa balavadomanassaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:490_10: Iti ayaṃ icchā imesaṃ dvinnampi dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvena dukkhāti veditabbā. Apica –
atk-abh02a:491_0: Taṃ taṃ patthayamānānaṃ, tassa tassa alābhato;
atk-abh02a:492_0: Yaṃ vighātamayaṃ dukkhaṃ, sattānaṃ idha jāyati.
atk-abh02a:496_2: Dukkhañhi ettakāni dukkhasatānīti vā ettakāni dukkhasahassānīti vā ettakāni dukkhasatasahassānīti vā saṃkhipituṃ na sakkā,
atk-abh02a:496_5: saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti desanaṃ saṅkhipento evamāha.
atk-abh02a:498_0: Jātippabhutikaṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ vuttaṃ idha tādinā;
atk-abh02a:499_0: Avuttaṃ yañca taṃ sabbaṃ, vinā ete na vijjati.
atk-abh02a:502_15: Tena bādhiyamānānaṃ puthujjanānaṃ tattha paṭighuppattito cetobādhanadukkhaṃ domanassaṃ.
atk-abh02a:502_17: Manorathavighātappattānaṃ icchāvighātadukkhaṃ icchitālābhoti evaṃ nānappakārato upaparikkhiyamānā upādānakkhandhāva
atk-abh02a:502_18: dukkhāti yadetaṃ ekamekaṃ dassetvā vuccamānaṃ anekehi kappehi na sakkā asesato vattuṃ,
atk-abh02a:502_19: taṃ sabbampi dukkhaṃ ekajalabindumhi sakalasamuddajalarasaṃ viya yesu kesuci pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu
atk-abh02a:502_20: saṅkhipitvā dassetuṃ “saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti bhagavā avocāti.
atk-abh02a:505_1: Samudayasaccaniddese yāyaṃ taṇhāti yā ayaṃ taṇhā.
atk-abh02a:505_7: Sā panesā punabbhavassa dāyikāpi atthi adāyikāpi,
atk-abh02a:505_12: dinnāya paṭisandhiyā upadhivepakkamattāpi ponobbhavikā evāti nāmaṃ labhati.
atk-abh02a:505_14: nandirāgena saddhiṃ atthato ekattameva gatāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:505_23: bhavapatthanāvasena uppannassa sassatadiṭṭhisahagatassa rūpārūpabhavarāgassa ca jhānanikantiyā cetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:506_0: Idāni tassā taṇhāya vatthuṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ sā kho panesātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:506_3: Yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpanti yaṃ lokasmiṃ piyasabhāvañceva madhurasabhāvañca.
atk-abh02a:506_4: Cakkhuṃ loketiādīsu lokasmiñhi cakkhādīsu mamattena abhiniviṭṭhā sattā sampattiyaṃ patiṭṭhitā attano
atk-abh02a:506_5: cakkhuṃ ādāsādīsu nimittaggahaṇānusārena vippasannapañcapasādaṃ suvaṇṇavimāne ugghāṭitamaṇisīhapañjaraṃ
atk-abh02a:506_7: sotaṃ rajatapanāḷikaṃ viya pāmaṅgasuttakaṃ viya ca maññanti,
atk-abh02a:506_8: tuṅganāsāti laddhavohāraṃ ghānaṃ vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitaharitālavaṭṭiṃ viya maññanti,
atk-abh02a:506_10: kāyaṃ sālalaṭṭhiṃ viya suvaṇṇatoraṇaṃ viya ca maññanti,
atk-abh02a:506_11: manaṃ aññesaṃ manena asadisaṃ uḷāraṃ maññanti,
atk-abh02a:506_14: attanā paṭiladdhāni catusamuṭṭhānikagandhārammaṇādīni ‘kassa aññassa evarūpāni atthī’ti maññanti.
atk-abh02a:506_15: Tesaṃ evaṃ maññamānānaṃ tāni cakkhādīni piyarūpāni ceva honti sātarūpāni ca.
atk-abh02a:506_16: Atha nesaṃ tattha anuppannā ceva taṇhā uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:506_21: Tattha uppajjamānāti yadā uppajjati tadā ettha uppajjatīti attho.
atk-abh02a:509_1: Nirodhasaccaniddese yo tassāyeva taṇhāyāti ettha ‘yo tasseva dukkhassā’ti vattabbe yasmā samudayanirodheneva dukkhaṃ nirujjhati no aññathā, yathāha –
atk-abh02a:514_0: Tasmā taṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ dassento samudayanirodhena dassetuṃ evamāha.
atk-abh02a:514_2: Te dukkhaṃ nirodhentā dukkhanirodhañca dassentā hetumhi paṭipajjanti, na phale.
atk-abh02a:514_4: Te dukkhaṃ nirodhentā dukkhanirodhañca dassentā attakilamathānuyogena ceva tasseva ca desanāya phale paṭipajjanti,
atk-abh02a:514_6: Sīhasamānavuttitāya satthā hetumhi paṭipajjanto yo tassāyevātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:515_0: Tattha tassāyevāti yā sā uppatti nivesavasena heṭṭhā pakāsitā tassāyeva.
atk-abh02a:515_2: Nibbānañhi āgamma taṇhā asesā virajjati nirujjhati.
atk-abh02a:515_7: Tasmā nibbānaṃ “cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo”ti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:515_9: Nāmāni panassa sabbasaṅkhatānaṃ nāmapaṭipakkhavasena anekāni nibbānavevacanāneva honti,
atk-abh02a:515_22: anupapatti, agati, ajātaṃ, ajaraṃ, abyādhi, amataṃ, asokaṃ,
atk-abh02a:516_0: Idāni maggena chinnāya nibbānaṃ āgamma appavattipattāyapi ca taṇhāya yesu vatthūsu tassā uppatti dassitā,
atk-abh02a:516_1: tattheva abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ sā kho panesātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:516_2: Tattha yathā puriso khette jātaṃ tittaalābuvalliṃ disvā aggato paṭṭhāya mūlaṃ pariyesitvā chindeyya,
atk-abh02a:516_4: Tato tasmiṃ khette tittaalābu niruddhā pahīnāti vucceyya.
atk-abh02a:516_5: Evameva khette tittaalābu viya cakkhādīsu taṇhā.
atk-abh02a:516_6: Sā ariyamaggena mūlacchinnā nibbānaṃ āgamma appavattiṃ gacchati.
atk-abh02a:516_7: Evaṃ gatā pana tesu vatthūsu khette tittaalābu viya na paññāyati.
atk-abh02a:516_8: Yathā ca aṭavito core ānetvā nagarassa dakkhiṇadvāre ghāteyyuṃ,
atk-abh02a:516_9: tato aṭaviyaṃ corā matāti vā māritāti vā vucceyyuṃ;
atk-abh02a:516_10: evameva aṭaviyaṃ corā viya yā cakkhādīsu taṇhā,
atk-abh02a:516_11: sā dakkhiṇadvāre corā viya nibbānaṃ āgamma niruddhattā nibbāne niruddhā.
atk-abh02a:516_12: Evaṃ niruddhā pana tesu vatthūsu aṭaviyaṃ corā viya na paññāyati.
atk-abh02a:516_13: Tenassā tattheva nirodhaṃ dassento “cakkhuṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ,
atk-abh02a:519_2: Ariyoti taṃtaṃmaggavajjhehi kilesehi ārakattā ariyabhāvakarattā ariyaphalapaṭilābhakarattā ca ariyo.
atk-abh02a:521_0: Tesu ca ekekassa tīṇi tīṇi kiccāni honti,
atk-abh02a:521_2: sammādiṭṭhi tāva aññehipi attano paccanīkakilesehi saddhiṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ pajahati,
atk-abh02a:522_0: Apicesā sammādiṭṭhi nāma pubbabhāge nānākkhaṇā nānārammaṇā hoti,
atk-abh02a:522_2: kiccato pana dukkhe ñāṇantiādīni cattāri nāmāni labhati.
atk-abh02a:522_5: Tesu sammāsaṅkappo kiccato nekkhammasaṅkappotiādīni tīṇi nāmāni labhati.
atk-abh02a:522_6: Sammāvācādayo tayo pubbabhāge nānākkhaṇā nānārammaṇā viratiyopi honti cetanāyopi,
atk-abh02a:522_8: Sammāvāyāmo sammāsatīti idampi dvayaṃ kiccato sammappadhānasatipaṭṭhānavasena cattāri nāmāni labhati.
atk-abh02a:523_0: Iti imesu aṭṭhasu dhammesu bhagavatā nibbānādhigamāya paṭipannassa yogino bahūpakārattā paṭhamaṃ sammādiṭṭhi desitā.
atk-abh02a:523_2: Tasmā etāya pubbabhāge vipassanāñāṇasaṅkhātāya sammādiṭṭhiyā avijjandhakāraṃ viddhaṃsetvā kilesacore ghātento khemena yogāvacaro nibbānaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh02a:523_3: Tena vuttaṃ “nibbānādhigamāya paṭipannassa yogino bahūpakārattā paṭhamaṃ sammādiṭṭhi desitā”ti.
atk-abh02a:524_2: Yathā hi heraññiko hatthena parivattetvā parivattetvā cakkhunā kahāpaṇaṃ olokento ‘ayaṃ kūṭo,
atk-abh02a:524_4: evaṃ yogāvacaropi pubbabhāge vitakkena vitakketvā vipassanāpaññāya olokayamāno ‘ime dhammā kāmāvacarā,
atk-abh02a:524_6: Yathā vā pana purisena koṭiyaṃ gahetvā parivattetvā parivattetvā dinnaṃ mahārukkhaṃ tacchako vāsiyā tacchetvā kamme upaneti,
atk-abh02a:524_7: evaṃ vitakkena vitakketvā vitakkatvā dinnadhamme yogāvacaro paññāya ‘ime dhammā kāmāvacarā,
atk-abh02a:524_8: ime dhammā rūpāvacarā’tiādinā nayena paricchinditvā kamme upaneti.
atk-abh02a:526_0: Yasmā pana ‘idañcidañca karissāmā’ti paṭhamaṃ vācāya saṃvidahitvā loke kammante payojenti,
atk-abh02a:526_1: tasmā vācā kāyakammassa upakārikāti sammāvācāya anantaraṃ sammākammanto vutto.
atk-abh02a:527_1: tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ pahāya ubhayaṃ sucaritaṃ pūrentasseva yasmā ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ pūrati,
atk-abh02a:528_0: Evaṃ suddhājīvena ‘parisuddho me ājīvo’ti ettāvatā paritosaṃ akatvā suttappamattena viharituṃ na yuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:528_1: atha kho sabbairiyāpathesu idaṃ vīriyamārabhitabbanti dassetuṃ tadanantaraṃ sammāvāyāmo vutto.
atk-abh02a:529_0: Tato āraddhavīriyenāpi kāyādīsu catūsu vatthūsu sati suppatiṭṭhitā kātabbāti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ sammāsati desitā.
atk-abh02a:530_0: Yasmā pana evaṃ suppatiṭṭhitā sati samādhissa upakārānupakārānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesitvā pahoti ekattārammaṇe cittaṃ samādhātuṃ,
atk-abh02a:531_6: taṇhā samudayo”ti evaṃ saṅkhepena ca “katame pañcakkhandhā?
atk-abh02a:531_7: Rūpakkhandho”tiādinā nayena vitthārena ca ācariyassa santike uggaṇhitvā vācāya punappunaṃ parivattento yogāvacaro kammaṃ karoti;
atk-abh02a:531_8: itaresu pana dvīsu saccesu “nirodhasaccaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ,
atk-abh02a:531_9: maggasaccaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpa”nti evaṃ savaneneva kammaṃ karoti.
atk-abh02a:531_10: So evaṃ kammaṃ karonto cattāri saccāni ekena paṭivedhena paṭivijjhati,
atk-abh02a:532_9: Imassa ca bhikkhuno pubbe pariggahato ‘dukkhaṃ parijānāmi,
atk-abh02a:533_7: Itaresaṃ pana dvinnaṃ dassanatthāya payogo bhavaggagahaṇatthaṃ hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya,
atk-abh02a:533_9: satadhā bhinnavālassa koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādanaṃ viya ca hoti.
atk-abh02a:533_11: Evaṃ duddasattā gambhīresu gambhīrattā ca duddasesu catūsu saccesu uggahādivasena pubbabhāgañāṇuppattiṃ sandhāya idaṃ “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:534_3: Tattha nekkhammavitakko kāmavitakkassa padaghātaṃ padacchedaṃ karonto uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:534_6: Nekkhammavitakko ca kāmavitakkassa paccanīko hutvā uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:535_0: Tattha yogāvacaro kāmavitakkassa padaghātanatthaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ vā sammasati aññaṃ vā pana kiñci saṅkhāraṃ.
atk-abh02a:535_1: Athassa vipassanākkhaṇe vipassanāsampayutto saṅkappo tadaṅgavasena kāmavitakkassa padaghātaṃ padacchedaṃ karonto uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:535_3: Athassa maggakkhaṇe maggasampayutto saṅkappo samucchedavasena kāmavitakkassa padaghātaṃ padacchedaṃ karonto uppajjati;
atk-abh02a:535_4: byāpādavitakkassāpi padaghātanatthaṃ byāpādavitakkaṃ vā aññaṃ vā saṅkhāraṃ sammasati;
atk-abh02a:535_5: vihiṃsāvitakkassa padaghātanatthaṃ vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ vā aññaṃ vā saṅkhāraṃ sammasati.
atk-abh02a:536_0: Kāmavitakkādīnaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vibhattesu aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇesu ekakammaṭṭhānampi apaccanīkaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:536_1: Ekantato pana kāmavitakkassa tāva asubhesu paṭhamajjhānameva paccanīkaṃ,
atk-abh02a:536_4: Tasmā asubhe parikammaṃ katvā jhānaṃ samāpannassa samāpattikkhaṇe jhānasampayutto saṅkappo vikkhambhanavasena
atk-abh02a:536_6: Jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapentassa vipassanākkhaṇe vipassanāsampayutto saṅkappo tadaṅgavasena kāmavitakkassa paccanīko hutvā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:536_7: Vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggaṃ pāpentassa maggakkhaṇe maggasampayutto saṅkappo samucchedavasena kāmavitakkassa paccanīko hutvā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:537_1: karuṇāya parikammaṃ katvā jhānaṃ samāpajjatīti sabbaṃ purimanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:537_4: Evamete nekkhammasaṅkappādayo vipassanājhānavasena uppattīnaṃ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā;
atk-abh02a:537_5: maggakkhaṇe pana imesu tīsu ṭhānesu uppannassa akusalasaṅkappassa padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena
atk-abh02a:538_0: Sammāvācāniddesepi yasmā aññeneva cittena musāvādā viramati,
atk-abh02a:538_3: maggakkhaṇe pana micchāvācāsaṅkhātāya catubbidhāya akusaladussīlyacetanāya padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena
atk-abh02a:538_4: maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva sammāvācāsaṅkhātā kusalaveramaṇī uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:539_0: Sammākammantaniddesepi yasmā aññeneva cittena pāṇātipātā viramati,
atk-abh02a:539_4: maggakkhaṇe pana micchākammantasaṅkhātāya tividhāya akusaladussīlyacetanāya padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena
atk-abh02a:539_5: maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva sammākammantasaṅkhātā akusalaveramaṇī uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:540_5: Idhāpi yasmā aññeneva cittena kāyadvāravītikkamā viramati;
atk-abh02a:540_8: maggakkhaṇe pana dvīsu dvāresu sattannaṃ kammapathānaṃ vasena uppannāya micchāājīvadussīlyacetanāya padacchedato
atk-abh02a:540_9: anuppattisādhanavasena maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva sammāājīvasaṅkhātā kusalaveramaṇī uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:541_2: Aññeneva hi cittena anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya vāyāmaṃ karoti,
atk-abh02a:541_4: aññeneva ca anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya,
atk-abh02a:541_7: Ekameva hi maggasampayuttaṃ vīriyaṃ catukiccasādhanaṭṭhena cattāri nāmāni labbhati.
atk-abh02a:542_5: Ekāyeva hi maggasampayuttā sati catukiccasādhanaṭṭhena cattāri nāmāni labhati.
atk-abh02a:543_8: dutiyādayopi dutiyādīnaṃ aññatarajjhānikā vā paṭhamajjhānikā vā.
atk-abh02a:543_9: Evaṃ cattāropi maggā jhānavasena sadisā vā asadisā vā ekaccasadisā vā honti.
atk-abh02a:544_1: Pādakajjhānaniyāmena tāva paṭhamajjhānalābhino paṭhamajjhānā vuṭṭhāya vipassantassa uppannamaggo paṭhamajjhāniko hoti;
atk-abh02a:544_3: Dutiyajjhānato uṭṭhāya vipassantassa uppanno maggo dutiyajjhāniko hoti;
atk-abh02a:544_5: Tatiyajjhānato uṭṭhāya vipassantassa uppanno maggo tatiyajjhāniko hoti;
atk-abh02a:544_8: Esa nayo catutthajjhānato paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanā.
atk-abh02a:545_1: Tañca kho lokuttaraṃ no lokiyanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:545_3: Etthāpi paṭhamajjhānādīsu yato uṭṭhāya sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭilabhitvā āruppasamāpattiṃ bhāvetvā yo āruppe uppanno,
atk-abh02a:545_4: taṃjhānikāva tassa tattha tayo maggā uppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:545_6: Keci pana therā “vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā niyāmentī”ti vadanti.
atk-abh02a:545_9: Tesaṃ vādavinicchayo heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍe lokuttarapadabhājanīyavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:545_10: Ayaṃ vuccati sammāsamādhīti yā imesu catūsu jhānesu ekaggatā,
atk-abh02a:546_0: Tattha lokiyamagge sabbāneva maggaṅgāni yathānurūpaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu aññatarārammaṇāni honti.
atk-abh02a:546_1: Lokuttaramagge pana catusaccapaṭivedhāya pavattassa ariyassa nibbānārammaṇaṃ avijjānusayasamugghātakaṃ paññācakkhu sammādiṭṭhi.
atk-abh02a:546_2: Tathā sampannadiṭṭhissa taṃsampayuttaṃ tividhamicchāsaṅkappasamugghātakaṃ cetaso nibbānapadābhiniropanaṃ sammāsaṅkappo.
atk-abh02a:546_3: Tathā passantassa vitakkentassa ca taṃsampayuttāva catubbidhavacīduccaritasamugghātikāya micchāvācāya virati sammāvācā.
atk-abh02a:546_4: Tathā viramantassa taṃsampayuttāva micchākammantasamucchedikā tividhakāyaduccaritavirati sammākammanto.
atk-abh02a:546_5: Tesaṃyeva sammāvācākammantānaṃ vodānabhūtā taṃsampayuttāva kuhanādisamucchedikā micchāājīvavirati sammāājīvo.
atk-abh02a:546_6: Imissā sammāvācākammantājīvasaṃkhātāya sīlabhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhamānassa tadanurūpo taṃsampayuttova kosajjasamucchedako
atk-abh02a:546_7: anuppannuppannānaṃ akusalakusalānaṃ anuppādapahānuppādaṭṭhitisādhako ca vīriyārambho sammāvāyāmo.
atk-abh02a:546_8: Evaṃ vāyamantassa taṃsampayuttova micchāsativiniddhunanako kāyādīsu kāyānupassanādisādhako ca cetaso asammoso sammāsati.
atk-abh02a:546_9: Iti anuttarāya satiyā suvihitacittārakkhassa taṃsampayuttāva micchāsamādhisamugghātikā cittekaggatā sammāsamādhīti.
atk-abh02a:546_10: Esa lokuttaro ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo yo saha lokiyena maggena dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-abh02a:547_0: So kho panesa maggo sammādiṭṭhisaṅkappānaṃ vijjāya,
atk-abh02a:547_1: sesadhammānaṃ caraṇena saṅgahitattā vijjā ceva caraṇañca.
atk-abh02a:547_3: itaresaṃ samathayānena saṅgahitattā samatho ceva vipassanā ca.
atk-abh02a:547_6: avasesānaṃ samādhikkhandhena adhipaññāadhisīlaadhicittasikkhāhi ca saṅgahitattā khandhattayañceva sikkhāttayañca hoti;
atk-abh02a:547_7: yena samannāgato ariyasāvako dassanasamatthehi cakkhūhi gamanasamatthehi ca pādehi samannāgato addhiko
atk-abh02a:547_9: samathayānena attakilamathānuyoganti antadvayaṃ parivajjetvā majjhimapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno paññākkhandhena mohakkhandhaṃ,
atk-abh02a:547_11: samādhikkhandhena ca lobhakkhandhaṃ padālento adhipaññāsikkhāya paññāsampadaṃ,
atk-abh02a:547_13: adhicittasikkhāya samādhisampadanti tisso sampattiyo patvā amataṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikaroti,
atk-abh02a:550_2: Tattha “ariyasaccānī”ti avatvā nippadesato paccayasaṅkhātaṃ samudayaṃ dassetuṃ “cattāri saccānī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:550_3: Ariyasaccānīti hi vutte avasesā ca kilesā,
atk-abh02a:550_6: avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā dhammā na saṅgayhanti.
atk-abh02a:550_7: Na ca kevalaṃ taṇhāva dukkhaṃ samudāneti,
atk-abh02a:550_8: imepi avasesā ca kilesādayo paccayā samudānentiyeva.
atk-abh02a:550_9: Iti imepi paccayā dukkhaṃ samudānentiyevāti nippadesato paccayasaṅkhātaṃ samudayaṃ dassetuṃ “ariyasaccānī”ti avatvā “cattāri saccānī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:551_0: Niddesavāre ca nesaṃ paṭhamaṃ dukkhaṃ aniddisitvā tasseva dukkhassa sukhaniddesatthaṃ dukkhasamudayo niddiṭṭho.
atk-abh02a:551_1: Tasmiñhi niddiṭṭhe “avasesā ca kilesā”tiādinā nayena dukkhasaccaṃ sukhaniddesaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:551_2: Nirodhasaccampettha taṇhāya pahānaṃ “taṇhāya ca avasesānañca kilesānaṃ pahāna”nti evaṃ yathāvuttassa
atk-abh02a:551_4: Maggasaccaṃ panettha paṭhamajjhānikasotāpattimaggavasena dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ vibhattassa desanānayassa mukhamattameva dassentena niddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:552_0: Yasmā pana na kevalaṃ aṭṭhaṅgiko maggova paṭipadā “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho
atk-abh02a:552_1: hotī”ti vacanato pana puggalajjhāsayavasena pañcaṅgikopi maggo paṭipadā evāti desito,
atk-abh02a:552_2: tasmā taṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ pañcaṅgikavāropi niddiṭṭho.
atk-abh02a:552_3: Yasmā ca na kevalaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikapañcaṅgikamaggāva paṭipadā,
atk-abh02a:552_5: tasmā taṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ tatiyo sabbasaṅgāhikavāropi niddiṭṭho.
atk-abh02a:552_6: Tattha “avasesā dhammā dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya sampayuttā”ti idaṃ parihāyati.
atk-abh02a:553_0: Tattha aṭṭhaṅgikavārassa “taṇhāya avasesānañca kilesānaṃ pahāna”ntiādīsu pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu paṭhamakoṭṭhāse
atk-abh02a:553_5: appaṇihitapaṭipadāti imesu pañcasu vāresu dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ catukkapañcakanayānaṃ vasena dasa nayā honti.
atk-abh02a:553_6: Evaṃ sesesupīti vīsatiyā abhinivesesu dve nayasatāni.
atk-abh02a:553_8: Iti suddhikāni dve sādhipatī aṭṭhāti sabbampi nayasahassaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:553_12: evaṃ sesesupīti aṭṭhaṅgikavāre pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu vīsati nayasahassāni honti.
atk-abh02a:553_13: Tathā pañcaṅgikavāre sabbasaṅgāhikavāre cāti sabbānipi saṭṭhi nayasahassāni satthārā vibhattāni.
atk-abh02a:553_15: Evamidaṃ tividhamahāvāraṃ pañcadasakoṭṭhāsaṃ saṭṭhinayasahassapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ abhidhammabhājanīyaṃ nāma niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:556_1: Pañhāpucchake catunnampi saccānaṃ khandhavibhaṅge vuttanayānusāreneva kusalādibhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:556_2: Ārammaṇattikesu pana samudayasaccaṃ kāmāvacaradhamme assādentassa parittārammaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:556_9: Maggasaccaṃ sahajātahetuvasena sabbadāpi maggahetukaṃ vīriyaṃ vā vīmaṃsaṃ vā jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā maggabhāvanākāle maggādhipati,
atk-abh02a:556_12: tesaṃyeva maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhaṇakāle maggādhipati,
atk-abh02a:557_1: Etāni hi atītādibhede dhamme ārabbha uppattikāle atītādiārammaṇāni honti.
atk-abh02a:557_2: Samudayasaccaṃ ajjhattādibhede dhamme assādentassa ajjhattādiārammaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:557_4: Iti imasmiṃ pañhāpucchake dve saccāni lokiyāni honti,
atk-abh02a:557_8: Sammāsambuddhena hi tīsupi suttantabhājanīyādīsu lokiyalokuttarāneva saccāni kathitāni.
atk-abh02a:557_9: Evamayaṃ saccavibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṃ nīharitvāva bhājetvā dassitoti.
atk-abh02a:562_11: Dukkhasomanassa domanassa upekkhālakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti upekkhindriyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:562_17: Anaññātaññassāmīti pavatte jānanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:562_18: Ñātānaṃyeva dhammānaṃ puna ājānane indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti aññindriyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:563_0: Idha suttantabhājanīyaṃ nāma na gahitaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:563_1: Suttante imāya paṭipāṭiyā bāvīsatiyā indriyānaṃ anāgatattā.
atk-abh02a:563_5: Evaṃ pana nirantaraṃ dvāvīsati āgatāni nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:563_7: Ayaṃ pana aparo nayo – etesu hi
atk-abh02a:565_0: Bhedābhedā tathā kiccā, bhūmito ca vinicchayaṃ.
atk-abh02a:566_0: Tattha cakkhādīnaṃ tāva “cakkhatīti cakkhū”tiādinā nayena attho pakāsito.
atk-abh02a:566_1: Pacchimesu pana tīsu paṭhamaṃ ‘pubbabhāge anaññātaṃ amataṃ padaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ vā jānissāmī’ti evaṃ
atk-abh02a:566_2: paṭipannassa uppajjanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:566_3: Dutiyaṃ ājānanato ca indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca aññindriyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:566_4: Tatiyaṃ aññātāvino catūsu saccesu niṭṭhitañāṇakiccassa khīṇāsavasseva uppajjanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca aññātāvindriyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:567_10: Tena ca siṭṭhānīti indaliṅgaṭṭhena indasiṭṭhaṭṭhena ca indriyāni.
atk-abh02a:567_11: Sabbāneva panetāni bhagavatā yathābhūtato pakāsitāni ca abhisambuddhāni cāti indadesitaṭṭhena indadiṭṭhaṭṭhena ca indriyāni.
atk-abh02a:567_16: tasmiṃ tikkhe tikkhattā mande ca mandattāti.
atk-abh02a:569_1: Tattha ajjhattadhammaṃ pariññāya ariyabhūmipaṭilābho hotīti attabhāvapariyāpannāni cakkhundriyādīni paṭhamaṃ desitāni.
atk-abh02a:569_2: So panattabhāvo yaṃ dhammaṃ upādāya itthīti vā purisoti vā saṅkhaṃ gacchati,
atk-abh02a:569_3: ayaṃ soti nidassanatthaṃ tato itthindriyaṃ purisindriyañca.
atk-abh02a:569_4: So duvidhopi jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhavuttīti ñāpanatthaṃ tato jīvitindriyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:569_5: Yāva tassa pavatti tāva etesaṃ vedayitānaṃ anivatti.
atk-abh02a:569_6: Yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ sukhadukkhanti ñāpanatthaṃ tato sukhindriyādīni.
atk-abh02a:569_7: Taṃnirodhatthaṃ pana ete dhammā bhāvetabbāti paṭipattidassanatthaṃ tato saddhādīni.
atk-abh02a:569_8: Imāya paṭipattiyā esa dhammo paṭhamaṃ attani pātubhavatīti paṭipattiyā amoghabhāvadassanatthaṃ tato anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:569_9: Tasseva phalattā tato anantaraṃ bhāvetabbattā ca tato aññindriyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:569_11: adhigate ca panimasmiṃ natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyanti ñāpanatthaṃ ante paramassāsabhūtaṃ aññātāvindriyaṃ desitanti ayamettha kamo.
atk-abh02a:570_2: Sesānaṃ abhedoti evamettha bhedābhedato vinicchayaṃ vijāniyā.
atk-abh02a:571_1: Cakkhundriyassa tāva “cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ indriyapaccayena
atk-abh02a:571_2: paccayo”ti vacanato yaṃ taṃ indriyapaccayabhāvena sādhetabbaṃ attano tikkhamandādibhāvena cakkhuviññāṇādidhammānaṃ
atk-abh02a:571_13: aññātāvindriyassa sabbakiccesu ussukkappahānañceva amatābhimukhabhāvapaccayatā ca sampayuttānanti evamettha kiccato vinicchayaṃ vijāniyā.
atk-abh02a:572_6: Avasāne tīṇi lokuttarānevāti evaṃ bhūmito vinicchayaṃ vijāniyā.
atk-abh02a:575_1: Niddesavāre “yaṃ cakkhu catunnaṃ mahābhūtāna”ntiādi sabbaṃ dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ padabhājane vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:575_2: Vīriyindriyasamādhindriyaniddesādīsu ca sammāvāyāmo micchāvāyāmo sammāsamādhi micchāsamādhītiādīni na vuttāni. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:575_5: Evaṃ santepettha dasa indriyāni lokiyāni kāmāvacarāneva,
atk-abh02a:578_0: 221. Pañhāpucchake sabbesampi indriyānaṃ kusalādivibhāgo pāḷinayānusāreneva veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:579_1: Ārammaṇattikesu pana sattindriyā anārammaṇāti cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyaitthipurisindriyāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:579_7: siyā mahaggatārammaṇanti kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha pavattikāle parittārammaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:579_10: Navindriyā siyā parittārammaṇāti manindriyajīvitindriyasomanassindriyaupekkhindriyāni ceva saddhādipañcakañca sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:579_11: Jīvitindriyañhi rūpamissakattā anārammaṇesu rūpadhammesu saṅgahitampi arūpakoṭṭhāsena siyāpakkhe saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:581_1: siyā uppādinoti satta rūpindriyāni tīṇi ca vipākindriyāni sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:581_3: Tattha domanassindriyaṃ paṇṇattiṃ ārabbha pavattikāle navattabbārammaṇaṃ,
atk-abh02a:581_7: Tāni hi ajjhattadhammepi bahiddhādhammepi ārabbha pavattanti.
atk-abh02a:582_4: Ayaṃ pana indriyavibhaṅgo dveparivaṭṭaṃ nīharitvā bhājetvā dassitoti.
atk-abh02a:587_1: Idāni tadanantare paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge yā “ayaṃ avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā nayena tanti nikkhittā,
atk-abh02a:587_2: tassā atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ karontena vibhajjavādimaṇḍalaṃ otaritvā ācariye anabbhācikkhantena sakasamayaṃ
atk-abh02a:587_3: avokkamantena parasamayaṃ anāyūhantena suttaṃ appaṭibāhantena vinayaṃ anulomentena mahāpadese olokentena
atk-abh02a:587_4: dhammaṃ dīpentena atthaṃ saṅgahantena tamevatthaṃ puna āvattetvā aparehipi pariyāyehi niddisantena ca
atk-abh02a:590_0: Tasmā “aññatra āgamādhigamappattehi na sukarā paṭiccasamuppādassa atthavaṇṇanā”ti paritulayitvā –
atk-abh02a:605_0: Tattha ‘desanābhedato’ti bhagavato hi vallihārakānaṃ catunnaṃ purisānaṃ valliggahaṇaṃ viya ādito vā majjhato vā paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānaṃ,
atk-abh02a:605_1: tathā pariyosānato vā majjhato vā paṭṭhāya yāva ādīti catubbidhā paṭiccasamuppādadesanā.
atk-abh02a:605_2: Yathā hi vallihārakesu catūsu purisesu eko valliyā mūlameva paṭhamaṃ passati,
atk-abh02a:605_3: so taṃ mūle chetvā sabbaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā ādāya kamme upaneti,
atk-abh02a:605_7: jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānāpi paṭiccasamuppādaṃ deseti.
atk-abh02a:606_0: Yathā pana tesu purisesu eko valliyā majjhaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati,
atk-abh02a:606_1: so majjhe chinditvā uparibhāgaṃyeva ākaḍḍhitvā ādāya kamme upaneti,
atk-abh02a:606_2: evaṃ bhagavā “tassa taṃ vedanaṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī;
atk-abh02a:606_6: bhavapaccayā jātī”ti majjhato paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānāpi deseti.
atk-abh02a:607_0: Yathā ca tesu purisesu eko valliyā aggaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati,
atk-abh02a:607_1: so agge gahetvā aggānusārena yāva mūlā sabbaṃ ādāya kamme upaneti,
atk-abh02a:607_2: evaṃ bhagavā “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:607_5: jarāmaraṇaṃ no vā kathaṃ vā ettha hotī”ti?
atk-abh02a:607_11: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:607_14: saṅkhārā no vā kathaṃ vā ettha hotī”ti?
atk-abh02a:607_17: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti pariyosānato paṭṭhāya yāva āditopi paṭiccasamuppādaṃ deseti.
atk-abh02a:608_0: Yathā pana tesu purisesu eko valliyā majjhameva paṭhamaṃ passati,
atk-abh02a:608_1: so majjhe chinditvā heṭṭhā otaranto yāva mūlā ādāya kamme upaneti,
atk-abh02a:608_21: avijjāpabhavā”ti majjhato paṭṭhāya yāva ādito deseti.
atk-abh02a:609_3: Samantabhaddako hi paṭiccasamuppādo tato tato ñāyappaṭivedhāya saṃvattatiyeva.
atk-abh02a:609_4: Desanāvilāsappatto ca bhagavā catuvesārajjappaṭisambhidāyogena catubbidhagambhīrabhāvappattiyā ca.
atk-abh02a:609_6: Visesato panassa yā ādito paṭṭhāya anulomadesanā,
atk-abh02a:609_7: sā pavattikāraṇavibhāgasammūḷhaṃ veneyyajanaṃ samanupassato yathāsakehi kāraṇehi pavattisandassanatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:610_1: sā “kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno jāyati ca jīyati ca mīyati cā”ti ādinā nayena kicchāpannaṃ lokamanuvilokayato
atk-abh02a:610_2: pubbabhāgappaṭivedhānusārena tassa tassa jarāmaraṇādikassa dukkhassa attanādhigatakāraṇasandassanatthaṃ.
atk-abh02a:610_3: Yā pana majjhato paṭṭhāya yāva ādi,
atk-abh02a:610_4: sā āhāranidānavavatthāpanānusārena yāva atītaṃ addhānaṃ atiharitvā puna atītaddhato pabhuti hetuphalapaṭipāṭisandassanatthaṃ.
atk-abh02a:610_5: Yā pana majjhato paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā pavattā,
atk-abh02a:610_6: sā paccuppanne addhāne anāgataddhahetusamuṭṭhānato pabhuti anāgataddhasandassanatthaṃ.
atk-abh02a:610_7: Tāsu yā sā pavattikāraṇasammūḷhassa veneyyajanassa yathāsakehi kāraṇehi pavattisandassanatthaṃ uppattikkamasandassanatthañca
atk-abh02a:611_1: Kiṃ pakativādīnaṃ pakati viya avijjāpi akāraṇaṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ lokassāti?
atk-abh02a:611_4: Atthi pana pariyāyo yena mūlakāraṇaṃ siyā.
atk-abh02a:611_7: Bhagavā hi vaṭṭakathaṃ kathento dve dhamme sīsaṃ katvā kathesi –
atk-abh02a:611_10: koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya ‘ito pubbe avijjā nāhosi,
atk-abh02a:611_17: koṭi na paññāyati bhavataṇhāya ‘ito pubbe bhavataṇhā nāhosi,
atk-abh02a:612_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā vaṭṭakathaṃ kathento ime dveva dhamme sīsaṃ katvā kathesīti?
atk-abh02a:612_2: Duggatigāmino hi kammassa visesahetu avijjā. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:612_4: aggisantāpalaguḷābhighātaparissamābhibhūtā vajjhagāvī tāya parissamāturatāya nirassādampi attano anatthāvahampi ca uṇhodakapānaṃ viya,
atk-abh02a:612_5: kilesasantāpato nirassādampi duggativinipātato ca attano anatthāvahampi pāṇātipātādimanekappakāraṃ duggatigāmikammaṃ ārabhati.
atk-abh02a:612_6: Sugatigāmino pana kammassa visesahetu bhavataṇhā. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:612_8: yathā vuttappakārā gāvī sītudakataṇhāya saassādaṃ attano parissamavinodanañca sītudakapānaṃ viya,
atk-abh02a:612_9: kilesasantāpavirahato saassādaṃ sugatisampāpanena attano duggatidukkhaparissamavinodanañca pāṇātipātāveramaṇīādimanekappakāraṃ
atk-abh02a:613_0: Etesu pana vaṭṭakathāya sīsabhūtesu dhammesu katthaci bhagavā ekadhammamūlikaṃ desanaṃ deseti,
atk-abh02a:613_13: bālassa taṇhāya sampayuttassa evamayaṃ kāyo samudāgato.
atk-abh02a:613_14: Iti ayañceva kāyo bahiddhā ca nāmarūpaṃ itthetaṃ dvayaṃ,
atk-abh02a:613_16: saḷevāyatanāni yehi phuṭṭho bālo sukhadukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī”tiādi.
atk-abh02a:613_17: Tāsu tāsu desanāsu “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti ayamidha avijjāvasena ekadhammamūlikā desanāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:614_12: Dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādivasena vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ catubbidhaṃ atthaṃ aviditaṃ karotītipi avijjā.
atk-abh02a:614_16: Apica cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ vatthārammaṇānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādapaṭiccasamuppannānañca dhammānaṃ chādanatopi avijjā.
atk-abh02a:615_3: Etīti uppajjati ceva pavattati cāti attho.
atk-abh02a:615_5: Avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo.
atk-abh02a:616_4: kāyavacīcittasaṅkhārā tayoti ime cha avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā.
atk-abh02a:617_3: payogābhisaṅkhāroti ime pana cattāro saṅkhārasaddena āgatasaṅkhārā.
atk-abh02a:617_4: Tattha “aniccā vata saṅkhārā”tiādīsu vuttā sabbepi sappaccayā dhammā ‘saṅkhatasaṅkhārā’ nāma.
atk-abh02a:617_6: Tepi “aniccā vata saṅkhārā”ti ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
atk-abh02a:617_7: Visuṃ pana nesaṃ āgataṭṭhānaṃ na paññāyati.
atk-abh02a:617_14: tāvatikaṃ gantvā akkhāhataṃ maññe aṭṭhāsī”tiādīsu āgato.
atk-abh02a:618_5: tato cittasaṅkhāro”tiādinā nayena saṅkhārasaddena āgatā anekasaṅkhārā.
atk-abh02a:618_8: Ito paraṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇantiādīsu yaṃ vuttaṃ taṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:620_2: atha kho sabbapadehi ‘sambhavantī’ti saddassa yojanā kātabbā.
atk-abh02a:620_3: Itarathā hi “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti vutte kiṃ karontīti na paññāyeyyuṃ.
atk-abh02a:620_4: “Sambhavantī”ti pana yojanāya sati “avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo;
atk-abh02a:620_5: tasmā avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā sambhavantī”ti paccayapaccayuppannavavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:623_5: dvārārammaṇato pana sabbesupi arūpadhammesu chabbidhatā veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:627_3: yonigatipariyāpannato catubbidhaṃ pañcavidhañcāti iminā nayena phassādīnampi ekavidhādibhāvo veditabboti.
atk-abh02a:628_0: ‘Aṅgānañca vavatthānā’ti sokādayo cettha bhavacakkassa avicchedadassanatthaṃ vuttā.
atk-abh02a:628_1: Jarāmaraṇabbhāhatassa hi bālassa te sambhavanti. Yathāha –
atk-abh02a:628_4: puthujjano sārīrikāya dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṃ kandati sammohamāpajjatī”ti.
atk-abh02a:628_5: Yāva ca tesaṃ pavatti tāva avijjāyāti punapi avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti sambandhameva hoti bhavacakkaṃ.
atk-abh02a:628_6: Tasmā tesampi jarāmaraṇeneva ekasaṅkhepaṃ katvā dvādaseva paṭiccasamuppādaṅgānīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a:631_3: Tattha avijjāpaccayesu saṅkhāresu dassetabbesu yasmā putte kathetabbe paṭhamaṃ pitā kathīyati.
atk-abh02a:631_6: Tasmā desanākusalo satthā saṅkhārānaṃ janakatthena pitusadisaṃ avijjaṃ tāva dassetuṃ tattha katamā avijjā?
atk-abh02a:632_0: Tattha yasmā ayaṃ avijjā dukkhasaccassa yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ jānituṃ passituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na deti,
atk-abh02a:632_3: Tathā yasmā dukkhasamudayassa dukkhanirodhassa dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ jānituṃ passituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na deti,
atk-abh02a:632_6: Imesu catūsu ṭhānesu suttantikapariyāyena aññāṇaṃ avijjāti kathitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:633_0: Nikkhepakaṇḍe pana abhidhammapariyāyena “pubbante aññāṇa”nti aparesupi catūsu ṭhānesu aññāṇaṃ gahitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:633_8: Tatrāyaṃ avijjā yasmā atītānaṃ khandhādīnaṃ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ jānituṃ passituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na deti,
atk-abh02a:633_12: atītānāgatānaṃ khandhādīnaṃ idappaccayatāya ceva paṭiccasamuppannadhammānañca yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ jānituṃ passituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na deti,
atk-abh02a:633_15: Imesu aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu abhidhammapariyāyena aññāṇaṃ avijjāti kathitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:634_1: Kiccato ceva jātito ca avijjā kathitā nāma hoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh02a:634_2: Ayañhi avijjā imāni aṭṭha ṭhānāni jānituṃ passituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na detīti kiccato kathitā;
atk-abh02a:634_3: uppajjamānāpi imesu aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu uppajjatīti jātitopi kathitā.
atk-abh02a:634_4: Evaṃ kathetvā puna “yaṃ evarūpaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassana”ntiādīni pañcavīsati padāni avijjāya lakkhaṇaṃ dassetuṃ gahitāni.
atk-abh02a:635_0: Tattha yasmā ayaṃ avijjā imehi aṭṭhahi padehi kathitāpi puna pañcavīsatiyā padehi lakkhaṇe akathite sukathitā nāma na hoti,
atk-abh02a:635_1: lakkhaṇe pana kathiteyeva sukathitā nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:635_2: Yathā puriso naṭṭhaṃ goṇaṃ pariyesamāno manusse puccheyya – “api, ayyā,
atk-abh02a:635_8: Atha tena ‘saṅghāṭi’ vā ‘naṅgalaṃ’ vāti vutte goṇo sukathito nāma bhaveyya;
atk-abh02a:635_9: evameva yasmā ayaṃ avijjā aṭṭhahi padehi kathitāpi puna pañcavīsatiyā padehi lakkhaṇe akathite sukathitā nāma na hoti,
atk-abh02a:635_10: lakkhaṇe pana kathiteyeva sukathitā nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:635_11: Tasmā yānassā lakkhaṇadassanatthaṃ pañcavīsati padāni kathitāni,
atk-abh02a:636_2: Sā atthatthaṃ kāraṇakāraṇaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti.
atk-abh02a:636_3: Ayaṃ pana avijjā uppajjitvā taṃ viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ na detīti ñāṇapaccanīkato aññāṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:636_6: Avijjā pana uppajjitvā taṃ passituṃ na detīti adassanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:636_9: Avijjā pana uppajjitvā taṃ abhisametuṃ na detīti anabhisamayo.
atk-abh02a:636_11: Sā taṃ ākāraṃ anubujjhati sambujjhati paṭivijjhati.
atk-abh02a:636_12: Avijjā pana uppajjitvā taṃ anubujjhituṃ saṃbujjhituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na detīti ananubodho asambodho appaṭivedho.
atk-abh02a:636_14: Sā taṃ ākāraṃ gahetvā ghaṃsitvā gaṇhāti.
atk-abh02a:636_15: Avijjā pana uppajjitvā taṃ gahetvā ghaṃsitvā gaṇhituṃ na detīti asaṅgāhanā.
atk-abh02a:636_17: Sā taṃ ākāraṃ ogāhitvā anupavisitvā gaṇhāti.
atk-abh02a:636_18: Avijjā pana uppajjitvā taṃ ogāhitvā anupavisitvā gaṇhituṃ na detīti apariyogāhanā.
atk-abh02a:636_20: Sā taṃ ākāraṃ samaṃ sammā ca pekkhati.
atk-abh02a:636_21: Avijjā pana uppajjitvā taṃ samaṃ sammā ca pekkhituṃ na detīti asamapekkhanā.
atk-abh02a:636_24: Avijjā pana uppajjitvā taṃ paccavekkhituṃ na detīti apaccavekkhaṇā.
atk-abh02a:637_1: Sā atthatthaṃ kāraṇakāraṇaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ sammā pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:637_2: Avijjā pana uppajjitvā taṃ ākāraṃ pajānituṃ na detīti asampajaññaṃ.
atk-abh02a:637_10: Magge pariyuṭṭhitacorā addhike viya kusalacittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāti gaṇhāti vilumpatīti avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:637_11: Yathā nagaradvāre palighasaṅkhātāya laṅgiyā patitāya antonagare manussānaṃ bahinagaragamanampi bahinagare
atk-abh02a:637_13: evameva yassa sakkāyanagare ayaṃ patitā tassa nibbānasampāpakaṃ ñāṇagamanaṃ pacchijjatīti avijjālaṅgī nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:637_18: Ayaṃ vuccati avijjāti ayaṃ evaṃlakkhaṇā avijjā nāmāti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:638_0: Evaṃlakkhaṇā panāyaṃ avijjā dukkhādīsu aññāṇanti vuttāpi dukkhasaccassa ekadeso hoti,
atk-abh02a:639_2: Apica kho pana dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ gambhīrañceva duddasañca.
atk-abh02a:639_4: lakkhaṇassa pana duddasattā gambhīraṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-abh02a:639_6: Yathā pana mahāsamuddaṃ manthetvā ojāya nīharaṇaṃ nāma bhāro,
atk-abh02a:639_8: pabbataṃ pīḷetvā rasassa nīharaṇaṃ nāma bhāro;
atk-abh02a:639_9: evameva dve saccāni gambhīratāya eva duddasāni,
atk-abh02a:639_11: Evaṃ duddasattā gambhīrānaṃ gambhīrattā ca duddasānaṃ catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ paṭicchādakaṃ mohandhakāraṃ ayaṃ vuccati avijjāti.
atk-abh02a:642_0: Saṅkhārapade heṭṭhā vuttasaṅkhāresu saṅkhārasaddena āgatasaṅkhāre anāmasitvā avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāreyeva dassento tattha katame avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā?
atk-abh02a:643_15: Kasmā panetesaṃ suttānaṃ vasena te gahitāti?
atk-abh02a:643_17: nāpi bāhirakaisīhi vā sāvakehi vā devatāhi vā bhāsito.
atk-abh02a:643_19: Abhidhammepi hi suttepi ekasadisāva tanti niddiṭṭhāti imassatthassa dīpanatthaṃ.
atk-abh02a:644_0: Idāni te saṅkhāre pabhedato dassetuṃ tattha katamo puññābhisaṅkhārotiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:644_1: Tattha kusalā cetanāti aniyamato catubhūmikacetanāpi vuttā.
atk-abh02a:644_2: Kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāti niyamitattā pana aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacetanā,
atk-abh02a:644_3: pañca rūpāvacarakusalacetanāti terasa cetanā puññābhisaṅkhāro nāma.
atk-abh02a:644_4: Dānamayātiādīhi tāsaṃyeva cetanānaṃ puññakiriyavatthuvasena pavatti dassitā.
atk-abh02a:644_7: Yathā hi paguṇaṃ dhammaṃ sajjhāyamāno ekaṃ dve anusandhigatepi na jānāti,
atk-abh02a:644_9: evameva kasiṇaparikammaṃ karontassa paguṇajjhānaṃ paccavekkhantassa paguṇakammaṭṭhānañca manasikarontassa ñāṇavippayuttāpi bhāvanā hoti.
atk-abh02a:645_0: Tattha dānamayādīsu “dānaṃ ārabbha dānamadhikicca yā uppajjati cetanā sañcetanā cetayitattaṃ –
atk-abh02a:645_3: bhāvanaṃ ārabbha bhāvanamadhikicca yā uppajjati cetanā sañcetanā cetayitattaṃ –
atk-abh02a:645_4: ayaṃ vuccati bhāvanāmayo puññābhisaṅkhāro”ti ayaṃ saṅkhepadesanā.
atk-abh02a:646_0: Cīvarādīsu pana catūsu paccayesu rūpādīsu vā chasu ārammaṇesu annādīsu vā dasasu dānavatthūsu taṃ taṃ
atk-abh02a:646_1: dentassa tesaṃ uppādanato paṭṭhāya pubbabhāge pariccāgakāle pacchā somanassacittena anussaraṇe cāti tīsu
atk-abh02a:646_3: Sīlaṃ paripūraṇatthāya pana ‘pabbajissāmī’ti vihāraṃ gacchantassa pabbajantassa manorathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā ‘pabbajito vatamhi,
atk-abh02a:646_4: sādhu suṭṭhū’ti āvajjantassa pātimokkhaṃ saṃvarantassa cīvarādayo paccaye paccavekkhantassa āpāthagatesu
atk-abh02a:646_5: rūpādīsu cakkhudvārādīni saṃvarantassa ājīvaṃ sodhentassa ca pavattā cetanā sīlamayā nāma.
atk-abh02a:646_6: Paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttena vipassanāmaggena cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato bhāventassa rūpe…pe… dhamme,
atk-abh02a:646_14: dhammasaññaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato bhāventassa pavattā cetanā bhāvanāmayā nāmāti ayaṃ vitthārakathā.
atk-abh02a:647_1: Kāmāvacarāti kiñcāpi tattha ṭhapetvā dve domanassasahagatacetanā sesā rūpārūpabhavepi uppajjanti,
atk-abh02a:647_3: kāmāvacareyeva paṭisandhivasena vipākaṃ avacārentīti kāmāvacarātveva vuttā.
atk-abh02a:648_0: Āneñjābhisaṅkhāraniddese kusalā cetanā arūpāvacarāti catasso arūpāvacarakusalacetanā.
atk-abh02a:648_1: Etā hi catasso aniñjanaṭṭhena aniñjanassa ca abhisaṅkharaṇaṭṭhena āneñjābhisaṅkhāroti vuccanti.
atk-abh02a:648_2: Rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānato hi tisso kusalavipākakiriyācetanā dvādasa arūpāvacaracetanāti pañcadasa dhammā aniccalaṭṭhena aphandanaṭṭhena āneñjā nāma.
atk-abh02a:648_3: Tattha rūpāvacarā kusalā cetanā aniñjā samānāpi attanā sarikkhakampi asarikkhakampi saiñjanampi aniñjanampi
atk-abh02a:648_4: rūpārūpaṃ janetīti āneñjābhisaṅkhāro nāma na hoti.
atk-abh02a:648_5: Vipākakiriyacetanā pana avipākattā vipākaṃ na abhisaṅkharonti,
atk-abh02a:648_6: tathā arūpāvacarā vipākakiriyacetanāpīti ekādasāpi etā cetanā āneñjāva na abhisaṅkhārā.
atk-abh02a:648_7: Catubbidhā pana arūpāvacarakusalacetanā yathā hatthiassādīnaṃ sadisāva chāyā honti,
atk-abh02a:648_8: evaṃ attanā sadisaṃ niccalaṃ arūpameva janetīti āneñjābhisaṅkhāroti vuccatīti.
atk-abh02a:649_2: āneñjābhisaṅkhāravasena catassoti sabbāpetā paripiṇḍitā ekūnatiṃsa cetanā honti.
atk-abh02a:649_3: Iti bhagavā aparimāṇesu cakkavāḷesu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uppajjanakakusalākusalacetanā mahātulāya dhārayamāno viya,
atk-abh02a:649_4: nāḷiyaṃ pakkhipitvā minamāno viya ca sabbaññutañāṇena paricchinditvā ekūnatiṃsameva dassesi.
atk-abh02a:650_0: Idāni aparimāṇesu cakkavāḷesu aparimāṇā sattā kusalākusalakammaṃ āyūhamānā yehi dvārehi āyūhanti,
atk-abh02a:650_1: tāni tīṇi kammadvārāni dassento tattha katamo kāyasaṅkhāro?
atk-abh02a:650_3: Tattha kāyasañcetanāti kāyaviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā kāyadvārato pavattā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacetanā dvādasa akusalacetanāti samavīsati cetanā;
atk-abh02a:650_4: kāyadvāre ādānaggahaṇacopanaṃ pāpayamānā uppannā vīsati kusalākusalacetanātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:651_0: Vacīsañcetanāti vacīviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā vacīdvārato pavattā tāyeva vīsati cetanā;
atk-abh02a:651_1: vacīdvāre hanusañcopanaṃ vākyabhedaṃ pāpayamānā uppannā vīsati cetanātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:651_2: Abhiññācetanā panettha parato viññāṇassa paccayo na hotīti na gahitā.
atk-abh02a:652_0: Manosañcetanāti ubhopi viññattiyo asamuṭṭhāpetvā manodvāre uppannā sabbāpi ekūnatiṃsa cetanā.
atk-abh02a:652_1: Iti bhagavā aparimāṇesu cakkavāḷesu aparimāṇā sattā kusalākusalakammaṃ āyūhamānā imehi tīhi dvārehi āyūhantīti āyūhanakammadvāraṃ dassesi.
atk-abh02a:653_0: Imesaṃ pana dvinnampi tikānaṃ aññamaññaṃ sampayogo veditabbo. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh02a:653_1: Puññābhisaṅkhāro hi kāyaduccaritā viramantassa siyā kāyasaṅkhāro,
atk-abh02a:653_3: Evaṃ aṭṭha kusalacetanā kāmāvacarā puññābhisaṅkhāro ca hoti kāyasaṅkhāro ca vacīsaṅkhāro ca.
atk-abh02a:653_4: Manodvāre uppannā pana terasa cetanā puññābhisaṅkhāro ca hoti cittasaṅkhāro ca.
atk-abh02a:653_7: dve dvārāni muñcitvā manodvāre pavattiyaṃ siyā cittasaṅkhāroti.
atk-abh02a:653_8: Evaṃ apuññābhisaṅkhāro kāyasaṅkhāropi hoti vacīsaṅkhāropi cittasaṅkhāropi.
atk-abh02a:655_3: Yassa hi dukkhādīsu avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ aññāṇaṃ appahīnaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:655_4: so dukkhe tāva pubbantādīsu ca aññāṇena saṃsāradukkhaṃ sukhasaññāya gahetvā tassa hetubhūte tividhepi saṅkhāre ārabhati,
atk-abh02a:655_5: samudaye aññāṇena dukkhahetubhūtepi taṇhāparikkhāre saṅkhāre sukhahetuto maññamāno ārabhati,
atk-abh02a:655_6: nirodhe pana magge ca aññāṇena dukkhassa anirodhabhūtepi gativisese dukkhanirodhasaññī hutvā nirodhassa
atk-abh02a:655_7: ca amaggabhūtesupi yaññāmaratapādīsu nirodhamaggasaññī hutvā dukkhanirodhaṃ patthayamāno yaññāmaratapādimukhena
atk-abh02a:656_0: Apica so tāya catūsu saccesu appahīnāvijjatāya visesato jātijarārogamaraṇādianekādīnavavokiṇṇaṃ puññaphalasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-abh02a:656_1: dukkhaṃ dukkhato ajānanto tassa adhigamāya kāyavacīcittasaṅkhārabhedaṃ puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ ārabhati devaccharakāmako
atk-abh02a:656_3: sukhasammatassāpi ca tassa puññaphalassa ante mahāpariḷāhajanakaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhataṃ appassādatañca
atk-abh02a:656_4: apassantopi tappaccayaṃ vuttappakārameva puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ ārabhati salabho viya dīpasikhābhinipātaṃ,
atk-abh02a:657_0: Kāmūpasevanādīsu ca savipākesu ādīnavaṃ apassanto sukhasaññāya ceva kilesābhibhūtatāya ca dvārattayappavattampi
atk-abh02a:657_3: Āruppavipākesu cāpi saṅkhāravipariṇāmadukkhataṃ anavabujjhamāno sassatādivipallāsena cittasaṅkhārabhūtaṃ
atk-abh02a:658_12: so avijjāvirāgā vijjuppādā neva puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharotī”ti.
atk-abh02a:661_0: Paresaṃ pacchimānaṃ sā, ekadhā paccayo matā.
atk-abh02a:662_0: Tattha ‘puññānaṃ duvidhā’ti ārammaṇapaccayena ca upanissayapaccayena cāti dvedhā paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:662_1: Sā hi avijjaṃ khayato vayato sammasanakāle kāmāvacarānaṃ puññābhisaṅkhārānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo hoti,
atk-abh02a:662_3: avijjāsamatikkamanatthāya pana dānādīni ceva kāmāvacarapuññakiriyavatthūni pūrentassa rūpāvacarajjhānāni
atk-abh02a:662_4: ca uppādentassa dvinnampi tesaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo hoti;
atk-abh02a:662_5: tathā avijjāsammūḷhattā kāmabhavarūpabhavasampattiyo patthetvā tāneva puññāni karontassa.
atk-abh02a:663_0: ‘Anekadhā pana paresa’nti apuññābhisaṅkhārānaṃ anekadhā paccayo hoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh02a:663_1: Esā hi avijjaṃ ārabbha rāgādīnaṃ uppajjanakāle ārammaṇapaccayena,
atk-abh02a:663_5: yaṃ kiñci akusalaṃ karontassa hetusahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatapaccayehīti anekadhā paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:664_0: ‘Pacchimānaṃ sā ekadhā paccayo matā’ti āneñjābhisaṅkhārānaṃ upanissayapaccayeneva ekadhā paccayo matā.
atk-abh02a:664_1: So panassā upanissayabhāvo puññābhisaṅkhāre vuttanayeneva veditabboti.
atk-abh02a:665_1: ‘kiṃ panāyamekāva avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo udāhu aññepi paccayā hontī’ti?
atk-abh02a:665_2: Kiñcettha yadi tāva ekāva ekakāraṇavādo āpajjati.
atk-abh02a:665_3: Atha ‘aññepi santi avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā’ti ekakāraṇaniddeso nupapajjatīti?
atk-abh02a:666_0: Ekaṃ na ekato idha, nānekamanekatopi no ekaṃ;
atk-abh02a:668_0: Ekato hi kāraṇato na idha kiñci ekaṃ phalamatthi,
atk-abh02a:668_4: Tathā hi anekehi utupathavībījasalilasaṅkhātehi kāraṇehi anekameva rūpagandharasādiaṅkurasaṅkhātaṃ phalamuppajjamānaṃ dissati.
atk-abh02a:669_3: desanāvilāsassa ca veneyyānañca anurūpato ekamevahetuṃ vā phalaṃ vā dīpeti;
atk-abh02a:669_5: Phasso hi vedanāya padhānahetu yathāphassaṃ vedanāvavatthānato.
atk-abh02a:669_6: Vedanā ca phassassa padhānaphalaṃ yathāvedanaṃ phassavavatthānato.
atk-abh02a:671_0: Tasmā ayamidha avijjā vijjamānesupi aññesu vatthārammaṇasahajātadhammādīsu saṅkhārakāraṇesu “assādānupassino
atk-abh02a:671_1: taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī”ti ca “avijjāsamudayā āsavasamudayo”ti ca vacanato aññesampi taṇhādīnaṃ saṅkhārahetūnaṃ
atk-abh02a:671_4: avijjāgato puññābhisaṅkhārampi abhisaṅkharotī”ti pākaṭattā asādhāraṇattā ca saṅkhārānaṃ hetubhāvena dīpitāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:671_5: Eteneva ca ekekahetuphaladīpanaparihāravacanena sabbattha ekekahetuphaladīpane payojanaṃ veditabbanti.
atk-abh02a:672_1: evaṃ santepi ekantāniṭṭhaphalāya sāvajjāya avijjāya kathaṃ puññāneñjābhisaṅkhārapaccayattaṃ yujjati?
atk-abh02a:674_0: Dhammānaṃ paccayo siddho, vipākā eva te ca na.
atk-abh02a:675_0: Dhammānañhi ṭhānasabhāvakiccādiviruddho ca aviruddho ca paccayo loke siddho.
atk-abh02a:676_2: Sadisameva hi utuāhārasaṅkhātaṃ rūpaṃ rūpassa paccayo hoti,
atk-abh02a:676_7: Yesañca dhammānaṃ ye viruddhāviruddhā sadisāsadisā paccayā,
atk-abh02a:676_8: na te dhammā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākāyeva.
atk-abh02a:676_9: Iti ayaṃ avijjā vipākavasena ekantāniṭṭhaphalasabhāvavasena ca sāvajjāpi samānā sabbesampi etesaṃ puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ
atk-abh02a:677_0: So cassā paccayabhāvo “yassa hi dukkhādīsu avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ aññāṇaṃ appahīnaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:677_1: so dukkhe tāva pubbantādīsu ca aññāṇena saṃsāradukkhaṃ sukhasaññāya gahetvā tassa hetubhūte tividhepi saṅkhāre ārabhatī”tiādinā nayena vutto eva.
atk-abh02a:681_0: Abhisaṅkharoti so ete, saṅkhāre tividhe yato;
atk-abh02a:682_0: Avijjā paccayo tesaṃ, tividhānampi yaṃ tatoti.
atk-abh02a:683_2: Cutiyā tāva vimūḷho sabbattha “khandhānaṃ bhedo maraṇa”nti cutiṃ agaṇhanto ‘satto marati,
atk-abh02a:683_4: Upapāte vimūḷho sabbattha “khandhānaṃ pātubhāvo jātī”ti upapātaṃ agaṇhanto ‘satto upapajjati,
atk-abh02a:686_1: Taṃ evaṃ agaṇhanto ‘ayaṃ satto asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ gacchati,
atk-abh02a:686_2: parasmā lokā imaṃ lokaṃ āgacchatī’tiādīni vikappeti.
atk-abh02a:686_3: Saṅkhārānaṃ lakkhaṇe vimūḷho saṅkhārānaṃ sabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇañca agaṇhanto saṅkhāre attato
atk-abh02a:686_4: attaniyato dhuvato subhato sukhato ca vikappeti.
atk-abh02a:686_5: Paṭiccasamuppannadhammesu vimūḷho avijjādīhi saṅkhārādīnaṃ pavattiṃ agaṇhanto “attā jānāti vā na jānāti vā,
atk-abh02a:686_6: so eva karoti ca kāreti ca so paṭisandhiyaṃ upapajjati,
atk-abh02a:686_7: tassa aṇuissarādayo kalalādibhāvena sarīraṃ saṇṭhapetvā indriyāni sampādenti,
atk-abh02a:686_8: so indriyasampanno phusati vediyati taṇhiyati upādiyati ghaṭiyati,
atk-abh02a:686_9: so puna bhavantare bhavatī”ti vā “sabbe sattā niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇatā”ti vā vikappeti.
atk-abh02a:686_10: So evaṃ avijjāya andhīkato evaṃ vikappento yathā nāma andho pathaviyaṃ vicaranto maggampi amaggampi thalampi ninnampi samampi visamampi paṭipajjati,
atk-abh02a:686_11: evaṃ puññampi apuññampi āneñjampi saṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharotīti.
atk-abh02a:691_0: Yadā ñatvā ca so dhammaṃ, saccāni abhisamessati;
atk-abh02a:696_1: Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇapadaniddese cakkhuviññāṇantiādīsu cakkhuviññāṇaṃ kusalavipākaṃ akusalavipākanti duvidhaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:696_8: Iti imehi chahi viññāṇehi sabbānipi bāttiṃsa lokiyavipākaviññāṇāni saṅgahitāni honti.
atk-abh02a:696_9: Lokuttarāni pana vaṭṭakathāyaṃ na yujjantīti na gahitāni.
atk-abh02a:697_1: kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ ‘idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ viññāṇaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā hotī’ti?
atk-abh02a:699_0: “Kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:701_0: “Tasseva rūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi…pe…
atk-abh02a:703_2: ekā manoviññāṇadhātūti evaṃ sattavidhaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
atk-abh02a:704_0: “Akusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:705_0: Āneñjābhisaṅkhārapaccayā pana cattāri arūpavipākānīti evaṃ catubbidhaṃ viññāṇaṃ hotīti. Yathāha –
atk-abh02a:706_0: “Tasseva arūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ…pe…
atk-abh02a:707_1: taṃ ñatvā idānissa evaṃ pavatti veditabbā –
atk-abh02a:707_2: sabbameva hi idaṃ pavattipaṭisandhivasena dvidhā pavattati.
atk-abh02a:707_5: somanassasahagatāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātūti imāni terasa pañcavokārabhave pavattiyaṃyeva pavattanti.
atk-abh02a:707_6: Sesāni ekūnavīsati tīsu bhavesu yathānurūpaṃ pavattiyampi paṭisandhiyampi pavattanti.
atk-abh02a:708_1: Kusalavipākāni tāva cakkhuviññāṇādīni pañca kusalavipākena vā akusalavipākena vā nibbattassa yathākkamaṃ
atk-abh02a:708_2: paripākamupagatindriyassa cakkhādīnaṃ āpāthagataṃ iṭṭhaṃ vā iṭṭhamajjhattaṃ vā rūpādiārammaṇaṃ ārabbha
atk-abh02a:708_5: Kevalañhi tesaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ aniṭṭhamajjhattaṃ vā rūpādiārammaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:708_7: Dasāpi cetāni niyatadvārārammaṇavatthuṭṭhānāni niyatakiccāneva ca bhavanti.
atk-abh02a:709_0: Tato kusalavipākānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ anantaraṃ kusalavipākamanodhātu tesaññeva ārammaṇamārabbha hadayavatthuṃ
atk-abh02a:709_3: Idañca pana dvayaṃ aniyatadvārārammaṇaṃ niyatavatthuṭṭhānaṃ niyatakiccañca hoti.
atk-abh02a:710_0: Somanassasahagatā pana ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātu kusalavipākamanodhātuyā anantaraṃ tassā eva ārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:710_1: ārabbha hadayavatthuṃ nissāya santīraṇakiccaṃ sādhayamānā ca chasu dvāresu balavārammaṇe kāmāvacarasattānaṃ
atk-abh02a:710_2: yebhuyyena lobhasampayuttajavanāvasāne bhavaṅgavīthiṃ pacchinditvā javanena gahitārammaṇe tadārammaṇavasena
atk-abh02a:710_3: ca sakiṃ vā dvikkhattuṃ vā pavattati.
atk-abh02a:710_4: Cittappavattigaṇanāyaṃ pana sabbadvāresu tadārammaṇe dve eva cittavārā āgatā.
atk-abh02a:710_5: Idaṃ pana cittaṃ tadārammaṇanti ca piṭṭhibhavaṅganti cāti dve nāmāni labhati,
atk-abh02a:710_7: Evaṃ tāva terasa pañcavokārabhave pavattiyaṃyeva pavattantīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a:710_8: Sesesu ekūnavīsatiyā cittesu na kiñci attano anurūpāya paṭisandhiyā na pavattati.
atk-abh02a:711_0: Pavattiyaṃ pana kusalākusalavipākā tāva dve ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyo pañcadvāre kusalākusalavipākamanodhātūnaṃ anantaraṃ santīraṇakiccaṃ,
atk-abh02a:711_2: attanā dinnapaṭisandhito uddhaṃ asati bhavaṅgupacchedake cittuppāde bhavaṅgakiccaṃ,
atk-abh02a:711_3: ante cutikiccañcāti cattāri kiccāni sādhayamānā niyatavatthukā aniyatadvārārammaṇaṭṭhānakiccā hutvā pavattanti.
atk-abh02a:712_0: Aṭṭha kāmāvacarasahetukacittāni pavattiyaṃ vuttanayeneva chasu dvāresu tadārammaṇakiccaṃ,
atk-abh02a:712_1: attanā dinnapaṭisandhito uddhaṃ asati bhavaṅgupacchedake cittuppāde bhavaṅgakiccaṃ,
