atk-abh02a:712_2: ante cutikiccañcāti tīṇi kiccāni sādhayamānāni niyatavatthukāni aniyatadvārārammaṇaṭṭhānakiccāni hutvā pavattanti.
atk-abh02a:713_0: Pañca rūpāvacarāni cattāri ca arūpāvacarāni attanā dinnapaṭisandhito uddhaṃ asati bhavaṅgupacchedake cittuppāde bhavaṅgakiccaṃ,
atk-abh02a:713_3: itarāni avatthukāni niyatārammaṇāni aniyataṭṭhānakiccāni hutvā pavattantīti.
atk-abh02a:713_4: Evaṃ tāva bāttiṃsavidhampi viññāṇaṃ pavattiyaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā pavattati.
atk-abh02a:713_5: Tatrassa te te saṅkhārā kammapaccayena ca upanissayapaccayena ca paccayā honti.
atk-abh02a:714_1: tesu ekampi rūpārūpabhave tadārammaṇaṃ hutvā na pavattati. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:714_4: yaṃ rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu pavattiyaṃ tassa janakaṃ bhaveyya.
atk-abh02a:714_5: Cakkhuviññāṇādīnampi rūpabhave abhāvo āpajjatīti ce? Na;
atk-abh02a:715_0: Yathā cetaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ ekantena rūpārūpabhave nappavattati tathā sabbepi akāmāvacare dhamme nānubandhati. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:715_2: Tañhi yathā nāma gehā nikkhamitvā bahi gantukāmo taruṇadārako attano janakaṃ pitaraṃ vā aññaṃ vā pitusadisaṃ
atk-abh02a:715_5: tathā etampi bhavaṅgārammaṇato bahi nikkhamitukāmaṃ sabhāgatāya attano janakaṃ pitaraṃ vā pitusadisaṃ vā kāmāvacarajavanameva anubandhati,
atk-abh02a:716_1: tathā yadā ete kāmāvacaradhammāpi mahaggatārammaṇā hutvā pavattanti tadā tepi nānubandhati. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:716_3: Tañhi yathā pitaraṃ vā pitusadisaṃ vā ñātiṃ anubandhantopi taruṇadārako gharadvāraantaravīthicatukkādimhi pariciteyeva dese anubandhati,
atk-abh02a:716_4: na araññaṃ vā yuddhabhūmiṃ vā gacchantaṃ;
atk-abh02a:716_5: evaṃ kāmāvacaradhamme anubandhantampi amahaggatādimhi pariciteyeva dese pavattamāne dhamme anubandhati,
atk-abh02a:717_0: Yasmā cassa “sabbo kāmāvacaravipāko kiriyamanodhātu kiriyaahetukamanoviññāṇadhātu somanassasahagatā ime
atk-abh02a:717_1: dhammā parittārammaṇā”ti evaṃ accantaparittameva ārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:718_2: ekādasa tadārammaṇacittāni nāmagottaṃ ārabbha javane javite tadārammaṇaṃ na gaṇhanti.
atk-abh02a:718_3: Paṇṇattiṃ ārabbha javane javite tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhati.
atk-abh02a:718_6: Rūpārūpadhamme ārabbha javane javite tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhati.
atk-abh02a:718_9: Lokuttaradhamme ārabbha javane javite tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhati.
atk-abh02a:718_10: Abhiññāñāṇaṃ ārabbha javane javite tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhati.
atk-abh02a:718_11: Paṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ ārabbha javane javite tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhati.
atk-abh02a:719_0: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “sesesu ekūnavīsatiyā cittesu na kiñci attano anurūpāya paṭisandhiyā na pavattatī”ti,
atk-abh02a:720_2: Tattha akusalavipākāya ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyā apāyesu paṭisandhi hoti,
atk-abh02a:720_4: Aṭṭhahi sahetukamahāvipākehi kāmāvacaradevesu ceva manussesu ca puññavantānaṃ paṭisandhi hoti,
atk-abh02a:721_0: Saṅkhepato paṭisandhiyā tīṇi ārammaṇāni honti – kammaṃ,
atk-abh02a:721_4: Kammanimittaṃ nāma yaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kammaṃ āyūhati.
atk-abh02a:721_5: Tattha atīte kappakoṭisatasahassamatthakasmimpi kamme kate tasmiṃ khaṇe kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā āgantvā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a:722_1: gopakasīvalī kira nāma tālapiṭṭhikavihāre cetiyaṃ kāresi.
atk-abh02a:722_3: So tadeva nimittaṃ gaṇhitvā kālaṃkatvā devaloke nibbatti.
atk-abh02a:722_5: Parammukhaṃ gacchantassa hi pacchato tikhiṇena asinā sīsaṃ chindanti.
atk-abh02a:722_6: Nipajjitvā niddāyantassāpi tikhiṇena asinā sīsaṃ chindanti.
atk-abh02a:722_8: Evarūpepi kāle aññataraṃ kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a:722_11: Evarūpepi kāle kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a:722_12: Evaṃ pisiyamānāya pana makkhikāya paṭhamaṃ kāyadvārāvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ nāvaṭṭeti,
atk-abh02a:722_25: Arūpadhammānaṃ visayo nāma evaṃ lahukoti dīpanatthaṃ.
atk-abh02a:723_0: Gatinimittaṃ nāma nibbattanakaokāse eko vaṇṇo upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a:723_1: Tattha niraye upaṭṭhahante lohakumbhisadiso hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a:723_6: gatinimittanti saṅkhepato paṭisandhiyā tīṇi ārammaṇāni honti.
atk-abh02a:724_6: Dasannaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ atītaṃ vā paccuppannaṃ vā.
atk-abh02a:724_8: Evaṃ tīsu ārammaṇesu pavattamānā pana paṭisandhi yasmā atītārammaṇassa vā navattabbārammaṇassa vā cuticittassa anantarameva hoti.
atk-abh02a:724_10: Tasmā dvīsu ārammaṇesu aññatarārammaṇāya cutiyā anantaraṃ tīsu ārammaṇesu aññatarārammaṇāya paṭisandhiyā sugatiduggativasena pavattanākāro veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:725_1: kāmāvacarasugatiyaṃ tāva ṭhitassa pāpakammino puggalassa “tānissa tamhi samaye olambantī”tiādivacanato
atk-abh02a:725_2: maraṇamañce nipannassa yathūpacitaṃ pāpakammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā manodvāre āpāthamāgacchati.
atk-abh02a:725_3: Taṃ ārabbha uppannāya tadārammaṇapariyosānāya suddhāya vā javanavīthiyā anantaraṃ bhavaṅgavisayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cuticittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:725_4: Tasmiṃ niruddhe tadeva āpāthagataṃ kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā ārabbha anupacchinnakilesabalavināmitaṃ duggatipariyāpannaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:725_5: Ayaṃ atītārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā atītārammaṇā paṭisandhi.
atk-abh02a:726_0: Aparassa maraṇasamaye vuttappakārakammavasena narakādīsu aggijālavaṇṇādikaṃ duggatinimittaṃ manodvāre āpāthamāgacchati.
atk-abh02a:726_1: Tassa dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅge uppajjitvā niruddhe taṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha ekaṃ āvajjanaṃ,
atk-abh02a:726_4: Tato bhavaṅgavisayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaṃ cuticittaṃ.
atk-abh02a:726_7: Ayaṃ atītārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā paccuppannārammaṇā paṭisandhi.
atk-abh02a:727_0: Aparassa maraṇasamaye pañcannaṃ dvārānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ dvāre rāgādihetubhūtaṃ hīnārammaṇaṃ āpāthamāgacchati.
atk-abh02a:727_1: Tassa yathākkamena uppannavoṭṭhabbanāvasāne maraṇassa āsannabhāvena mandībhūtavegattā pañca javanāni dve tadārammaṇāni ca uppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:727_10: ekaṃ cuticittanti pañcadasa cittakkhaṇā atītā honti.
atk-abh02a:727_11: Athāvasesaekacittakkhaṇāyuke tasmiṃ yeva ārammaṇe paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:727_12: Ayampi atītārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā paccuppannārammaṇā paṭisandhi.
atk-abh02a:727_13: Esa tāva atītārammaṇāya sugaticutiyā anantarā atītapaccuppannārammaṇāya duggatipaṭisandhiyā pavattanākāro.
atk-abh02a:728_0: Duggatiyaṃ ṭhitassa pana upacitānavajjakammassa vuttanayeneva taṃ anavajjakammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā
atk-abh02a:728_1: manodvāre āpāthamāgacchatīti kaṇhapakkhe sukkapakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:728_2: Ayaṃ atītārammaṇāya duggaticutiyā anantarā atītapaccuppannārammaṇāya sugatipaṭisandhiyā pavattanākāro.
atk-abh02a:729_0: Sugatiyaṃ ṭhitassa pana upacitānavajjakammassa “tānissa tamhi samaye olambantī”tiādivacanato maraṇamañce
atk-abh02a:729_1: nipannassa yathūpacitaṃ anavajjakammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā manodvāre āpāthamāgacchati.
atk-abh02a:729_4: Taṃ ārabbha uppannāya tadārammaṇapariyosānāya suddhāya vā javanavīthiyā anantaraṃ bhavaṅgavisayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cuticittamuppajjati.
atk-abh02a:729_5: Tasmiṃ niruddhe tadeva āpāthagataṃ kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā ārabbha anupacchinnakilesabalavināmitaṃ sugatipariyāpannaṃ paṭisandhicittamuppajjati.
atk-abh02a:729_6: Ayaṃ atītārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā atītārammaṇā navattabbārammaṇā vā paṭisandhi.
atk-abh02a:730_0: Aparassa maraṇasamaye kāmāvacarānavajjakammavasena manussaloke mātukucchivaṇṇasaṅkhātaṃ vā devaloke uyyānakapparukkhādivaṇṇasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-abh02a:730_2: Tassa duggatinimitte dassitānukkameneva cuticittānantaraṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:730_3: Ayaṃ atītārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā paccuppannārammaṇā paṭisandhi.
atk-abh02a:731_2: cittaṃ pasādehī’ti vatvā pupphadāmadhajapaṭākādivasena rūpārammaṇaṃ vā dhammassavanatūriyapūjādivasena
atk-abh02a:731_3: saddārammaṇaṃ vā dhūmavāsagandhādivasena gandhārammaṇaṃ vā ‘idaṃ, tāta, sāyassu,
atk-abh02a:731_4: tavatthāya dātabbaṃ deyyadhamma’nti vatvā madhuphāṇitādivasena rasārammaṇaṃ vā ‘idaṃ, tāta, phusassu,
atk-abh02a:731_5: tavatthāya dātabbaṃ deyyadhamma’nti vatvā cīnapaṭasomārapaṭādivasena phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā pañcadvāre upasaṃharanti.
atk-abh02a:731_6: Tassa tasmiṃ āpāthagate rūpādiārammaṇe yathākkamena uppannavoṭṭhapanāvasāne maraṇassa āsannabhāvena mandībhūtavegattā
atk-abh02a:731_7: pañca javanāni dve tadārammaṇāni ca uppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:731_8: Tato bhavaṅgavisayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaṃ cuticittaṃ,
atk-abh02a:731_9: tadavasāne tasmiññeva ekacittakkhaṇaṭṭhitike ārammaṇe paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:731_10: Ayampi atītārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā paccuppannārammaṇā paṭisandhi.
atk-abh02a:732_0: Aparassa pana pathavīkasiṇajjhānādivasena paṭiladdhamahaggatassa sugatiyaṃ ṭhitassa maraṇasamaye kāmāvacarakusalakamma-
atk-abh02a:732_2: gatinimittānaṃ aññataraṃ pathavīkasiṇādikaṃ vā nimittaṃ mahaggatacittaṃ vā manodvāre āpāthamāgacchati.
atk-abh02a:732_3: Cakkhusotānaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ kusaluppattihetubhūtaṃ paṇītamārammaṇaṃ āpāthamāgacchati.
atk-abh02a:732_4: Tassa yathākkamena uppannavoṭṭhabbanāvasāne maraṇassa āsannabhāvena mandībhūtavegattā pañca javanāni uppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:732_6: Tasmā javanānantaraṃyeva bhavaṅgavisayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaṃ cuticittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:732_7: Tassāvasāne kāmāvacaramahaggatasugatīnaṃ aññatarasugatipariyāpannaṃ yathūpaṭṭhitesu ārammaṇesu aññatarārammaṇaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:732_8: Ayaṃ navattabbārammaṇāya sugaticutiyā anantarā atītapaccuppannanavattabbānaṃ aññatarārammaṇā paṭisandhi.
atk-abh02a:733_1: Ayaṃ atītanavattabbārammaṇāya sugaticutiyā anantarā atītanavattabbapaccuppannārammaṇāya paṭisandhiyā pavattanākāro.
atk-abh02a:734_0: Duggatiyaṃ ṭhitassa pana pāpakammino vuttanayeneva taṃ kammaṃ kammanimittaṃ gatinimittaṃ vā manodvāre,
atk-abh02a:734_2: Athassa yathākkamena cuticittāvasāne duggatipariyāpannaṃ tesu ārammaṇesu aññatarārammaṇaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:734_3: Ayaṃ atītārammaṇāya duggaticutiyā anantarā atītapaccuppannārammaṇāya paṭisandhiyā pavattanākāroti.
atk-abh02a:734_4: Ettāvatā ekūnavīsatividhassāpi viññāṇassa paṭisandhivasena pavatti dīpitā hoti.
atk-abh02a:738_0: Idañhi ekūnavīsatividhampi vipākaviññāṇaṃ paṭisandhimhi pavattamānaṃ dvidhā kammena vattati.
atk-abh02a:738_1: Yathāsakañhi etassa janakaṃ kammaṃ nānākkhaṇikakammappaccayena ceva upanissayapaccayena ca paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:738_3: Evaṃ vattamānassa panassa missādīhi bhedehi duvidhādikopi bhedo veditabbo,
atk-abh02a:738_5: idañhi paṭisandhivasena ekadhā vattamānampi rūpena saha missāmissabhedato duvidhaṃ,
atk-abh02a:739_0: Missaṃ dvidhā bhāvabhedā, sabhāvaṃ tattha ca dvidhā;
atk-abh02a:740_0: Dve vā tayo vā dasakā, omato ādinā saha.
atk-abh02a:741_0: ‘Missaṃ dvidhā bhāvabhedā’ti yañhetamettha aññatra arūpabhavā rūpamissaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:741_1: taṃ rūpabhave itthindriyapurisindriyasaṅkhātena bhāvena vinā uppattito kāmabhave aññatra jātipaṇḍakapaṭisandhiyā
atk-abh02a:741_2: bhāvena saha uppattito sabhāvaṃ abhāvanti duvidhaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:742_0: ‘Sabhāvaṃ tattha ca dvidhā’ti tatthāpi ca yaṃ sabhāvaṃ taṃ itthipurisabhāvānaṃ aññatarena saha uppattito duvidhameva hoti.
atk-abh02a:743_1: omato ādinā sahā’ti yañhetamettha missaṃ amissanti dvaye ādibhūtaṃ rūpamissaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ,
atk-abh02a:743_2: tena saha vatthukāyadasakavasena dve vā vatthukāyabhāvadasakavasena tayo vā dasakā omato uppajjanti,
atk-abh02a:743_4: Taṃ panetaṃ evaṃ omakaparimāṇaṃ uppajjamānaṃ aṇḍajajalābujanāmikāsu dvīsu yonīsu jātiuṇṇāya ekena aṃsunā
atk-abh02a:744_0: Niraye bhummavajjesu, devesu ca na yoniyo;
atk-abh02a:746_0: Tattha devesu cāti casaddena yathā niraye ca bhummavajjesu ca devesu,
atk-abh02a:746_1: evaṃ nijjhāmataṇhikapetesu ca purimikā tisso yoniyo na santīti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:746_3: Sese pana tiracchānapettivisayamanussasaṅkhāte gatittaye pubbe vajjitabhummadevesu ca catasso yoniyo honti. Tattha –
atk-abh02a:747_0: Tiṃsa nava ceva rūpīsu, sattati ukkaṃsatova rūpāni;
atk-abh02a:749_0: Rūpībrahmesu tāva opapātikayonikesu cakkhusotavatthudasakānaṃ jīvitanavakassa cāti catunnaṃ kalāpānaṃ
atk-abh02a:749_1: vasena tiṃsa ca nava ca paṭisandhiviññāṇena saha rūpāni uppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:749_2: Rūpībrahme pana ṭhapetvā aññesu saṃsedajaopapātikesu ukkaṃsato cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyabhāvavatthudasakānaṃ vasena sattati.
atk-abh02a:749_4: Tattha vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā catasso cāpi dhātuyo cakkhupasādo jīvitindriyanti ayaṃ dasarūpaparimāṇo rūpapuñjo cakkhudasako nāma.
atk-abh02a:749_6: Avakaṃsato pana jaccandhabadhiraaghānakanapuṃsakassa jivhākāyavatthudasakānaṃ vasena tiṃsa rūpāni uppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:749_7: Ukkaṃsāvakaṃsānaṃ pana antare anurūpato vikappo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:753_2: tāsaṃ imehi khandhādīhi bhedābhedaviseso ñātabboti attho.
atk-abh02a:754_1: Kadāci catukkhandhāya āruppacutiyā anantarā catukkhandhāva ārammaṇatopi abhinnā paṭisandhi hoti,
atk-abh02a:754_4: Kadāci pana catukkhandhāya āruppacutiyā anantarā pañcakkhandhā kāmāvacarā paṭisandhi.
atk-abh02a:754_5: Kadāci pañcakkhandhāya kāmāvacaracutiyā rūpāvacaracutiyā vā anantarā catukkhandhā āruppapaṭisandhi.
atk-abh02a:754_14: avitakkaavicāracutiyā savitakkasavicārapaṭisandhīti tassa tassa viparītato ca yathāyogaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:756_0: Nāssa tato saṅkanti, na tato hetuṃ vinā hoti.
atk-abh02a:757_0: Iti hetaṃ laddhapaccayaṃ rūpārūpadhammamattaṃ uppajjamānaṃ bhavantaraṃ upetīti vuccati, na satto, na jīvo.
atk-abh02a:757_1: Tassa nāpi atītabhavato idha saṅkanti atthi,
atk-abh02a:757_2: nāpi tato hetuṃ vinā idha pātubhāvo.
atk-abh02a:758_0: Atītabhavasmiñhi sarasena upakkamena vā samāsannamaraṇassa asayhānaṃ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgasandhibandhanacchedakānaṃ
atk-abh02a:758_1: māraṇantikavedanāsattānaṃ sannipātaṃ asahantassa ātape pakkhittaharitatālapaṇṇamiva kamena upasussamāne
atk-abh02a:758_2: sarīre niruddhesu cakkhādīsu indriyesu hadayavatthumatte patiṭṭhitesu kāyindriyamanindriyajīvitindriyesu
atk-abh02a:758_3: taṅkhaṇāvasesaṃ hadayavatthusannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ garusamāsevitāsannapubbakatānaṃ aññataraṃ laddhāvasesapaccayasaṅkhārasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-abh02a:758_4: kammaṃ vā tadupaṭṭhāpitaṃ vā kammanimittagatinimittasaṅkhātaṃ visayamārabbha pavattati.
atk-abh02a:758_5: Tadevaṃ pavattamānaṃ taṇhāavijjānaṃ appahīnattā avijjāpaṭicchāditādīnave tasmiṃ visaye taṇhā nāmeti,
atk-abh02a:758_7: Taṃ santativasena taṇhāya nāmiyamānaṃ saṅkhārehi khippamānaṃ orimatīrarukkhavinibaddharajjumālambitvā mātikātikkamako viya purimañca nissayaṃ jahati,
atk-abh02a:758_8: aparañca kammasamuṭṭhāpitaṃ nissayaṃ assādayamānaṃ vā anassādayamānaṃ vā ārammaṇādīhiyeva paccayehi pavattati.
atk-abh02a:759_3: nāpi tato kammasaṅkhāranativisayādihetuṃ vinā pātubhūtanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:762_0: Ettha cetassa viññāṇassa purimabhavato idha anāgamane atītabhavapariyāpannahetūhi ca uppāde paṭighosapadīpamuddāpaṭibimbappakārā
atk-abh02a:762_2: Yathā hi paṭighosapadīpamuddacchāyā saddādihetukā aññatra agantvā honti,
atk-abh02a:762_4: Ettha ca ‘santānabandhato natthi ekatā nāpi nānatā’.
atk-abh02a:762_5: Yadi hi santānabandhe sati ekantamekatā bhaveyya,
atk-abh02a:762_12: Tasmā ettha na ekantamekatā vā nānatā vā upagantabbāti.
atk-abh02a:763_1: nanu evaṃ asaṅkantipātubhāve sati ye imasmiṃ manussattabhāve khandhā,
atk-abh02a:763_2: tesaṃ niruddhattā phalapaccayassa ca kammassa tattha agamanato aññassa aññato ca taṃ phalaṃ siyā?
atk-abh02a:763_3: Upabhuñjake ca asati kassa taṃ phalaṃ siyā?
atk-abh02a:764_0: Santāne yaṃ phalaṃ etaṃ, nāññassa na ca aññato;
atk-abh02a:766_0: Ekasantānasmiñhi phalamuppajjamānaṃ tattha ekantaṃ ekattanānattānaṃ paṭisiddhattā aññassāti vā aññatoti vā na hoti.
atk-abh02a:766_1: Etassa ca panatthassa bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro sādhako.
atk-abh02a:766_2: Ambabījādīnañhi abhisaṅkhāresu katesu tassa bījassa santāne laddhapaccayo kālantare phalaviseso uppajjamāno
atk-abh02a:766_4: na ca tāni bījāni te abhisaṅkhārā vā phalaṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-abh02a:766_6: Vijjāsipposadhādīhi cāpi bālasarīre upayuttehi kālantare vuḍḍhasarīrādīsu phaladehi ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:767_0: Yampi vuttaṃ ‘upabhuñjake ca asati kassa taṃ phalaṃ siyā’ti? Tattha –
atk-abh02a:770_0: Yathā hi rukkhasaṅkhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekadesabhūtassa rukkhaphalassa uppattiyā eva rukkho phalatīti vā phalitoti vā vuccati,
atk-abh02a:770_1: tathā devamanussasaṅkhātānaṃ khandhānaṃ ekadesabhūtassa upabhogasaṅkhātassa sukhadukkhaphalassa uppādeneva
atk-abh02a:770_2: devo vā manusso vā upabhuñjatīti vā sukhitoti vā dukkhitoti vā vuccati.
atk-abh02a:770_3: Tasmā na ettha aññena upabhuñjakena nāma koci attho atthīti.
atk-abh02a:771_1: ‘evaṃ santepi ete saṅkhārā vijjamānā vā phalassa paccayā siyuṃ,
atk-abh02a:771_3: Yadi ca vijjamānā pavattikkhaṇeyeva nesaṃ vipākena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:771_5: pavattito pubbe ca pacchā ca niccaṃ phalāvahā siyu’nti.
atk-abh02a:772_0: Katattā paccayā ete, na ca niccaṃ phalāvahā;
atk-abh02a:774_0: Katattā eva hi saṅkhārā attano phalassa paccayā honti,
atk-abh02a:774_2: Yathāha “kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”tiādi.
atk-abh02a:774_3: Yathārahassa attano phalassa ca paccayā hutvā na puna phalāvahā honti vipakkavipākattā.
atk-abh02a:774_4: Etassa catthassa vibhāvane idaṃ pāṭibhogādikaṃ nidassanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:775_0: Yathā hi loke yo kassaci atthassa niyyātanatthaṃ pāṭibhogo hoti,
atk-abh02a:775_3: Tassa taṃ kiriyākaraṇamattameva tadatthaniyyātanādimhi paccayo hoti,
atk-abh02a:775_4: na kiriyāya vijjamānatā vā avijjamānatā vā.
atk-abh02a:775_5: Na ca tadatthaniyyātanādito parampi dhārakova hoti. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:775_7: Evaṃ katattāva saṅkhārāpi attano phalassa paccayā honti,
atk-abh02a:775_8: na ca yathārahaṃ phaladānato parampi phalāvahā hontīti.
atk-abh02a:775_9: Ettāvatā missāmissavasena dvidhāpi pavattamānassa paṭisandhiviññāṇassa saṅkhārapaccayā pavatti dīpitā hoti.
atk-abh02a:779_5: Etesu bhavādīsu paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca ete yesaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ paccayā yathā ca paccayā honti tathā vijānitabbāti attho.
atk-abh02a:780_1: puññābhisaṅkhāre tāva kāmāvacaraaṭṭhacetanābhedo puññābhisaṅkhāro avisesena kāmabhave sugatiyaṃ navannaṃ
atk-abh02a:780_2: vipākaviññāṇānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena ceva upanissayapaccayena cāti dvidhā paccayo.
atk-abh02a:780_3: Rūpāvacarapañcakusalacetanābhedo puññābhisaṅkhāro rūpabhave paṭisandhiyaṃ eva pañcannaṃ.
atk-abh02a:780_7: Sveva rūpabhave pañcannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte,
atk-abh02a:780_9: Kāmabhave pana duggatiyaṃ aṭṭhannampi parittavipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte,
atk-abh02a:781_0: Tattha niraye mahāmoggallānattherassa narakacārikādīsu iṭṭhārammaṇasamāyoge so paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:781_1: Tiracchānesu pana nāgasupaṇṇapetamahiddhikesu ca iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ labbhatiyeva.
atk-abh02a:781_2: Sveva kāmabhave sugatiyaṃ soḷasannampi kusalavipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte ca paṭisandhiyañca.
atk-abh02a:781_3: Avisesena puññābhisaṅkhāro rūpabhave dasannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte ca paṭisandhiyañca.
atk-abh02a:782_0: Dvādasākusalacetanābhedo apuññābhisaṅkhāro kāmabhave duggatiyaṃ ekassa viññāṇassa tatheva paccayo paṭisandhiyaṃ,
atk-abh02a:782_5: Kāmabhave pana sugatiyaṃ tesaṃyeva sattannaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte,
atk-abh02a:782_7: rūpabhave catunnaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte,
atk-abh02a:782_10: Brahmaloke pana aniṭṭhā rūpādayo nāma natthi,
atk-abh02a:783_0: Āneñjābhisaṅkhāro arūpabhave catunnaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte ca paṭisandhiyañca.
atk-abh02a:784_0: Kāmāvacarakusalākusalato pana sabbasaṅgāhikanayena vīsaticetanābhedopi kāyasaṅkhāro kāmabhave dasannaṃ
atk-abh02a:784_1: vipākaviññāṇānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena ceva upanissayapaccayena cāti dvidhā paccayo.
atk-abh02a:784_3: rūpabhave navannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte,
atk-abh02a:784_5: Sveva kāmabhave tevīsatiyā vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte ca paṭisandhiyañca.
atk-abh02a:785_0: Aṭṭhavīsatiekūnatiṃsacetanābhedopi pana cittasaṅkhāro tīsu bhavesu ekūnavīsatiyā vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo paṭisandhiyaṃ,
atk-abh02a:785_2: Sveva dvīsu bhavesu heṭṭhāvuttānaṃ terasannañca navannañcāti dvāvīsatiyā vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte,
atk-abh02a:785_4: Tīsu pana bhavesu dvattiṃsāyapi vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo pavatte ceva paṭisandhiyañca.
atk-abh02a:785_5: Evaṃ tāva bhavesu paṭisandhipavattīnaṃ vasena te saṅkhārā yesaṃ paccayā,
atk-abh02a:785_6: yathā ca paccayā honti tathā vijānitabbā.
atk-abh02a:786_1: imesu hi saṅkhāresu yasmā puññābhisaṅkhāro tāva dvīsu bhavesu paṭisandhiṃ datvā sabbaṃ attano vipākaṃ janeti,
atk-abh02a:786_6: Asaññasattāvāse panesa rūpamattamevābhisaṅkharotīti catūsuyeva sattāvāsesu ca paṭisandhiṃ datvā sabbaṃ attano vipākaṃ janeti.
atk-abh02a:786_11: catūsu sattāvāsesu ca ekavīsatiyā vipākaviññāṇānaṃ vuttanayeneva paccayo hoti yathāsambhavaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca.
atk-abh02a:787_4: tādiseyeva ca ekasmiṃ sattāvāse paṭisandhivasena vipaccati,
atk-abh02a:787_5: tasmā esa ekasmiṃ bhave catūsu yonīsu,
atk-abh02a:787_8: ekamhi ca sattāvāse sattannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānaṃ vuttanayeneva paccayo hoti paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca.
atk-abh02a:788_4: ākāsānañcāyatanādīsu ca catūsu sattāvāsesu paṭisandhivasena vipaccati,
atk-abh02a:788_9: catunnaṃ viññāṇānaṃ vuttanayeneva paccayo hoti paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca.
atk-abh02a:789_4: dvīsu ca sattāvāsesu paṭisandhiṃ datvā sabbaṃ attano vipākaṃ janeti,
atk-abh02a:789_9: dvīsu ca sattāvāsesu tevīsatiyā vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca.
atk-abh02a:790_0: Cittasaṅkhāro pana yasmā ekaṃ sattāvāsaṃ ṭhapetvā na katthaci na vipaccati,
atk-abh02a:790_5: aṭṭhasu sattāvāsesu yathāyogaṃ dvattiṃsāya vipākaviññāṇānaṃ tatheva paccayo paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca.
atk-abh02a:790_6: Aviññāṇake pana sattāvāse saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ natthi.
atk-abh02a:791_0: Apica puññābhisaṅkhāro asaññasattesu kaṭattārūpānaṃ nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena paccayoti. Evaṃ –
atk-abh02a:799_1: Cattāro ca mahābhūtā catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya rūpa”nti evaṃ tāva suttante ca idha rūpapadassa abhedato ekasadisā desanā katā;
atk-abh02a:800_1: Vedanā saññā cetanā phasso manasikāro”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:800_3: Tattha hi yampi cakkhuviññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:800_4: uppannañca cittassa ṭhiti arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyūti evaṃ aññadhammasannissayena aggahetabbato pākaṭaṃ,
atk-abh02a:800_5: taṃ dassento cetanāphassamanasikāravasena saṅkhārakkhandhaṃ tidhā bhinditvā dvīhi khandhehi saddhiṃ desesi.
atk-abh02a:800_6: Idha pana tattha vuttañca avuttañca sabbaṃ nāmaṃ saṅgaṇhanto “tayo khandhā –
atk-abh02a:801_0: Kiṃ pana ime tayo khandhāva nāmaṃ,
atk-abh02a:801_3: Tasmiṃ pana viññāṇe gayhamāne nāmaviññāṇassa ca paccayaviññāṇassa cāti dvinnaṃ viññāṇānaṃ sahabhāvo āpajjati.
atk-abh02a:801_4: Tasmā viññāṇaṃ paccayaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā paccayanibbattaṃ nāmaṃ dassetuṃ tayova khandhā vuttāti.
atk-abh02a:802_0: ‘Sabbabhavādīsu pavattito’ti ettha pana nāmaṃ ekaṃ sattāvāsaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbabhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisesasattāvāsesu pavattati.
atk-abh02a:802_6: Evaṃ pavattamāne cetasmiṃ nāmarūpe yasmā abhāvakagabbhaseyyakānaṃ aṇḍajānañca paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthukāyavasena
atk-abh02a:802_7: rūpato dve santatisīsāni tayo ca arūpino khandhā pātubhavanti,
atk-abh02a:802_8: tasmā tesaṃ vitthārena rūparūpato vīsati dhammā tayo ca arūpino khandhāti ete tevīsati dhammā viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:802_9: Aggahitaggahaṇena pana ekasantatisīsato nava rūpadhamme apanetvā cuddasa,
atk-abh02a:802_11: Tesampi agahitaggahaṇena santatisīsadvayato aṭṭhārasa rūpadhamme apanetvā pannarasa.
atk-abh02a:803_0: Yasmā ca opapātikasattesu brahmakāyikādīnaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe cakkhusotavatthudasakānaṃ jīvitindriyanavakassa
atk-abh02a:803_1: ca vasena rūparūpato cattāri santatisīsāni tayo ca arūpino khandhā pātubhavanti,
atk-abh02a:803_2: tasmā tesaṃ vitthārena rūparūpato ekūnacattālīsa dhammā tayo ca arūpino khandhāti ete dvācattālīsa dhammā viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:803_3: Agahitaggahaṇena pana santatisīsattayato sattavīsati dhamme apanetvā pannarasa.
atk-abh02a:804_0: Kāmabhave pana yasmā sesaopapātikānaṃ vā saṃsedajānaṃ vā sabhāvakaparipuṇṇāyatanānaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe
atk-abh02a:804_1: rūparūpato satta santatisīsāni tayo ca arūpino khandhā pātubhavanti,
atk-abh02a:804_2: tasmā tesaṃ vitthārena rūparūpato sattati dhammā tayo ca arūpino khandhāti ete tesattati dhammā viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:804_3: Aggahitaggahaṇena pana santatisīsachakkato catupaññāsa dhamme apanetvā ekūnavīsati.
atk-abh02a:804_5: Avakaṃsena pana taṃtaṃrūpasantatisīsavikalānaṃ tassa tassa vasena hāpetvā hāpetvā saṅkhepato ca vitthārato
atk-abh02a:805_0: Pavatte pana sabbattha rūpappavattidese paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe paṭisandhicittena saha pavattaututo utusamuṭṭhānaṃ suddhaṭṭhakaṃ pātubhavati.
atk-abh02a:805_2: Tañhi yathā papāte patitapuriso parassa paccayo hotuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh02a:805_3: evaṃ vatthudubbalatāya dubbalattā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh02a:805_4: Paṭisandhicittato pana uddhaṃ paṭhamabhavaṅgato pabhuti cittasamuṭṭhānakaṃ suddhaṭṭhakaṃ.
atk-abh02a:805_5: Saddapātubhāvakāle paṭisandhikkhaṇato uddhaṃ pavattaututo ceva cittato ca saddanavakaṃ.
atk-abh02a:807_0: Tena so tattha yāpeti, mātukucchigato naro”ti. ;
atk-abh02a:808_1: opapātikānaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ attano mukhagataṃ kheḷaṃ ajjhoharaṇakāle āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ suddhaṭṭhakanti
atk-abh02a:808_2: idaṃ āhārasamuṭṭhānassa suddhaṭṭhakassa utucittasamuṭṭhānānañca ukkaṃsato dvinnaṃ navakānaṃ vasena chabbīsatividhaṃ,
atk-abh02a:808_3: pubbe ekekacittakkhaṇe tikkhattuṃ uppajjamānaṃ vuttaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ sattatividhanti channavutividhaṃ
atk-abh02a:808_4: rūpaṃ tayo ca arūpino khandhāti samāsato navanavuti dhammā.
atk-abh02a:808_6: tasmā duvidhampi taṃ apanetvā ime sattanavuti dhammā yathāsambhavaṃ sabbasattānaṃ viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:808_7: Tesañhi suttānampi pamattānampi carantānampi khādantānampi pivantānampi divā ca rattiñca ete viññāṇapaccayā pavattanti.
atk-abh02a:809_0: Yaṃ panetamettha kammajarūpaṃ taṃ bhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ patiṭṭhahantampi
atk-abh02a:809_3: Atha kho vātabbhāhatāpi catuddisavavatthāpitā naḷakalāpiyo viya,
atk-abh02a:809_4: ūmivegabbhāhatāpi mahāsamudde katthaci laddhapatiṭṭhā bhinnavāhanikā viya ca aññamaññūpatthaddhānevetāni
atk-abh02a:809_5: apatamānāni saṇṭhahitvā ekampi vassaṃ dvepi vassāni…pe…
atk-abh02a:809_6: vassasatampi yāva tesaṃ sattānaṃ āyukkhayo vā puññakkhayo vā tāva pavattantīti.
atk-abh02a:810_0: ‘Saṅgahā’ti ettha ca yaṃ āruppe pavattipaṭisandhīsu pañcavokārabhave ca pavattiyā viññāṇapaccayā nāmameva,
atk-abh02a:810_1: yañca asaññīsu sabbattha pañcavokārabhave ca pavattiyā viññāṇapaccayā rūpameva,
atk-abh02a:810_3: taṃ sabbaṃ nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpañca nāmarūpanti evaṃ ekadesasarūpekasesanayena saṅgahetvā viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:810_4: Asaññīsu viññāṇābhāvā ayuttanti ce nāyuttaṃ. Idañhi –
atk-abh02a:811_0: Nāmarūpassa yaṃ hetu, viññāṇaṃ taṃ dvidhā mataṃ;
atk-abh02a:813_0: Yañhi nāmarūpassa hetu viññāṇaṃ taṃ vipākāvipākabhedato dvidhā mataṃ.
atk-abh02a:813_1: Idañca asaññasattesu kammasamuṭṭhānattā pañcavokārabhave pavattaabhisaṅkhāraviññāṇapaccayā rūpaṃ,
atk-abh02a:813_2: tathā pañcavokāre pavattiyaṃ kusalādicittakkhaṇe kammasamuṭṭhānanti yuttameva idaṃ.
atk-abh02a:818_0: Tadaññaṃ pana viññāṇaṃ, tassa tassa yathārahaṃ.
atk-abh02a:819_0: Yañhetaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ pavattiyaṃ vā vipākasaṅkhātaṃ nāmaṃ,
atk-abh02a:819_1: tassa rūpamissassa vā rūpaamissassa vā paṭisandhikaṃ vā aññaṃ vā vipākaviññāṇaṃ sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttavipākaāhāraindriyaatthiavigatapaccayehi
atk-abh02a:819_4: Ṭhapetvā pana vatthurūpaṃ sesarūpassa imesu navasu aññamaññapaccayaṃ apanetvā sesehi aṭṭhahi paccayehi paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:819_5: Abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ pana asaññasattarūpassa vā pañcavokāre vā kammajassa suttantikapariyāyena upanissayavasena ekadhāva paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:819_6: Avasesaṃ paṭhamabhavaṅgato pabhuti sabbampi viññāṇaṃ tassa tassa nāmarūpassa yathārahaṃ paccayo hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:819_7: Vitthārato pana tassa paccayanaye dassiyamāne sabbāpi paṭṭhānakathā vitthāretabbā hotīti na taṃ ārabhāma.
atk-abh02a:820_3: Sutte hi “cittānuparivattino dhammā”tiādinā nayena bahudhā vedanādīnaṃ viññāṇapaccayatā siddhā.
atk-abh02a:821_0: Cittajena hi rūpena, idha diṭṭhena sijjhati;
atk-abh02a:823_0: Citte hi pasanne appasanne vā tadanurūpāni rūpāni uppajjamānāni diṭṭhāni.
atk-abh02a:823_1: Diṭṭhena ca adiṭṭhassa anumānaṃ hotīti iminā idha diṭṭhena cittajarūpena adiṭṭhassāpi paṭisandhirūpassa viññāṇaṃ paccayo hotīti jānitabbametaṃ.
atk-abh02a:823_2: Kammasamuṭṭhānassāpi hi tassa cittasamuṭṭhānasseva viññāṇapaccayatā paṭṭhāne āgatāti.
atk-abh02a:824_0: Ettha ca “viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti bhāsamānena bhagavatā yasmā upaparikkhamānānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ paramatthato nāmarūpamattameva pavattamānaṃ dissati, na satto, na poso;
atk-abh02a:824_1: tasmā appaṭivattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṃ anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ hotīti.
atk-abh02a:830_2: rūpaṃ pana sakasantatipariyāpannaṃ niyamato cattāri bhūtāni cha vatthūni jīvitindriyanti evaṃ bhūtavatthādikaṃ matanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:830_3: Taṃ pana “nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpañca nāmarūpa”nti evaṃ katekasesaṃ “chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatana”nti
atk-abh02a:830_4: evaṃ katekasesasseva saḷāyatanassa paccayoti veditabbaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:830_9: Idha saṅgahitameva hi tattha vibhattanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:831_3: Tassa tassa hi nāmassa rūpassa ca bhāve taṃ taṃ āyatanaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:831_5: Sā panassa tabbhāvabhāvībhāvatā paccayanayasmiññeva āvibhavissati. Tasmā –
atk-abh02a:832_0: Paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte vā, hoti yaṃ yassa paccayo;
atk-abh02a:833_0: Yathā ca paccayo hoti, tathā neyyaṃ vibhāvinā.
atk-abh02a:836_0: Paccayo sattadhā chaṭṭhā, hoti taṃ avakaṃsato.
atk-abh02a:837_1: ‘Paṭisandhiyaṃ’ tāva avakaṃsato sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttavipākaatthiavigatapaccayehi sattadhā nāmaṃ chaṭṭhāyatanassa paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:837_3: kiñci āhārapaccayenāti evaṃ aññathāpi paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:838_1: Itaraṃ pana avakaṃsato vuttappakāresu paccayesu vipākapaccayavajjehi chahi paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:838_3: kiñci āhārapaccayenāti evaṃ aññathāpi paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:841_0: Āruppato hi aññasmimpi pañcavokārabhave taṃ vipākanāmaṃ hadayavatthuno sahāyaṃ hutvā chaṭṭhassa manāyatanassa
atk-abh02a:841_1: yathā āruppe vuttaṃ tatheva avakaṃsato sattadhā paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:841_2: Itaresaṃ panetaṃ pañcannaṃ cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ catumahābhūtasahāyaṃ hutvā sahajāta nissayavipākavippayuttaatthiavigatavasena chahākārehi paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:841_4: kiñci āhārapaccayenāti evaṃ aññathāpi paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:842_0: Pavattepi tathā hoti, pākaṃ pākassa paccayo;
atk-abh02a:844_1: tatheva vipākanāmaṃ vipākassa chaṭṭhāyatanassa avakaṃsato sattadhā paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:844_2: Avipākaṃ pana avipākassa chaṭṭhassa avakaṃsatova tato vipākapaccayaṃ apanetvā chadhāva paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:847_0: Tattheva hi pavatte sesānaṃ cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ cakkhuppasādādivatthukampi itarampi vipākanāmaṃ
atk-abh02a:847_4: Tasmā kusalādibhedampi tesaṃ catudhā paccayo hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:847_5: Evaṃ tāva nāmameva paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte vā yassa yassa āyatanassa paccayo hoti,
atk-abh02a:850_0: Rūpato sandhiyaṃ vatthu, chadhā chaṭṭhassa paccayo;
atk-abh02a:852_0: Rūpato hi paṭisandhiyaṃ vatthurūpaṃ chaṭṭhassa manāyatanassa sahajātaaññamaññanissayavippayuttaatthiavigatapaccayehi chadhā paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:852_1: Cattāri pana bhūtāni avisesato paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca yaṃ yaṃ āyatanaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:852_2: tassa tassa vasena pañcannampi cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ sahajātanissayaatthiavigatapaccayehi catudhā paccayā honti.
atk-abh02a:854_0: Tāneva chadhā chaṭṭhassa, vatthu tasseva pañcadhā.
atk-abh02a:855_0: Etesaṃ pana cakkhādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca atthiavigataindriyavasena rūpajīvitaṃ tidhā paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:856_0: ‘Āhāro cā’ti āhāro ca atthiavigataāhāravasena tidhā paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:856_1: So ca kho ye sattā āhārūpajīvino,
atk-abh02a:856_4: Tāni pana pañca cakkhāyatanādīni chaṭṭhassa cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇasaṅkhātassa manāyatanassa
atk-abh02a:856_7: Ṭhapetvā pana pañca viññāṇāni tasseva avasesamanāyatanassa vatthurūpaṃ nissayapurejātavippayuttaatthiavigatavasena pañcadhā paccayo hoti pavatte,
atk-abh02a:856_9: Evaṃ rūpameva paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte vā yassa yassa āyatanassa paccayo hoti yathā ca hoti tathā veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:857_0: Nāmarūpaṃ panubhayaṃ, hoti yaṃ yassa paccayo;
atk-abh02a:858_0: Yathā ca tampi sabbattha, viññātabbaṃ vibhāvinā.
atk-abh02a:859_1: paṭisandhiyaṃ tāva pañcavokārabhave khandhattayavatthurūpasaṅkhātaṃ nāmarūpaṃ chaṭṭhāyatanassa sahajātaaññamaññanissayavipākasampayuttavippayuttaatthiavigatapaccayādīhi
atk-abh02a:859_3: Vuttanayānusārena pana sakkā sabbaṃ yojetunti na ettha vitthāro dassitoti.
atk-abh02a:865_0: ‘Saṅkhepato’ hi pāḷiyaṃ cakkhusamphassoti ādayo chaḷeva phassā āgatā.
atk-abh02a:865_1: Vitthārena pana cakkhusamphassādayo pañca kusalavipākā pañca akusalavipākāti dasa,
atk-abh02a:865_2: sesā bāvīsati lokiyavipākaviññāṇasampayuttā ca bāvīsatīti evaṃ sabbepi saṅkhārapaccayā vuttaviññāṇamiva bāttiṃsa honti.
atk-abh02a:865_3: Yaṃ panetassa bāttiṃsavidhassāpi phassassa paccayo saḷāyatanaṃ. Tattha –
atk-abh02a:868_0: Tattha ye tāva “upādinnakapavattikathā aya”nti ekasantatipariyāpannameva paccayaṃ paccayuppannañca dīpenti,
atk-abh02a:868_1: te chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phassoti pāḷianusārato āruppe chaṭṭhāyatanañca aññattha sabbasaṅgahato saḷāyatanañca
atk-abh02a:868_2: phassassa paccayoti ekadesasarūpekasesaṃ katvā chaṭṭhena saha ajjhattaṃ cakkhādiṃ saḷāyatananti icchanti.
atk-abh02a:868_3: Tañhi chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatanantveva saṅghaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh02a:868_6: te yaṃ yaṃ āyatanaṃ phassassa paccayo hoti taṃ sabbaṃ dīpentā bāhirampi pariggahetvā tadeva chaṭṭhena
atk-abh02a:868_7: saha ajjhattaṃ bāhirehipi rūpāyatanādīhi saddhiṃ saḷāyatananti icchanti.
atk-abh02a:868_8: Tampi hi chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatananti etesaṃ ekasese kate saḷāyatanantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh02a:869_7: Sabbehi eko ekamhā vā sabbe na sambhonti,
atk-abh02a:869_9: yathā cakkhusamphasso cakkhāyatanā rūpāyatanā cakkhuviññāṇasaṅkhātā manāyatanā avasesā sampayuttadhammāyatanā
atk-abh02a:872_0: ‘Ekavacananiddesenā’ti saḷāyatanapaccayā phassoti iminā hi ekavacananiddesena anekehi āyatanehi eko phasso hotīti tādinā dīpitoti attho.
atk-abh02a:873_0: Chadhā pañca tato ekaṃ, navadhā bāhirāni cha;
atk-abh02a:875_1: cakkhāyatanādīni tāva pañca cakkhusamphassādibhedato pañcavidhassa phassassa nissayapurejātaindriyavippayuttaatthiavigatavasena chadhā paccayā honti.
atk-abh02a:875_2: Tato paraṃ ekaṃ vipākamanāyatanaṃ anekabhedassa vipākamanosamphassassa sahajātaaññamaññanissayavipākaāhāraindriyasampayuttaatthiavigatavasena
atk-abh02a:875_4: Bāhiresu pana rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhusamphassassa ārammaṇapurejātaatthiavigatavasena catudhā paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:875_6: Manosamphassassa pana tāni dhammāyatanañca tathā ca ārammaṇapaccayamatteneva cāti evaṃ bāhirāni cha yathāsambhavametassa paccayatte vibhāvayeti.
atk-abh02a:881_0: Cakkhusamphassajāvedanātiādinā hi nayena pāḷiyaṃ imā cakkhusamphassajādikā dvārato chaḷeva vedanā vuttā.
atk-abh02a:881_1: Tā pana pabhedena ekūnanavutiyā cittehi sampayuttattā ekūnanavutīti matā.
atk-abh02a:885_0: Sesānaṃ ekadhā phasso, manodvārepi so tathā.
atk-abh02a:886_0: Tattha hi pañcadvāre cakkhupasādādivatthukānaṃ pañcannaṃ vedanānaṃ cakkhusamphassādiko phasso sahajātaaññamaññanissayavipākaāhārasampayuttaatthiavigatavasena
atk-abh02a:886_2: Sesānaṃ pana ekekasmiṃ dvāre sampaṭicchanasantīraṇatadārammaṇavasena pavattānaṃ kāmāvacaravipākavedanānaṃ
atk-abh02a:886_3: cakkhusamphassādiko phasso upanissayavasena ekadhāva paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:887_0: ‘Manodvārepi so tathā’ti manodvārepi hi tadārammaṇavasena pavattānaṃ kāmāvacaravipākavedanānaṃ so sahajātamanosamphassasaṅkhāto
atk-abh02a:887_3: Yā panetā manodvāre tadārammaṇavasena pavattā kāmāvacaravedanā,
atk-abh02a:887_4: tāsaṃ manodvāre āvajjanasampayutto manosamphasso upanissayavasena ekadhā paccayo hotīti.
atk-abh02a:893_0: Imasmiñhi vedanāpaccayā taṇhāniddese ‘seṭṭhiputto brāhmaṇaputto’ti pitito nāmavasena putto viya imā rūpataṇhā…pe…
atk-abh02a:893_1: dhammataṇhāti ārammaṇato nāmavasena cha taṇhā dīpitā pakāsitā kathitāti attho.
atk-abh02a:893_2: Tattha rūpe taṇhā rūpataṇhāti iminā nayena padattho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:894_0: Tāsu ca pana taṇhāsu ekekā taṇhā pavattiākārato kāmataṇhā,
atk-abh02a:894_3: Rūpataṇhā eva hi yadā cakkhussa āpāthagataṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ kāmassādavasena assādayamānā pavattati,
atk-abh02a:894_5: Yadā tadevārammaṇaṃ dhuvaṃ sassatanti pavattāya sassatadiṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ pavattati,
atk-abh02a:894_8: Yadā pana tadevārammaṇaṃ “ucchijjati vinassatī”ti pavattāya ucchedadiṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ pavattati,
atk-abh02a:894_11: Eseva nayo saddataṇhādīsupīti etā aṭṭhārasa taṇhā honti.
atk-abh02a:895_6: kāmataṇhādivasena vā tissova taṇhā hontīti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:895_7: Yasmā panime sattā puttaṃ assādetvā putte mamattena dhātiyā viya rūpādiārammaṇavasena uppajjamānaṃ vedanaṃ
atk-abh02a:895_10: tasmā sabbāpesā vedanāpaccayā taṇhā hotīti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:897_0: Ekāva ekadhā cesā, tasmā taṇhāya paccayo.
atk-abh02a:899_0: Dukkhī sukhaṃ patthayati, sukhī bhiyyopi icchati;
atk-abh02a:901_0: Taṇhāya paccayā tasmā, honti tissopi vedanā;
atk-abh02a:903_0: Vedanā paccayā cāpi, yasmā nānusayaṃ vinā;
atk-abh02a:904_0: Hoti tasmā na sā hoti, brāhmaṇassa vusīmatoti.
atk-abh02a:910_8: Tathā diṭṭhi ca sā upādānañcāti diṭṭhupādānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:910_10: Sassato attā ca loko cātiādīsu hi purimadiṭṭhiṃ uttaradiṭṭhi upādiyati.
atk-abh02a:910_13: Gosīlagovatādīni hi evaṃ suddhīti abhinivesato sayameva upādānānīti.
atk-abh02a:910_18: Attavādamattameva vā attāti upādiyanti etenāti attavādupādānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:911_1: Yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmataṇhā kāmasneho kāmapariḷāho kāmamucchā kāmajjhosānaṃ –
atk-abh02a:911_2: idaṃ vuccati kāmupādāna”nti āgatattā saṅkhepato taṇhādaḷhattaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:911_3: Taṇhādaḷhattaṃ nāma purimataṇhāupanissayapaccayena daḷhasambhūtā uttarataṇhā eva.
atk-abh02a:912_0: Vitthārato pana pubbe rūpādīsu vuttāya aṭṭhasatappabhedāyapi taṇhāya daḷhabhāvo kāmupādānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:912_7: idaṃ vuccati diṭṭhupādāna”nti sīlavatehi suddhiparāmasanaṃ pana sīlabbatupādānaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-abh02a:913_4: Tattha anamatagge saṃsāre imassa paṭhamaṃ uppattīti abhāvato kilesānaṃ nippariyāyena uppattikkamo na vuccati.
atk-abh02a:913_5: Pariyāyena pana yebhuyyena ekasmiṃ bhave attaggāhapubbaṅgamo sassatucchedābhiniveso.
atk-abh02a:913_6: Tato “sassato ayaṃ attā”ti gaṇhato attavisuddhatthaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ,
atk-abh02a:913_7: ucchijjatīti gaṇhato paralokanirapekkhassa kāmupādānanti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ attavādupādānaṃ,
atk-abh02a:913_8: tato diṭṭhisīlabbatakāmupādānānīti ayametesaṃ ekasmiṃ bhave uppattikkamo.
atk-abh02a:915_0: Mahāvisayattā pana pākaṭattā ca etesu kāmupādānaṃ paṭhamaṃ desitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:915_3: Yebhuyyena ca ālayarāmatāya pajāya pākaṭaṃ kāmupādānaṃ,
atk-abh02a:915_8: Tasmiṃ dvaye gokiriyaṃ vā kukkurakiriyaṃ vā disvāpi veditabbato oḷārikanti sīlabbatupādānaṃ paṭhamaṃ desitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:916_0: Taṇhā ca purimassettha, ekadhā hoti paccayo;
atk-abh02a:917_0: Sattadhā aṭṭhadhā vāpi, hoti sesattayassa sā.
atk-abh02a:918_0: Ettha ca evaṃ desite upādānacatukke purimassa kāmupādānassa kāmataṇhā upanissayavasena ekadhāva paccayo hoti taṇhābhinanditesu visayesu uppattito.
atk-abh02a:918_1: Sesattayassa pana sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatahetuvasena sattadhā vā upanissayena saha aṭṭhadhā vāpi paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:918_2: Yadā ca sā upanissayavasena paccayo hoti tadā asahajātāva hotīti.
atk-abh02a:923_0: Yaṃ yassa paccayo ceva, viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a:924_8: Kammaṃ pana yathā sukhakāraṇattā “sukho buddhānamuppādo”ti vutto,
atk-abh02a:924_10: Tattha katamo kammabhavoti tesu dvīsu bhavesu yo kammabhavoti vutto,
atk-abh02a:925_3: saññā vā ettha bhave atthīti saññābhavo.
atk-abh02a:925_5: Oḷārikasaññāya abhāvā sukhumāya ca bhāvā neva saññā nāsaññā asmiṃ bhaveti nevasaññānāsaññābhavo.
atk-abh02a:925_7: Eko vā vokāro assa bhavassāti ekavokārabhavo.
atk-abh02a:925_9: Ayaṃ vuccati upapattibhavoti esa navavidhopi upapattibhavo nāma vuccatīti.
atk-abh02a:926_0: ‘Dhammato’ pana ettha hi puññābhisaṅkhāro dhammato terasa cetanā,
atk-abh02a:926_3: “Sabbampi bhavagāmikamma”nti etena sabbepete dhammā cetanā sampayuttā vā kammasaṅkhātā ācayagāmino dhammā saṅgahitā.
atk-abh02a:926_10: Ekavokārabhavādayo ekacatupañcakkhandhā upādinnakkhandhehīti evamettha ‘dhammato’pi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a:927_0: ‘Sātthato’ti yathā ca bhavaniddese tatheva kāmañca saṅkhāraniddesepi puññābhisaṅkhārādayova vuttā,
atk-abh02a:927_1: evaṃ santepi purimā atītakammavasena idha paṭisandhiyā paccayattā vuttā.
atk-abh02a:927_2: Ime paccuppannakammavasena āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayattāti punavacanaṃ sātthakameva.
atk-abh02a:927_4: Kusalacetanā kāmāvacarā”ti evamādinā nayena cetanāva saṅkhārāti vuttā.
atk-abh02a:927_6: Pubbe ca viññāṇapaccayameva kammaṃ saṅkhārāti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:927_10: “Upādānapaccayā bhavo”ti idha pana upapattibhavassāpi saṅgahitattā kusalākusalābyākatā dhammā vuttā.
atk-abh02a:928_0: ‘Bhedasaṅgahā’ti upādānapaccayā bhavassa bhedato ceva saṅgahato ca.
atk-abh02a:928_11: Yathā ca kāmupādānapaccayā saddhiṃ antogadhehi cha bhavā tathā sesupādānapaccayāpīti evaṃ upādānapaccayā bhedato saddhiṃ antogadhehi catuvīsati bhavā.
atk-abh02a:929_0: Saṅgahato pana kammabhavaṃ upapattibhavañca ekato katvā kāmupādānapaccayā saddhiṃ antogadhehi eko kāmabhavo,
atk-abh02a:929_2: Tathā sesupādānapaccayāpīti evaṃ upādānapaccayā saṅgahato saddhiṃ antogadhehi dvādasa bhavā.
atk-abh02a:929_3: Apica avisesena upādānapaccayā kāmabhavūpagaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavo.
atk-abh02a:929_6: Evaṃ upādānapaccayā saddhiṃ antogadhehi dve kāmabhavā,
atk-abh02a:929_8: dve arūpabhavāti aparenapi pariyāyena saṅgahato cha bhavā.
atk-abh02a:929_9: Kammabhavaupapattibhavabhedaṃ vā anupagamma saddhiṃ antogadhehi kāmabhavādivasena tayo bhavā honti.
atk-abh02a:929_10: Kāmabhavādibhedañcāpi anupagamma kammabhavaupapattibhavavasena dve bhavā honti.
atk-abh02a:929_11: Kammupapattibhedañca anupagamma upādānapaccayā bhavoti bhavavasena eko bhavo hotīti.
atk-abh02a:929_12: Evamettha upādānapaccayassa bhavassa bhedasaṅgahāpi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a:930_0: ‘Yaṃ yassa paccayo cevā’ti yañcettha upādānaṃ yassa paccayo hoti,
atk-abh02a:930_3: Yaṃ kiñci yassa kassaci paccayo hotiyeva.
atk-abh02a:930_6: idaṃ ayutta’nti avicāretvā yassa kassaci upādānassa vasena yaṃ kiñci bhavaṃ patthetvā yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ karotiyeva.
atk-abh02a:930_7: Tasmā yadekacce “sīlabbatupādānena rūpārūpabhavā na hontī”ti vadanti,
atk-abh02a:930_11: idhekacco anussavavasena vā diṭṭhānusārena vā “kāmā nāmete manussaloke ceva khattiyamahāsālakulādīsu
atk-abh02a:930_12: chakāmāvacaradevaloke ca samiddhā”ti cintetvā tesaṃ adhigamatthaṃ asaddhammasavanādīhi vañcito ‘iminā
atk-abh02a:930_13: kammena kāmā sampajjantī’ti maññamāno kāmupādānavasena kāyaduccaritādīnipi karoti.
atk-abh02a:930_15: sandiṭṭhike vā pana kāme patthayamāno paṭiladdhe vā gopayamāno kāmupādānavasena kāyaduccaritādīnipi karoti.
atk-abh02a:930_18: kammābhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo saññābhavapañcavokārabhavā pana tadantogadhā eva.
atk-abh02a:931_0: Aparo pana saddhammasavanādīhi upabrūhitañāṇo “iminā kammena kāmā sampajjantī”ti maññamāno kāmupādānavasena kāyasucaritādīni karoti.
atk-abh02a:931_1: So sucaritapāripūriyā devesu vā manussesu vā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:931_5: Iti kāmupādānaṃ sappabhedassa sāntogadhassa kāmabhavassa paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:932_0: Aparo “rūpārūpabhavesu tato samiddhatarā kāmā”ti sutvā vā parikappetvā vā kāmupādānavaseneva rūpārūpasamāpattiyo
atk-abh02a:932_5: Iti kāmupādānaṃ sappabhedānaṃ sāntogadhānaṃ rūpārūpabhavānampi paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:933_0: Aparo “ayaṃ attā nāma kāmāvacarasampattibhave vā rūpārūpabhavānaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ ucchinno suucchinno
atk-abh02a:933_1: hotī”ti ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ upādāya tadupagaṃ kammaṃ karoti.
atk-abh02a:933_5: Iti diṭṭhupādānaṃ sappabhedānaṃ sāntogadhānaṃ tiṇṇampi kāmarūpārūpabhavānaṃ paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:934_0: Aparo “ayaṃ attā nāma kāmāvacarasampattibhave vā rūpārūpabhavānaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ sukhī hoti,
atk-abh02a:934_1: vigatapariḷāho hotī”ti attavādupādānena tadupagaṃ kammaṃ karoti.
atk-abh02a:934_5: Iti attavādupādānaṃ sappabhedānaṃ sāntogadhānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhavānaṃ paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:935_0: Aparo “idaṃ sīlabbataṃ nāma kāmāvacarasampattibhave vā rūpārūpabhavānaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ paripūrentassa
atk-abh02a:935_1: sukhaṃ pāripūriṃ gacchatī”ti sīlabbatupādānavasena tadupagaṃ kammaṃ karoti.
atk-abh02a:935_5: Iti sīlabbatupādānampi sappabhedānaṃ sāntogadhānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhavānaṃ paccayo hotīti evamettha yaṃ yassa paccayo hoti tatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a:936_0: Kiṃ panettha kassa bhavassa kathaṃ paccayo hotīti ce?
atk-abh02a:939_0: Rūpārūpabhavānañhi kāmabhavapariyāpannassa ca kāmabhave kusalakammasseva upapattibhavassa cetaṃ catubbidhampi
atk-abh02a:939_2: Kāmabhave attanā sampayuttaakusalakammabhavassa sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatahetupaccayappabhedehi sahajātādīhi paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:942_1: Bhavapaccayā jātiniddesādīsu jātiādīnaṃ vinicchayo saccavibhaṅge vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:942_5: So pana kammapaccayaupanissayapaccayavasena dvidhāva paccayo hotīti.
atk-abh02a:943_1: kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ “bhavo jātiyā paccayo”ti ce?
atk-abh02a:943_3: Bāhirānañhi janakajanettisukkasoṇitāhārādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ samattepi sattānaṃ yamakānampi sataṃ hīnapaṇītatādiviseso dissati.
atk-abh02a:943_7: tadabhinibbattakasattānaṃ ajjhattasantāne aññassa kāraṇassa abhāvatoti kammabhavahetukova.
atk-abh02a:944_0: Yasmā ca asati jātiyā jarāmaraṇaṃ nāma na hoti,
atk-abh02a:944_2: jātiyā pana sati jarāmaraṇañceva jarāmaraṇasaṅkhātadukkhadhammaphuṭṭhassa ca bālassa jarāmaraṇābhisambandhā
atk-abh02a:944_3: vā tena tena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa anabhisambandhā vā sokādayo ca dhammā honti,
atk-abh02a:944_4: tasmā ayaṃ jātijarāmaraṇassa ceva sokādīnañca paccayo hotīti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:944_5: Sā pana upanissayakoṭiyā ekadhāva paccayo hotīti.
atk-abh02a:946_0: 242. Evametassātiādīnaṃ attho uddesavāre vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Saṅgatiādīni samudayavevacanāneva.
atk-abh02a:947_1: tasmā yā sā avijjā “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti evametassa bhavacakkassa ādimhi vuttā, sā –
atk-abh02a:950_6: paridevo ca nāma mūḷhassāti tesu tāva siddhesu siddhāva hoti avijjā.
atk-abh02a:950_9: Vatthukāmaviyoge tāva soko kāmāsavasamudayo hoti? Yathāha –
atk-abh02a:953_4: mama rūpanti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino taṃ rūpaṃ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
atk-abh02a:953_6: Yathā ca diṭṭhāsavasamudayā evaṃ bhavāsavasamudayāpi, yathāha –
atk-abh02a:953_7: “yepi te devā dīghāyukā vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā uccesu vimānesu ciraṭṭhitikā tepi tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ
atk-abh02a:953_8: sutvā yebhuyyena bhayaṃ saṃvegaṃ santāsaṃ āpajja”nti pañca pubbanimittāni disvā maraṇabhayena santajjitānaṃ
atk-abh02a:953_10: Yathā ca bhavāsavasamudayā evaṃ avijjāsavasamudayāpi, yathāha –
atk-abh02a:953_13: bālo diṭṭheva dhamme tividhaṃ dukkhadomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī”ti.
atk-abh02a:954_1: tasmā ete sijjhamānā avijjāya hetubhūte āsave sādhenti.
atk-abh02a:954_2: Āsavesu ca siddhesu paccayabhāve bhāvato avijjāpi siddhāva hotīti.
atk-abh02a:954_3: Evaṃ tāvettha ‘sokādīhi avijjā siddhā’ hotīti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:955_0: Yasmā pana evaṃ paccayabhāve bhāvato avijjāya siddhāya puna “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā,
atk-abh02a:955_1: saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti evaṃ hetuphalaparamparāya pariyosānaṃ natthi,
atk-abh02a:955_2: tasmā taṃ hetuphalasambandhavasena pavattaṃ dvādasaṅgaṃ ‘bhavacakkaṃ aviditādī’ti siddhaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:956_0: Evaṃ sati “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti idaṃ ādimattakathanaṃ virujjhatīti ce?
atk-abh02a:956_4: Avijjāggahaṇena hi avasesaṃ kilesavaṭṭañca kammādīni ca bālaṃ paliveṭhenti,
atk-abh02a:956_6: Avijjāsamucchede pana kate tehi vimokkho hoti,
atk-abh02a:956_9: Iti yaṃ gaṇhato bandho muñcato ca mokkho hoti,
atk-abh02a:956_11: na ādimattakathananti evamidaṃ bhavacakkaṃ aviditādīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:956_12: Tayidaṃ yasmā avijjādīhi kāraṇehi saṅkhārādīnaṃ pavatti,
atk-abh02a:956_13: tasmā tato aññena “brahmā mahābrahmā seṭṭho sajitā”ti evaṃ parikappitena brahmādinā vā saṃsārassa kārakena
atk-abh02a:956_14: “so kho pana me ayaṃ attā vado vedeyyo”ti evaṃ parikappitena attanā vā sukhadukkhānaṃ vedakena rahitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:960_0: Dve aṭṭha dve eva ca, sarūpato tesu aṅgāni.
atk-abh02a:961_0: Tassa kho panetassa bhavacakkassa avijjā taṇhā cāti dve dhammā mūlanti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:962_1: Tesu pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato āgatavasena avijjā saṅkhārā cāti dve aṅgāni atītakālāni,
atk-abh02a:962_3: jāti ceva jarāmaraṇañca dve anāgatakālānīti veditabbāni. Puna –
atk-abh02a:965_1: Tattha saṅkhārānañca paṭisandhiviññāṇassa ca antarā eko hetuphalasandhi nāma.
atk-abh02a:965_2: Vedanāya ca taṇhāya ca antarā eko phalahetusandhi nāma.
atk-abh02a:965_3: Bhavassa ca jātiyā ca antarā eko hetuphalasandhīti.
atk-abh02a:965_5: Sandhīnaṃ ādipariyosānavavatthitā panassa cattāro saṅgahā honti,
atk-abh02a:968_0: Etehi pana vīsatiyā ākārehi arehi vīsatiākārāranti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:968_1: Tattha ‘atīte hetavo pañcā’ti avijjā saṅkhārā cāti ime tāva dve vuttā eva.
atk-abh02a:968_11: ime pañca dhammā purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā paccayā”ti.
atk-abh02a:969_2: Moho avijjāti yo tadā dukkhādīsu moho,
atk-abh02a:969_5: Āyūhanā saṅkhārāti taṃ kammaṃ karoto purimacetanāyo,
atk-abh02a:969_6: yathā ‘dānaṃ dassāmī’ti cittaṃ uppādetvā māsampi saṃvaccharampi dānūpakaraṇāni sajjentassa uppannā purimacetanāyo.
atk-abh02a:969_7: Paṭiggāhakānaṃ pana hatthe dakkhiṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpayato cetanā bhavoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:969_8: Ekāvajjanesu vā chasu javanesu cetanā āyūhanasaṅkhārā nāma.
atk-abh02a:969_10: Yā kāci vā pana cetanā bhavo,
atk-abh02a:969_12: Nikanti taṇhāti yā kammaṃ karontassa tassa phale uppattibhave nikāmanā patthanā sā taṇhā nāma.
atk-abh02a:969_13: Upagamanaṃ upādānanti yaṃ kammaṃ bhavassa paccayabhūtaṃ;
atk-abh02a:969_14: ‘idaṃ katvā asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne kāme sevissāmi ucchijjissāmī’tiādinā nayena pavattaṃ upagamanaṃ gahaṇaṃ parāmasanaṃ –
atk-abh02a:969_16: Cetanā bhavoti āyūhanāvasāne vuttacetanā bhavoti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:970_5: vedayitaṃ vedanā ime pañca dhammā idhūpapattibhavasmiṃ purekatassa kammassa paccayā”ti.
atk-abh02a:970_6: Tattha paṭisandhi viññāṇanti yaṃ bhavantarapaṭisandhānavasena uppannattā paṭisandhīti vuccati,
atk-abh02a:970_8: Okkanti nāmarūpanti yā gabbhe rūpārūpadhammānaṃ okkanti,
atk-abh02a:970_12: Phuṭṭho phassoti yo ārammaṇaṃ phuṭṭho phusanto uppanno –
atk-abh02a:970_14: Vedayitaṃ vedanāti yaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇena vā saḷāyatanapaccayena vā phassena sahuppannaṃ vipākavedayitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:971_0: ‘Idāni hetavo pañcā’ti taṇhādayo pāḷiyaṃ āgatāva taṇhupādānabhavā.
atk-abh02a:971_1: Bhave pana gahite tassa pubbabhāgā taṃsampayuttā vā saṅkhārā gahitāva honti,
atk-abh02a:971_3: yāya vā mūḷho kammaṃ karoti sā avijjā gahitāva hotīti evaṃ pañca.
atk-abh02a:971_9: Ime pañca dhammā idha kammabhavasmiṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayā”ti.
atk-abh02a:971_10: Tattha idha paripakkattā āyatanānanti paripakkāyatanassa kammakaraṇakāle sammoho dassito.
atk-abh02a:972_8: Ime pañca dhammā āyatiṃ upapattibhavasmiṃ idha katassa kammassa paccayā”ti.
atk-abh02a:973_3: anāgate pañca vipākadhammāti dasa dhammā kammaṃ,
atk-abh02a:973_6: dvīsu ṭhānesu vipāko vipāko nāmāti sabbampetaṃ bhavacakkaṃ paccayākāravaṭṭaṃ kammañceva kammavipāko ca.
atk-abh02a:973_8: dvīsu ṭhānesu vipāko vipākasaṅkhepoti sabbampetaṃ kammasaṅkhepo ceva vipākasaṅkhepo ca.
atk-abh02a:973_10: dvīsu ṭhānesu vipāko vipākavaṭṭanti sabbampetaṃ kammavaṭṭañceva vipākavaṭṭañca.
atk-abh02a:973_12: dvīsu ṭhānesu vipāko vipākabhavoti sabbampetaṃ kammabhavo ceva vipākabhavo ca.
atk-abh02a:973_14: dvīsu ṭhānesu vipāko vipākapavattanti sabbampetaṃ kammapavattañceva vipākapavattañca.
atk-abh02a:973_16: dvīsu vipāko vipākasantatīti sabbampetaṃ kammasantati ceva vipākasantati ca.
atk-abh02a:973_18: dvīsu vipāko kiriyāphalaṃ nāmāti sabbampetaṃ kiriyā ceva kiriyāphalañcāti.
atk-abh02a:980_0: Hetūsu uparuddhesu, chinnaṃ vaṭṭaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:982_0: Satte ca nūpalabbhante, nevucchedo na sassataṃ.
atk-abh02a:983_0: Tivaṭṭamanavaṭṭhitaṃ bhamatīti ettha pana saṅkhārabhavā kammavaṭṭaṃ,
atk-abh02a:983_2: viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanā vipākavaṭṭanti imehi tīhi vaṭṭehi tivaṭṭamidaṃ bhavacakkaṃ yāva
atk-abh02a:983_3: kilesavaṭṭaṃ na upacchijjati tāva anupacchinnapaccayattā anavaṭṭhitaṃ punappunaṃ parivaṭṭanato bhamatiyevāti
atk-abh02a:987_0: Tattha yasmā kusalākusalakammaṃ avisesena samudayasaccanti saccavibhaṅge vuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:987_1: tasmā avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti avijjāya saṅkhārā dutiyasaccappabhavaṃ dutiyasaccaṃ,
atk-abh02a:988_0: Yasmā panettha avijjā vatthūsu ca satte sammoheti paccayo ca hoti saṅkhārānaṃ pātubhāvāya,
atk-abh02a:988_1: tathā saṅkhārā saṅkhatañca abhisaṅkharonti paccayā ca honti viññāṇassa,
atk-abh02a:988_2: viññāṇampi vatthuñca paṭijānāti paccayo ca hoti nāmarūpassa,
atk-abh02a:988_3: nāmarūpampi aññamaññañca upatthambheti paccayo ca hoti saḷāyatanassa,
atk-abh02a:988_4: saḷāyatanampi savisaye ca vattati paccayo ca hoti phassassa,
atk-abh02a:988_5: phassopi ārammaṇañca phusati paccayo ca hoti vedanāya,
atk-abh02a:988_6: vedanāpi ārammaṇarasañca anubhavati paccayo ca hoti taṇhāya,
atk-abh02a:988_7: taṇhāpi rajjanīye ca dhamme rajjati paccayo ca hoti upādānassa,
atk-abh02a:988_8: upādānampi upādānīye ca dhamme upādiyati paccayo ca hoti bhavassa,
atk-abh02a:988_9: bhavopi nānāgatīsu ca vikkhipati paccayo ca hoti jātiyā,
atk-abh02a:988_10: jātipi khandhe ca janeti tesaṃ abhinibbattibhāvena pavattatā paccayo ca hoti jarāmaraṇassa,
atk-abh02a:988_11: jarāmaraṇampi khandhānaṃ pākabhedabhāvañca adhitiṭṭhati paccayo ca hoti bhavantarapātubhāvāya sokādīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānattā,
atk-abh02a:988_12: tasmā sabbapadesu dvidhā pavatta‘kiccato’pi idaṃ viññātabbaṃ yathārahaṃ.
atk-abh02a:989_4: vijānāti phusati vedayati taṇhiyati upādiyati bhavati jāyati jīyati mīyatī”ti evamādidassananivāraṇaṃ,
atk-abh02a:990_0: Yasmā panettha salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇavasena dhammānaṃ adassanato andho viya avijjā,
atk-abh02a:991_0: Yasmā vā panettha avijjā appaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattibhāvena satte abhibhavati paṭalaṃ viya akkhīni,
atk-abh02a:991_1: tadabhibhūto ca bālo ponobbhavikehi saṅkhārehi attānaṃ veṭheti kosakārakimi viya kosappadesehi,
atk-abh02a:991_2: saṅkhārapariggahitaṃ viññāṇaṃ gatīsu patiṭṭhaṃ labhati pariṇāyakapariggahito viya rājakumāro rajje,
atk-abh02a:991_3: upapattinimittaṃ parikappanato viññāṇaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ anekappakāraṃ nāmarūpaṃ abhinibbatteti māyākāro viya māyaṃ,
atk-abh02a:991_4: nāmarūpe patiṭṭhitaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti subhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhito vanappagumbo viya,
atk-abh02a:991_5: āyatanaghaṭṭanato phasso jāyati araṇīsahitābhimaddanato aggi viya,
atk-abh02a:991_6: phassena phuṭṭhassa vedanā pātubhavati agginā phuṭṭhassa ḍāho viya,
atk-abh02a:991_7: vedayamānassa taṇhā vaḍḍhati loṇūdakaṃ pivato pipāsā viya,
atk-abh02a:991_8: tasito bhavesu abhilāsaṃ karoti pipāsito viya pānīye,
atk-abh02a:991_9: tadassupādānaṃ upādānena bhavaṃ upādiyati āmisalobhena maccho baḷisaṃ viya,
atk-abh02a:991_10: bhave sati jāti hoti bīje sati aṅkuro viya,
atk-abh02a:991_11: jātassa avassaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ uppannassa rukkhassa patanaṃ viya,
atk-abh02a:991_12: tasmā evaṃ ‘upamāhi’ petaṃ bhavacakkaṃ viññātabbaṃ yathārahaṃ.
atk-abh02a:992_0: Yasmā ca bhagavatā atthatopi dhammatopi desanātopi paṭivedhatopi gambhīrabhāvaṃ sandhāya “gambhīro cāyaṃ, ānanda,
atk-abh02a:993_0: Tattha yasmā na jātito jarāmaraṇaṃ na hoti,
atk-abh02a:993_1: na ca jātiṃ vinā aññato hoti,
atk-abh02a:993_2: itthañca jātito samudāgacchatīti evaṃ jātipaccayasamudāgataṭṭhassa duravabodhanīyato jarāmaraṇassa jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho gambhīro,
atk-abh02a:994_0: Yasmā pana yenākārena yadavatthā ca avijjā tesaṃ tesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hoti,
atk-abh02a:994_1: tassa duravabodhanīyato avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ paccayaṭṭho gambhīro,
atk-abh02a:994_4: tasmā idaṃ bhavacakkaṃ dhammagambhīranti ayamettha ‘dhammagambhīratā’ hetuno hi dhammoti nāmaṃ,
atk-abh02a:995_0: Yasmā cassa tena tena kāraṇena tathā tathā pavattetabbattā desanāpi gambhīrā,
atk-abh02a:995_1: na tattha sabbaññutañāṇato aññaṃ ñāṇaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ labhati,
atk-abh02a:995_5: katthaci vemajjhato paṭṭhāya anulomato vā paṭilomato vā,
atk-abh02a:995_9: tasmā idaṃ bhavacakkaṃ desanāgambhīranti ayaṃ desanāgambhīratā.
atk-abh02a:996_1: yena paṭividdhena avijjādayo dhammā salakkhaṇato paṭividdhā honti,
atk-abh02a:997_6: saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti evaṃ bījassa aṅkurādibhāvena rukkhabhāvappatti viya santānānupacchedo ‘ekattanayo’ nāma;
atk-abh02a:997_7: yaṃ sammā passanto hetuphalasambandhena pavattamānassa santānassa anupacchedāvabodhato ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati,
atk-abh02a:997_8: micchā passanto hetuphalasambandhena pavattamānassa santānānupacchedassa ekattaggahaṇato sassatadiṭṭhiṃ upādiyati.
atk-abh02a:998_1: yaṃ sammā passanto navanavānaṃ uppādadassanato sassatadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati,
atk-abh02a:998_2: micchā passanto ekasantānapatitassa bhinnasantānasseva nānattaggahaṇato ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ upādiyati.
atk-abh02a:999_2: yaṃ sammā passanto kārakassa abhāvāvabodhato attadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati,
atk-abh02a:999_3: micchā passanto yo asatipi byāpāre avijjādīnaṃ sabhāvaniyamasiddho hetubhāvo tassa aggahaṇato akiriyadiṭṭhiṃ upādiyati.
atk-abh02a:1000_0: Avijjādīhi pana kāraṇehi saṅkhārādīnaṃyeva sambhavo khīrādīhi dadhiādīnaṃ viya,
atk-abh02a:1000_2: yaṃ sammā passanto paccayānurūpato phalāvabodhato ahetukadiṭṭhiñca akiriyadiṭṭhiñca pajahati,
atk-abh02a:1000_3: micchā passanto paccayānurūpaṃ phalappavattiṃ aggahetvā yato kutoci yassa kassaci asambhavaggahaṇato
atk-abh02a:1003_0: Idañhi gambhīrato agādhaṃ nānānayaggahaṇato durabhiyānaṃ ñāṇāsinā samādhipavarasilāyaṃ sunisitena –
atk-abh02a:1008_3: dhammassa ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamayaṃ pajā tantākulakajātā kulagaṇṭhikajātā muñjapabbajabhūtā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātivattatī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1008_4: Tasmā attano vā paresaṃ vā hitāya sukhāya paṭipanno avasesakiccāni pahāya –
atk-abh02a:1013_1: Evaṃ mahāpathaviṃ pattharanto viya ākāsaṃ vitthārayanto viya ca sabbadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇo satthā suttantabhājanīye
atk-abh02a:1013_2: niggaṇṭhiṃ nijjaṭaṃ paccayākāraṃ nānācittavasena dassetvā idāni yasmā na kevalaṃ ayaṃ paccayākāro nānācittesuyeva hoti,
atk-abh02a:1013_4: tasmā abhidhammabhājanīyavasena ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ paccayākāraṃ nānappakārato dassetuṃ avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārotiādinā nayena mātikaṃ tāva ṭhapesi.
atk-abh02a:1016_1: ettha hi avijjāsaṅkhāraviññāṇanāmachaṭṭhāyatanaphassavedanātaṇhāupādānappabhedehi avijjādīhi navahi mūlapadehi avijjādiko,
atk-abh02a:1016_8: upādānādikoti ime nava mūlapadā nava nayā honti.
atk-abh02a:1017_0: Tesu yo tāva ayaṃ avijjādiko nayo,
atk-abh02a:1017_5: Yathā cettha evaṃ sesesupīti ekekasmiṃ naye catunnaṃ catunnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena chattiṃsa catukkāni.
atk-abh02a:1017_6: Tattha ekekena catukkena catunnaṃ catunnaṃ vārānaṃ saṅgahitattā catunnampi catukkānaṃ vasena ekekasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:1017_7: naye soḷasa soḷasa vārāti catucattālīsādhikaṃ vārasataṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1019_0: Tattha yadetaṃ sabbapaṭhame avijjāmūlake naye paccayacatukkaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1019_2: saḷāyatanaṭṭhāne chaṭṭhāyatanassa ca vuttattā aparipuṇṇaaṅgadvayayutto dvādasaṅgikavāro nāma.
atk-abh02a:1019_4: saḷāyatanaṭṭhāne ca na kassaci vuttattā aparipuṇṇaekaṅgayutto ekādasaṅgikavāro nāma.
atk-abh02a:1019_5: Tatiyo saḷāyatanaṭṭhāne chaṭṭhāyatanassa vuttattā paripuṇṇaekaṅgayutto dvādasaṅgikavāro nāma.
atk-abh02a:1020_1: ayampi chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phassoti vuttattā aparipuṇṇekaṅgayuttoyevāti? Na,
atk-abh02a:1021_0: Tattha paṭhamo imesu dutiyādīsu tīsu vāresu na katthaci na pavisatīti sabbasaṅgāhikoti vutto.
atk-abh02a:1022_0: Yaṃ yattha aññathā vuttaṃ, avuttañcāpi yaṃ yahiṃ;
atk-abh02a:1023_0: Yaṃ yathā paccayo yassa, taṃ sabbamupalakkhaye.
atk-abh02a:1024_1: avisesena tāva catūsupi etesu suttantabhājaniye viya saṅkhārāti avatvā saṅkhāroti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1024_6: Ekacittakkhaṇe ca bahū cetanā na santīti saṅkhārāti avatvā saṅkhāroti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1025_0: Paṭhamavāre panettha ekacittakkhaṇapariyāpannadhammasaṅgahaṇato sabbaṭṭhānasādhāraṇato ca rūpaṃ chaḍḍetvā “viññāṇapaccayā nāma”ntveva vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1025_4: tasmā tassānurūpaṃ paccayabhūtaṃ āyatanaṃ gaṇhanto saḷāyatanaṭṭhāne “nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatana”nti ekaṃ manāyatanaṃyeva āha.
atk-abh02a:1025_7: hetuphalavisesadassanatthaṃ pana aṅgapuṇṇatthañca puna idha gahitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1025_8: Tatra hi etassa visesena saṅkhāro hetu,
atk-abh02a:1025_12: Sokādayo pana yasmā sabbe ekacittakkhaṇe na sambhavanti,
atk-abh02a:1025_13: sabbasmiñca cittappavattiṭṭhāne ceva citte ca na pavattanti,
atk-abh02a:1025_15: Jātijarāmaraṇāni pana acittakkhaṇamattānipi samānāni cittakkhaṇe antogadhattā aṅgaparipūraṇatthaṃ gahitāni.
atk-abh02a:1026_0: Yaṃ panettha ito paresu vāresu vuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1026_2: Yasmiṃ yasmiṃ pana vāre yo yo viseso āgato,
atk-abh02a:1027_0: ‘Yaṃ yathā paccayo yassā’ti ettha pana saṅkhārassa avijjā sampayuttadhammasādhāraṇehi sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatapaccayehi
atk-abh02a:1027_2: Tattha yasmā parato hetucatukkādīni tīṇi catukkāni avigatasampayuttaaññamaññapaccayavasena vuttāni,
atk-abh02a:1027_3: tasmā idha tāni apanetvā avasesānaṃ vasena avijjā saṅkhārassa catudhā paccayoti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1028_2: Idha pana teyeva tayo apanetvā pañcadhā.
atk-abh02a:1028_9: Idha pana teyeva tayo apanetvā tidhā catudhā pañcadhā vā.
atk-abh02a:1028_11: Evaṃ phasso vedanāya sādhāraṇehi chahi āhārapaccayena cāti sattadhā.
atk-abh02a:1028_12: Idha pana teyeva tayo apanetvā catudhā.
atk-abh02a:1028_13: Vedanā taṇhāya sādhāraṇehi chahi jhānindriyapaccayehi cāti aṭṭhadhā.
atk-abh02a:1028_14: Idha pana teyeva tayo apanetvā pañcadhā.
atk-abh02a:1028_17: Evaṃ upādānaṃ bhavassa sādhāraṇehi chahi maggapaccayena cāti sattadhā.
atk-abh02a:1028_18: Idha pana teyeva tayo apanetvā catudhā.
atk-abh02a:1029_1: “imasmiṃ catukke sabbesampi saṅkhārādīnaṃ avijjādayo sahajātapaccayena paccayā honti.
atk-abh02a:1029_3: te bhavādīnaṃ tathā abhāvaṃ sesapaccayānañca sambhavaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhipitabbā.
atk-abh02a:1029_4: Na hi bhavo jātiyā sahajātapaccayo hoti,
atk-abh02a:1029_6: Ye cetesaṃ saṅkharādīnaṃ avasesā paccayā vuttā,
atk-abh02a:1029_9: Evaṃ tāva paṭhamavāre yaṃ yattha aññathā vuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1030_1: dutiyavāre “nāmapaccayā phasso”ti vatvā saḷāyatanaṭṭhāne na kiñci vuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1030_4: Phassassa hi na kevalañca chaṭṭhāyatanameva paccayo,
atk-abh02a:1030_6: Mahānidānasuttante cassa “atthi idappaccayā phassoti iti puṭṭhena satā, ānanda,
atk-abh02a:1030_11: Evaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ chaḍḍetvā ekādasaṅgiko paṭiccasamuppādo vutto.
atk-abh02a:1030_12: Tasmā imassa paccayavisesassa dassanatthaṃ imissā ca mahānidānasuttantadesanāya pariggahatthaṃ dutiyavāre
atk-abh02a:1030_13: “nāmapaccayā phasso”ti vatvā saḷāyatanaṭṭhāne na kiñci vuttanti.
atk-abh02a:1031_0: Tatiyavāre pana “viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti suttantabhājanīye āgatameva catutthamaṅgaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1031_1: taṃ ekacittakkhaṇikattā paccayākārassa idha ayuttanti ce?
atk-abh02a:1031_4: Sacepi hi tattha rūpaṃ cittakkhaṇato uddhaṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh02a:1031_5: tathāpissa taṃ viññāṇaṃ sakakkhaṇe paccayo hoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh02a:1031_6: Purejātassa tāva cittasamuṭṭhānassa aññassa vā pacchājātapaccayena.
atk-abh02a:1031_7: Vuttañcetaṃ “pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo”ti.
atk-abh02a:1031_9: Yathāha “cittacetasikā dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo”ti.
atk-abh02a:1032_3: Ayañhi paccayākāro rūpappavattidese kāmabhave gabbhaseyyakānañceva aparipuṇṇāyatanaopapātikānañca rūpāvacaradevānañca vasena desito.
atk-abh02a:1032_7: Taṃ panetassa chaṭṭhāyatanassa nissayapaccayena ceva purejātapaccayena cāti dvidhā paccayo hotīti esa tatiyavāre viseso.
atk-abh02a:1033_9: tasmā ettha saḷāyatanapaccayāti avatvā “chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso”ti vuttoti ayaṃ catutthavāre viseso.
atk-abh02a:1034_0: Evametesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ ñatvā puna sabbesveva tesu visesena paṭhamakā dve vārā arūpabhave paccayākāradassanatthaṃ vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1034_3: Rūpabhavasmiñhi satipi rūpasammissatte saḷāyatanaṃ na pavattati.
atk-abh02a:1034_6: Tatiyo vā rūpabhave ceva kāmabhave ca aparipuṇṇāyatanānaṃ akusalappavattikkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vutto.
atk-abh02a:1034_9: So hi na katthaci cittappavattidese na pavattati.
atk-abh02a:1034_13: Purimāsu hi dvīsu yonīsu so sambhavati,
atk-abh02a:1034_16: Pacchimāsu hi so dvīsu yonīsu sambhavati,
atk-abh02a:1035_0: Ettāvatā ca yaṃ vuttaṃ catūsupi vāresu –
atk-abh02a:1036_0: Yaṃ yattha aññathā vuttaṃ, avuttañcāpi yaṃ yahiṃ;
atk-abh02a:1037_0: Yaṃ yathā paccayo yassa, taṃ sabbamupalakkhayeti.
atk-abh02a:1040_0: Viseso yo ca taṃ jaññā, catukkesu paresupi.
atk-abh02a:1042_1: Tattha yo tāva idha vutto nayo,
atk-abh02a:1042_4: hetucatukke tāva avijjā hetu assāti avijjāhetuko.
atk-abh02a:1042_5: Avijjā assa sahavattanato yāvabhaṅgā pavattikā gamikāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1042_6: “Avijjāpaccayā”ti ca ettāvatā sahajātādipaccayavasena sādhāraṇato saṅkhārassa avijjā paccayoti dassetvā,
atk-abh02a:1043_0: Kasmā pana bhavādīsu hetukaggahaṇaṃ na katanti?
atk-abh02a:1043_3: Ṭhapetvā upādānaṃ vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho –
atk-abh02a:1043_4: ayaṃ vuccati upādānapaccayā bhavo”ti vacanato upādānapaccayā catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ idha bhavoti nāmaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1043_5: Saṅkhārakkhandhe ca “jāti dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahitā”tiādivacanato jātijarāmaraṇāni antogadhāni.
atk-abh02a:1044_0: Tattha yāva upādānaṃ tāva jātijarāmaraṇānaṃ anupalabbhanato upādānaṃ bhavassa na niyamato avigatapaccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:1044_1: “Yā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ jātī”ti ādivacanato saṅkhatalakkhaṇesu jātiyā jarāmaraṇasaṅkhātassa bhavassa
atk-abh02a:1044_5: Jāti jarāmaraṇassa paccayoti sabbathāpi avigatapaccayaniyamābhāvato abhāvato ca avigatapaccayassa bhavādīsu hetukaggahaṇaṃ na katanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1045_2: na ca upapattibhavassa upādānaṃ avigatapaccayo hotīti “upādānapaccayā bhavo upādānahetuko”ti avatvā “upādānapaccayā bhavo”ti vutto.
atk-abh02a:1045_4: Taṃ idha upapattimissakassa bhavassa anadhippetattā ayuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1046_0: Bhavapaccayā jātīti ettha ca ṭhapetvā jātijarāmaraṇāni avaseso bhavo jātiyā paccayoti veditabbo. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:1046_3: ṭhapetvā jātijarāmaraṇāni bhavo jātiyā paccayoti vattabboti?
atk-abh02a:1046_9: tassa vattabbapadeso natthīti vattabbapadesābhāvato na vutto.
atk-abh02a:1046_11: Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpantiādīsu ca viññāṇādīnaṃ avigatapaccayabhāvasambhavato viññāṇahetukādivacanaṃ katanti esa hetucatukke viseso.
atk-abh02a:1048_1: Sampayuttacatukkepi avijjāpaccayāti ettāvatā sahajātādipaccayavasena saṅkhārassa avijjāpaccayataṃ dassetvā
atk-abh02a:1048_4: Yasmā pana arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ rūpadhammehi sampayogo natthi,
atk-abh02a:1048_5: tasmā viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpantiādīsu tatiyacatutthavārapadesu “viññāṇasampayuttaṃ nāma”ntiādinā nayena yaṃ labbhati,
atk-abh02a:1050_1: Aññamaññacatukkepi avijjāpaccayāti sahajātādipaccayavasena saṅkhārassa avijjāpaccayataṃ dassetvā “saṅkhārapaccayāpi
atk-abh02a:1050_9: heṭṭhā vā desanāya pacchinnattā evaṃ na vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1050_13: tasmā catutthavāre “chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayāpi nāmarūpa”nti yaṃ labbhati tadeva gahitanti esa aññamaññacatukke viseso.
atk-abh02a:1053_2: Tatthāpi yathā avijjāmūlake evaṃ cattāri catukkāni soḷasa ca vārā veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1053_3: Paṭhamacatukke pana paṭhamavārameva dassetvā desanā saṃkhittā.
atk-abh02a:1053_5: Tattha sabbesveva tesu saṅkhāramūlakādīsu aṭṭhasu nayesu “saṅkhārapaccayā avijjā”tiādinā nayena sahajātādipaccayavasena
atk-abh02a:1053_6: avijjāya saṅkhārādipaccayataṃ dassetvā puna “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā nayena ekacittakkhaṇepi paccayākāracakkassa
atk-abh02a:1054_0: Kasmā pana bhavamūlakā jātijarāmaraṇamūlakā vā nayā na vuttā?
atk-abh02a:1054_3: “Saṅkhārapaccayā avijjā”ti evamādīsu pana vuccamānesu na koci bhavapariyāpanno dhammo avijjāya paccayo na vutto.
atk-abh02a:1054_4: Tasmā apubbassa aññassa avijjāpaccayassa vattabbassa abhāvato bhavamūlako nayo na vutto.
atk-abh02a:1054_6: Tasmā “bhavapaccayā avijjā”ti vuccamāne “avijjāpaccayā avijjā”tipi vuttaṃ siyā.
atk-abh02a:1054_7: Na ca ekacittakkhaṇe avijjā avijjāya paccayo nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:1054_8: Tattha pacchinnattāva jātijarāmaraṇamūlakāpi nayā na gahitā.
atk-abh02a:1054_10: Na cetāni ekacittakkhaṇe avijjāya paccayā hontīti bhavamūlakā jātijarāmaraṇamūlakā vā nayā na vuttāti.
atk-abh02a:1057_1: Idāni yathā heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalattikaṃ ādiṃ katvā nikkhittamātikāya paṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṃ kusalaṃ bhājitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1057_2: tathā idha mātikāya anikkhittattā paṭhamaṃ kusalaṃ anāmasitvā “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro”ti akusaladhammavasena
atk-abh02a:1057_3: mātikāya nikkhittattā nikkhepapaṭipāṭiyāva avijjādīni paṭiccasamuppādaṅgāni bhājetvā dassetuṃ katame
atk-abh02a:1057_6: Yasmā pana ekacittakkhaṇe taṇhāya ca kāmupādānassa ca sambhavo natthi,
atk-abh02a:1057_7: tasmā yaṃ ettha taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ labbhati,
atk-abh02a:1058_0: Bhavaniddese ca yasmā upādānaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhe saṅgahaṃ gacchati,
atk-abh02a:1058_1: tasmā “ṭhapetvā upādānaṃ vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1058_3: Na ca tadeva tassa paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:1059_1: Evaṃ paṭhamavāraṃ niṭṭhapetvā puna dutiyavāre yasmiṃ samaye paṭhamavārena paccayākāro dassito,
atk-abh02a:1059_2: tasmiṃyeva samaye aparenapi nayena paccayākāraṃ dassetuṃ visuṃ samayavavatthānavāraṃ avatvā tasmiṃ samaye
atk-abh02a:1059_4: Tattha ṭhapetvā phassanti idaṃ yasmā phassopi nāmapariyāpanno,
atk-abh02a:1060_2: tasmiṃ pavattamāne yasmā tenupatthaddhānaṃ cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ upacitattaṃ paññāyati,
atk-abh02a:1060_4: Yasmā ca kammajarūpassapi tasmiṃ samaye vattamānassa viññāṇaṃ pacchājātapaccayena paccayo hoti,
atk-abh02a:1060_6: Tattha kiñcāpi kammajaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānanti dveva santatiyo gahitā,
atk-abh02a:1061_1: Catutthavāre pana yasmā ekacittakkhaṇepi mahābhūtarūpapaccayā cakkhāyatanādīni,
atk-abh02a:1061_3: nāmapaccayā ca pacchājātasahajātādivasena yathānurūpaṃ sabbānipi pavattanti,
atk-abh02a:1063_3: taṃ visuṃ visuṃ dassetuṃ idaṃ vuccati viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇasampayuttaṃ nāmantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1064_1: Catutthacatukke phassapaccayā nāmaniddese kiñcāpi “ṭhapetvā phassaṃ vedanākkhandho…pe…
atk-abh02a:1064_3: idaṃ vuccati phassapaccayā nāma”nti na vuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1064_5: viññāṇakkhandho”ti vuttattā avuttampi taṃ vuttameva hoti.
atk-abh02a:1065_0: Yathā cāyaṃ catucatukko soḷasavārappabhedo avijjāmūlako paṭhamanayo etasmiṃ paṭhamākusalacitte pakāsito,
atk-abh02a:1066_1: Idāni imināva nayena sesākusalacittesupi paccayākāraṃ dassetuṃ katame dhammā akusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1066_2: Tattha yasmā diṭṭhivippayuttesu taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ natthi,
atk-abh02a:1066_3: tasmā upādānaṭṭhāne upādānaṃ viya daḷhanipātinā adhimokkhena padaṃ pūritaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1066_4: Domanassasahagatesu ca yasmā vedanāpaccayā taṇhāpi natthi,
atk-abh02a:1066_5: tasmā taṇhāṭṭhāne taṇhā viya balavakilesena paṭighena padaṃ pūritaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1066_7: Vicikicchāsampayutte pana yasmā sanniṭṭhānābhāvato adhimokkhopi natthi,
atk-abh02a:1066_8: tasmā taṇhāṭṭhāne balavakilesabhūtāya vicikicchāya padaṃ pūritaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1066_11: tasmā taṇhāṭṭhāne balavakilesena uddhaccena padaṃ pūritaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1066_13: Sabbattheva ca visesamattaṃ dassetvā pāḷi saṃkhittā.
atk-abh02a:1067_1: Adhimuccati vā tena ārammaṇe cittaṃ nibbicikicchatāya sanniṭṭhānaṃ gacchatīti adhimokkho.
atk-abh02a:1067_5: Sabbacittesu ca paṭhamacitte vuttanayeneva nayacatukkavārappabhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1067_6: Kevalañhi vicikicchāsampayutte upādānamūlakassa nayassa abhāvā aṭṭha nayā,
atk-abh02a:1070_1: Idāni imināva nayena kusalacittādīsupi paccayākāraṃ dassetuṃ katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1070_2: Yathā pana akusale paṭhamaṃ mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā pacchā niddeso kato,
atk-abh02a:1070_5: Lokiyakusalādīsu hi tesaṃ dhammānaṃ dukkhasaccapariyāpannattā “evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassā”ti appanā hoti,
atk-abh02a:1070_7: Tasmā ettha sādhāraṇato mātikaṃ ṭhapetuṃ na sakkāti pāṭiyekkaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ kusalādīnaṃ mātikaṃ uddisitvāva niddeso katoti.
atk-abh02a:1071_0: Tattha yasmā ekacittakkhaṇe kusalasaṅkhārena saddhiṃ avijjā natthi,
atk-abh02a:1071_4: taṇhupādānānañca abhāvato taṇhāṭṭhāne taṇhā viya ārammaṇe ajjhogāḷho pasādo,
atk-abh02a:1071_5: upādānaṭṭhāne upādānaṃ viya daḷhanipātī nāma adhimokkho vutto.
atk-abh02a:1074_2: Sabbavāresu ca avijjāmūlakā nayā parihīnā. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:1074_4: Kusalacittesu hi avijjāṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbaṃ kusalamūlaṃ atthi,
atk-abh02a:1074_7: evaṃ santepi idha pacchinnattā tattha na gahitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1074_8: Pañcaviññāṇasote sotapatitāva hutvā desanā katāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1075_0: Visesato panettha cakkhuviññāṇādīsu taṇhāṭṭhānaṃ upādānaṭṭhānañca parihīnaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:1075_3: Sahetukesu pasādasabbhāvato taṇhāṭṭhāne pasādena padaṃ pūritaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1075_6: sahetukesu pasādamūlakena saddhiṃ aṭṭha aṭṭha nayā veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1076_0: Tattha cakkhuviññāṇādīsupi catunnampi catukkānaṃ ādivārova vutto.
atk-abh02a:1076_5: Yathā ca paṭhamacatukke dve vārā labbhanti,
atk-abh02a:1076_8: sesacatukkesu ca dve dve vārā avuttāpi vuttāva hontīti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1076_10: Idha pacchinnattā pana parato na gahitā.
atk-abh02a:1079_1: Idāni aparena pariyāyena ekacittakkhaṇe paccayākāraṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1079_3: Teneva niddesavāre “tattha katamā avijjā”ti avibhajitvā “tattha katamo avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro”ti vibhattaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1079_4: Kusalacetanāsaṅkhāto hi saṅkhāroyeva tasmiṃ samaye cittena sahajāto hoti,
atk-abh02a:1080_0: Tattha lokiyakusalassa heṭṭhā suttantabhājanīye vuttanayeneva avijjā paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:1080_1: Yasmā pana appahīnāvijjo avijjāya pahānatthaṃ lokuttaraṃ bhāveti,
atk-abh02a:1080_5: Tattha tebhūmakakusale sammohavasenapi samatikkamabhāvanāvasenapi āyūhanaṃ labbhati;
atk-abh02a:1081_1: yathā heṭṭhā ekekakusale catunnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena nava soḷasakā laddhā,
atk-abh02a:1084_1: Idāni abyākatesupi apareneva nayena paccayākāraṃ dassetuṃ katame dhammā abyākatātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1084_2: Tattha kusalamūlapaccayāti idampi upanissayapaccayataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1084_6: Tasmā esa upanissayapaccayena ceva nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena ca paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:1084_7: Teneva niddesavāre “tattha katamaṃ kusalamūla”nti avibhajitvā “tattha katamo kusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro”ti vibhattaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1085_0: Avijjāmūlakakusalaniddese viya ca imasmimpi vipākaniddese paṭhamaṃ paccayacatukkameva labbhati.
atk-abh02a:1085_2: Tasmā ekekasmiṃ vipākacitte ekamekasseva catukkassa vasena kusalamūlamūlake akusalamūlamūlake ca naye vārappabhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1085_3: Kiriyādhammānaṃ pana yasmā neva avijjā na kusalākusalamūlāni upanissayapaccayataṃ labhanti,
atk-abh02a:1092_0: Yasmā ñāṇapabhedo, na kadācipi hoti etasmiṃ.
atk-abh02a:1094_0: Tattha kayirā na haññaṃ, karaṇīyataraṃ tato atthīti.
atk-abh02a:1095_0: Ayaṃ pana paccayākāro suttantaabhidhammabhājanīyavasena dveparivaṭṭameva nīharitvā bhājetvā dassito hoti.
atk-abh02a:1101_2: Tena na tato heṭṭhā na uddhanti satipaṭṭhānaparicchedaṃ dīpeti.
atk-abh02a:1101_5: tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭidhānunayavītivattatāpi, satipi.
atk-abh02a:1101_12: Āhārasamudayā kāyassa samudayo”tiādīsu hi satigocaro satipaṭṭhānanti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1102_1: yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇaṃ anusāsitumarahatī”ti ettha tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatā satipaṭṭhānanti vuttā.
atk-abh02a:1102_7: “Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrentī”tiādīsu pana satiyeva satipaṭṭhānanti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1102_14: Iti sati ca sā paṭṭhānañcātipi satipaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1103_0: Kasmā pana bhagavatā cattārova satipaṭṭhānā vuttā,
atk-abh02a:1103_8: Samathayānikassa ca mandassa akicchena adhigantabbanimittaṃ paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ visuddhimaggo,
atk-abh02a:1104_3: Tesaṃ tattha asubhabhāvadassanena tassa vipallāsassa pahānatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Sukhaṃ, niccaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1104_4: attāti gahitesupi ca vedanādīsu vedanā dukkhā,
atk-abh02a:1104_8: Tesaṃ tattha dukkhādibhāvadassanena tesaṃ vipallāsānaṃ pahānatthaṃ sesāni tīṇi vuttānīti.
atk-abh02a:1104_9: Evaṃ subhasukhaniccaattabhāvavipallāsappahānatthaṃ vā cattārova vuttā anūnā anadhikāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1104_11: atha kho caturoghayogāsavaganthaupādānaagatippahānatthampi catubbidhāhārapariññatthañca cattārova vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1105_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “saraṇavasena ceva ekattasamosaraṇavasena ca ekameva satipaṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇavasena cattāroti etadeva vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1105_1: Yathā hi catudvāre nagare pācīnato āgacchantā pācīnadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pācīnadvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-abh02a:1105_4: uttarato āgacchantā uttaradisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā uttaradvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-abh02a:1106_0: Yathā pācīnato āgacchantā pācīnadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pācīnadvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-abh02a:1106_1: evaṃ kāyānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā kāyānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena
atk-abh02a:1106_3: Yathā dakkhiṇato āgacchantā dakkhiṇadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇadvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-abh02a:1106_4: evaṃ vedanānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā navavidhena vedanānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā vedanānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena
atk-abh02a:1106_6: Yathā pacchimato āgacchantā pacchimadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pacchimadvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-abh02a:1106_7: evaṃ cittānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā soḷasavidhena cittānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā cittānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena
atk-abh02a:1106_9: Yathā uttarato āgacchantā uttaradisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā uttaradvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-abh02a:1106_10: evaṃ dhammānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā pañcavidhena dhammānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā dhammānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena
atk-abh02a:1106_12: Evaṃ saraṇavasena ceva ekattasamosaraṇavasena ca ekameva satipaṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇavasena cattāroti vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1107_0: Idha bhikkhūti ettha kiñcāpi bhagavatā devaloke nisīditvā ayaṃ satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgo kathito,
atk-abh02a:1107_1: ekabhikkhupi tattha bhagavato santike nisinnako nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:1107_2: Evaṃ santepi yasmā ime cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhikkhū bhāventi,
atk-abh02a:1107_13: Paṭipannako hi devo vā hotu manusso vā,
atk-abh02a:1111_0: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū”ti. ;
atk-abh02a:1113_1: Tasmā ajjhattaṃ kāyeti attano kāyeti attho.
atk-abh02a:1113_3: Rūpakāyo hi idha aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ kesādīnañca dhammānaṃ samūhaṭṭhena,
atk-abh02a:1113_6: Yathā ca samūhaṭṭhena evaṃ kucchitānaṃ āyaṭṭhena.
atk-abh02a:1114_1: kāyaṃ vā anupassamāno kāyeti ca vatvāpi puna kāyānupassīti dutiyaṃ kāyaggahaṇaṃ asammissato vavatthānaghanavinibbhogādidassanatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:1114_3: Tena na kāye vedanānupassī cittadhammānupassī vā;
atk-abh02a:1114_4: atha kho kāye kāyānupassī yevāti kāyasaṅkhāte vatthusmiṃ kāyānupassanākārasseva dassanena asammissato vavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1114_11: kadalikkhandhapattavaṭṭivinibhuñjako viya rittamuṭṭhiviniveṭhako viya ca bhūtupādāyasamūhānupassīyevāti
atk-abh02a:1114_12: nānappakārato samūhavasena kāyasaṅkhātassa vatthuno dassanena ghanavinibbhogo dassito hoti.
atk-abh02a:1114_13: Na hettha yathāvuttasamūhavinimutto kāyo vā itthī vā puriso vā añño vā koci dhammo dissati.
atk-abh02a:1114_14: Yathāvuttadhammasamūhamatteyeva pana tathā tathā sattā micchābhinivesaṃ karonti.
atk-abh02a:1115_0: “Yaṃ passati na taṃ diṭṭhaṃ, yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ taṃ na passati;
atk-abh02a:1116_0: Apassaṃ bajjhate mūḷho, bajjhamāno na muccatī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1117_6: na evaṃ aniccadukkhānattaasubhabhūteyeva imasmiṃ kāye niccasukhaattasubhabhāvānupassī;
atk-abh02a:1117_11: so satova assasatī”tiādinā nayena assāsapassāsādicuṇṇakajātaaṭṭhikapariyosāno kāyo vutto,
atk-abh02a:1117_25: tassa sabbassa imasmiṃyeva kāye anupassanato kāye kāyānupassīti evampi attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh02a:1118_0: Atha vā kāye ahanti vā mamanti vā evaṃ gahetabbassa kassaci ananupassanato,
atk-abh02a:1118_1: tassa tasseva pana kesalomādikassa nānādhammasamūhassa anupassanato kāye kesādidhammasamūhasaṅkhāte kāyānupassīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh02a:1118_3: no niccato”tiādinā anukkamena paṭisambhidāyaṃ āgatanayassa sabbasseva aniccalakkhaṇādino ākārasamūhasaṅkhātassa
atk-abh02a:1118_4: kāyassa anupassanatopi kāye kāyānupassīti evampi attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh02a:1119_0: Tathā hi ayaṃ kāye kāyānupassanāpaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno bhikkhu imaṃ kāyaṃ aniccānupassanādīnaṃ sattannaṃ
atk-abh02a:1119_1: anupassanānaṃ vasena aniccato anupassati no niccato,
atk-abh02a:1119_8: So taṃ aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahati,
