atk-abh02a:1120_1: ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ aparena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā apatamānaṃ attabhāvaṃ harati pavattetīti attho.
atk-abh02a:1121_3: Paṭhamanayena hi attano kāye kāyapariggaho vutto,
atk-abh02a:1121_5: tatiyanayena kālena attano kālena parassa kāye.
atk-abh02a:1121_7: Paguṇakammaṭṭhānassa pana aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇakālo ettha kathito.
atk-abh02a:1121_9: So hi yasmā tasmiṃ samaye yaṃ taṃ vīriyaṃ tīsu bhavesu kilesānaṃ ātāpanato ātāpoti vuccati,
atk-abh02a:1122_2: Ayaṃ pana yasmā satiyā ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetvā paññāya anupassati,
atk-abh02a:1122_3: na hi sativirahitassa anupassanā nāma atthi,
atk-abh02a:1122_8: tasmā ettha “kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”ti ettāvatā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānakammaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1122_9: Atha vā yasmā anātāpino antosaṅkhepo antarāyakaro hoti,
atk-abh02a:1122_11: muṭṭhassatī upāyāpariccāge anupāyāpariggahe ca asamatthova hoti,
atk-abh02a:1122_13: tasmā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ānubhāvena taṃ sampajjati tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ “ātāpī sampajāno satimā”ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1123_0: Iti kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ sampayogaṅgañca dassetvā idāni pahānaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1123_1: Tattha vineyyāti tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena vā vinayitvā.
atk-abh02a:1123_2: Loketi ettha yvāyaṃ ajjhattādibhedo kāyo pariggahito sveva idha loko nāma.
atk-abh02a:1124_5: domanassavinayena kāye bhūtānaṃ asubhāsukhabhāvādīnaṃ apanayanassa ca pahānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1124_6: Tena yogāvacarassa yogānubhāvo yogasamatthatā ca dīpitā hoti.
atk-abh02a:1124_10: Anurodhavirodhavippamutto cesa aratiratisaho abhūtaṃ apakkhipanto bhūtañca anapanento yogasamattho hotīti.
atk-abh02a:1127_3: kālena attano kālena parassa vedanādīsūti tividho pariggaho vutto.
atk-abh02a:1127_4: Vedanāsu vedanānupassītiādīsu ca vedanādīnaṃ punavacane payojanaṃ kāyānupassanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1127_7: dhammesu dhammānupassīti ettha pana vedanāti tisso vedanā.
atk-abh02a:1127_12: Kevalaṃ panidha yathā vedanā anupassitabbā tathā anupassanto “vedanāsu vedanānupassī”ti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1130_0: Sa ve sammadaso bhikkhu, upasanto carissatī”ti. ;
atk-abh02a:1132_2: Dhammā salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇānaṃ suññatādhammassa aniccādisattānupassanānaṃ niddesavāre āgatasantāsantādibhedānañca vasena anupassitabbā.
atk-abh02a:1132_4: Kāmañcettha yassa kāyasaṅkhāte loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ pahīnaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1132_9: Tenevassa tattha pahānadassanatthampi evaṃ vuttanti veditabbanti.
atk-abh02a:1135_1: Idāni seyyathāpi nāma cheko vilīvakārako thūlakilañjasaṇhakilañjacaṅkoṭakapeḷāpuṭādīni upakaraṇāni kattukāmo
atk-abh02a:1135_2: ekaṃ mahāveḷuṃ labhitvā catudhā chinditvā tato ekekaṃ veḷukhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā phāletvā taṃ taṃ upakaraṇaṃ kareyya,
atk-abh02a:1135_3: yathā vā pana cheko suvaṇṇakāro nānāvihitaṃ piḷandhanavikatiṃ kattukāmo suparisuddhaṃ suvaṇṇaghaṭikaṃ
atk-abh02a:1135_4: labhitvā catudhā bhinditvā tato ekekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ gahetvā taṃ taṃ piḷandhanaṃ kareyya,
atk-abh02a:1135_5: evameva bhagavā satipaṭṭhānadesanāya sattānaṃ anekappakāraṃ visesādhigamaṃ kattukāmo ekameva sammāsatiṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā –
atk-abh02a:1135_6: idha bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”tiādinā nayena ārammaṇavasena catudhā bhinditvā tato
atk-abh02a:1135_7: ekekaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vibhajanto kathañca bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ kāyetiādinā nayena niddesavāraṃ vattumāraddho.
atk-abh02a:1136_2: kena ca ākārena kena pakārena bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ kāye kāyānupassī viharatīti?
atk-abh02a:1136_6: saddo ajjhattādivasena sabbappakārakāyānupassanānibbattakassa puggalassa sannissayabhūtasāsanaparidīpano aññasāsanassa tathābhāvapaṭisedhano ca.
atk-abh02a:1137_4: Pūraṃ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhatīti nānappakārakesādiasucibharito ayaṃ kāyoti passati. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh02a:1137_7: Imasminti yvāyaṃ uddhaṃ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā tiriyaṃ tacapariyanto pūro nānappakārassa asucinoti vuccati tasmiṃ.
atk-abh02a:1137_9: Sarīrañhi asucisañcayato kucchitānaṃ kesādīnañceva cakkhurogādīnañca rogasatānaṃ āyabhūtato kāyoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1138_2: atthi imasmiṃ kāye lomāti evaṃ sambandho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1138_5: tacato paṭṭhāya tiriyantatoti ettake byāmamatte kaḷevare sabbākārenapi vicinanto na koci kiñci muttaṃ
atk-abh02a:1138_6: vā maṇiṃ vā veḷuriyaṃ vā agaruṃ vā kuṅkumaṃ vā kappūraṃ vā vāsacuṇṇādiṃ vā aṇumattampi sucibhāvaṃ passati,
atk-abh02a:1138_7: atha kho paramaduggandhajegucchaṃ assirīkadassanaṃ nānappakāraṃ kesalomādibhedaṃ asuciṃyeva passati.
atk-abh02a:1138_9: atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā lomā…pe… muttanti.
atk-abh02a:1139_0: Imaṃ pana kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇitukāmena kulaputtena āditova catubbidhaṃ sīlaṃ sodhetvā suparisuddhasīle patiṭṭhitena,
atk-abh02a:1139_1: yvāyaṃ dasasu palibodhesu palibodho atthi taṃ upacchinditvā,
atk-abh02a:1139_4: arahattaṃ anāgāmiphalādīsu vā aññataraṃ pattassa sabbantimena paricchedena sāṭṭhakathāya pāḷiyā kataparicayassa
atk-abh02a:1139_6: Visuddhaṃ tathārūpaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ ekavihāre alabhantena tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā uggahetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1139_7: Tattha catubbidhasīlavisodhanañceva palibodho ca palibodhupacchedo ca ācariyassa santikaṃ upasaṅkamanavidhānañca
atk-abh02a:1140_0: Ācariyena pana kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathentena tividhena kathetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1140_2: Tassa ekaṃ dve nisajjavāre sajjhāyaṃ kāretvā kathetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1140_6: Tassa nātipapañcaṃ nātisaṅkhepaṃ katvā nijjaṭaṃ niggaṇṭhikaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1140_8: Sattadhā uggahakosallaṃ dasadhā ca manasikārakosallaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1141_0: Tattha vacasā manasā vaṇṇato saṇṭhānato disato okāsato paricchedatoti evaṃ sattadhā uggahakosallaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1141_2: tenapi manasikārakāle paṭhamaṃ vācāya sajjhāyo kātabbo.
atk-abh02a:1141_3: Ekaccassa hi sajjhāyaṃ karontasseva kammaṭṭhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:1141_4: malayavāsīmahādevattherassa santike uggahitakammaṭṭhānānaṃ dvinnaṃ therānaṃ viya.
atk-abh02a:1141_5: Thero kira tehi kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācito ‘cattāro māse imaṃ evaṃ sajjhāyaṃ karothā’ti dvattisākārapāḷiṃ adāsi. Te,
atk-abh02a:1141_6: kiñcāpi tesaṃ dve tayo nikāyā paguṇā,
atk-abh02a:1141_7: padakkhiṇaggāhitāya pana cattāro māse dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyantāva sotāpannā ahesuṃ.
atk-abh02a:1142_0: Tasmā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathentena ācariyena antevāsiko vattabbo –
atk-abh02a:1142_2: Karontena ca tacapañcakādīni paricchinditvā anulomapaṭilomavasena sajjhāyo kātabbo.
atk-abh02a:1142_3: “Kesā lomā nakhā dantā taco”ti hi vatvā puna paṭilomato “taco dantā nakhā lomā kesā”ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1142_4: Tadanantaraṃ vakkapañcake “maṃsaṃ nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjaṃ vakka”nti vatvā puna paṭilomato “vakkaṃ aṭṭhimiñjaṃ
atk-abh02a:1142_5: aṭṭhi nhāru maṃsaṃ taco dantā nakhā lomā kesā”ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1142_6: Tato papphāsapañcake “hadayaṃ yakanaṃ kilomakaṃ pihakaṃ papphāsa”nti vatvā puna paṭilomato “papphāsaṃ
atk-abh02a:1142_7: pihakaṃ kilomakaṃ yakanaṃ hadayaṃ vakkaṃ aṭṭhimiñjaṃ aṭṭhi nhāru maṃsaṃ taco dantā nakhā lomā kesā”ti
atk-abh02a:1143_0: Tato imaṃ tantiṃ anāruḷhampi paṭisambhidāmagge āgataṃ matthaluṅgaṃ karīsāvasāne tantiṃ āropetvā imasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:1143_1: matthaluṅgapañcake “antaṃ antaguṇaṃ udariyaṃ karīsaṃ matthaluṅga”nti vatvā puna paṭilomato “matthaluṅgaṃ
atk-abh02a:1143_2: karīsaṃ udariyaṃ antaguṇaṃ antaṃ papphāsaṃ pihakaṃ kilomakaṃ yakanaṃ hadayaṃ vakkaṃ aṭṭhimiñjaṃ aṭṭhi
atk-abh02a:1143_3: nhāru maṃsaṃ taco dantā nakhā lomā kesā”ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1144_0: Tato medachakke “pittaṃ semhaṃ pubbo lohitaṃ sedo medo”ti vatvā puna paṭilomato “medo sedo lohitaṃ pubbo
atk-abh02a:1144_1: semhaṃ pittaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ karīsaṃ udariyaṃ antaguṇaṃ antaṃ papphāsaṃ pihakaṃ kilomakaṃ yakanaṃ hadayaṃ
atk-abh02a:1144_2: vakkaṃ aṭṭhimiñjaṃ aṭṭhi nhāru maṃsaṃ taco dantā nakhā lomā kesā”ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1145_0: Tato muttachakke “assu vasā kheḷo siṅghāṇikā lasikā mutta”nti vatvā puna paṭilomato “muttaṃ lasikā siṅghāṇikā
atk-abh02a:1145_1: kheḷo vasā assu medo sedo lohitaṃ pubbo semhaṃ pittaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ karīsaṃ udariyaṃ antaguṇaṃ antaṃ papphāsaṃ
atk-abh02a:1145_2: pihakaṃ kilomakaṃ yakanaṃ hadayaṃ vakkaṃ aṭṭhimiñjaṃ aṭṭhi nhāru maṃsaṃ taco dantā nakhā lomā kesā”ti
atk-abh02a:1145_3: evaṃ kālasatampi kālasahassampi kālasatasahassampi vācāya sajjhāyo kātabbo.
atk-abh02a:1145_4: Vacasā sajjhāyena hi kammaṭṭhānatanti paguṇā hoti;
atk-abh02a:1145_5: na ito cito ca cittaṃ vidhāvati;
atk-abh02a:1145_11: Vacasā sajjhāyo hi manasā sajjhāyassa paccayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:1146_2: ‘Disato’ti imasmiṃ sarīre nābhito uddhaṃ uparimā disā,
atk-abh02a:1146_4: Tasmā “ayaṃ koṭṭhāso imissā nāma disāyā”ti disā vavatthapetabbā.
atk-abh02a:1146_5: ‘Okāsato’ti “ayaṃ koṭṭhāso imasmiṃ nāma okāse patiṭṭhito”ti evaṃ tassa tassa okāso vavatthapetabbo.
atk-abh02a:1146_7: Tattha “ayaṃ koṭṭhāso heṭṭhā ca upari ca tiriyañca iminā nāma paricchinno”ti evaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1146_9: lomāpi na kesā”ti evaṃ amissīkatavasena visabhāgaparicchedo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1147_0: Evaṃ sattadhā uggahakosallaṃ ācikkhantena pana “idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ asukasmiṃ sutte paṭikkūlavasena kathitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1147_10: Tadetaṃ idha samathakammaṭṭhānaṃ avisesato sabbasādhāraṇavasena kathitanti vadantiyevāti.
atk-abh02a:1148_6: tayo ca suttantā”ti evaṃ dasadhā manasikārakosallaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1148_7: Tattha ‘anupubbato’ti idañhi sajjhāyakaraṇato paṭṭhāya anupaṭipāṭiyā manasikātabbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1148_9: Ekantarikāya hi manasikaronto yathā nāma akusalo puriso dvattiṃsapadaṃ nisseṇiṃ ekantarikāya ārohanto kilantakāyo patati,
atk-abh02a:1148_11: evameva bhāvanāsampattivasena adhigantabbassa assādassa anadhigamā kilantacitto patati,
atk-abh02a:1149_1: Atisīghato manasikaroto hi yathā nāma tiyojanaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjitvā okkamanavissajjanaṃ asallakkhetvā
atk-abh02a:1149_2: sīghena javena sattakkhattumpi gamanāgamanaṃ karoto purisassa kiñcāpi addhānaṃ parikkhayaṃ gacchati,
atk-abh02a:1150_1: Atisaṇikato manasikaroto hi yathā nāma tadaheva tiyojanaṃ maggaṃ gantukāmassa purisassa antarāmagge rukkhapabbatagahanādīsu
atk-abh02a:1151_0: ‘Vikkhepapaṭibāhanato’ti kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇe cetaso vikkhepo paṭibāhitabbo.
atk-abh02a:1151_1: Appaṭibāhato hi yathā nāma ekapadikaṃ papātamaggaṃ paṭipannassa purisassa akkamanapadaṃ asallakkhetvā ito cito ca vilokayato padavāro virajjhati,
atk-abh02a:1151_3: evameva bahiddhā vikkhepe sati kammaṭṭhānaṃ parihāyati,
atk-abh02a:1152_0: ‘Paṇṇattisamatikkamanato’ti yā ayaṃ “kesā lomā”ti ādikā paṇṇatti taṃ atikkamitvā paṭikkūlanti cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1152_1: Yathā hi udakadullabhakāle manussā araññe udapānaṃ disvā tattha tālapaṇṇādikaṃ kiñcideva saññāṇaṃ bandhitvā
atk-abh02a:1152_2: tena saññāṇena āgantvā nhāyanti ceva pivanti ca,
atk-abh02a:1152_3: yadā pana tesaṃ abhiṇhasañcārena āgatāgatapadaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:1152_5: icchiticchitakkhaṇe gantvā nhāyanti ceva pivanti ca;
atk-abh02a:1152_6: evameva pubbabhāge ‘kesā lomā’ti paṇṇattivasena manasikaroto paṭikkūlabhāvo pākaṭo hoti.
atk-abh02a:1152_7: Atha ‘kesā lomā’ti paṇṇattiṃ samatikkamitvā paṭikkūlabhāveyeva cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1153_2: Ādikammikassa hi ‘kesā’ti manasikaroto manasikāro gantvā ‘mutta’nti imaṃ pariyosānakoṭṭhāsameva āhacca tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh02a:1153_3: ‘Mutta’nti ca manasikaroto manasikāro gantvā ‘kesā’ti imaṃ ādikoṭṭhāsameva āhacca tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh02a:1153_6: Tena ye ye upaṭṭhahanti tesu tesu tāva kammaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1153_7: yāva dvīsu upaṭṭhitesu tesampi eko suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhahati.
atk-abh02a:1153_8: Evaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ pana tameva punappunaṃ manasikarontena appanā uppādetabbā.
atk-abh02a:1154_1: yathā hi dvattiṃsatālake tālavane vasantaṃ makkaṭaṃ gahetukāmo luddo ādimhi ṭhitatālassa paṇṇaṃ sarena vijjhitvā ukkuṭṭhiṃ kareyya;
atk-abh02a:1154_2: atha so makkaṭo paṭipāṭiyā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ tāle patitvā pariyantatālameva gaccheyya;
atk-abh02a:1154_3: tatthapi gantvā luddena tatheva kate puna teneva nayena āditālaṃ āgaccheyya;
atk-abh02a:1154_4: so evaṃ punappunaṃ paṭipāṭiyā gacchanto ukkuṭṭhukkuṭṭhiṭṭhāneyeva uṭṭhahitvā puna anukkamena ekasmiṃ
atk-abh02a:1154_5: tāle nipatitvā tassa vemajjhe makuḷatālapaṇṇasūciṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā vijjhiyamānopi na uṭṭhaheyya,
atk-abh02a:1155_5: makkaṭassa dvattiṃsatālake tālavane nivāso viya yogino cittassa dvattiṃsakoṭṭhāsake kāye ārammaṇavasena anusaṃcaraṇaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1155_6: luddena ādimhi ṭhitatālassa paṇṇaṃ sarena vijjhitvā ukkuṭṭhiyā katāya makkaṭassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ tāle patitvā
atk-abh02a:1155_7: pariyantatālagamanaṃ viya yogino ‘kesā’ti manasikāre āraddhe paṭipāṭiyā gantvā pariyosānakoṭṭhāse eva
atk-abh02a:1155_10: punappunaṃ paṭipāṭiyā gacchamānassa makkaṭassa ukkuṭṭhukkuṭṭhiṭṭhāne uṭṭhānaṃ viya punappunaṃ manasikaroto
atk-abh02a:1155_11: kesuci kesuci upaṭṭhitesu anupaṭṭhahante vissajjetvā upaṭṭhitesu parikammakaraṇaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1155_12: anukkamena ekasmiṃ tāle nipatitvā tassa vemajjhe makuḷatālapaṇṇasūciṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā vijjhiyamānassāpi
atk-abh02a:1155_13: anuṭṭhānaṃ viya avasāne dvīsu upaṭṭhitesu yo suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhāti tameva punappunaṃ manasikaritvā appanāya
atk-abh02a:1156_1: yathā nāma piṇḍapātiko bhikkhu dvattiṃsakulaṃ gāmaṃ upanissāya vasanto paṭhamagehe eva dve bhikkhā labhitvā parato ekaṃ vissajjeyya;
atk-abh02a:1156_2: punadivase tisso labhitvā parato dve vissajjeyya;
atk-abh02a:1156_3: tatiyadivase ādimhiyeva pattapūraṃ labhitvā āsanasālaṃ gantvā paribhuñjeyya,
atk-abh02a:1156_7: tassa taṃ gāmaṃ upanissāya vāso viya yogino dvattiṃsākāre parikammakaraṇaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1156_8: paṭhamagehe dve bhikkhā labhitvā parato ekissā vissajjanaṃ viya dutiyadivase tisso labhitvā parato dvinnaṃ
atk-abh02a:1156_9: vissajjanaṃ viya ca manasikaroto manasikaroto anupaṭṭhahante anupaṭṭhahante vissajjetvā upaṭṭhitesu upaṭṭhitesu
atk-abh02a:1156_11: tatiyadivase ādimhiyeva pattapūraṃ labhitvā āsanasālāyaṃ nisīditvā paribhogo viya dvīsu yo suṭṭhutaraṃ
atk-abh02a:1156_12: upaṭṭhahati tameva punappunaṃ manasikaritvā appanāya uppādanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1157_1: Kesādīsu ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse appanā hotīti veditabbāti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-abh02a:1158_2: bojjhaṅgakosallanti ime tayo suttantā vīriyasamādhiyojanatthaṃ veditabbāti ayamettha adhippāyo. Tattha –
atk-abh02a:1159_2: bhikkhunā tīṇi nimittāni kālena kālaṃ manasikātabbāni…kālena kālaṃ samādhinimittaṃ manasikātabbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1159_7: ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ kosajjāya saṃvatteyya. Sace,
atk-abh02a:1159_10: ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ uddhaccāya saṃvatteyya. Sace,
atk-abh02a:1159_13: ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na sammāsamādhiyeyya āsavānaṃ khayāya.
atk-abh02a:1159_19: taṃ hoti cittaṃ mudu ca kammaniyañca pabhassarañca,
atk-abh02a:1160_2: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā ukkaṃ bandhati,
atk-abh02a:1160_4: ukkāmukhaṃ ālimpetvā saṇḍāsena jātarūpaṃ gahetvā ukkāmukhe pakkhipeyya,
atk-abh02a:1160_9: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṃ jātarūpaṃ ekantaṃ abhidhameyya,
atk-abh02a:1160_12: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṃ jātarūpaṃ ekantaṃ udakena paripphoseyya,
atk-abh02a:1160_15: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṃ jātarūpaṃ ekantaṃ ajjhupekkheyya,
atk-abh02a:1160_16: ṭhānaṃ taṃ jātarūpaṃ na sammā paripākaṃ gaccheyya.
atk-abh02a:1161_2: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṃ jātarūpaṃ kālena kālaṃ abhidhamati,
atk-abh02a:1161_5: taṃ hoti jātarūpaṃ mudu ca kammaniyañca pabhassarañca,
atk-abh02a:1161_9: yadi paṭṭikāya yadi kuṇḍalāya yadi gīveyyakāya yadi suvaṇṇamālāya,
atk-abh02a:1162_4: yassa yassa ca abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassa dhammassa cittaṃ abhininnāmeti abhiññā sacchikiriyāya,
atk-abh02a:1162_5: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane”ti idaṃ suttaṃ adhicittanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1163_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo anuttaraṃ sītibhāvaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
atk-abh02a:1163_5: bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggahetabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggaṇhāti,
atk-abh02a:1163_6: yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paggahetabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paggaṇhāti,
atk-abh02a:1163_7: yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃsitabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃseti,
atk-abh02a:1163_8: yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati,
atk-abh02a:1163_12: chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo anuttaraṃ sītibhāvaṃ sacchikātu”nti idaṃ suttaṃ sītibhāvoti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1164_3: akālo tasmiṃ samaye passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāyā”ti saṃyuttamahāvagge bojjhaṅgasaṃyutte āgatameva.
atk-abh02a:1165_0: Iti idaṃ sattavidhaṃ uggahakosallaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā imañca dasavidhaṃ manasikārakosallaṃ suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā
atk-abh02a:1165_1: tena yoginā ubhayakosallavasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ sādhukaṃ uggahetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1165_2: Sace panassa ācariyena saddhiṃ ekavihāreyeva phāsu hoti,
atk-abh02a:1165_3: evaṃ vitthārena akathāpetvā kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjantena visesaṃ labhitvā uparūpari kathāpetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1165_4: Aññattha vasitukāmena yathāvuttena vidhinā vitthārato kathāpetvā punappunaṃ parivattetvā sabbaṃ gaṇṭhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1165_5: chinditvā kammaṭṭhānabhāvanāya ananurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ pahāya mahāvāsatādiaṭṭhārasadosavajjite anurūpe vihāre
atk-abh02a:1165_6: viharantena khuddakapalibodhupacchedaṃ katvā yo tāva rāgacarito hoti,
atk-abh02a:1166_0: Karontena pana kesesu tāva nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh02a:1166_1: Ekaṃ vā dve vā kese luñcitvā hatthatale ṭhapetvā vaṇṇo tāva vavatthapetabbo.
atk-abh02a:1166_3: udakapatte vā yāgupatte vā oloketumpi vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-abh02a:1166_8: evaṃ sakalepi tacapañcake disvāva nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1166_9: Evaṃ nimittaṃ gahetvā sabbakoṭṭhāsesu vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena vavatthapetvā vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhaāsayokāsavasena
atk-abh02a:1167_8: Paricchedato kesā sīsaveṭhanacamme vīhaggamattaṃ pavisitvā patiṭṭhitena heṭṭhā attano mūlatalena,
atk-abh02a:1167_11: Dve kesā ekato natthīti ayaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo.
atk-abh02a:1168_1: lomā na kesā’ti evaṃ avasesehi ekatiṃsakoṭṭhāsehi amissīkatā kesā nāma pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāsoti ayaṃ visabhāgaparicchedo.
atk-abh02a:1169_0: Idaṃ pana tesaṃ vaṇṇādivasena pañcadhā paṭikkūlato vavatthāpanaṃ –
atk-abh02a:1169_3: Manuññepi hi yāgupatte vā bhattapatte vā kesavaṇṇaṃ kiñci disvā ‘kesamissakamidaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1169_6: Rattiṃ bhuñjantāpi kesasaṇṭhānaṃ akkavākaṃ vā makacivākaṃ vā chupitvāpi tatheva jigucchanti.
atk-abh02a:1170_4: Yathā hi daharassa kumārassa vaccaṃ vaṇṇato haḷiddivaṇṇaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1170_8: dāṭhāpissa sumanamakuḷasadisāti ubhayampi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato siyā appaṭikkūlaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1171_0: Yathā pana asuciṭṭhāne gāmanissandena jātāni sūpeyyapaṇṇāni nāgarikamanussānaṃ jegucchāni honti aparibhogāni,
atk-abh02a:1171_1: evaṃ kesāpi pubbalohitamuttakarīsapittasemhādinissandena jātattā atijegucchāti idaṃ nesaṃ ‘āsayato’ pāṭikulyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1171_2: Ime ca kesā nāma gūtharāsimhi uṭṭhitakaṇṇikaṃ viya ekattiṃsakoṭṭhāsarāsimhi jātā.
atk-abh02a:1171_4: parikhādīsu jātakamalakuvalayādipupphaṃ viya ca asuciṭṭhāne jātattā paramajegucchāti idaṃ tesaṃ ‘okāsato’ pāṭikkūlyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1172_1: evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsānaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhāsayokāsavasena pañcadhā paṭikkūlatā vavatthapetabbā.
atk-abh02a:1172_2: Vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena pana sabbepi visuṃ visuṃ vavatthapetabbā.
atk-abh02a:1173_0: Tattha lomā tāva pakativaṇṇato na kesā viya asambhinnakāḷakā,
atk-abh02a:1173_4: okāsato ṭhapetvā kesānaṃ patiṭṭhitokāsañca hatthapādatalāni ca yebhuyyena avasesasarīraveṭhanacamme jātā;
atk-abh02a:1173_5: paricchedato sarīraveṭhanacamme likkhāmattaṃ pavisitvā patiṭṭhitena heṭṭhā attano mūlatalena,
atk-abh02a:1175_3: Tesañhi heṭṭhimāya tāva dantapāḷiyā majjhe cattāro dantā mattikāpiṇḍe paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitaalābubījasaṇṭhānā.
atk-abh02a:1175_4: Tesaṃ ubhosu passesu ekeko ekamūlako ekakoṭiko mallikamakuḷasaṇṭhāno.
atk-abh02a:1175_11: Paricchedato heṭṭhā hanukaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitena attano mūlatalena,
atk-abh02a:1176_4: So cassa setabhāvo aggijālābhighātapaharaṇapahārādīhi viddhaṃsitāya chaviyā pākaṭo hoti.
atk-abh02a:1178_0: Tacapariggaṇhakena ca yogāvacarena uttaroṭṭhato paṭṭhāya upari mukhaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesetvā paṭhamaṃ tāva mukhaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitacammaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1178_2: Tato thavikāya pakkhittapattassa ca thavikāya ca antarena hatthamiva sīsaṭṭhikassa ca sīsacammassa ca
atk-abh02a:1178_3: antarena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā aṭṭhikena saddhiṃ cammassa ekābaddhabhāvaṃ viyojentena sīsacammaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1178_8: Taṃ taṃ vavatthapetvā anulomena ca paṭilomena ca dakkhiṇapādacammaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1178_11: Atha gīvācammānantaraṃ heṭṭhimahanucammaṃ vavatthapetvā adharoṭṭhapariyosānaṃ pāpetvā niṭṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1178_12: Evaṃ oḷārikoḷārikaṃ pariggaṇhantassa sukhumampi pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1180_9: Evaṃ oḷārikoḷārikaṃ maṃsaṃ pariggaṇhantassa sukhumampi pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1180_11: Okāsato sādhikāni tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni anulimpetvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1181_3: Etesu hi gīvāya uparibhāgato paṭṭhāya pañca mahānhārū sarīraṃ vinaddhamānā hadayassa purimapassena otiṇṇā,
atk-abh02a:1181_13: Evaṃ sarīradhārakā nāma saṭṭhi mahānhārū kāyaṃ vinaddhamānā otiṇṇā,
atk-abh02a:1182_0: Aññe pana taṃ taṃ padesaṃ ajjhottharitvā ṭhitā tato sukhumatarā suttarajjukasaṇṭhānā.
atk-abh02a:1182_10: Paricchedato heṭṭhā tiṇṇaṃ aṭṭhisatānaṃ upari patiṭṭhitatalehi,
atk-abh02a:1183_0: Aṭṭhīti ṭhapetvā dvattiṃsa dantaṭṭhīni avasesāni catusaṭṭhi hatthaṭṭhīni,
atk-abh02a:1185_6: Koṭiyaṃ ṭhitaānisadaṭṭhi adhomukhaṃ katvā gahitasappaphaṇasaṇṭhānaṃ sattasu ṭhānesu chiddāvachiddaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1185_9: Tesaṃ antarantarā kakacadantasadisā dve tayo kaṇṭakā honti.
atk-abh02a:1186_11: Satta gīvaṭṭhīni daṇḍena vijjhitvā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitavaṃsakaḷīracakkalikasaṇṭhānāni.
atk-abh02a:1189_0: Aṭṭhimiñjanti tesaṃ tesaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantaragataṃ miñjaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1189_2: Saṇṭhānato mahantamahantānaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantaragataṃ veḷunāḷiyaṃ pakkhittaseditamahāvettaggasaṇṭhānaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1190_5: Okāsato galavāṭakā nikkhantena ekamūlena thokaṃ gantvā dvidhā bhinnena thūlanhārunā vinibaddhaṃ hutvā hadayamaṃsaṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1191_9: yaṃ nissāya manodhātu manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti.
atk-abh02a:1191_15: paññācaritassa acchaṃ vippasannaṃ anāvilaṃ paṇḍaraṃ parisuddhaṃ niddhotajātimaṇi viya jutimantaṃ khāyati.
atk-abh02a:1191_17: Okāsato sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ majjhe patiṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1192_6: paññavantānaṃ dve vā tīṇi vā khuddakāni.
atk-abh02a:1192_8: Okāsato dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ abbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1193_6: Okāsato paṭicchannakilomakaṃ hadayañca vakkañca paṭicchādetvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1193_7: Apaṭicchannakilomakaṃ sakalasarīre cammassa heṭṭhato maṃsaṃ pariyonaddhitvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1194_4: Okāsato hadayassa vāmapasse udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1194_5: yasmiṃ paharaṇappahārena bahi nikkhante sattānaṃ jīvitakkhayo hoti.
atk-abh02a:1195_3: Abbhantare asitapītānaṃ abhāve uggatena kammajatejusmanā abbhāhatattā saṅkhāditapalālapiṇḍamiva nirasaṃ nirojaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1195_5: Okāsato sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānamantare hadayañca yakanañca paṭicchādetvā olambantaṃ ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1196_1: itthiyā aṭṭhavīsatihatthā ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesu obhaggā antavaṭṭi.
atk-abh02a:1196_5: Okāsato upari galavāṭake heṭṭhā ca karīsamagge vinibandhattā galavāṭakakarīsamaggapariyante sarīrabbhantare ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1197_5: yantaphalakāni antabhoge ekato agaḷante ābandhitvā pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakassa antarā taṃ sibbetvā
atk-abh02a:1197_6: ṭhitarajjukā viya ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesu antabhogānaṃ antarā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1198_5: Udaraṃ nāma ubhato nippīḷiyamānassa allasāṭakassa majjhe sañjātaphoṭakasadisaṃ antapaṭalaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1198_13: paṭatantasuttakā iccevamādidvattiṃsakulappabhedā kimayo ākulabyākulā saṇḍasaṇḍacārino hutvā nivasanti;
atk-abh02a:1198_14: ye pānabhojanādimhi avijjamāne ullaṅghitvā viravantā hadayamaṃsaṃ abhihananti,
atk-abh02a:1198_15: pānabhojanādiajjhoharaṇavelāya ca uddhaṃmukhā hutvā paṭhamajjhohaṭe dve tayo ālope turitaturitā vilumpanti;
atk-abh02a:1199_0: Yattha seyyathāpi nāma caṇḍālagāmadvāre candanikāya nidāghasamaye thūlaphusitake deve vassante udakena
atk-abh02a:1199_2: dvīhatīhaccayena sañjātakimikulaṃ sūriyātapavegasantāpakuthitaṃ upari pheṇapubbulake muñcantaṃ abhinīlavaṇṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1199_3: paramaduggandhajegucchaṃ neva upagantuṃ na daṭṭhuṃ araharūpataṃ āpajjitvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh02a:1199_7: kimikulākulaṃ uparūpari pheṇapubbulakāni muñcantaṃ paramakasambuduggandhajegucchabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā tiṭṭhati;
atk-abh02a:1199_10: yattha ca patitaṃ pānabhojanādi pañcadhā vibhāgaṃ gacchati –
atk-abh02a:1199_16: Paricchedato udarapaṭalena ceva udariyabhāgena ca paricchinnaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1200_5: Pakkāsayo nāma heṭṭhā nābhipiṭṭhikaṇṭakamūlānamantare antāvasāne ubbedhena aṭṭhaṅgulamatto veḷunāḷikasadiso,
atk-abh02a:1200_6: yattha seyyathāpi nāma uparūpari bhūmibhāge patitaṃ vassodakaṃ ogaḷitvā heṭṭhā bhūmibhāgaṃ pūretvā tiṭṭhati;
atk-abh02a:1200_7: evameva yaṃ kiñci āmāsaye patitaṃ pānabhojanādikaṃ udaragginā pheṇuddehakaṃ pakkaṃ pakkaṃ nisadāya pisitamiva
atk-abh02a:1200_8: saṇhabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā antabilena ogaḷitvā ogaḷitvā madditvā veḷupabbe pakkhipamānapaṇḍumattikā viya sannicitaṃ
atk-abh02a:1200_10: Paricchedato pakkāsayapaṭalena ceva karīsabhāgena ca paricchinnaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1201_5: Okāsato sīsakaṭāhabbhantare cattāro sibbinimagge nissāya samodhānetvā ṭhapitā cattāro piṭṭhapiṇḍā viya samohitaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh02a:1201_6: Paricchedato sīsakaṭāhassa abbhantaratalehi ceva matthaluṅgabhāgena ca paricchinnaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1202_7: Okāsato abaddhapittaṃ ṭhapetvā kesalomadantanakhānaṃ maṃsavinimuttaṭṭhānañceva thaddhasukkhacammañca
atk-abh02a:1202_9: yamhi kupite akkhīni pītakāni honti bhamanti,
atk-abh02a:1202_11: Baddhapittaṃ hadayapapphāsānamantare yakanamaṃsaṃ nissāya patiṭṭhite mahākosātakīkosakasadise pittakosake ṭhitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1203_5: yaṃ pānabhojanādīni ajjhoharaṇakāle seyyathāpi nāma udake sevālapaṇakaṃ kaṭṭhe vā kapāle vā patante chijjitvā
atk-abh02a:1203_7: evameva pānabhojanādimhi nipatante chijjitvā dvidhā hutvā puna ajjhottharitvā tiṭṭhati;
atk-abh02a:1203_8: yamhi ca mandībhūte pakkagaṇḍo viya pūtikukkuṭaṇḍamiva ca udaraṃ paramajegucchaṃ kuṇapagandhaṃ hoti;
atk-abh02a:1203_9: tato uggatena ca gandhena uddekopi mukhampi duggandhaṃ pūtikuṇapasadisaṃ hoti;
atk-abh02a:1203_12: yañca vaḍḍhitvā bahalattamāpannaṃ pidhānaphalakamiva vaccakuṭiyā udarapaṭalassa abbhantareyeva kuṇapagandhaṃ sannirujjhitvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh02a:1204_5: Okāsato pana pubbassa okāso nāma nibaddho natthi yattha so sannicito tiṭṭheyya;
atk-abh02a:1204_6: yatra yatra pana khāṇukaṇṭakappaharaṇaggijālādīhi abhihate sarīrappadese lohitaṃ saṇṭhahitvā paccati,
atk-abh02a:1205_10: sannicitalohitaṃ yakanaṭṭhānassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ pūretvā ekapattapūramattaṃ hadayavakkapapphāsānaṃ upari
atk-abh02a:1205_11: thokaṃ thokaṃ paggharantaṃ vakkahadayayakanapapphāse temayamānaṃ ṭhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1205_12: Tasmiñhi vakkahadayādīni atemente sattā pipāsitā honti.
atk-abh02a:1206_5: yattha so lohitaṃ viya sadā tiṭṭheyya;
atk-abh02a:1206_6: yadā pana aggisantāpasūriyasantāpautuvikārādīhi sarīraṃ santappati tadā udakato abbuḷhamattavisamacchinnabhisamūḷālakumudanāḷakalāpo
atk-abh02a:1206_8: Tasmā tassa saṇṭhānampi kesalomakūpavivarānaṃyeva vasena veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1206_9: Sedapariggaṇhakena ca yoginā kesalomakūpavivare pūretvā ṭhitavaseneva sedo manasikātabbo.
atk-abh02a:1207_2: Saṇṭhānato thūlasarīrassa tāva cammamaṃsantare ṭhapitahaliddivaṇṇadukūlapilotikasaṇṭhāno hoti,
atk-abh02a:1207_3: kisasarīrassa jaṅghamaṃsaṃ ūrumaṃsaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭakanissitaṃ piṭṭhamaṃsaṃ udaravaṭṭimaṃsanti etāni nissāya
atk-abh02a:1207_8: yaṃ sinehasaṅkhaṃ gatampi paramajegucchattā neva muddhani telatthāya,
atk-abh02a:1208_5: Na cetaṃ pittakosake pittamiva akkhikūpakesu sadā sannicitaṃ tiṭṭhati;
atk-abh02a:1208_6: yadā pana sattā somanassajātā mahāhasitaṃ hasanti,
atk-abh02a:1208_7: domanassajātā rodanti paridevanti tathārūpaṃ visabhāgāhāraṃ āharanti,
atk-abh02a:1208_8: yadā ca nesaṃ akkhīni dhūmarajapaṃsukādīhi abhihaññanti,
atk-abh02a:1208_9: tadā etehi somanassadomanassavisabhāgāhārautūhi samuṭṭhahitvā akkhikūpake pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā.
atk-abh02a:1208_10: Assupariggaṇhakena pana yoginā akkhikūpake pūretvā ṭhitavaseneva pariggaṇhitabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1209_6: Na cesā etesu okāsesu sadā vilīnāva hutvā tiṭṭhati;
atk-abh02a:1209_7: yadā pana aggisantāpasūriyasantāpautuvisabhāgadhātuvisabhāgehi te padesā usmā jātā honti,
atk-abh02a:1209_8: tadā tattha nhānakāle pasannaudakūpari sinehabinduvisaṭo viya ito cito ca saṃsarati.
atk-abh02a:1210_5: Okāsato ubhohi kapolapassehi oruyha jivhāya ṭhito.
atk-abh02a:1210_6: Na cesa ettha sadā sannicito hutvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh02a:1210_7: Yadā pana sattā tathārūpaṃ āhāraṃ passanti vā saranti vā uṇhatittakaṭukaloṇambilānaṃ vā kiñci mukhe ṭhapenti,
atk-abh02a:1210_10: tadā kheḷo uppajjitvā ubhohi kapolapassehi oruyha jivhāya saṇṭhāti.
atk-abh02a:1210_13: mukhe pakkhittañca puthukaṃ vā taṇḍulaṃ vā aññaṃ vā kiñci khādanīyaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1211_5: Na cesā ettha sadā sannicitā hutvā tiṭṭhati;
atk-abh02a:1211_6: atha kho yathā nāma puriso paduminīpattena dadhiṃ bandhitvā heṭṭhā kaṇṭakena vijjheyya,
atk-abh02a:1211_7: atha tena chiddena dadhimatthu gaḷitvā bahi pateyya,
atk-abh02a:1211_8: evameva yadā sattā rodanti vā visabhāgāhārautuvasena vā sañjātadhātukkhobhā honti,
atk-abh02a:1211_9: tadā antosīsato pūtisemhabhāvaṃ āpannaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ gaḷitvā tālumatthakavivarena otaritvā nāsāpuṭe pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā.
atk-abh02a:1211_10: Siṅghāṇikā pariggaṇhakena pana yoginā nāsāpuṭe pūretvā ṭhitavaseneva pariggaṇhitabbā.
atk-abh02a:1212_4: Okāsato aṭṭhisandhīnaṃ abbhañjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā asītisatasandhīnaṃ abbhantare ṭhitā.
atk-abh02a:1212_6: tassa uṭṭhahantassa nisīdantassa abhikkamantassa paṭikkamantassa sammiñjantassa pasārentassa aṭṭhikāni kaṭakaṭāyanti,
atk-abh02a:1212_10: Yassa pana bahukā hoti tassa uṭṭhānanisajjādīsu na aṭṭhīni kaṭakaṭāyanti,
atk-abh02a:1212_11: dīghampi addhānaṃ gatassa na vāyodhātu kuppati,
atk-abh02a:1213_5: yattha seyyathāpi nāma candanikāya pakkhitte amukhe ravaṇaghaṭe candanikaraso pavisati,
atk-abh02a:1213_10: yamhi ca muttassa bharite ‘passāvaṃ karomā’ti sattānaṃ āyūhanaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1213_11: Paricchedato vatthiabbhantarena ceva muttabhāgena ca paricchinnaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1214_0: Evañhi kesādike koṭṭhāse vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena vavatthapetvā anupubbato nātisīghato nātisaṇikatotiādinā
atk-abh02a:1214_1: nayena vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhāsayokāsavasena pañcadhā ‘paṭikkūlā paṭikkūlā’ti manasikaroto paṇṇattisamatikkamavasena,
atk-abh02a:1214_2: seyyathāpi cakkhumato purisassa dvattiṃsavaṇṇānaṃ kusumānaṃ ekasuttagaṇṭhitaṃ mālaṃ olokentassa sabbapupphāni apubbāpariyamiva pākaṭāni honti,
atk-abh02a:1214_3: evameva “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā”ti imaṃ kāyaṃ olokentassa sabbe te dhammā apubbāpariyamiva pākaṭā honti.
atk-abh02a:1214_4: Tena vuttaṃ manasikārakosallakathāyaṃ “ādikammikassa hi ‘kesā’ti manasikaroto manasikāro gantvā ‘mutta’nti
atk-abh02a:1215_1: athassa evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsesu pākaṭībhūtesu āhiṇḍantā manussatiracchānādayo sattākāraṃ vijahitvā koṭṭhāsarāsivaseneva upaṭṭhahanti;
atk-abh02a:1215_2: tehi ca ajjhohariyamānaṃ pānabhojanādi koṭṭhāsarāsimhi pakkhipiyamānamiva upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a:1215_3: Athassa anupubbamuñcanādivasena ‘paṭikūlā paṭikūlā’ti punappunaṃ manasikaroto anukkamena appanā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1216_2: Taṃ punappunaṃ āvajjentassa manasikarontassa takkāhataṃ vitakkāhataṃ karontassa cattāro khandhā paṭikūlārammaṇā honti,
atk-abh02a:1216_4: Pubbabhāge parikammaupacāracittāni savitakkasavicārāni sappītikāni somanassasahagatāni paṭikūlanimittārammaṇāni;
atk-abh02a:1216_7: Paṭikkūlepi ca etasmiṃ ārammaṇe ānisaṃsadassāvitāya somanassaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:1217_1: idañhi kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetukāmena kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetvā sajjhāyakāle eva kesādīnaṃ vaṇṇanimittasaṇṭhānanimittadisānimittaokāsanimittaparicchedanimittāni
atk-abh02a:1217_2: vācāya pothetvā pothetvā ekekakoṭṭhāse ‘ayaṃ etaṃsarikkhako’ti tividhena sajjhāyo kātabbo. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh02a:1217_3: Tacapañcake tāva heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva anulomato pañcāhaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1217_6: Tato ācariyassa santikaṃ gantvā vakkapañcakaṃ uggaṇhitvā tatheva addhamāsaṃ sajjhāyo kātabbo.
atk-abh02a:1217_7: Tato te dasapi koṭṭhāse ekato katvā addhamāsaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1217_13: Tato te chabbīsatipi koṭṭhāse ekato katvā addhamāsaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1217_15: Tato sabbepi dvattiṃsa koṭṭhāse ekato katvā addhamāsanti evaṃ cha māse sajjhāyo kātabbo.
atk-abh02a:1218_1: upanissayasampannassa sappaññassa bhikkhuno kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhantasseva koṭṭhāsā upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-abh02a:1218_4: Yattakā koṭṭhāsā upaṭṭhahanti tattake gahetvā sajjhāyo kātabbo.
atk-abh02a:1218_5: Evaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathentena pana neva paññavato na mandapaññassa vasena kathetabbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1218_7: Majjhimapaññassa hi vasena ācariyā chahi māsehi paricchinditvā tantiṃ ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-abh02a:1218_8: Yassa pana ettāvatāpi koṭṭhāsā pākaṭā na honti,
atk-abh02a:1218_9: tena tato parampi sajjhāyo kātabbo eva;
atk-abh02a:1219_3: Ācariyenāpi ‘vaṇṇavasena sajjhāyaṃ karohī’ti niyametvā na kathetabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1219_6: Sace hi ācariyena ‘vaṇṇavasena sajjhāyaṃ karohī’ti vutte imassa bhikkhuno tathā karontassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaṇṇato na upaṭṭhāti,
atk-abh02a:1219_8: athesa ‘na idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ vilakkhaṇa’nti saññī hoti,
atk-abh02a:1219_10: ‘Paṭikūlavasena sajjhāyaṃ karohī’ti vuttepi sace tassa tathā karontassa paṭikkūlato na upaṭṭhāti,
atk-abh02a:1219_14: ‘Dhātuvasena taṃ sajjhāyaṃ karohī’ti vuttepi sace tassa tathā karontassa dhātuto na upaṭṭhāti,
atk-abh02a:1220_3: Sace panassa evaṃ koṭṭhāsavasena sajjhāyaṃ karontassa vaṇṇato upaṭṭhāti,
atk-abh02a:1220_10: pubbe tayā vaṇṇakasiṇe parikammaṃ katapubbaṃ bhavissati.
atk-abh02a:1221_0: So evaṃ karonto ajjhattaṃ nīlakaṃ pītakaṃ lohitakaṃ odātakanti cattāri vaṇṇakasiṇāni labhati. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh02a:1221_1: Tassa hi kesalomapittesu ceva akkhīnañca kāḷakaṭṭhāne vaṇṇaṃ ‘nīlaṃ nīla’nti manasikarontassa catukkapañcakajjhānāni uppajjanti;
atk-abh02a:1221_2: jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh02a:1221_3: Medasmiṃ pana akkhīnañca pītakaṭṭhāne vaṇṇaṃ ‘pītakaṃ pītaka’nti manasikarontassa catukkapañcakajjhānāni uppajjanti;
atk-abh02a:1221_4: jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh02a:1221_5: Maṃsalohitesu pana akkhīnañca rattaṭṭhāne vaṇṇaṃ ‘lohitakaṃ lohitaka’nti manasikarontassa catukkapañcakajjhānāni uppajjanti;
atk-abh02a:1221_6: jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh02a:1221_7: Nakhadantacammaaṭṭhīsu pana akkhīnañca paṇḍaraṭṭhāne vaṇṇaṃ ‘odātaṃ odāta’nti manasikarontassa catukkapañcakajjhānāni uppajjanti,
atk-abh02a:1221_8: jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh02a:1221_9: Idaṃ vaṇṇavasena abhiniviṭṭhassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā nigamanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1222_0: Aparassa koṭṭhāsavasena sajjhāyaṃ karontassa paṭikūlato upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a:1222_5: pubbe tayā paṭikūlamanasikāre yogo kato bhavissati.
atk-abh02a:1222_9: Tassa kesā nāma ‘ajaññā duggandhā jegucchā paṭikūlā’ti evaṃ paṭikūlavasena sajjhāyaṃ karontassa paṭikūlārammaṇe paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattati.
atk-abh02a:1222_10: So jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh02a:1222_11: Idaṃ paṭikūlavasena abhiniviṭṭhassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā nigamanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1223_0: Aparassa koṭṭhāsavasena sajjhāyaṃ karontassa dhātuto upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a:1223_2: Kesā tāva vammikamatthake jātakunthatiṇakāni viya hutvā upaṭṭhahanti.
atk-abh02a:1223_10: Aṭṭhimiñjaṃ mahāveḷumhi pakkhittaseditavettaggaṃ viya. Vakkaṃ, hadayaṃ, yakanaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1223_12: papphāsanti ime cha koṭṭhāsā sūnakāragharaṃ viya hutvā upaṭṭhahanti.
atk-abh02a:1223_13: Dvattiṃsahatthaṃ antaṃ lohitadoṇiyaṃ saṃvellitvā ṭhapitagharasappo viya.
atk-abh02a:1223_17: Matthaluṅgaṃ omadditvā ṭhapitā cattāro taṇḍulapiṭṭhapiṇḍā viya.
atk-abh02a:1223_18: Dvādasavidhā āpodhātu paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitesu dvādasasu udakasarāvakesu pūritaudakaṃ viya hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a:1224_4: pubbe tayā dhātumanasikāre yogo kato bhavissati.
atk-abh02a:1225_1: idha bhikkhu ‘kesā sīsaṃ pariyonaddhitvā ṭhitacamme jātā.
atk-abh02a:1225_2: Te na jānanti ‘mayaṃ sīsaṃ pariyonaddhitvā ṭhitacamme jātā’ti;
atk-abh02a:1225_3: sīsaṃ pariyonaddhitvā ṭhitacammampi na jānāti ‘kesā mayi jātā’ti;
atk-abh02a:1225_4: acetanā ete abyākatā suññā thaddhā patthinnā pathavīdhātu esā’ti manasikaroti.
atk-abh02a:1225_6: Te na jānanti ‘mayaṃ sarīraṃ pariyonahanacamme jātā’ti.
atk-abh02a:1225_7: Sarīraṃ pariyonahanacammampi na jānāti ‘lomā mayi jātā’ti etepi acetanā.
atk-abh02a:1225_9: Te na jānanti ‘mayaṃ aṅgulīnaṃ aggesu jātā’ti.
atk-abh02a:1225_10: Aṅgulīnaṃ aggānipi na jānanti ‘nakhā amhesu jātā’ti.
atk-abh02a:1225_22: Nhāru na jānāti ‘ahaṃ aṭṭhipuñjaṃ ābandhitvā ṭhita’nti.
atk-abh02a:1226_3: Piṭṭhikaṇṭaṭṭhikopi kaṭiṭṭhikaṃ ūruṭṭhikaṃ jaṅghaṭṭhikaṃ gopphakaṭṭhikaṃ na jānāti ‘ahaṃ paṇhikaṭṭhike patiṭṭhita’nti.
atk-abh02a:1226_4: Paṇhikaṭṭhikampi na jānāti ‘ahaṃ gopphakaṭṭhikaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti…pe…
atk-abh02a:1226_5: gīvaṭṭhikaṃ na jānāti ‘ahaṃ sīsaṭṭhikaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhita’nti.
atk-abh02a:1231_3: matthaluṅgaṃ acetanaṃ abyākataṃ suññaṃ thaddhaṃ patthinnaṃ pathavīdhātū’ti manasikaroti.
atk-abh02a:1231_5: muttaṃ acetanaṃ abyākataṃ suññaṃ yūsagataṃ āpodhātū’ti manasikaroti.
atk-abh02a:1232_0: Ime dve mahābhūte pariggaṇhantassa udare ussadā tejodhātu pākaṭā hoti,
atk-abh02a:1232_2: Ime cattāro mahābhūte pariggaṇhantassa upādārūpaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1232_9: Athassa evaṃ “cattāri mahābhūtāni tevīsati upādārūpāni rūpakkhandho”ti rūpakkhandhaṃ pariggaṇhantassa āyatanadvāravasena arūpino khandhā pākaṭā honti.
atk-abh02a:1232_12: dvādasāyatanāni aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo hontīti khandhāyatanadhātuvasena yamakatālakandhaṃ phālento viya dve koṭṭhāse katvā nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapeti.
atk-abh02a:1233_0: So “idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ na ahetu na appaccayā nibbattaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1233_3: Ko pana paccayo”ti upaparikkhanto “avijjāpaccayā taṇhāpaccayā kammapaccayā āhārapaccayā cā”ti tassa paccayaṃ
atk-abh02a:1233_4: vavatthapetvā “atītepi paccayā ceva paccayasamuppannadhammā ca anāgatepi etarahipi paccayā ceva paccayasamuppannadhammā ca,
atk-abh02a:1233_5: tato uddhaṃ satto vā puggalo vā natthi,
atk-abh02a:1234_0: Evaṃ saṅkhāre sallakkhetvā ṭhitassa pana bhikkhussa dasabalassa sāsane mūlaṃ otiṇṇaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-abh02a:1234_6: dhammasavaṇasappāyaṃ labhitvā ekāsane ekapallaṅkavaragato tīṇi lakkhaṇāni āropetvā vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā
atk-abh02a:1234_7: saṅkhāre sammasanto arahattaṃ gaṇhātīti idaṃ dhātuvasena abhiniviṭṭhassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā nigamanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1235_0: Yassa pana neva vaṇṇato upaṭṭhāti na paṭikūlato na suññato tena ‘na me upaṭṭhātī’ti na kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā nisīditabbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1235_3: Iccassa punappunaṃ koṭṭhāsavasena sajjhāyaṃ karontassa koṭṭhāsā paguṇā honti.
atk-abh02a:1235_5: Yadā ‘kesā’ti āvajjitamatte manasikāro gantvā ‘matthaluṅga’nti antimakoṭṭhāse patiṭṭhāti,
atk-abh02a:1236_0: Athassa yathā nāma cakkhumato purisassa dvattiṃsavaṇṇānaṃ pupphānaṃ ekasuttaganthitaṃ mālaṃ olokentassa
atk-abh02a:1236_1: paṭipāṭiyā vā pana nikhāte dvattiṃsavatipāde paṭikkamitvā olokentassa paṭipāṭiyāva dvattiṃsavaṇṇāni pupphāni
atk-abh02a:1236_4: vicarantā tiracchānagatāpi manussāpi sattāti na upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-abh02a:1237_0: Koṭṭhāsānaṃ paguṇakālato paṭṭhāya tīsu mukhesu ekena mukhena vimuccissati.
atk-abh02a:1237_1: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaṇṇato vā paṭikūlato vā suññato vā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a:1237_2: Yathā nāma pūve pacitukāmā itthī madditvā ṭhapitapiṭṭhato yaṃ yaṃ icchati taṃ taṃ pacati,
atk-abh02a:1237_3: yathā vā pana same bhūmippadese ṭhapitaṃ udakapūraṃ kumbhaṃ yato yato āvijjhanti tato tatova udakaṃ nikkhamati;
atk-abh02a:1237_4: evameva koṭṭhāsānaṃ paguṇakālato paṭṭhāya tīsu mukhesu ekena mukhena vimuccissati.
atk-abh02a:1237_9: Imasmiṃ uggahasandhismiṃ ṭhatvā arahattaṃ pattā bhikkhu gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā.
atk-abh02a:1238_0: Yassa pana uggahasandhismiṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ na upaṭṭhāti,
atk-abh02a:1238_6: Vasantena aṭṭhārasa vihāradose vajjetvā pañcaṅgasamannāgate senāsane vasitabbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1238_8: Tato pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantena rattiṭṭhānaṃ vā divāṭṭhānaṃ vā pavisitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikātabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1239_1: Ādito tāva heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva anupubbato manasikātabbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1239_3: Anupubbato manasikaronto hi dvattiṃsapadaṃ nisseṇiṃ padapaṭipāṭiyā akkamanto pāsādaṃ āruyha pāsādānisaṃsaṃ
atk-abh02a:1239_4: anubhavanakapuriso viya ‘kesā lomā’ti paṭipāṭiyā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaronto kammaṭṭhānato ca na parihāyati,
atk-abh02a:1239_6: Anupubbato manasikarontenāpi ca nātisīghato nātisaṇikato manasikātabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1239_7: Atisīghato manasikarontassa hi kiñcāpi kammaṭṭhānaṃ paguṇaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:1240_0: Atisaṇikato manasikarontassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ na gacchati,
atk-abh02a:1240_2: Yathā hi puriso tiyojanaṃ maggaṃ sāyaṃ kacchaṃ bandhitvā paṭipanno nikkhantaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya sītalacchāyaṃ disvā vissamati,
atk-abh02a:1240_6: taṃ antarāyeva sīho vā byaggho vā dīpi vā hanati,
atk-abh02a:1240_7: corā vā pana viluppanti ceva hananti ca;
atk-abh02a:1240_8: evameva atisaṇikaṃ manasikarontassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ na gacchati,
atk-abh02a:1241_0: Tasmā nātisīghaṃ nātisaṇikaṃ ekadivasaṃ tiṃsavāre manasikātabbaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1241_5: Yathā hi pātova uṭṭhāya mukhaṃ no dhovituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-abh02a:1241_6: khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ no khādituṃ no bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati;
atk-abh02a:1241_8: idameva ekantena no kātuṃ na vaṭṭati;
atk-abh02a:1241_10: Yathā hi ekassa purisassa tīṇi khettāni;
atk-abh02a:1241_14: tena tīṇipi khettāni paṭijaggituṃ asakkontena dve chaḍḍetvā ekaṃ dvattiṃsakumbhadāyakameva paṭijaggitabbaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1241_17: evameva sesaṃ mukhadhovanādikammaṃ chaḍḍetvāpi ettheva kammaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1241_19: Karonto mahantaṃ atthaṃ gaṇhitvā tiṭṭhatīti ettāvatā majjhimā paṭipadā nāma kathitā.
atk-abh02a:1242_1: Kammaṭṭhānañhi vissajjetvā citte bahiddhā vikkhepaṃ gacchante kammaṭṭhānato parihāyati,
atk-abh02a:1242_3: Yathā hi eko puriso sahassuddhāraṃ sādhetvā vaḍḍhiṃ labhitvā addhānaṃ paṭipanno antarāmagge kumbhīlamakaragāharakkhasasamuṭṭhitāya
atk-abh02a:1242_4: gambhīragirikandarāya upari atthataṃ ekapadikaṃ daṇḍakasetuṃ āruyha gacchanto akkamanapadaṃ vissajjetvā
atk-abh02a:1242_5: ito cito ca olokento paripatitvā kumbhīlādibhattaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:1242_6: evameva ayampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā sacitte bahiddhā vikkhepaṃ gacchante kammaṭṭhānato parihāyati,
atk-abh02a:1243_1: purisassa sahassuddhāraṃ sādhetvā vaḍḍhiṃ laddhakālo viya hi imassa bhikkhuno ācariyasantike kammaṭṭhānassa uggahitakālo;
atk-abh02a:1243_3: tassa kumbhīlādīhi daṭṭhakālo viya vaṭṭamūlakāni mahādukkhāni;
atk-abh02a:1243_5: tassa purisassa ekapadikaṃ daṇḍakasetuṃ āruyha akkamanapadaṃ vissajjetvā ito cito ca olokentassa paripatitvā
atk-abh02a:1243_6: kumbhīlādīnaṃ bhattabhāvaṃ āpannakālo viya imassa bhikkhuno kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā bahiddhā vikkhittacittassa
atk-abh02a:1243_7: kammaṭṭhānato parihāyitvā vaṭṭabhayaṃ samatikkamituṃ asamatthabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1244_1: Kese manasikaritvā cittuppādassa bahiddhā vikkhepaṃ paṭibāhitvā suddhacitteneva ‘lomā nakhā dantā taco’ti manasikātabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1244_5: Sahassuddhāraṃ sādhetvā vaḍḍhiṃ labhitvā chekassa purisassa daṇḍakasetuṃ āruyha nivāsanapārupanaṃ saṃvidhāya
atk-abh02a:1244_6: dhātupatthaddhakāyaṃ katvā sotthinā paratīragamanaṃ viya chekassa bhikkhuno kese manasikaritvā cittuppādassa
atk-abh02a:1244_7: bahiddhā vikkhepaṃ paṭibāhitvā suddhacitteneva ‘lomā nakhā dantā taco’ti manasikarontassa kammaṭṭhānato
atk-abh02a:1245_0: Evaṃ bahiddhā vikkhepaṃ paṭibāhantenāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva paṇṇattiṃ samatikkamanato manasikātabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1245_1: ‘Kesā lomā’ti paṇṇattiṃ vissajjetvā ‘paṭikūlaṃ paṭikūla’nti sati ṭhapetabbā.
atk-abh02a:1245_3: Yāva na upaṭṭhāti tāva paṇṇatti na vissajjetabbā.
atk-abh02a:1245_4: Yadā upaṭṭhāti tadā paṇṇattiṃ vissajjetvā ‘paṭikūla’nti manasikātabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1245_5: Karontena ca heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva pañcahākārehi paṭikūlato manasikātabbā.
atk-abh02a:1246_0: Tattha kesādayo pañca koṭṭhāsā subhanimittaṃ rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇanti saṅkhaṃ gatā.
atk-abh02a:1246_2: sabbe te imesu pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu rajjanti.
atk-abh02a:1246_3: Ayaṃ pana bhikkhu mahājanassa rajjanaṭṭhāne ‘paṭikūla’nti appanaṃ pāpeti.
atk-abh02a:1246_4: Tattha appanāppattito paṭṭhāya parato akilamantova appanaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh02a:1247_1: yathā hi cheko dhanuggaho rājānaṃ ārādhetvā satasahassuṭṭhānakaṃ gāmavaraṃ labhitvā sannaddhapañcāvudho
atk-abh02a:1247_2: tattha gacchanto antarāmagge dvattiṃsa core disvā tesu pañcacorajeṭṭhake ghāteyya;
atk-abh02a:1247_3: tesaṃ ghātitakālato paṭṭhāya tesu dve ekamaggaṃ paṭipajjamānā nāma na honti;
atk-abh02a:1247_5: Dhanuggahassa rājānaṃ ārādhetvā gāmavaraṃ laddhakālo viya hi imassa bhikkhuno ācariyasantike kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetvā ṭhitakālo;
atk-abh02a:1247_8: corajeṭṭhakānaṃ ghātitakālo viya imassa bhikkhuno sabbasattānaṃ rajjanaṭṭhāne tacapañcake ‘paṭikūla’nti appanāya pāpitakālo;
atk-abh02a:1247_9: sesacorānaṃ pāṇippahāreneva palāyitakālo viya sesakoṭṭhāsesu akilamantasseva appanāppatti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1248_0: Evaṃ paṇṇattiṃ samatikkamantena ca anupubbamuñcanato manasikāro pavattetabbo –
atk-abh02a:1248_1: kese manasikarontena manasikaronteneva kesesu sāpekkhena hutvā lomesu sati pesetabbā.
atk-abh02a:1248_2: Yāva lomā na upaṭṭhahanti tāva ‘kesā kesā’ti manasikātabbā.
atk-abh02a:1248_3: Yadā pana lomā upaṭṭhahanti tadā kese vissajjetvā lomesu sati upaṭṭhapetabbā.
atk-abh02a:1249_1: yathā hi jalūkā gacchamānā yāva purato patiṭṭhaṃ na labhati tāva pacchato naṅguṭṭhena gahitaṭṭhānaṃ na muñcati;
atk-abh02a:1249_2: yadā pana purato patiṭṭhaṃ labhati tadā naṅguṭṭhaṃ ukkhipitvā mukhena gahitaṭṭhāne ṭhapeti;
atk-abh02a:1249_3: evameva kese manasikarontena manasikaronteneva kesesu sāpekkhena hutvā lomesu sati pesetabbā.
atk-abh02a:1249_4: Yāva lomā na upaṭṭhahanti tāva ‘kesā kesā’ti manasikātabbā.
atk-abh02a:1249_5: Yadā lomā upaṭṭhahanti tadā kese vissajjetvā lomesu sati upaṭṭhapetabbā.
atk-abh02a:1250_0: Evaṃ pavattentena appanā hotīti vuttamanasikārakosallaṃ sampādetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ?

atk-abh02a:1272_1: Na koci satto vā puggalo vā vedayati.
atk-abh02a:1272_3: Na kassaci sattassa vā puggalassa vā vedanā.

atk-abh02a:1272_9: Evaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vedayatīti sallakkhento ‘esa sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī’ti pajānātīti veditabbo,
atk-abh02a:1273_0: Thero kira aphāsukakāle balavavedanāya nitthunanto aparāparaṃ parivattati.

atk-abh02a:1274_3: Iti bhagavā rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento vedanāvasena kathesi.
atk-abh02a:1274_7: Tattha bhagavā rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento saṅkhepamanasikāravasena vā vitthāramanasikāravasena vā catudhātuvavatthānaṃ kathesi.

atk-abh02a:1275_5: Ekaccassa hi saṃkhittena vā vitthārena vā pariggahite rūpakammaṭṭhāne tasmiṃ ārammaṇe cittacetasikānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1275_6: paṭhamābhinipāto taṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusanto uppajjamāno phasso pākaṭo hoti.

atk-abh02a:1275_8: Ekaccassa taṃ ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetvā vijānantaṃ uppajjamānaṃ viññāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.

atk-abh02a:1282_0: Tattha sukhaṃ vedanantiādīsu ayaṃ aparopi pajānanapariyāyo –
atk-abh02a:1282_1: sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmīti pajānātīti sukhavedanākkhaṇe dukkhāya vedanāya abhāvato sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno ‘sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1282_2: Tena yā pubbe bhūtapubbā dukkhā vedanā,

atk-abh02a:1283_3: neva tasmiṃ samaye dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti,
atk-abh02a:1283_5: sukhaṃyeva tasmiṃ samaye vedanaṃ vedeti. Yasmiṃ,
atk-abh02a:1283_9: neva tasmiṃ samaye sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti,

atk-abh02a:1284_0: Sāmisaṃ vā sukhantiādīsu sāmisā sukhā nāma pañcakāmaguṇāmisanissitā cha gehassitasomanassavedanā;
atk-abh02a:1284_7: So taṃ nimittanti so taṃ vedanānimittaṃ.

atk-abh02a:1303_4: Taṃ tattha bahulaṃ pavattayato byāpādo pahīyati.
atk-abh02a:1305_0: Apica cha dhammā byāpādassa pahānāya saṃvattanti –
atk-abh02a:1305_7: Odissakānodissakadisāpharaṇānañhi aññataravasena mettaṃ uggaṇhantassāpi byāpādo pahīyati.
atk-abh02a:1305_11: Nanu tvaṃ attano kammena āgantvā attano kammeneva gamissasi?
atk-abh02a:1305_12: Parassa kujjhanaṃ nāma vītaccitaṅgāratattaayosalākagūthādīni gahetvā parassa paharitukāmatāsadisaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1305_15: Esa attano kammenāgantvā attano kammeneva gamissati;
atk-abh02a:1305_16: appaṭicchitapaheṇakaṃ viya paṭivātakhittarajomuṭṭhi viya ca etassevesa kodho matthake patissatī’ti.
atk-abh02a:1305_17: Evaṃ attano ca parassa ca kammassakataṃ paccavekkhatopi,
atk-abh02a:1305_19: assaguttattherasadise mettābhāvanārate kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi byāpādo pahīyati;
atk-abh02a:1305_21: Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā byāpādassa pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1305_22: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnassa byāpādassa anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1306_6: Imesu aratiādīsu ayonisomanasikāraṃ bahulaṃ pavattayato thinamiddhaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1307_2: arati tandī vijambhikā bhattasammado cetaso ca līnattaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1308_2: Nikkamadhātu nāma kosajjato nikkhantattā tato balavataraṃ.
atk-abh02a:1308_3: Parakkamadhātu nāma paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavataraṃ.
atk-abh02a:1308_4: Imasmiṃ tippabhede vīriye yonisomanasikāraṃ bahulaṃ pavattayato thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati.
atk-abh02a:1310_0: Apica cha dhammā thinamiddhassa pahānāya saṃvattanti –
atk-abh02a:1310_7: Āharahatthaka bhuttavamitaka tatravaṭṭaka alaṃsāṭaka kākamāsakabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a:1310_8: nisinnassa hi samaṇadhammaṃ karoto thinamiddhaṃ mahāhatthī viya ottharantaṃ āgacchati.
atk-abh02a:1310_9: Catupañcaālopaokāsaṃ pana ṭhapetvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā yāpanasīlassa bhikkhuno taṃ na hotīti atibhojane nimittaṃ gaṇhantassāpi thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati.
atk-abh02a:1310_10: Yasmiṃ iriyāpathe thinamiddhaṃ okkamati tato aññaṃ parivattentassāpi,
atk-abh02a:1310_13: mahākassapattherasadise pahīnathinamiddhe kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati;
atk-abh02a:1310_15: Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā thinamiddhassa pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1310_16: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnassa thinamiddhassa arahattamaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1311_0: Cetaso avūpasame ayonisomanasikārena uddhaccakukkuccassa uppādo hoti.
atk-abh02a:1311_3: Tattha ayonisomanasikāraṃ bahulaṃ pavattayato uddhaccakukkuccaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1313_0: Samādhisaṅkhāte pana cetaso vūpasame yonisomanasikārenassa pahānaṃ hoti. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-abh02a:1315_0: Apica cha dhammā uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānāya saṃvattanti –
atk-abh02a:1315_7: Bāhusaccenapi hi ekaṃ vā dve vā tayo vā cattāro vā pañca vā nikāye pāḷivasena ca atthavasena ca uggaṇhantassāpi uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati.
atk-abh02a:1315_11: upālittherasadise vinayadhare kalyāṇamitte sevantassapi uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati;
atk-abh02a:1315_13: Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1315_14: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīne uddhaccakukkucce uddhaccassa arahattamaggena kukkuccassa anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1316_0: Vicikicchāṭhānīyesu dhammesu ayonisomanasikārena vicikicchāya uppādo hoti.
atk-abh02a:1316_1: Vicikicchāṭhānīyā dhammā nāma punappunaṃ vicikicchāya kāraṇattā vicikicchāva.
atk-abh02a:1316_2: Tattha ayonisomanasikāraṃ bahulaṃ pavattayato vicikicchā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1318_0: Kusalādidhammesu yonisomanasikārena panassā pahānaṃ hoti. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-abh02a:1320_0: Apica cha dhammā vicikicchāya pahānāya saṃvattanti –
atk-abh02a:1320_8: pañca vā nikāye pāḷivasena ca atthavasena ca uggaṇhantassāpi vicikicchā pahīyati.
atk-abh02a:1320_12: saddhādhimutte vakkalittherasadise kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi vicikicchā pahīyati.
atk-abh02a:1320_14: Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā vicikicchāya pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1320_15: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnāya vicikicchāya sotāpattimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1323_2: Yathā ca anuppannassātiādīsu pana satisambojjhaṅgassa tāva –
atk-abh02a:1324_5: uppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti –
atk-abh02a:1324_9: Taṃ tattha bahulaṃ pavattayato satisambojjhaṅgo uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1325_0: Apica cattāro dhammā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti –
atk-abh02a:1325_8: ṭhānanisajjādīsu satisamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāracittatāya ca satisambojjhaṅgo uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1325_9: Evaṃ catūhi kāraṇehi uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1327_6: uppannassa vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti –
atk-abh02a:1329_0: Apica satta dhammā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti –
atk-abh02a:1329_12: tadā ajjhattikaṃ vatthu avisadaṃ hoti aparisuddhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1329_13: Yadā pana cīvaraṃ jiṇṇaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ duggandhaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:1329_15: tadā bāhiraṃ vatthu avisadaṃ hoti aparisuddhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1329_19: Etasmiñhi ajjhattikabāhiravatthumhi avisade uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi avisadaṃ hoti aparisuddhaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1329_20: aparisuddhāni dīpakapallakavaṭṭitelāni nissāya uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya.
atk-abh02a:1329_21: Visade pana ajjhattikabāhiravatthumhi uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi visadaṃ hoti parisuddhāni dīpakapallakavaṭṭitelāni
atk-abh02a:1330_7: Tasmā taṃ dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena vā yathā vā manasikaroto balavaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1330_11: atha neva saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh02a:1330_15: Evaṃ sesesupi ekassa balavabhāve sati itaresaṃ attano kiccesu asamatthatā veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1331_0: Visesato panettha saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca samataṃ pasaṃsanti.
atk-abh02a:1331_4: bhesajjasamuṭṭhito viya rogo atekiccho hoti ‘cittuppādamatteneva kusalaṃ hotī’ti atidhāvitvā dānādīni puññāni akaronto niraye uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1331_12: Samādhi pana vīriyena saṃyojito kosajje patituṃ na labhati.
atk-abh02a:1331_13: Vīriyaṃ samādhinā saṃyojitaṃ uddhacce patituṃ na labhati.
atk-abh02a:1331_17: Evaṃ so saddahanto okappento appanaṃ pāpuṇissati.
atk-abh02a:1332_0: Samādhipaññāsu pana samādhikammikassa ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:1332_6: Sati hi cittaṃ uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ saddhāvīriyapaññānaṃ vasena uddhaccapātato,
atk-abh02a:1332_7: kosajjapakkhikena ca samādhinā kosajjapātato rakkhati. Tasmā sā,
atk-abh02a:1332_11: Tenāha “sati ca pana sabbatthikā vuttā bhagavatā.
atk-abh02a:1332_15: na vinā satiyā cittassa paggahaniggaho hotī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1333_0: Duppaññapuggalaparivajjanā nāma khandhādibhede anogāḷhapaññānaṃ dummedhapuggalānaṃ ārakā parivajjanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1333_2: Gambhīrañāṇacariyapaccavekkhaṇā nāma gambhīresu khandhādīsu pavattāya gambhīrapaññāya pabhedapaccavekkhaṇā.
atk-abh02a:1333_4: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1335_5: uppannassa vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti –
atk-abh02a:1337_0: Apica ekādasa dhammā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti –
atk-abh02a:1338_0: Tattha nirayesu pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇato paṭṭhāya mahādukkhaṃ anubhavanakālepi,
atk-abh02a:1338_3: pettivisaye anekānipi vassasahassāni ekaṃ buddhantarampi khuppipāsāhi āturībhūtakālepi,
atk-abh02a:1338_7: kālo vīriyakaraṇāyā’ti evaṃ apāyabhayaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi vīriyasambojjhaṅgo uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1338_12: so ca na sakkā kusītena gantu’nti evaṃ gamanavīthiṃ paccavekkhantassāpi uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1338_16: nāpi taṃ nissāya ‘jīvissāmā’ti te paṇītāni piṇḍapātādīni denti;
atk-abh02a:1338_17: atha kho attano kārānaṃ mahapphalataṃ paccāsiṃsamānā denti.
atk-abh02a:1338_18: Satthārāpi ‘ayaṃ ime paccaye paribhuñjitvā kāyadaḷhībahulo sukhaṃ viharissatī’ti na evañca sampassatā tuyhaṃ paccayā anuññatā;
atk-abh02a:1338_19: atha kho ‘ayaṃ ime paribhuñjamāno samaṇadhammaṃ katvā vaṭṭadukkhato muccissatī’ti te paccayā anuññātā.
atk-abh02a:1338_20: So dāni tvaṃ kusīto viharanto na taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ apacāyissasi.
atk-abh02a:1338_21: Āraddhavīriyasseva hi piṇḍapātāpacāyanaṃ nāma hotī’ti evaṃ piṇḍapātāpacāyanaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:1339_1: Tassa ca gocaragāme ekā mahāupāsikā theraṃ puttaṃ katvā paṭijaggati.
atk-abh02a:1339_2: Sā ekadivasaṃ araññaṃ gacchantī dhītaraṃ āha – “amma,
atk-abh02a:1339_7: Tava bhātikassa ayyamittassa āgatakāle bhattaṃ pacitvā khīrasappiphāṇitehi saddhiṃ dehi,
atk-abh02a:1339_10: “Ahaṃ pana hiyyo pakkaṃ pārivāsikabhattaṃ kañjiyena bhuttamhī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1339_12: “Sākapaṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā kaṇataṇḍulehi ambilayāguṃ pacitvā ṭhapehi, ammā”ti.
atk-abh02a:1340_0: Thero cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ nīharantova taṃ saddaṃ sutvā attānaṃ ovadi –
atk-abh02a:1340_4: Taṃ nissāya kho panesā neva khettaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1340_9: Tvaṃ etissā tā sampattiyo dātuṃ sakkhissasi,
atk-abh02a:1340_11: Ayaṃ kho pana piṇḍapāto tayā sarāgena sadosena samohena na sakkā bhuñjitu’nti pattaṃ thavikāya pakkhipitvā
atk-abh02a:1340_12: gaṇṭhikaṃ muñcitvā nivattitvā kassakaleṇameva gantvā pattaṃ heṭṭhāmañce cīvaraṃ cīvaravaṃse ṭhapetvā
atk-abh02a:1340_13: ‘arahattaṃ apāpuṇitvā na nikkhamissāmī’ti vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā nisīdi.
atk-abh02a:1340_14: Dīgharattaṃ appamatto hutvā nivutthabhikkhu vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā purebhattameva arahattaṃ patvā vikasamānamiva
atk-abh02a:1342_0: Yassa te āsavā khīṇā, dakkhiṇeyyosi mārisā”ti.
atk-abh02a:1343_1: piṇḍāya paviṭṭhānaṃ tumhādisānaṃ arahantānaṃ bhikkhaṃ datvā mahallakitthiyo dukkhā muccissantī’ti āha.
atk-abh02a:1344_0: Thero uṭṭhahitvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā kālaṃ olokento ‘pātoyevā’ti ñatvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-abh02a:1344_1: Dārikāpi bhattaṃ sampādetvā ‘idāni me bhātā āgamissati,
atk-abh02a:1344_2: idāni me bhātā āgamissatīti dvāraṃ vivaritvā olokayamānā nisīdi. Sā,
atk-abh02a:1344_4: pattaṃ gahetvā sappiphāṇitayojitassa khīrapiṇḍapātassa pūretvā hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-abh02a:1345_0: Therassa hi tadā ativiya parisuddho chavivaṇṇo ahosi,
atk-abh02a:1345_2: mukhaṃ bandhanā muttatālapakkaṃ viya ativiya virocittha.
atk-abh02a:1345_6: Upāsikā ‘ajja me puttassa pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ patta’nti ñatvā “abhiramati te, amma,
atk-abh02a:1346_0: Mahantaṃ kho panetaṃ satthu dāyajjaṃ yadidaṃ satta ariyadhanāni nāma.
atk-abh02a:1346_2: Yathā hi vippaṭipannaṃ puttaṃ mātāpitaro ‘ayaṃ amhākaṃ aputto’ti paribāhiraṃ karonti;
atk-abh02a:1346_3: so tesaṃ accayena dāyajjaṃ na labhati;
atk-abh02a:1346_4: evaṃ kusītopi idaṃ ariyadhanadāyajjaṃ na labhati,
atk-abh02a:1346_7: Satthuno hi te mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhigaṇhanakālepi abhinikkhamanepi abhisambodhiyampi dhammacakkapavattanayamakapāṭihāriyadevorohanaāyusaṅkhāravossajjanesupi
atk-abh02a:1346_9: Yuttaṃ nu te evarūpassa satthuno sāsane pabbajitvā kusītena bhavitu’nti evaṃ satthumahattaṃ paccavekkhatopi uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1347_4: Tayā nāma evarūpena jinaputtena hutvā na yuttaṃ kusītena viharitu’nti evaṃ jātimahattaṃ paccavekkhatopi uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1347_5: ‘Sāriputtamoggallānā ceva asītimahāsāvakā ca vīriyeneva lokuttaradhammaṃ paṭivijjhiṃsu.
atk-abh02a:1348_0: Kucchiṃ pūretvā ṭhitaajagarasadise vissaṭṭhakāyikacetasikavīriye kusītapuggale parivajjentassāpi āraddhavīriye
atk-abh02a:1348_1: pahitatte puggale sevantassāpi ṭhānanisajjādīsu viriyuppādanatthaṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāracittassāpi uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1348_2: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1350_5: uppannassa vā pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti –
atk-abh02a:1352_0: Apica ekādasa dhammā pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti –
atk-abh02a:1353_0: Buddhaguṇe anussarantassāpi hi yāva upacārā sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno pītisambojjhaṅgo uppajjati;
atk-abh02a:1353_2: dīgharattaṃ akkhaṇḍaṃ katvā rakkhitaṃ catupārisuddhisīlaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi,
atk-abh02a:1353_4: dubbhikkhabhayādīsu paṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ datvā ‘evaṃ nāma adamhā’ti cāgaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi,
atk-abh02a:1353_5: gihinopi evarūpe kāle sīlavantānaṃ dinnadānaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi,
atk-abh02a:1353_6: yehi guṇehi samannāgatā devatā devattaṃ pattā tathārūpānaṃ guṇānaṃ attani atthitaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi,
atk-abh02a:1353_7: samāpattiyā vikkhambhite kilese saṭṭhipi sattatipi vassāni na samudācarantīti paccavekkhantassāpi,
atk-abh02a:1353_13: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1355_5: uppannassa vā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti –
atk-abh02a:1356_1: Apica satta dhammā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti –
atk-abh02a:1356_10: sītuṇhesu utūsu ṭhānādīsu ca iriyāpathesu sappāyaṃ utuñca iriyāpathañca sevantassāpi passaddhi uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1356_14: tasseva visabhāge utuiriyāpathe vajjetvā sabhāge sevantassāpi uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1356_15: Majjhattapayogo vuccati attano ca parassa ca kammassakatapaccavekkhaṇā;
atk-abh02a:1356_21: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1358_5: uppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti –
atk-abh02a:1359_0: Evaṃ uppādo hoti. Tattha samathova samathanimittaṃ, avikkhepaṭṭhena ca abyagganimittanti.
atk-abh02a:1360_0: Apica ekādasa dhammā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti –
atk-abh02a:1360_12: Tattha vatthuvisadakiriyatā ca indriyasamattapaṭipādanatā ca vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1361_1: Samaye cittassa paggahaṇanatāti yasmiṃ samaye atisithilavīriyatādīhi līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:1361_3: Samaye cittassa niggahaṇanatāti yasmiṃ samaye accāraddhavīriyatādīhi uddhaṭaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:1361_5: Samaye sampahaṃsanatāti yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paññāpayogamandatāya vā upasamasukhānadhigamena vā nirassādaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:1362_0: Samaye ajjhupekkhanatā nāma yasmiṃ samaye sammāpaṭipattiṃ āgamma alīnaṃ anuddhaṭaṃ anirassādaṃ ārammaṇe
atk-abh02a:1362_2: tadāyaṃ paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu na byāpāraṃ āpajjati sārathī viya samappavattesu assesu.
atk-abh02a:1362_4: Asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanatā nāma upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ vā appattānaṃ vikkhittacittānaṃ puggalānaṃ ārakā parivajjanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1362_5: Samāhitapuggalasevanatā nāma upacārena vā appanāya vā samāhitacittānaṃ sevanā bhajanā payirupāsanā.
atk-abh02a:1362_8: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1364_5: uppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti –
atk-abh02a:1365_2: Apica pañca dhammā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti –
atk-abh02a:1366_1: ‘tvaṃ attano kammena āgantvā attanova kammena gamissasi.
atk-abh02a:1366_2: Esopi attano kammena āgantvā attanova kammena gamissati.
atk-abh02a:1366_3: Tvaṃ kaṃ kelāyasī’ti evaṃ kammassakatapaccavekkhaṇena ca ‘paramatthato sattoyeva natthi.
atk-abh02a:1366_4: So tvaṃ kaṃ kelāyasī’ti evaṃ nissattapaccavekkhaṇena ca.
atk-abh02a:1366_6: ‘idaṃ cīvaraṃ anupubbena vaṇṇavikārañceva jiṇṇabhāvañca upagantvā pādapuñchanacoḷakaṃ hutvā yaṭṭhikoṭiyā chaḍḍanīyaṃ bhavissati.
atk-abh02a:1366_8: nāssa evaṃ vinassituṃ dadeyyā’ti evaṃ assāmikabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena ca.
atk-abh02a:1367_0: Sattasaṅkhārakelāyanapuggalaparivajjanatāti ettha yo puggalo gihī vā attano puttadhītādike,
atk-abh02a:1367_5: Bhantamigo viya ito cito ca āloketi;
atk-abh02a:1367_6: aññena kesacchedanādīnaṃ atthāya ‘muhuttaṃ tāva asukaṃ pesethā’ti yāciyamānopi ‘amhepi taṃ attano kammaṃ na kārema,
atk-abh02a:1367_7: tumhe naṃ gahetvā kilamessathā’ti na deti –
atk-abh02a:1368_2: tāvakālikaṃ yācitopi ‘mayampi imaṃ mamāyantā na paribhuñjāma,
atk-abh02a:1368_5: Yo pana tesu dvīsupi vatthūsu majjhatto udāsīno –
atk-abh02a:1368_7: Iti ayaṃ upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo evarūpe sattasaṅkhārakelāyanapuggale ārakā parivajjentassāpi,
atk-abh02a:1368_10: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1370_1: Iti ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā pubbabhāge nānācittesu labbhanti.
atk-abh02a:1370_7: Ādito hi kāyaṃ pariggaṇhitvā āgatassa vipassanāsampayuttā sati kāyānupassanā nāma.
atk-abh02a:1370_8: Tāya satiyā samannāgato puggalo kāyānupassī nāma.
atk-abh02a:1370_9: Vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ariyamaggaṃ pattassa maggakkhaṇe maggasampayuttā sati kāyanupassanā nāma.
atk-abh02a:1370_10: Tāya satiyā samannāgato puggalo kāyānupassī nāma.
atk-abh02a:1370_13: Dhamme pariggaṇhitvā āgatassa vipassanāsampayuttā sati dhammānupassanā nāma.
atk-abh02a:1370_14: Tāya satiyā samannāgato puggalo dhammānupassī nāma.
atk-abh02a:1370_15: Vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ariyamaggaṃ pattassa maggakkhaṇe maggasampayuttā sati dhammānupassanā nāma.
atk-abh02a:1370_16: Tāya satiyā samannāgato puggalo dhammānupassī nāma.
atk-abh02a:1370_18: Kāye pana ‘subha’nti vipallāsappahānā kāyapariggāhikā sati maggena samijjhatīti kāyānupassanā nāma.
atk-abh02a:1370_19: Vedanāya ‘sukha’nti vipallāsappahānā vedanāpariggāhikā sati maggena samijjhatīti vedanānupassanā nāma.
atk-abh02a:1370_20: Citte ‘nicca’nti vipallāsappahānā cittapariggāhikā sati maggena samijjhatīti cittānupassanā nāma.
atk-abh02a:1370_21: Dhammesu ‘attā’ti vipallāsappahānā dhammapariggāhikā sati maggena samijjhatīti dhammānupassanā nāma.
atk-abh02a:1370_22: Iti ekāva maggasampayuttā sati catukiccasādhanaṭṭhena cattāri nāmāni labhati.
atk-abh02a:1373_1: Abhidhammabhājanīye lokuttarasatipaṭṭhānavasena desanāya āraddhattā yathā kāyādiārammaṇesu lokiyasatipaṭṭhānesu tanti ṭhapitā,
atk-abh02a:1373_2: evaṃ aṭṭhapetvā sabbānipi kāyānupassādīni satipaṭṭhānāni dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ vibhattassa desanānayassa mukhamattameva dassentena niddiṭṭhāni.
atk-abh02a:1374_5: appaṇihitapaṭipadāti imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ catukkapañcakanayānaṃ vasena dasa nayā honti.
atk-abh02a:1374_6: Evaṃ sesesupīti vīsatiyā abhinivesesu dve nayasatāni.
atk-abh02a:1374_8: Iti suddhikāni dve sādhipatīni aṭṭhāti sabbampi nayasahassaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1374_9: Tathā vedanānupassanādīsu suddhikasatipaṭṭhāne cāti sotāpattimagge pañca nayasahassāni.
atk-abh02a:1374_12: suññatāpaṇihitānimittādibhedesu pana tato tiguṇe vipāke saṭṭhi nayasahassānīti.
atk-abh02a:1374_13: Evameva sakiccasādhakānañceva saṃsiddhikakiccānañca kusalavipākasatipaṭṭhānānaṃ niddesavasena duvidho
atk-abh02a:1374_14: kāyānupassanādivasena ca suddhikavasena ca kusale pañcannaṃ vipāke pañcannanti dasannaṃ niddesavārānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1376_2: Ārammaṇattikesu pana sabbānipi etāni appamāṇaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattanato appamāṇārammaṇāneva,
atk-abh02a:1376_5: vīriyaṃ vā vīmaṃsaṃ vā jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā maggabhāvanākāle maggādhipatīni;
atk-abh02a:1376_6: chandacittajeṭṭhakāya maggabhāvanāya navattabbāni maggādhipatīnīti phalakālepi navattabbāneva;
atk-abh02a:1376_8: nibbānassa pana bahiddhādhammattā bahiddhārammaṇāni nāma hontīti.
atk-abh02a:1376_10: Sammāsambuddhena hi suttantabhājanīyasmiṃyeva lokiyalokuttaramissakā satipaṭṭhānā kathitā;
atk-abh02a:1376_12: Evamayaṃ satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṃ nīharitvā bhājetvā dassitoti.
atk-abh02a:1381_2: Tena na tato heṭṭhā na uddhanti sammappadhānaparicchedaṃ dīpeti.
atk-abh02a:1381_4: Idha bhikkhūti imasmiṃ sāsane paṭipannako bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a:1381_9: Chandaṃ janetīti kattukamyatāsaṅkhātaṃ kusalacchandaṃ janeti uppādeti.
atk-abh02a:1381_12: Cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti teneva sahajātavīriyena cittaṃ ukkhipati.
atk-abh02a:1381_14: Paṭipāṭiyā panetāni cattāripi padāni āsevanābhāvanābahulīkammasātaccakiriyāhi yojetabbāni.
atk-abh02a:1382_0: Uppannānaṃ pāpakānanti anuppannanti avattabbataṃ āpannānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1382_2: Anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānanti anibbattānaṃ kosallasambhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1382_11: Ayaṃ tāva catunnaṃ sammappadhānānaṃ uddesavāravasena ekapadiko atthuddhāro.
atk-abh02a:1383_1: Idāni paṭipāṭiyā tāni padāni bhājetvā dassetuṃ kathañca bhikkhu anuppannānantiādinā nayena niddesavāro āraddho.
atk-abh02a:1383_5: tattha chandaniddese tāva yo chandoti yo chandaniyavasena chando.
atk-abh02a:1383_15: Tesu dhammacchandoti imasmiṃ ṭhāne kattukamyatākusaladhammacchando adhippeto.
atk-abh02a:1384_0: Imaṃ chandaṃ janetīti chandaṃ kurumānova chandaṃ janeti nāma.
atk-abh02a:1384_2: Uṭṭhapetīti chandaṃ kurumānova taṃ uṭṭhapeti nāma.
atk-abh02a:1384_4: Nibbattetīti chandaṃ kurumānova taṃ nibbatteti nāma.
atk-abh02a:1384_6: Apica chandaṃ karontova chandaṃ janeti nāma.
atk-abh02a:1384_8: Kenacideva antarāyena patitaṃ puna ukkhipanto uṭṭhapeti nāma.
atk-abh02a:1384_11: Anosakkanatāya alīnavuttitāya anolīnavuttitāya abhimukhabhāvena nibbattento abhinibbatteti nāma.
atk-abh02a:1385_1: Vīriyaniddese vīriyaṃ karontova vīriyaṃ ārabhati nāma.
atk-abh02a:1385_3: Vīriyaṃ karontoyeva ca āsevati bhāveti nāma.
atk-abh02a:1386_4: Evaṃ sampaggahitaṃ yathā na patati tathā naṃ vīriyupatthambhena upatthambhento upatthambheti.
atk-abh02a:1386_5: Upatthambhitampi thirabhāvatthāya punappunaṃ upatthambhento paccupatthambheti nāma.
atk-abh02a:1387_1: Ṭhitiyātipadassa niddese sabbesampi asammosādīnaṃ ṭhitivevacanabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ yā ṭhiti so asammosotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1387_2: Ettha hi heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ padaṃ uparimassa uparimassa padassa attho,
atk-abh02a:1387_3: uparimaṃ uparimaṃ padaṃ heṭṭhimassa heṭṭhimassa atthotipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:1390_1: bhikkhu ‘anuppannā me pāpakā akusalā dhammā uppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyu’nti ātappaṃ karoti;
atk-abh02a:1390_2: ‘uppannā me pāpakā akusalā dhammā appahīyamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyu’nti ātappaṃ karoti;
atk-abh02a:1390_3: ‘anuppannā me kusalā dhammā anuppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyu’nti ātappaṃ karoti.
atk-abh02a:1390_4: ‘Uppannā me kusalā dhammā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyu’nti ātappaṃ karotī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1391_0: Ettha ca ‘anuppannā me kusalā dhammā’ti samathavipassanā ceva maggo ca.
atk-abh02a:1391_2: Maggo pana sakiṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhamāno anatthāya saṃvattanako nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:1391_3: So hi phalassa paccayaṃ datvāva nirujjhati.
atk-abh02a:1392_0: Tattha “uppannā samathavipassanā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvattantī”ti atthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ idaṃ vatthu –
atk-abh02a:1392_1: eko kira khīṇāsavatthero ‘mahācetiyañca mahābodhiñca vandissāmī’ti samāpattilābhinā bhaṇḍagāhakasāmaṇerena
atk-abh02a:1392_2: saddhiṃ janapadato mahāvihāraṃ āgantvā vihārapariveṇaṃ pāvisi;
atk-abh02a:1392_3: sāyanhasamaye mahābhikkhusaṅghe cetiyaṃ vandamāne cetiyaṃ vandanatthāya na nikkhami. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:1392_4: Khīṇāsavānañhi tīsu ratanesu mahantaṃ gāravaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1392_5: Tasmā bhikkhusaṅghe vanditvā paṭikkante manussānaṃ sāyamāsabhuttavelāya sāmaṇerampi ajānāpetvā ‘cetiyaṃ vandissāmī’ti ekakova nikkhami.
atk-abh02a:1392_6: Sāmaṇero ‘kiṃ nu kho thero avelāya ekakova gacchati,
atk-abh02a:1392_8: Thero anāvajjanena tassa āgamanaṃ ajānanto dakkhiṇadvārena mahācetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruḷho.
atk-abh02a:1393_0: Mahāthero mahācetiyaṃ ulloketvā buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ gahetvā sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā haṭṭhapahaṭṭho mahācetiyaṃ vandati.
atk-abh02a:1393_1: Sāmaṇero therassa vandanākāraṃ disvā ‘upajjhāyo me ativiya pasannacitto vandati;
atk-abh02a:1393_2: kiṃ nu kho pupphāni labhitvā pūjaṃ kareyyā’ti cintesi.
atk-abh02a:1393_3: There vanditvā uṭṭhāya sirasi añjaliṃ ṭhapetvā mahācetiyaṃ ulloketvā ṭhite sāmaṇero ukkāsitvā attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpesi.
atk-abh02a:1393_7: kinnu kho pupphāni labhitvā pūjeyyāthā”ti? “Āma, sāmaṇera,
atk-abh02a:1393_8: imasmiṃ cetiye viya aññatra ettakaṃ dhātunidhānaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:1393_9: Evarūpaṃ asadisaṃ mahāthūpaṃ pupphāni labhitvā ko na pūjeyyā”ti? “Tena hi, bhante,
atk-abh02a:1393_11: āharissāmī”ti tāvadeva jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā iddhiyā himavantaṃ gantvā vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni gahetvā
atk-abh02a:1393_12: parissāvanaṃ pūretvā mahāthere dakkhiṇamukhato pacchimamukhe asampatteyeva āgantvā pupphaparissāvanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1394_0: Thero pacchimamukhanissitena sopānena āruyha kucchivedikābhūmiyaṃ pupphapūjaṃ kātuṃ āraddho.
atk-abh02a:1394_2: pupphāni patitvā dutiyabhūmiyaṃ jaṇṇuppamāṇena odhinā pūrayiṃsu.
atk-abh02a:1394_13: Thero parissāvanaṃ sāmaṇerassa datvā saddhiṃ hatthipākārena cetiyaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditvā pariveṇaṃ gacchanto cintesi –
atk-abh02a:1394_15: sakkhissati nu kho imaṃ iddhānubhāvaṃ rakkhitunti?
atk-abh02a:1394_19: evarūpaṃ pana iddhiṃ nāsetvā pacchimakāle kāṇapesakāriyā hatthena madditaṃkañjiyaṃ pivissasī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1394_20: Daharakabhāvassa nāmesa doso yaṃ so upajjhāyassa kathāya saṃvejetvā ‘kammaṭṭhānaṃ me, bhante,
atk-abh02a:1394_22: ‘amhākaṃ upajjhāyo kiṃ vadatī’ti taṃ pana asuṇanto viya agamāsi.
atk-abh02a:1395_0: Thero mahācetiyañca mahābodhiñca vanditvā sāmaṇeraṃ pattacīvaraṃ gāhāpetvā anupubbena kuṭeḷitissamahāvihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-abh02a:1395_1: Sāmaṇero upajjhāyassa padānupadiko hutvā bhikkhācāraṃ na gacchati.
atk-abh02a:1395_3: bhante”ti pucchitvā pana ‘idāni me upajjhāyo gāmadvāraṃ sampatto bhavissatī’ti ñatvā attano ca upajjhāyassa
atk-abh02a:1395_4: ca pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā ākāsenāgantvā therassa pattacīvaraṃ datvā piṇḍāya pavisati.
atk-abh02a:1395_10: santāya samāpattiyā parihīnā brahmacariyavāse santhambhituṃ na sakkontī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1395_11: Sāmaṇero ‘kiṃ katheti mayhaṃ upajjhāyo’ti sotuṃ na icchati,
atk-abh02a:1395_13: Thero anupubbena cetiyavandanaṃ karonto kammupendavihāraṃ nāma gato.
atk-abh02a:1395_14: Tattha vasantepi there sāmaṇero tatheva karoti.
atk-abh02a:1396_0: Athekadivasaṃ ekā pesakāradhītā abhirūpā paṭhamavaye ṭhitā kammupendagāmato nikkhamitvā padumassaraṃ oruyha gāyamānā pupphāni bhañjati.
atk-abh02a:1396_1: Tasmiṃ samaye sāmaṇero padumassaramatthakena gacchati gacchanto pana,
atk-abh02a:1396_6: Santasamāpattibalena pana tattheva udakapiṭṭhe apatitvā simbalitūlaṃ viya patamānaṃ anupubbena padumassaratīre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh02a:1396_7: So vegena gantvā upajjhāyassa pattacīvaraṃ datvā nivatti.
atk-abh02a:1396_9: nivāriyamānopi na nivattissatī’ti kiñci avatvā piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-abh02a:1397_0: Sāmaṇero gantvā padumassaratīre aṭṭhāsi tassā paccuttaraṇaṃ āgamayamāno.
atk-abh02a:1397_1: Sāpi sāmaṇeraṃ ākāsena gacchantañca punāgantvā ṭhitañca disvā ‘addhā esa maṃ nissāya ukkaṇṭhito’ti ñatvā ‘paṭikkama sāmaṇerā’ti āha.
atk-abh02a:1397_3: Itarā paccuttaritvā sāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā ‘kiṃ,
atk-abh02a:1397_6: Sā bahūhi kāraṇehi gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ brahmacariyavāse ānisaṃsañca dassetvā ovadamānāpi tassa ukkaṇṭhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1397_7: vinodetuṃ asakkontī ‘ayaṃ mama kāraṇā evarūpāya iddhiyā parihīno;
atk-abh02a:1397_9: ‘Idheva tiṭṭhā’ti vatvā gharaṃ gantvā mātāpitūnaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-abh02a:1397_10: Tepi āgantvā nānappakāraṃ ovadamānā vacanaṃ aggaṇhantaṃ āhaṃsu –
atk-abh02a:1397_15: gihībhūto nāma pesakārakammaṃ vā kareyya naḷakārakammaṃ vā,
atk-abh02a:1397_18: Pesakārako udare baddhasāṭakaṃ datvā gharaṃ netvā dhītaraṃ adāsi.
atk-abh02a:1398_0: So pesakārakammaṃ uggaṇhitvā pesakārehi saddhiṃ sālāya kammaṃ karoti.
atk-abh02a:1398_1: Aññesaṃ itthiyo pātova bhattaṃ sampādetvā āhariṃsu.
atk-abh02a:1398_3: So itaresu kammaṃ vissajjetvā bhuñjamānesu tasaraṃ vaṭṭento nisīdi.
atk-abh02a:1398_6: Mātugāmo ca nāma api cakkavattirājānaṃ attani paṭibaddhacittaṃ ñatvā dāsaṃ viya sallakkheti.
atk-abh02a:1398_16: vācāyapi maṃ ghaṭṭesī’ti kujjhitvā aññaṃ paharaṇaṃ apassanto tameva tasaradaṇḍakaṃ tasarato luñcitvā khipi.
atk-abh02a:1398_17: Sā taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā īsakaṃ parivatti.
atk-abh02a:1398_18: Tasaradaṇḍakassa ca koṭi nāma tikhiṇā hoti.
atk-abh02a:1398_19: Sā tassā parivattamānāya akkhikoṭiyaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh02a:1398_20: Sā ubhohi hatthehi vegena akkhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-abh02a:1399_0: So tasmiṃ kāle upajjhāyassa vacanaṃ anussari ‘idaṃ sandhāya maṃ upajjhāyo “anāgate kāle kāṇapesakāriyā hatthena madditaṃ kañjiyaṃ pivissasī”ti āha.
atk-abh02a:1399_2: Aho dīghadassī ayyo’ti mahāsaddena rodituṃ ārabhi.
atk-abh02a:1399_4: akkhi nāma bhinnaṃ na sakkā rodanena paṭipākatikaṃ kātu”nti āhaṃsu.
atk-abh02a:1399_6: apica kho idaṃ sandhāya rodāmī”ti sabbaṃ pavattiṃ paṭipāṭiyā kathesi.
atk-abh02a:1399_7: Evaṃ uppannā samathavipassanā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvattanti.
atk-abh02a:1400_1: tiṃsamattā bhikkhū kalyāṇiyaṃ mahācetiyaṃ vanditvā aṭavimaggena mahāmaggaṃ otaramānā antarāmagge jhāmakkhette
atk-abh02a:1400_2: kammaṃ katvā āgacchantaṃ ekaṃ manussaṃ addasaṃsu.
atk-abh02a:1400_4: masimakkhitameva ca ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ kacchaṃ pīḷetvā nivatthaṃ.

atk-abh02a:1413_9: Yathā khīrarukkhassa kuṭhāriyā āhatāhataṭṭhāne khīraṃ na nikkhamissatīti na vattabbaṃ, evaṃ.

atk-abh02a:1437_2: natthi mayhaṃ etassa nibbattane bhāro’ti chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammanibbattako daṭṭhabbo,

atk-abh02a:1440_5: Samādhidhurena bhāvitā cattāro khandhā samādhiddhipādo nāma.
atk-abh02a:1440_6: Chando padhānasaṅkhāroti dve dhammā saṅkhārakkhandhavasena samādhiddhipāde pavisanti;
atk-abh02a:1440_10: Chando samādhīti dve dhammā saṅkhārakkhandhavasena padhānasaṅkhāriddhipāde pavisanti;
atk-abh02a:1441_1: gahitameva vibhūtadhātukaṃ kataṃ. Kathaṃ? Chando, samādhi,
atk-abh02a:1441_2: padhānasaṅkhāroti ime tayo dhammā iddhīpi honti iddhipādāpi.
atk-abh02a:1441_4: Ime hi tayo dhammā ijjhamānā sampayuttakehi catūhi khandhehi saddhiṃyeva ijjhanti, na vinā.
atk-abh02a:1441_5: Sampayuttakā pana cattāro khandhā ijjhanakaṭṭhena iddhi nāma honti,
atk-abh02a:1441_7: ‘Iddhī’ti vā ‘iddhipādo’ti vā na aññassa kassaci adhivacanaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1441_8: sampayuttakānaṃ catunnaṃ khandhānaṃyeva adhivacanaṃ. Vīriyaṃ, cittaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1442_2: Ayamattho upacārena vā vipassanāya vā dīpetabbo.
atk-abh02a:1443_4: Evamidhāpi iddhīti vā pādoti vā na aññassa kassaci adhivacanaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1443_8: yadi satthā parato uttaracūḷabhājanīyaṃ nāma na āhareyya.
atk-abh02a:1443_15: Tesaṃ vacanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā iddhīpi iddhipādopi ‘nipphanno tilakkhaṇabbhāhato’ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh02a:1443_16: Iti imasmiṃ suttantabhājanīye lokiyalokuttaramissakā iddhipādā kathitāti.
