atk-abh02a:1446_5: Tathā uttaracūḷabhājanīye chandiddhipāde cattāri nayasahassāni vibhattāni,
atk-abh02a:1446_6: vīriyacittavīmaṃsiddhipāde cattāri cattārīti sabbānipi aṭṭhannaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena dvattiṃsa nayasahassāni vibhattāni.
atk-abh02a:1446_7: Evametaṃ nibbattitalokuttarānaṃyeva iddhipādānaṃ vasena dvattiṃsanayasahassappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ abhidhammabhājanīyaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1448_2: Ārammaṇattikesu pana sabbepete appamāṇaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattito appamāṇārammaṇā eva,
atk-abh02a:1448_6: Cattāro hi adhipatayo aññamaññaṃ garuṃ na karonti. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:1448_8: Yathā hi samajātikā samavayā samathāmā samasippā cattāro rājaputtā attano attano jeṭṭhakatāya aññamaññassa apacitiṃ na karonti,
atk-abh02a:1448_9: evamimepi cattāro adhipatayo pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ jeṭṭhakadhammatāya aññamaññaṃ garuṃ na karontīti ekanteneva na maggādhipatino.
atk-abh02a:1448_11: Nibbānassa pana bahiddhādhammattā bahiddhārammaṇā nāma hontīti.
atk-abh02a:1448_13: Sammāsambuddhena hi suttantabhājanīyasmiṃyeva lokiyalokuttaramissakā iddhipādā kathitā,
atk-abh02a:1453_2: Bojjhaṅgāti bodhiyā bodhissa vā aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā.
atk-abh02a:1453_4: yā esā dhammasāmaggī yāya lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyogaucchedasassatābhinivesādīnaṃ
atk-abh02a:1453_12: Yo panesa yathāvuttappakārāya etāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako bodhīti vuccati,
atk-abh02a:1454_5: sambujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā”ti iminā paṭisambhidānayenāpi bojjhaṅgattho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1455_0: Satisambojjhaṅgotiādīsu pasattho sundaro ca bojjhaṅgo sambojjhaṅgo,
atk-abh02a:1455_11: sabbatthikaṃ vadāmī”ti vacanato sabbesaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ upakārakattā satisambojjhaṅgo paṭhamaṃ vutto.
atk-abh02a:1455_12: Tato paraṃ “so tathā sato viharanto taṃ dhammaṃ paññāya pavicinatī”tiādinā nayena evaṃ anukkameneva nikkhepapayojanaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva.
atk-abh02a:1456_3: Ettha hi tayo bojjhaṅgā līnassa paṭipakkhā, yathāha –
atk-abh02a:1456_25: Evaṃ līnuddhaccapaṭipakkhato sabbatthikato ca satteva vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1457_1: Idāni nesaṃ ekasmiṃyevārammaṇe attano attano kiccavasena nānākaraṇaṃ dassetuṃ tattha katamo satisambojjhaṅgotiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1457_2: Tattha idha bhikkhūti imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a:1457_5: dhanena dhanavā viya satiyā satimā hoti,
atk-abh02a:1457_8: tañhi paramatthasaccassa nibbānassa ceva maggassa ca anulomato paramaṃ nāma hoti uttamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1458_0: Kasmā pana imasmiṃ satibhājanīye paññā saṅgahitāti?
atk-abh02a:1458_2: Sati hi paññāya saddhimpi uppajjati vināpi,
atk-abh02a:1458_6: Yathā hi dvīsu disāsu dve rājamahāmattā tiṭṭheyyuṃ;
atk-abh02a:1458_8: eko attano dhammatāya ekakova tesu rājaputtaṃ gahetvā ṭhito attanopi tejena rājaputtassapi tejena tejavā hoti;
atk-abh02a:1458_9: attano dhammatāya ṭhito na tena samatejo hoti;
atk-abh02a:1458_10: evameva rājaputtaṃ gahetvā ṭhitamahāmatto viya paññāya saddhiṃ uppannā sati,
atk-abh02a:1458_11: attano dhammatāya ṭhito viya vinā paññāya uppannā.
atk-abh02a:1458_12: Tattha yathā rājaputtaṃ gahetvā ṭhito attanopi tejena rājaputtassapi tejena tejavā hoti,
atk-abh02a:1458_13: evaṃ paññāya saddhiṃ uppannā sati balavatī hoti;
atk-abh02a:1458_14: yathā attano dhammatāya ṭhito na tena samatejo hoti,
atk-abh02a:1458_15: evaṃ vinā paññāya uppannā dubbalā hotīti balavabhāvadīpanatthaṃ paññā gahitāti.
atk-abh02a:1459_0: Cirakatampīti attano vā parassa vā kāyena cirakataṃ vattaṃ vā kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ vā kasiṇaparikammaṃ vā.
atk-abh02a:1459_1: Cirabhāsitampīti attanā vā parena vā vācāya cirabhāsitaṃ bahukampi,
atk-abh02a:1459_2: vattasīse ṭhatvā dhammakathaṃ vā kammaṭṭhānavinicchayaṃ vā,
atk-abh02a:1459_4: Saritā hotīti taṃ kāyaviññattiṃ vacīviññattiñca samuṭṭhāpetvā pavattaṃ arūpadhammakoṭṭhāsaṃ ‘evaṃ uppajjitvā evaṃ niruddho’ti saritā hoti.
atk-abh02a:1459_6: Ayaṃ vuccati satisambojjhaṅgoti ayaṃ evaṃ uppannā sesabojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpikā vipassanāsampayuttā sati satisambojjhaṅgo nāma kathīyati.
atk-abh02a:1460_0: So tathā sato viharantoti so bhikkhu tenākārena uppannāya satiyā sato hutvā viharanto.
atk-abh02a:1460_1: Taṃ dhammanti taṃ cirakataṃ cirabhāsitaṃ heṭṭhā vuttappakāraṃ dhammaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1460_2: Paññāya pavicinatīti paññāya ‘aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā’ti pavicinati.
atk-abh02a:1460_3: Pavicaratīti ‘aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā’ti tattha paññaṃ carāpento pavicarati.
atk-abh02a:1460_5: Ayaṃ vuccatīti idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ bojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpakaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo nāma vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1461_0: Tassa taṃ dhammanti tassa bhikkhuno taṃ heṭṭhā vuttappakāraṃ dhammaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1461_3: Ayaṃ vuccatīti idaṃ bojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpakaṃ vipassanāsampayuttaṃ vīriyaṃ vīriyasambojjhaṅgo nāma vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1462_1: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ bojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpikā vipassanāsampayuttā pīti pītisambojjhaṅgo nāma vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1463_1: Kāyopi passambhatīti khandhattayasaṅkhāto nāmakāyo kilesadarathapaṭippassaddhiyā passambhati.
atk-abh02a:1463_3: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ bojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpikā vipassanāsampayuttā passaddhi passaddhisambojjhaṅgo nāma vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1464_4: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ bojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpikā vipassanāsampayuttā cittekaggatā samādhisambojjhaṅgo nāma vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1465_0: Tathā samāhitanti tena appanāppattena viya samādhinā samāhitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1465_1: Sādhukaṃ ajjhupekkhitā hotīti suṭṭhu ajjhupekkhitā hoti;
atk-abh02a:1465_2: tesaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānavaḍḍhane abyāvaṭo hutvā ajjhupekkhati.
atk-abh02a:1465_3: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ channaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ anosakkanaanativattanabhāvasādhako majjhattākāro upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo nāma vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1466_1: Apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekacittakkhaṇe nānārasalakkhaṇā pubbabhāgavipassanā bojjhaṅgā kathitā hontīti.
atk-abh02a:1468_1: Idāni yena pariyāyena satta bojjhaṅgā cuddasa honti,
atk-abh02a:1468_2: tassa pakāsanatthaṃ dutiyanayaṃ dassento puna satta bojjhaṅgātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:1468_4: ajjhattaṃ dhammesu satīti ajjhattikasaṅkhāre pariggaṇhantassa uppannā sati.
atk-abh02a:1468_5: Bahiddhā dhammesu satīti bahiddhāsaṅkhāre pariggaṇhantassa uppannā sati.
atk-abh02a:1469_1: Cetasikaṃ vīriyanti “na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmi yāva me na anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccissatī”ti evaṃ kāyapayogaṃ vinā uppannavīriyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1469_5: Imasmiṃ naye satta bojjhaṅgā lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitā.
atk-abh02a:1470_0: Porāṇakattherā pana ‘ettakena pākaṭaṃ na hotī’ti vibhajitvā dassesuṃ.
atk-abh02a:1470_1: Etesu hi ajjhattadhammesu sati pavicayo upekkhāti ime tayo attano khandhārammaṇattā lokiyāva honti.
atk-abh02a:1471_0: Tattha ajjhattaṃ tāva dhammesu satipavicayaupekkhā ajjhattārammaṇā,
atk-abh02a:1471_1: lokuttarā pana bahiddhārammaṇāti tesaṃ lokuttarabhāvo mā yujjittha.
atk-abh02a:1471_2: Caṅkamappayogena nibbattavīriyampi lokiyanti vadanto na kilamati.
atk-abh02a:1471_3: Avitakkaavicārā pana pītisamādhiyo kadā lokuttarā hontīti?
atk-abh02a:1471_9: Ettha pana alabbhamānakaṃ upādāya labbhamānakāpi paṭikkhittā.
atk-abh02a:1471_10: Evamayaṃ avitakkaavicāro pītisambojjhaṅgo kāmāvacaratopi nikkhanto rūpāvacaratopi arūpāvacaratopīti nibbattitalokuttaro yevāti kathito.
atk-abh02a:1472_4: Ettha pana alabbhamānakaṃ upādāya labbhamānakopi paṭikkhitto.
atk-abh02a:1472_5: Evamayaṃ avitakkaavicāro samādhi kāmāvacaratopi nikkhanto rūpāvacaratopi arūpāvacaratopīti nibbattitalokuttaro yevāti kathito.
atk-abh02a:1473_6: evamassime āsavā nānusentī”ti iminā suttena lokuttarā honti.
atk-abh02a:1473_7: Yadā pana caṅkamapayogena nibbatte kāyikavīriye anupasanteyeva vipassanā maggena ghaṭīyati,
atk-abh02a:1473_11: brahmavihārajjhāne ca bojjhaṅgo uddharanto na vāretabbo”ti vadanti,
atk-abh02a:1473_12: tesaṃ vāde avitakkaavicārā pītisamādhisambojjhaṅgā lokiyā hontīti.
atk-abh02a:1475_1: Idāni bojjhaṅgānaṃ bhāvanāvasena pavattaṃ tatiyanayaṃ dassento puna satta bojjhaṅgātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:1475_14: Evametasmiṃ pañcavidhe viveke nissitaṃ vivekanissitanti tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ samucchedavivekanissitaṃ
atk-abh02a:1476_0: Tathā hi ayaṃ satisambojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyogamanuyutto yogī vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1476_6: Te hi na kevalaṃ balavavipassanāmaggaphalakkhaṇesu eva bojjhaṅgaṃ uddharanti,
atk-abh02a:1476_9: Tasmā tesaṃ matena etesaṃ jhānānaṃ pavattikkhaṇe kiccato eva vikkhambhanavivekanissitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1477_2: Tattha ‘pariccāgavossaggo’ti vipassanākkhaṇe ca tadaṅgavasena maggakkhaṇe ca samucchedavasena kilesappahānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1477_6: Tathā hi ayaṃ sati sambojjhaṅgo yathāvuttena pakārena kilese pariccajati,
atk-abh02a:1478_0: Vossaggapariṇāminti iminā pana sakalena vacanena vossaggatthaṃ pariṇamantaṃ pariṇatañca,
atk-abh02a:1478_2: Ayañhi bojjhaṅgabhāvanamanuyutto bhikkhu yathā satisambojjhaṅgo kilesapariccāgavossaggatthaṃ nibbānapakkhandanavossaggatthañca paripaccati,
atk-abh02a:1481_1: Abhidhammabhājanīye sattapi bojjhaṅge ekato pucchitvā vissajjanassa ca pāṭiyekkaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanassa ca vasena dve nayā.
atk-abh02a:1482_8: na sattassāti dīpetuṃ majjhattatā cittassāti vuttanti.
atk-abh02a:1483_1: sattannampi hi bojjhaṅgānaṃ ekato pucchitvā vissajjane ekekamagge nayasahassaṃ nayasahassanti cattāri nayasahassāni vibhattāni.
atk-abh02a:1483_2: Pāṭiyekkaṃ pucchitvā vissajjane ekekabojjhaṅgavasena cattāri cattārīti satta catukkā aṭṭhavīsati.
atk-abh02a:1483_3: Tāni purimehi catūhi saddhiṃ dvattiṃsāti sabbānipi abhidhammabhājanīye dvattiṃsa nayasahassāni vibhattāni kusalāneva.
atk-abh02a:1483_6: tasmā tesupi bojjhaṅgadassanatthaṃ kusalaniddesapubbaṅgamāya eva tantiyā vipākanayo āraddho.
atk-abh02a:1483_8: pāṭiyekkaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanassa ca vasena duvidho hoti.
atk-abh02a:1483_10: Vipāke pana kusalato tiguṇā nayā kātabbāti.
atk-abh02a:1486_2: Ārammaṇattikesu pana sabbepete appamāṇaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattito appamāṇārammaṇā eva,

atk-abh02a:1487_1: nibbānassa pana bahiddhādhammattā bahiddhārammaṇā nāma hontīti.

atk-abh02a:1492_1: Idāni tadanantare maggavibhaṅge ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggotiādi sabbaṃ saccavibhaṅge dukkhanirodhagāminīpaṭipadāniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1492_2: Bhāvanāvasena pāṭiyekkaṃ dassite dutiyanayepi sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāveti vivekanissitantiādi sabbaṃ bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1492_3: Evamidaṃ dvinnampi nayānaṃ vasena suttantabhājanīyaṃ lokiyalokuttaramissakameva kathitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1494_3: Yathā hi muddhābhisittassa rañño muddhābhisittāya deviyā kucchismiṃ jāto putto rājaputtoti avuttepi rājaputtoyeva hoti,
atk-abh02a:1494_4: evamayampi ariyoti avuttepi ariyo evāti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1495_1: Pañcaṅgikavārepi aṭṭhaṅgikoti avuttepi aṭṭhaṅgiko eva veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1495_7: So “suttaṃ āharāhī”ti vutto addhā aññaṃ apassanto imaṃ mahāsaḷāyatanato suttappadesaṃ āharissati “yā tathābhūtassa diṭṭhi,
atk-abh02a:1495_12: Pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1496_2: no ce āharati sayaṃ āharitvā “evamassāyaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchatī”ti “iminā te satthusāsanena vādo bhinno;
atk-abh02a:1497_0: Imāni pana tīṇi aṅgāni pubbe parisuddhāni vattanti,
atk-abh02a:1497_19: Imaṃ etesaṃ pañcannaṃ kārāpakaṅgānaṃ kiccātirekataṃ dassetuṃ pañcaṅgiko maggoti gahitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1498_3: satta sammāājīvacetanāti imamhā cetanābahuttā kathaṃ muccissatha?
atk-abh02a:1498_14: no ce āharati sayaṃ uparipaṇṇāsato āharitabbaṃ –
atk-abh02a:1501_2: sammāvācā ariyā anāsavā lokuttarā maggaṅgā? Yā kho,
atk-abh02a:1501_4: ariyacittassa anāsavacittassa ariyamaggasamaṅgino ariyamaggaṃ bhāvayato catūhi vacīduccaritehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī – ayaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1503_0: “Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammākammanto ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro…pe….
atk-abh02a:1504_0: “Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammāājīvo? Sammāājīvaṃpahaṃ, bhikkhave, dvāyaṃ vadāmi…pe… upadhivepakko.
atk-abh02a:1505_2: sammāājīvo ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro maggaṅgo? Yā kho,
atk-abh02a:1505_4: ariyacittassa anāsavacittassa ariyamaggasamaṅgino ariyamaggaṃ bhāvayato micchāājīvā ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī – ayaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1506_2: micchājīvato cāti ekekāva virati ariyā anāsavā lokuttarā maggaṅgāti vuttā.
atk-abh02a:1506_5: Idaṃ te suttaṃ akāmakassa lokuttaramaggo aṭṭhaṅgikoti dīpeti”.
atk-abh02a:1506_7: no ce sallakkheti aññānipi kāraṇāni āharitvā saññāpetabbo.
atk-abh02a:1507_1: dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo na upalabbhati,
atk-abh02a:1507_4: dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhati; idheva, subhadda,
atk-abh02a:1508_0: Aññesupi anekesu suttasatesu aṭṭhaṅgikova maggo āgato. Kathāvatthuppakaraṇepi vuttaṃ –
atk-abh02a:1511_2: Sace pana ettakenāpi saññattiṃ na gacchati, “gaccha,
atk-abh02a:1512_1: Aṭṭhaṅgikamaggasmiñhi ekato pucchitvā ekato vissajjane catūsu maggesu cattāri nayasahassāni vibhattāni.
atk-abh02a:1512_2: Pañcaṅgikamagge ekato pucchitvā ekato vissajjane cattāri;
atk-abh02a:1512_3: pāṭiyekkaṃ pucchitvā pāṭiyekkaṃ vissajjane cattāri cattārīti pañcasu aṅgesu vīsati.
atk-abh02a:1512_4: Iti purimāni aṭṭha imāni ca vīsatīti sabbānipi maggavibhaṅge aṭṭhavīsati nayasahassāni vibhattāni.
atk-abh02a:1512_6: Vipāke pana kusalato tiguṇā nayā kātabbāti.
atk-abh02a:1515_2: Ārammaṇattikesu pana sabbānipetāni appamāṇaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattito appamāṇārammaṇāneva,
atk-abh02a:1515_4: Neva hi maggo na phalaṃ maggaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti.
atk-abh02a:1515_6: vīriyaṃ vā vīmaṃsaṃ vā jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā maggabhāvanākāle maggādhipatīni;
atk-abh02a:1516_1: nibbānassa pana bahiddhādhammattā bahiddhārammaṇāni nāma hontīti evametasmiṃ pañhāpucchakepi nibbattitalokuttarāneva maggaṅgāni kathitāni.
atk-abh02a:1516_2: Sammāsambuddhena hi suttantabhājanīyasmiṃyeva lokiyalokuttarāni maggaṅgāni kathitāni;
atk-abh02a:1516_3: abhidhammabhājanīye pana pañhāpucchake ca lokuttarānevāti evamayaṃ maggavibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṃ nīharitvāva bhājetvā dassitoti.
atk-abh02a:1522_1: Idāni tadanantare jhānavibhaṅge yā tāva ayaṃ sakalassāpi suttantabhājanīyassa paṭhamaṃ mātikā ṭhapitā,
atk-abh02a:1522_2: tattha idhāti vacanaṃ pubbabhāgakaraṇīyasampadāya sampannassa sabbappakārajjhānanibbattakassa puggalassa sannissayabhūtasāsanaparidīpanaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1522_11: Ācāragocarasampannoti idamassa heṭṭhā pātimokkhasaṃvarassa upari jhānānuyogassa ca upakāradhammaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1522_12: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti idamassa pātimokkhato acavanadhammatāparidīpanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1523_5: Sātaccaṃ nepakkanti idamassa paññāpariggahitena vīriyena sātaccakāritāparidīpanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1523_6: Bodhipakkhikānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyuttoti idamassa paṭipattiyā nibbedhabhāgiyattaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1524_1: tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hotīti idamassa sabbattha satisampajaññasamannāgatattaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1524_2: So vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ bhajatīti idamassa anurūpasenāsanapariggahaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1524_5: So araññagato vāti idamassa vuttappakārena senāsanena yuttabhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1524_8: So abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyātiādi panassa kammaṭṭhānānuyogena nīvaraṇappahānaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1524_9: Tasseva pahīnanīvaraṇassa vivicceva kāmehītiādi paṭipāṭiyā jhānuppattiparidīpanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1525_0: Api ca idha bhikkhūti imasmiṃ sāsane jhānuppādako bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a:1525_1: Idāni yasmā jhānuppādakena bhikkhunā cattāri sīlāni sodhetabbāni,
atk-abh02a:1525_4: Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti iminā tesaṃ dvinnaṃ sīlānaṃ anavasesato ādānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1525_7: Pubbarattāpararattantiādinā sīle patiṭṭhitassa jhānabhāvanāya upakārake dhamme.
atk-abh02a:1525_8: So abhikkantetiādinā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ aparihānāya kammaṭṭhānassa ca asammosāya satisampajaññasamāyogaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1525_10: So araññagato vātiādinā taṃ senāsanaṃ upagatassa jhānānurūpairiyāpathañceva jhānabhāvanārambhañca.
atk-abh02a:1525_12: So ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāyātiādinā evaṃ pahīnajjhānapaccanīkadhammassa sabbajjhānānaṃ uppattikkamaṃ upadisatīti.
atk-abh02a:1528_1: Idāni yathānikkhittaṃ mātikaṃ paṭipāṭiyā bhājetvā dassetuṃ idhāti imissā diṭṭhiyātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1528_2: Tattha imissā diṭṭhiyātiādīhi dasahi padehi sikkhattayasaṅkhātaṃ sabbaññubuddhasāsanameva kathitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1528_3: Tañhi buddhena bhagavatā diṭṭhattā diṭṭhīti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1529_10: dubbharatāya saṃvattanti no subharatāyā’ti ekaṃsena hi, gotami,
atk-abh02a:1531_0: Apicetaṃ sikkhāttayasaṅkhātaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ bhagavatā diṭṭhattā sammādiṭṭhipaccayattā sammādiṭṭhipubbaṅgamattā ca diṭṭhi,
atk-abh02a:1531_4: Attano kārakaṃ apāyesu apatamānaṃ dhāretīti dhammo.
atk-abh02a:1531_6: Dhammo ca so vinayo cāti dhammavinayo.
atk-abh02a:1531_7: Kusaladhammehi vā akusaladhammānaṃ esa vinayoti dhammavinayo.
atk-abh02a:1531_11: ‘ime dhammā virāgāya saṃvattanti no sarāgāya…pe… ekaṃsena, gotami,
atk-abh02a:1532_0: Dhammena vā vinayo, na daṇḍādīhīti dhammavinayo, vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-abh02a:1537_11: Saṃsāradhammato hi sokādidhammato vā esa visiṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ nayati.
atk-abh02a:1537_16: Yasmā vā dhammāyeva abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā pahātabbā bhāvetabbā sacchikātabbā ca,
atk-abh02a:1537_20: Sātthasabyañjanatādīhi aññesaṃ vacanato padhānaṃ vacananti pavacanaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1537_25: “So vo mamaccayena satthā”ti hi dhammavinayova satthāti vuttoti evametesaṃ padānaṃ attho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1538_0: Yasmā pana imasmiṃyeva sāsane sabbapakārajjhānanibbattako bhikkhu dissati,
atk-abh02a:1538_2: tasmā tattha tattha ‘imissā’ti ca ‘imasmi’nti ca ayaṃ niyamo katoti veditabboti.
atk-abh02a:1539_3: Samaññāya eva hi ekacco bhikkhūti paññāyati.
atk-abh02a:1539_4: Tathā hi nimantanādimhi bhikkhūsu gaṇīyamānesu sāmaṇerepi gahetvā ‘sataṃ bhikkhū,
atk-abh02a:1539_10: Ayaṃ pana ānandattherena vuttattā dhammikā paṭiññā.
atk-abh02a:1539_11: Rattibhāge pana dussīlāpi paṭipathaṃ āgacchantā “ko etthā”ti vutte adhammikāya paṭiññāya abhūtatthāya “mayaṃ bhikkhū”ti vadanti.
atk-abh02a:1540_3: so taṃ labhatu vā mā vā,
atk-abh02a:1540_7: Bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti buddhādīhi ajjhupagataṃ bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatattā bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagato nāma.
atk-abh02a:1540_8: Yo hi koci appaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito,
atk-abh02a:1540_9: kasigorakkhādīhi jīvitakappanaṃ hitvā liṅgasampaṭicchaneneva bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a:1540_10: Parappaṭibaddhajīvikattā vā vihāramajjhe kājabhattaṃ bhuñjamānopi bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a:1540_11: Piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ nissāya pabbajjāya ussāhajātattā vā bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a:1541_2: Sahassagghanakopi hi paṭo satthakena khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chinno bhinnaggho hoti,
atk-abh02a:1541_5: Sukhasamphassopi hi paṭo suttehi saṃsibbito bhinnaphasso hoti,
atk-abh02a:1541_8: Suparisuddhopi hi paṭo sūcikammato paṭṭhāya sūcimalena,
atk-abh02a:1541_13: Gihīvatthavisabhāgānaṃ vā kāsāvānaṃ dhāraṇamatteneva bhinnapaṭadharoti bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a:1542_7: Sotāpanno hi sotāpattimaggena pañca kilese bhinditvā ṭhito.
atk-abh02a:1542_10: arahā arahattamaggena aṭṭha kilese bhinditvā ṭhito.
atk-abh02a:1542_11: Evamayaṃ catubbidho phalaṭṭho bhinnattā pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhikkhu nāma.
atk-abh02a:1543_0: Odhiso kilesānaṃ pahānāti ettha dve odhī –
atk-abh02a:1543_3: Tattha sotāpanno maggodhinā odhiso kilesānaṃ pahānā bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a:1543_4: Tassa hi catūsu maggesu ekeneva odhinā kilesā pahīnā,
atk-abh02a:1543_7: Sotāpanno ca kilesodhināpi odhiso kilesānaṃ pahānā bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a:1543_8: Tassa hi pahātabbakilesesu odhināva kilesā pahīnā,
atk-abh02a:1543_10: Arahā pana anodhisova kilesānaṃ pahānā bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a:1543_11: Tassa hi maggacatukkena anodhināva kilesā pahīnā,
atk-abh02a:1543_14: Ekāpi hi kilesasīmā ṭhitā nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:1543_15: Evaṃ so ubhayathāpi anodhiso kilesānaṃ pahānā bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a:1544_2: Tesu yo koci sekkho bhikkhuti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1544_4: Sekkhadhamme atikkamma aggaphale ṭhito tato uttari sikkhitabbābhāvato khīṇāsavo asekkhoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1544_5: Avaseso puthujjanabhikkhu tisso sikkhā neva sikkhati,
atk-abh02a:1545_0: Sīlaggaṃ samādhiggaṃ paññaggaṃ vimuttagganti idaṃ aggaṃ patvā ṭhitattā aggo bhikkhu nāma.
atk-abh02a:1545_2: Kalyāṇaputhujjanādayo hi yāva arahā tāva bhadrena sīlena samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanena
atk-abh02a:1545_3: ca samannāgatattā bhadro bhikkhūti saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti.
atk-abh02a:1546_0: Tattha ca “bhindati pāpake akusale dhammeti bhikkhu,
atk-abh02a:1546_2: sekkho bhikkhū”ti imesu tīsu ṭhānesu satta sekkhā kathitā.
atk-abh02a:1546_7: maṇḍo bhikkhū”ti imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu khīṇāsavova kathito.
atk-abh02a:1547_0: Evaṃ samaññādīhi bhikkhuṃ dassetvā idāni upasampadāvasena dassetuṃ samaggena saṅghenātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:1547_1: Tattha samaggena saṅghenāti sabbantimena paricchedena pañcavaggakaraṇīye kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā,
atk-abh02a:1547_2: tesaṃ āgatattā chandārahānaṃ chandassa āhaṭattā sammukhībhūtānañca appaṭikkosanato ekasmiṃ kamme samaggabhāvaṃ upagatena.
atk-abh02a:1547_3: Ñatticatutthenāti tīhi anussāvanāhi ekāya ca ñattiyā kātabbena.
atk-abh02a:1548_3: Tañcesa yathāvuttena kammena samāpannattā upasampannoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1548_16: Tāsu upasampadāsu imasmiṃ ṭhāne ayaṃ ñatticatutthakammūpasampadāva adhippetā.
atk-abh02a:1549_6: Tattha sīlanti kāmañcetaṃ saha kammavācāpariyosānena ijjhanakassa pātimokkhassa vevacanaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1549_7: evaṃ santepi dhammato etaṃ sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi vā viramantassa vattappaṭipattiṃ vā pūrentassa cetanādayo dhammā veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1550_0: Tattha cetanā sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi vā viramantassa vattapaṭipattiṃ vā pūrentassa cetanā.
atk-abh02a:1550_1: Cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi viramantassa virati.
atk-abh02a:1550_2: Apica cetanā sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīni pajahantassa satta kammapathacetanā.
atk-abh02a:1550_3: Cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ nāma “abhijjhaṃ pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā viharatī”tiādinā nayena saṃyuttamahāvagge vuttā anabhijjhāabyāpādasammādiṭṭhidhammā.
atk-abh02a:1550_4: Saṃvaro sīlanti ettha pañcavidhena saṃvaro veditabbo –
atk-abh02a:1550_12: Ettha ca saṃvarasīlaṃ avītikkamasīlanti idameva nippariyāyato sīlaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1550_13: cetanā sīlaṃ cetasikaṃ sīlanti pariyāyato sīlanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1551_0: Yasmā pana pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlena bhikkhu sāsane patiṭṭhāti nāma,
atk-abh02a:1551_3: kusaladhammā eva vā ettha patiṭṭhahantīti patiṭṭhā.
atk-abh02a:1552_0: “Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1553_0: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti ca. ;
atk-abh02a:1554_1: sīlaṃ sabbesaṃ kusaladhammāna”nti ca “sīle patiṭṭhitassa kho, mahārāja,
atk-abh02a:1554_2: sabbe kusalā dhammā na parihāyantī”ti ca ādisuttavasena veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1557_0: Yathā hi nagaravaḍḍhakī nagaraṃ māpetukāmo paṭhamaṃ nagaraṭṭhānaṃ sodheti,
atk-abh02a:1557_1: tato aparabhāge vīthicatukkasiṅghāṭakādiparicchedena vibhajitvā nagaraṃ māpeti;
atk-abh02a:1557_4: Yathā vā pana rajako paṭhamaṃ tīhi khārehi vatthaṃ dhovitvā parisuddhe vatthe yadicchakaṃ raṅgajātaṃ upaneti;
atk-abh02a:1557_5: yathā vā pana cheko cittakāro rūpaṃ likhitukāmo āditova bhittiparikammaṃ karoti,
atk-abh02a:1557_7: evameva yogāvacaro āditova sīlaṃ visodhetvā aparabhāge samathavipassanādayo dhamme sacchikaroti.
atk-abh02a:1558_2: Yathā hi chinnacaraṇassa purisassa disaṃgamanābhisaṅkhāro na jāyati,
atk-abh02a:1558_4: evameva yassa sīlaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti khaṇḍaṃ aparipuṇṇaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1558_6: Yassa pana taṃ abhinnaṃ hoti akkhaṇḍaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ tassa nibbānagamanāya ñāṇagamanaṃ sampajjati.
atk-abh02a:1559_2: Ubhayenāpi sīlasaṃyamo ceva sīlasaṃvaro ca kathito.
atk-abh02a:1559_5: vītikkamavasena tassa vipphandituṃ na detīti saṃyamo.
atk-abh02a:1559_8: Yathā hi sattānaṃ catubbidho āhāro mukhena pavisitvā aṅgamaṅgāni pharati,
atk-abh02a:1559_9: evaṃ yoginopi catubhūmakakusalaṃ sīlamukhena pavisitvā atthasiddhiṃ sampādeti.
atk-abh02a:1559_13: Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyāti catubhūmakakusalānaṃ paṭilābhatthāya pāmokkhaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ padhānanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1560_6: Yathā hi saṃvutadvāraṃ gehaṃ “saṃvutagehaṃ pihitageha”nti vuccati,
atk-abh02a:1561_1: Iriyatītiādīhi sattahipi padehi pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle ṭhitassa bhikkhuno iriyāpathavihāro kathito.
atk-abh02a:1562_1: Ācāragocaraniddese kiñcāpi bhagavā samaṇācaraṃ samaṇagocaraṃ kathetukāmo “ācāragocarasampannoti atthi ācāro,
atk-abh02a:1562_3: Yathā pana maggakusalo puriso maggaṃ acikkhanto ‘vāmaṃ muñca dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhā’ti paṭhamaṃ muñcitabbaṃ sabhayamaggaṃ uppathamaggaṃ ācikkhati,
atk-abh02a:1562_5: evameva maggakusalapurisasadiso dhammarājā paṭhamaṃ pahātabbaṃ buddhappaṭikuṭṭhaṃ anācāraṃ ācikkhitvā
atk-abh02a:1562_7: Purisena hi ācikkhitamaggo sampajjeyya vā na vā,
atk-abh02a:1563_0: Yasmā vā sasīsaṃ nahānena pahīnasedamalajallikassa purisassa mālāgandhavilepanādivibhūsanavidhānaṃ viya
atk-abh02a:1563_2: tasmā sedamalajallikkaṃ viya pahātabbaṃ paṭhamaṃ anācāraṃ ācikkhitvā,
atk-abh02a:1563_3: pahīnasedamalajallikassa mālāgandhavilepanādivibhūsanavidhānaṃ viya pacchā ācāraṃ ācikkhitukāmopi tattha katamo anācārotiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:1564_0: Yasmā pana na kevalaṃ kāyavācāhi eva anācāraṃ ācarati,
atk-abh02a:1564_2: tasmā taṃ dassetuṃ “sabbampi dussīlyaṃ anācāro”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1564_3: Tattha ekacciyaṃ anācāraṃ vibhajitvā dassento idhekacco veḷudānenātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:1564_5: Vihāre uṭṭhitañhi araññato vā āharitvā rakkhitagopitaṃ veḷuṃ ‘evaṃ me paccayaṃ dassantī’ti upaṭṭhākānaṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:1564_6: Evañhi jīvitaṃ kappento anesanāya micchājīvena jīvati.
atk-abh02a:1564_12: Sace pana taṃ issaravatāya deti garubhaṇḍavissajjanamāpajjati.
atk-abh02a:1565_6: So pana pamāṇena paricchinno telanāḷippamāṇopi garubhaṇḍaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1565_8: Yassa pana bhikkhuno telanāḷiyā vā kattaradaṇḍena vā attho,
atk-abh02a:1565_10: Phātikammaṃ tadagghanakaṃ vā atirekaṃ vā vaṭṭati,
atk-abh02a:1565_12: Hatthakammampi udakāharaṇamattaṃ vā appaharitakaraṇamattaṃ vā na vaṭṭati,
atk-abh02a:1565_14: Tasmā pokkharaṇito vā paṃsuṃ uddharitvā sopānaṃ vā attharāpetvā visamaṭṭhānaṃ vā samaṃ katvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:1565_15: Phātikammaṃ akatvā gahito tattha vasanteneva paribhuñjitabbo;
atk-abh02a:1565_17: Asatiyā gahetvā gatena yattha gato sarati,
atk-abh02a:1566_2: Manussā punappunaṃ yācanti vā tajjenti vā.
atk-abh02a:1566_3: Tadā bhikkhūhi ‘daṇḍakammaṃ katvā gaṇhathā’ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati;
atk-abh02a:1566_5: Sace te daṇḍakammatthāya vāsipharasuādīni vā khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ vā denti,
atk-abh02a:1566_7: Vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “daḍḍhagehā manussā gaṇhitvā gacchantā na vāretabbā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1567_4: Sace koṭṭetuṃ na icchanti ‘samabhāgaṃ labhissathā’ti vattabbā;
atk-abh02a:1567_14: Saṅghike rukkhe koṭṭāpetvā saṅghaṃ anāpucchitvāpi saṅghikaṃ āvāsaṃ kātuṃ labbhati.
atk-abh02a:1568_3: Hatthakammasīsena pana ekasmiṃ gehe mañcaṭṭhānamattaṃ labbhati,
atk-abh02a:1568_9: Saṅghikarukkhe saṅghikaṃ āvāsaṃ bādhente saṅghaṃ anāpucchā hāretuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-abh02a:1568_12: Sace rukkhaṃ nissāya saṅghassa mahanto lābho hoti,
atk-abh02a:1568_14: Puggalikarukkhe saṅghikaṃ āvāsaṃ bādhente rukkhasāmikassa ācikkhitabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1568_17: ‘Rukkhaṃ me dethā’ti codentassa rukkhaṃ agghāpetvā mūlaṃ dātabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1568_19: puggalike ca puggalikāvāsaṃ bādhentepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:1568_25: tato heṭṭhā vallikhaṇḍaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ na hoti.
atk-abh02a:1569_0: Pattadānādīsupi pattadānenāti paccayahetukena pattadānenātiādi sabbaṃ veḷudāne vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1570_1: Tālapaṇṇampi hi sayaṃjāte tālavane saṅghena paricchinnaṭṭhāneyeva garubhaṇḍaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1570_6: Yattha pana tiṇaṃ natthi tattha muñjapalālanāḷikerapaṇṇādīhipi chādenti.
atk-abh02a:1570_9: nāḷikerapaṇṇādīsu ca ekapaṇṇampi saṅghassa dinnaṃ vā tatthajātakaṃ vā bahiārāme saṅghassa tiṇavatthumhi jātatiṇaṃ vā rakkhitagopitaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1570_10: Taṃ pana saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate atirekaṃ puggalikakamme dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:1571_0: Pupphadāne “ettakesu rukkhesu pupphāni vissajjetvā yāgubhattavatthe upanentu,
atk-abh02a:1571_1: ettakesu senāsanapaṭisaṅkharaṇe upanentū”ti evaṃ niyamitaṭṭhāne eva pupphāni garubhaṇḍāni honti.
atk-abh02a:1571_2: Paratīre sāmaṇerā pupphāni ocinitvā rāsiṃ karonti,
atk-abh02a:1571_3: pañcaṅgasamannāgato pupphabhājako bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gaṇetvā koṭṭhāse karoti,
atk-abh02a:1571_4: so sampattaparisāya saṅghaṃ anāpucchitvāva dātuṃ labhati;
atk-abh02a:1571_6: Bhikkhu pana kassa pupphāni dātuṃ labhati,
atk-abh02a:1571_8: Mātāpitūnaṃ gehaṃ haritvāpi gehato pakkosāpetvāpi ‘vatthupūjaṃ karothā’ti dātuṃ labhati,
atk-abh02a:1571_15: Bhikkhunā piṇḍāya carantena manusse disvā ‘vihāre bahūni pupphāni,
atk-abh02a:1571_18: ‘Manussā khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ ādāya āgamissantī’ti cittena pana na vattabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1571_21: Manussā attano dhammatāya ‘vihāre pupphāni atthī’ti pucchitvā ‘asukadivase vihāraṃ āgamissāma,
atk-abh02a:1571_22: sāmaṇerānaṃ pupphāni ocinituṃ mā dethā’ti vadanti.
atk-abh02a:1572_0: Aparo bhikkhu sāmaṇerānaṃ ācikkhati “asukagāmavāsino pupphāni mā ocinitthā”ti āhaṃsūti.
atk-abh02a:1572_1: Manussāpi āmisaṃ āharitvā dānaṃ datvā vadanti –
atk-abh02a:1572_3: sāmaṇere amhehi saha pupphāni ocinituṃ āṇāpethā”ti.
atk-abh02a:1572_8: Ettakaṃ nayaṃ labhitvā sāmaṇere putte vā bhātike vā katvā pupphāni ocināpetuṃ doso natthi;
atk-abh02a:1573_0: Phaladāne phalampi pupphaṃ viya niyamitameva garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1573_1: Vihāre bahukamhi phalāphale sati aphāsukamanussā āgantvā yācanti.
atk-abh02a:1573_5: Phalehi vā rukkhehi vā paricchinditvā katikā kātabbā –
atk-abh02a:1573_7: ettakesu vā rukkhesu phalāni gaṇhantā na vāretabbā’ti.
atk-abh02a:1573_8: Corā pana issarā vā balakkārena gaṇhantā na vāretabbā;
atk-abh02a:1574_7: Sāpi heṭṭhimakoṭiyā tiṃsapalaguḷapiṇḍappamāṇāva tato heṭṭhā na garubhaṇḍanti.
atk-abh02a:1575_2: te attano ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ dātuṃ na labhanti.
atk-abh02a:1575_3: Yehi pana ‘ettakāni dantakaṭṭhāni āharitabbānī’ti paricchinditvā vāraṃ gahitāni,
atk-abh02a:1575_5: Ekena bhikkhunā dantakaṭṭhamāḷakato bahūni dantakaṭṭhāni na gahetabbāni,
atk-abh02a:1575_7: Pāṭiyekkaṃ vasantenāpi bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gaṇayitvā yattakāni attano pāpuṇanti tattakāneva gahetvā gantabbaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1575_8: antarā āgantukesu vā āgatesu disaṃ vā pakkamantena āharitvā gahitaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapetabbāni.
atk-abh02a:1576_0: Cāṭukamyatāyātiādīsu cāṭukamyatā vuccati attānaṃ dāsaṃ viya nīcaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā parassa khalitavacanampi saṇṭhapetvā piyakāmatāya paggayhavacanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1576_2: Yathā hi muggasūpe paccante bahū muggā pākaṃ gacchanti,
atk-abh02a:1576_4: evameva saccālikena jīvitakappake puggale bahu alikaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:1576_6: Yathā vā muggasūpassa appavisanaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-abh02a:1576_7: evameva saccālikavuttino puggalassa appaviṭṭhavācā nāma natthi;
atk-abh02a:1577_0: Jaṅghapesanikanti gāmantaradesantarādīsu tesaṃ tesaṃ gihīnaṃ sāsanapaṭisāsanaharaṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1577_3: tesaṃ sāsanaṃ gahetvā katthaci gamanavasena vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:1577_4: Cetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā attano vā kammaṃ karontānaṃ vaḍḍhakīnampi sāsanaṃ harituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:1577_8: “asukattherassa nāma dethā”ti piṇḍapātaṃ vā bhesajjaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā denti;
atk-abh02a:1577_9: “vihāre pūjaṃ karothā”ti mālāgandhavilepanādīni vā dhajapatākādīni vā nīyyādenti,
atk-abh02a:1577_12: Sesānaṃ sāsanaṃ gahetvā gacchantassa padavāre padavāre doso.
atk-abh02a:1578_0: Aññataraññatarenāti etesaṃ vā veḷudānādīnaṃ aññataraññatarena vejjakammabhaṇḍāgārikakammaṃ piṇḍapaṭipiṇḍakammaṃ
atk-abh02a:1578_1: saṅghuppādacetiyuppādaupaṭṭhāpanakammanti evarūpānaṃ vā micchājīvena jīvitakappanakakammānaṃ yena kenaci.
atk-abh02a:1578_3: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ sabbopi anācāro nāma kathīyati.
atk-abh02a:1579_1: Gocaraniddesepi paṭhamaṃ agocarassa vacane kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1579_2: Tattha ca gocaroti piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāya upasaṅkamituṃ yuttaṭṭhānaṃ gocaro,
atk-abh02a:1579_6: Tattha vesiyā nāma rūpūpajīviniyo yena kenacideva sulabhajjhācāratāmittasatthavasinehavasena upasaṅkamanto vesiyāgocaro nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:1579_10: Evaṃ upasaṅkamantassa hi ciraṃ rakkhitagopitopi samaṇadhammo katipāheneva nassati;
atk-abh02a:1579_12: Dakkhiṇāvasena pana upasaṅkamantena satiṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā upasaṅkamitabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1579_13: Vidhavā vuccanti matapatikā vā pavutthapatikā vā.
atk-abh02a:1579_16: Tesaṃ sabbesampi upasaṅkamane ādīnavo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1579_20: Te aññamaññaṃ santhavavasena katipāheneva rakkhitagopitasamaṇadhammaṃ nāsenti.
atk-abh02a:1579_22: Bhikkhunā pupphāni labhitvā pūjanatthāyapi ovādadānatthāyapi gantuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-abh02a:1580_2: Tattha tehi saddhiṃ saha soṇḍavasena upasaṅkamituṃ na vaṭṭati;
atk-abh02a:1580_4: Saṃsaṭṭho viharati rājūhītiādīsu rājānoti abhisittā vā hontu anabhisittā vā ye rajjaṃ anusāsanti.
atk-abh02a:1580_5: Rājamahāmattāti rājūnaṃ issariyasadisāya mahatiyā issariyamattāya samannāgatā.
atk-abh02a:1581_0: Ananulomikena saṃsaggenāti ananulomikasaṃsaggo nāma tissannaṃ sikkhānaṃ ananulomo paccanīkasaṃsaggo,
atk-abh02a:1581_7: titthiyatitthiyasāvakehi saddhiṃ ekacchandarucisamācāratā ekacchandarucisamācārabhāvāvaho vā sinehabahumānasanthavo.
atk-abh02a:1581_8: Tattha rājarājamahāmattehi saddhiṃ saṃsaggo brahmacariyantarāyaṃ karoti.
atk-abh02a:1581_10: Tesaṃ pana vādaṃ bhinditvā attano laddhiṃ gaṇhāpetuṃ samatthena upasaṅkamituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:1582_0: Idāni aparenapi pariyāyena agocaraṃ dassetuṃ yāni vā pana tāni kulānītiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1582_5: Appasannānīti cittaṃ pasannaṃ anāvilaṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-abh02a:1582_6: Akkosakaparibhāsakānīti akkosakāni ceva paribhāsakāni ca; ‘corosi, bālosi, mūḷhosi, oṭṭhosi, goṇosi,
atk-abh02a:1582_12: duggatiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā’ti evaṃ dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosanti; ‘hotu,
atk-abh02a:1582_15: vadhissāmā’ti evaṃ bhayadassanena paribhāsanti cāti attho.
atk-abh02a:1582_22: Ayogakkhemakāmānīti catūhi yogehi khemaṃ nibbhayaṃ na icchanti,
atk-abh02a:1582_26: Sabbesampi hi bhagavantaṃ uddissa pabbajitānañceva saraṇagatānañca catunnampi parisānaṃ tāni anatthakāmāniyeva.
atk-abh02a:1582_33: assaddhakulādisevakassa assaddhakulādiko cāti tippakāropi ayuttagocaro agocaroti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1583_1: Vesiyādiko tāva pañcakāmaguṇanissayato agocaroti veditabbo, yathāha – “ko ca,
atk-abh02a:1583_4: Yadidaṃ pañca kāmaguṇā”ti rājādiko jhānānuyogassa anupanissayato lābhasakkārāsanicakkanipphādanato diṭṭhivipattihetuto ca,
atk-abh02a:1584_6: Gharadvāraṃ sampattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paccayavekallaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:1584_8: Kāsāvapajjotānīti bhikkhubhikkhunīhi nivatthapārutānaṃ kāsāvānaṃyeva pabhāya ekobhāsāni bhūtapālaseṭṭhikulasadisāni.
atk-abh02a:1584_9: Isivātapaṭivātānīti gehaṃ pavisantānaṃ nikkhamantānañca bhikkhubhikkhunīsaṅkhātānaṃ isīnaṃ cīvaravātena
atk-abh02a:1584_10: ceva samiñjanapasāraṇādijanitasarīravātena ca paṭivātāni pavāyitāni viniddhutakibbisāni vā.
atk-abh02a:1585_3: Yāni tāni vajjānīti yāni tāni garahitabbaṭṭhena vajjāni.
atk-abh02a:1585_14: “anāpattigamanīyāni cittuppādamattakāni yāni ‘na puna evarūpaṃ karissāmī’ti manasā āvajjitamatteneva sujjhanti.
atk-abh02a:1585_18: Tasmā sabbalahukaṃ dukkaṭadubbhāsitaṃ idha vajjanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1585_22: Bhayadassāvīti catubbidhassa bhayassa kāraṇattā bhayato dassanasīlo.
atk-abh02a:1585_26: vippaṭisārajananato ca etena nānappakārena ādīnavato dassanasīlo.
atk-abh02a:1586_0: Nissaraṇadassāvīti yaṃ tattha nissaraṇaṃ tassa dassanasīlo.
atk-abh02a:1586_2: Ācariyattheravāde tāva “anāpattigamanīyatāya sati adhiṭṭhānāvikammaṃ nissaraṇa”nti kathitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1586_3: Antevāsikattheravāde tāva “āpattigamanīyatāya sati vuṭṭhānāvikammaṃ nissaraṇa”nti kathitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1587_0: Tattha tathārūpo bhikkhu aṇumattāni vajjāni vajjato bhayato passati nāma.
atk-abh02a:1587_14: Tattha ‘paramāṇu’ nāma ākāsakoṭṭhāsiko maṃsacakkhussa āpāthaṃ nāgacchati,
atk-abh02a:1587_16: ‘Aṇu’ nāma bhitticchiddatālacchiddehi paviṭṭhasūriyarasmīsu vaṭṭi vaṭṭi hutvā paribbhamanto paññāyati.
atk-abh02a:1587_17: ‘Tajjārī’ nāma gopathamanussapathacakkapathesu chijjitvā ubhosu passesu uggantvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh02a:1587_20: Etesu pana chattiṃsa paramāṇavo ekassa aṇuno pamāṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1587_34: Yo bhikkhu aṇumattaṃ vajjaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhasinerupabbatasadisaṃ katvā daṭṭhuṃ sakkoti –
atk-abh02a:1587_35: ayaṃ bhikkhu aṇumattāni vajjāni bhayato passati nāma.
atk-abh02a:1587_36: Yopi bhikkhu sabbalahukaṃ dukkaṭadubbhāsitamattaṃ paṭhamapārājikasadisaṃ katvā daṭṭhuṃ sakkoti –
atk-abh02a:1587_37: ayaṃ aṇumattāni vajjāni vajjato bhayato passati nāmāti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1588_1: Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūtipadaniddese bhikkhusikkhāti bhikkhūhi sikkhitabbasikkhā.
atk-abh02a:1588_2: Sā bhikkhunīhi sādhāraṇāpi asādhāraṇāpi bhikkhusikkhā eva nāma.
atk-abh02a:1588_4: Sāpi bhikkhūhi sādhāraṇāpi asādhāraṇāpi bhikkhunīsikkhā eva nāma.
atk-abh02a:1588_10: Tattha bhikkhubhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhā yāva arahattamaggā vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:1588_12: Tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu attanā sikkhitabbasikkhāpadesu eva sikkhati.
atk-abh02a:1588_13: Sesasikkhā pana atthuddhāravasena sikkhāpadassa atthadassa dassanatthaṃ vuttā.
atk-abh02a:1588_14: Iti imāsu sikkhāsūti evaṃpakārāsu etāsu sikkhāsu.
atk-abh02a:1588_15: Sabbena sabbanti sabbena sikkhāsamādānena sabbaṃ sikkhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1588_16: Sabbathā sabbanti sabbena sikkhitabbākārena sabbaṃ sikkhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1588_18: satisammosena bhinnassāpi sikkhāpadassa puna pākatikakaraṇato nissesaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1588_20: Tena vuccatīti yena kāraṇena etaṃ sabbaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ sabbena sikkhitabbākārena samādiyitvā sikkhati pūreti,
atk-abh02a:1589_1: Indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññūtipadadvayassa niddese kaṇhapakkhassa paṭhamavacane payojanaṃ ācāraniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1589_2: Tattha katamā indriyesu aguttadvāratātiādīsu pana yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1590_1: Jāgariyānuyoganiddese pubbarattāpararattanti ettha aḍḍharattasaṅkhātāya rattiyā pubbe pubbarattaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1590_5: Majjhimayāmo panassa bhikkhuno niddākilamathavinodanokāsoti na gahito.
atk-abh02a:1590_7: Anuyutto hotīti taṃ anuyogasaṅkhātaṃ āsevanaṃ bhāvanaṃ anuyutto hoti sampayutto.
atk-abh02a:1590_8: Niddese panassa idha bhikkhu divasanti pubbaṇho,
atk-abh02a:1590_11: Caṅkamena nisajjāyāti sakalampi divasaṃ iminā iriyāpathadvayeneva viharanto.
atk-abh02a:1590_12: Cittassa āvaraṇato āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi pañcahipi nīvaraṇehi sabbākusaladhammehi vā cittaṃ parisodheti.
atk-abh02a:1591_6: kāmabhogī vāmena passena sentī”ti ayaṃ kāmabhogīseyyā.
atk-abh02a:1591_7: Tesu hi yebhuyyena dakkhiṇapassena sayāno nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:1591_11: appamaṃsalohitattā hi aṭṭhisaṅghāṭajaṭitā ekena passena sayituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-abh02a:1591_16: tejussadattā hi sīho migarājā dve purimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne dve pacchimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetvā naṅguṭṭhaṃ
atk-abh02a:1591_17: antarasatthimhi pakkhipitvā purimapādapacchimapādanaṅguṭṭhānaṃ ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkhetvā dvinnaṃ purimapādānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1591_19: divasampi sayitvā pabujjhamāno na uttasanto pabujjhati,
atk-abh02a:1591_20: sīsaṃ pana ukkhipitvā purimapādādīnaṃ ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkheti;
atk-abh02a:1591_21: sace kiñci ṭhānaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitaṃ hoti ‘nayidaṃ tuyhaṃ jātiyā na sūrabhāvassa anurūpa’nti anattamano hutvā tattheva sayati,
atk-abh02a:1591_23: avijahitvā ṭhite pana ‘tuyhaṃ jātiyā ca sūrabhāvassa ca anurūpamida’nti haṭṭhatuṭṭho uṭṭhāya sīhavijambhitaṃ
atk-abh02a:1591_24: vijambhitvā kesarabhāraṃ vidhunitvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā gocarāya pakkamati.
atk-abh02a:1592_1: Accādhāyāti atiādhāya īsakaṃ atikkamma ṭhapetvā gopphakena hi gopphake jāṇunā vā jāṇumhi saṅghaṭṭiyamāne abhiṇhaṃ vedanā uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:1592_9: Sato sampajānoti satiyā ceva sampajānapaññāya ca samannāgato hutvā.
atk-abh02a:1592_11: Uṭṭhānasaññaṃ manasikaritvāti asukavelāya nāma uṭṭhahissāmī’ti evaṃ uṭṭhānavelāparicchedakaṃ uṭṭhānasaññaṃ citte upetvā.
atk-abh02a:1592_12: Evaṃ katvā nipanno hi yathāparicchinnakāleyeva uṭṭhātuṃ yutto.
atk-abh02a:1593_1: Sātaccaṃ nepakkanti satataṃ pavattayitabbato sātaccasaṅkhātaṃ vīriyañceva paripākagatattā nepakkasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-abh02a:1593_2: paññañca yutto anuyutto pavattayamānoyeva jāgariyānuyogaṃ anuyutto viharatīti attho.
atk-abh02a:1594_1: Bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānanti catusaccabodhisaṅkhātassa maggañāṇassa pakkhe bhavānaṃ dhammānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1594_2: Ettāvatā sabbepi sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhamme samūhato gahetvā lokiyāyapi bhāvanāya ekārammaṇe ekato
atk-abh02a:1595_1: Abhikkantetiādiniddese abhikkante paṭikkanteti ettha tāva abhikkantaṃ vuccati purato gamanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1595_4: Gamane tāva purato kāyaṃ abhiharanto abhikkamati nāma,
atk-abh02a:1595_6: Ṭhānepi ṭhitakova kāyaṃ purato onāmento abhikkamati nāma,
atk-abh02a:1595_8: Nisajjāyapi nisinnakova āsannassa purimaaṅgābhimukho saṃsaranto abhikkamati nāma,
atk-abh02a:1596_4: Taṃ pana sampajaññaṃ yasmā satisampayuttameva hoti,
atk-abh02a:1597_0: Ayañhi abhikkamanto vā paṭikkamanto vā na muṭṭhassatī asampajāno hoti;
atk-abh02a:1597_1: satiyā pana samannāgato paññāya ca sampajānoyeva abhikkamati ceva paṭikkamati ca;
atk-abh02a:1597_8: Tattha abhikkamanacitte uppanne cittavaseneva agantvā ‘kinnu me ettha gatena attho atthi,
atk-abh02a:1597_11: Cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā disvāpi hi buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ,
atk-abh02a:1597_12: saṅghadassanena saṅghārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā tadeva khayavayato sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh02a:1597_14: asubhaṃ disvā tattha paṭhamajjhānaṃ uppādetvā tadeva khayavayato sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh02a:1598_0: Tasmiṃ pana gamane sappāyāsappāyaṃ pariggahetvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṃ ‘sappāyasampajaññaṃ’,
atk-abh02a:1598_3: Sace pana cetiyassa mahatiyā pūjāya dasadvādasayojanantare parisā sannipatanti,
atk-abh02a:1598_4: attano vibhavānurūpaṃ itthiyopi purisāpi alaṅkatapaṭiyattā cittakammarūpakāni viya sañcaranti,
atk-abh02a:1598_14: Sace pana antogāme mahāmaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā sabbarattiṃ dhammassavanaṃ karontesu manussesu vuttappakāreneva janasannipāto ceva antarāyo ca hoti.
atk-abh02a:1599_2: eko kira daharabhikkhu sāmaṇeraṃ gahetvā dantakaṭṭhatthāya gato.
atk-abh02a:1599_3: Sāmaṇero maggā okkamitvā purato gacchanto asubhaṃ disvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tadeva pādakaṃ katvā
atk-abh02a:1599_4: saṅkhāre sammasanto tīṇi phalāni sacchikatvā uparimaggatthāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh02a:1599_6: So ‘mayā pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā saddhiṃ dve kathā nāma na kathitapubbā,
atk-abh02a:1599_10: iminā tāva maggena gantvā mayā ṭhitokāse muhuttaṃ puratthābhimukho ṭhatvā olokethā”ti āha.
atk-abh02a:1599_11: So tathā katvā tena pattavisesameva pāpuṇi.
atk-abh02a:1599_12: Evaṃ ekaṃ asubhaṃ dvinnaṃ janānaṃ atthāya jātaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1599_13: Evaṃ sātthampi panetaṃ purisassa mātugāmāsubhaṃ asappāyaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1600_0: Evaṃ pariggahitasātthasappāyassa pana aṭṭhatiṃsāya kammaṭṭhānesu attano cittaruciyaṃ kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-abh02a:1600_1: gocaraṃ uggahetvā bhikkhācāragocare taṃ gahetvāva gamanaṃ ‘gocarasampajaññaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh02a:1601_2: ekacco pana neva harati na paccāharati,
atk-abh02a:1601_4: Tattha yo bhikkhu divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetvā,
atk-abh02a:1601_5: tathā rattiyā paṭhamayāme majjhimayāme seyyaṃ kappetvā pacchimayāmepi nisajjācaṅkamehi vītināmetvā pageva
atk-abh02a:1601_6: cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavattaṃ katvā bodhirukkhe udakaṃ āsiñcitvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā
atk-abh02a:1601_8: so sarīraparikammaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā dve tayo pallaṅke usumaṃ gāhāpento kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitvā,
atk-abh02a:1601_9: bhikkhācāravelāya uṭṭhahitvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva pattacīvaramādāya senāsanato nikkhamitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontova cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā,
atk-abh02a:1601_10: sace buddhānussatikammaṭṭhānaṃ hoti taṃ avissajjetvāva cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ pavisati,
atk-abh02a:1601_11: aññaṃ ce kammaṭṭhānaṃ hoti sopānamūle ṭhatvā hatthena gahitabhaṇḍaṃ viya taṃ ṭhapetvā buddhārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh02a:1601_12: pītiṃ gahetvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruyha mahantaṃ cetiyaṃ ce,
atk-abh02a:1601_13: tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1601_15: tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1601_16: Cetiyaṃ vanditvā bodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ pattenāpi buddhassa bhagavato sammukhā viya nipaccākāraṃ dassetvā bodhi vanditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1602_0: So evaṃ cetiyañca bodhiñca vanditvā paṭisāmitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā,
atk-abh02a:1602_2: nikkhittakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gāmasamīpe kammaṭṭhānasīseneva cīvaraṃ pārupitvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati.
atk-abh02a:1602_3: Atha naṃ manussā disvā ‘ayyo no āgato’ti paccuggantvā pattaṃ gahetvā āsanasālāya vā gehe vā nisīdāpetvā
atk-abh02a:1602_4: yāguṃ datvā yāva bhattaṃ na niṭṭhāti tāva pāde dhovitvā telena makkhetvā purato nisīditvā pañhaṃ vā pucchanti
atk-abh02a:1602_6: Sacepi na kathāpenti “janasaṅgahatthaṃ dhammakathā nāma kātabbāyevā”ti aṭṭhakathācariyā vadanti.
atk-abh02a:1602_8: Tasmā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva āhāraṃ paribhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ vatvā nivattiyamānehipi manussehi anugatova
atk-abh02a:1602_9: gāmato nikkhamitvā tattha te nivattetvā maggaṃ paṭipajjati.
atk-abh02a:1603_0: Atha naṃ puretaraṃ nikkhamitvā bahigāme katabhattakiccā sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhū disvā paccuggantvā pattacīvaramassa gaṇhanti.
atk-abh02a:1603_2: amhākaṃ ācariyo’ti na mukhaṃ oloketvā vattaṃ karonti,
atk-abh02a:1603_9: yaṃ mātāpitūhipi dukkaraṃ taṃ ete manussā amhākaṃ karonti.
atk-abh02a:1603_13: Edisā nāma amhākaṃ upakārino natthī”ti tesaṃ guṇe kathento gacchati.
atk-abh02a:1604_0: Yassa pana pageva vuttappakāraṃ vattapaṭipattiṃ karontassa kammajatejo pajjalati,
atk-abh02a:1604_4: so pageva pattacīvaramādāya vegasāva cetiyaṃ vanditvā gorūpānaṃ nikkhamanavelāyameva gāmaṃ yāgubhikkhāya
atk-abh02a:1604_5: pavisitvā yāguṃ labhitvā āsanasālaṃ gantvā pivati.
atk-abh02a:1604_6: Athassa dvattikkhattuṃ ajjhoharaṇamatteneva kammajatejodhātu upādinnakaṃ muñcitvā anupādinnakaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-abh02a:1604_7: ghaṭasatena nhāto viya tejodhātupariḷāhanibbānaṃ patvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena yāguṃ paribhuñjitvā pattañca
atk-abh02a:1604_8: mukhañca dhovitvā antarābhatte kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikatvā avasesaṭṭhāne piṇḍāya caritvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena
atk-abh02a:1604_9: āhāraṃ paribhuñjitvā tato paṭṭhāya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ upaṭṭhahamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva āgacchati.
atk-abh02a:1604_11: Edisā ca bhikkhū yāguṃ pivitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā buddhasāsane arahattaṃ pattā nāma gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā.
atk-abh02a:1604_12: Sīhaḷadīpeyeva tesu tesu gāmesu āsanasālāya na taṃ āsanaṃ atthi,
atk-abh02a:1604_13: yattha yāguṃ pivitvā arahattaṃ pattā bhikkhū natthīti.
atk-abh02a:1605_0: Yo pamādavihārī hoti nikkhittadhuro sabbavattāni bhinditvā pañcavidhacetokhīlavinibandhabaddhacitto viharanto
atk-abh02a:1605_1: ‘kammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthī’tipi saññaṃ akatvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā ananulomikena gihīsaṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭho
atk-abh02a:1605_2: caritvā ca bhuñjitvā ca tuccho nikkhamati –
atk-abh02a:1606_0: Yo panāyaṃ “harati ca paccāharati cā”ti vutto,
atk-abh02a:1606_2: atthakāmā hi kulaputtā sāsane pabbajitvā dasampi vīsampi tiṃsampi cattārīsampi paññāsampi satampi ekato vasantā katikavattaṃ katvā viharanti – “āvuso,
atk-abh02a:1606_7: Tasmā gamane uppannakilesaṃ gamaneyeva niggaṇhatha. Ṭhāne,
atk-abh02a:1607_0: Te evaṃ katikavattaṃ katvā bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantā,
atk-abh02a:1607_7: So ‘ayaṃ bhikkhu tuyhaṃ uppannaṃ vitakkaṃ jānāti,
atk-abh02a:1607_8: ananucchavikaṃ te eta’nti attānaṃ paṭicodetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati.
atk-abh02a:1607_10: Athassa pacchato āgacchantopi nisīdatīti so eva nayo.
atk-abh02a:1607_11: Ariyabhūmiṃ okkamituṃ asakkontopi taṃ kilesaṃ vikkhambhetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontova gacchati,
atk-abh02a:1607_15: So kira ekūnavīsati vassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūrento eva vihāsi.
atk-abh02a:1607_16: Manussāpi antarāmagge kasantā ca vapantā ca maddantā ca kammāni ca karontā theraṃ tathāgacchantaṃ disvā “ayaṃ thero punappunaṃ nivattitvā gacchati,
atk-abh02a:1607_17: kiṃ nu kho maggamūḷho udāhu kiñci pamuṭṭho”ti samullapanti.
atk-abh02a:1607_18: So taṃ anādiyitvā kammaṭṭhānayuttacitteneva samaṇadhammaṃ karonto vīsativassabbhantare arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-abh02a:1607_19: Arahattapattadivase cassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ adhivatthā devatā aṅgulīhi dīpaṃ ujjāletvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh02a:1607_20: Cattāropi mahārājāno sakko ca devānamindo brahmā ca sahampati upaṭṭhānaṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-abh02a:1607_21: Tañca obhāsaṃ disvā vanavāsī mahātissatthero taṃ dutiyadivase pucchi –
atk-abh02a:1607_24: Thero vikkhepaṃ karonto “obhāso nāma dīpobhāsopi hoti,
atk-abh02a:1608_1: Sopi kira gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūrento ‘paṭhamaṃ tāva bhagavato mahāpadhānaṃ pūjessāmī’ti satta vassāni ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāsi;
atk-abh02a:1608_2: puna soḷasa vassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-abh02a:1608_3: So kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṃ uddharanto vippayuttena cittena uddhate pāde paṭinivattento gāmasīmaṃ gantvā ‘gāvī nu kho,
atk-abh02a:1608_4: pabbajito nu kho’ti āsaṅkanīyappadese ṭhatvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā kacchakantarato udakena pattaṃ dhovitvā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ karoti.
atk-abh02a:1608_6: ‘Mā me bhikkhaṃ dātuṃ vā vandituṃ vā āgate manusse ‘dīghāyukā hothā’ti vacanamattenāpi kammaṭṭhānavikkhepo ahosī’ti. ‘Ajja, bhante,
atk-abh02a:1608_7: katimī’ti divasaṃ vā bhikkhugaṇanaṃ vā pañhaṃ vā pucchito pana udakaṃ gilitvā āroceti;
atk-abh02a:1609_0: Kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatā paññāsa bhikkhū viya ca.
atk-abh02a:1609_3: Gāmañca piṇḍāya pavisantā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ katvā pavisiṃsu,
atk-abh02a:1609_9: ‘kinnu kho ete amheheva saddhiṃ na sallapanti udāhu aññamaññampi?
atk-abh02a:1609_12: etha ne aññamaññaṃ khamāpessāmā’ti sabbe vihāraṃ gantvā paññāsāya bhikkhūsu dvepi bhikkhū ekokāse nāddasaṃsu.
atk-abh02a:1609_13: Tato yo tesu cakkhumā puriso so āha – “na, bho,
atk-abh02a:1609_19: Tepi bhikkhū antotemāseyeva arahattaṃ patvā mahāpavāraṇāya visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāresuṃ.
atk-abh02a:1610_1: kalambutitthavihāre vassūpagatabhikkhū viya ca kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṃ uddharanto gāmasamīpaṃ
atk-abh02a:1610_2: gantvā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ katvā vīthiyo sallakkhetvā yattha surāsoṇḍadhuttādayo kalahakārakā caṇḍahatthiassādayo
atk-abh02a:1610_5: Tattha piṇḍāya caramāno na turitaturito viya javena gacchati,
atk-abh02a:1610_6: na hi javanapiṇḍapātikadhutaṅgaṃ nāma kiñci atthi,
atk-abh02a:1610_7: visamabhūmibhāgappattaṃ pana udakasakaṭaṃ viya niccalo hutvā gacchati,
atk-abh02a:1610_8: anugharaṃ paviṭṭho ca dātukāmaṃ vā adātukāmaṃ vā sallakkhetuṃ tadanurūpaṃ kālaṃ āgamento bhikkhaṃ gahetvā
atk-abh02a:1610_9: antogāme vā bahigāme vā vihārameva vā āgantvā,
atk-abh02a:1610_12: akkhabbhañjanavaṇālepanaputtamaṃsūpamavasena paccavekkhanto aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ āhāraṃ āhāreti neva davāya,
atk-abh02a:1610_17: Bhuttāvī ca udakakiccaṃ katvā muhuttaṃ bhattakilamathaṃ paṭippassambhetvā yathā purebhattaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1610_18: evaṃ pacchābhattaṃ purimayāmaṃ pacchimayāmañca kammaṭṭhānameva manasikaroti.
atk-abh02a:1611_3: no ce paṭhamavaye pāpuṇāti atha majjhimavaye,
atk-abh02a:1611_4: no ce majjhimavaye pāpuṇāti atha pacchimavaye,
atk-abh02a:1611_5: no ce pacchimavaye pāpuṇāti atha maraṇasamaye,
atk-abh02a:1611_6: no ce maraṇasamaye pāpuṇāti atha devaputto hutvā,
atk-abh02a:1611_7: no ce devaputto hutvā pāpuṇāti anuppanne buddhe nibbatto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikaroti,
atk-abh02a:1611_8: no ce paccekabodhiṃ sacchikaroti atha buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve khippābhiñño vā hoti –
atk-abh02a:1611_28: Iti imasmiṃ catukke yvāyaṃ harati ca paccāharati ca,
atk-abh02a:1612_2: idha bhikkhu abhikkamanto vā paṭikkamanto vā yathā andhabālaputhujjanā abhikkamādīsu ‘attā abhikkamati,
atk-abh02a:1612_5: tathā asammuyhanto ‘abhikkamāmī’ti citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānavāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1612_6: Iti cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāravasena ayaṃ kāyasammato aṭṭhisaṅghāto abhikkamati.
atk-abh02a:1612_7: Tassevaṃ abhikkamato ekekapāduddharaṇe pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
atk-abh02a:1612_10: Vossajjane tejodhātu vāyodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
atk-abh02a:1612_12: tathā sannikkhepanasannirujjhanesu tattha uddharaṇe pavattā rūpārūpadhammā atiharaṇaṃ na pāpuṇanti;
atk-abh02a:1612_17: tattha tattheva pabbaṃ pabbaṃ sandhi sandhi odhi odhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilaṃ viya paṭapaṭāyantā bhijjanti.
atk-abh02a:1613_0: Aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ, aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati;
atk-abh02a:1616_0: Niṭṭhito abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hotītipadassa attho.
atk-abh02a:1617_0: Ālokite vilokiteti ettha pana ālokitaṃ nāma purato pekkhanaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1617_2: Aññānipi heṭṭhā upari pacchato pekkhanavasena olokitaullokitāpalokitāni nāma honti.
atk-abh02a:1617_5: Iminā vā mukhena sabbānipi tāni gahitānevāti.
atk-abh02a:1618_0: Tattha ‘ālokessāmī’ti citte uppanne cittavaseneva anoloketvā atthapariggaṇhanaṃ ‘sātthakasampajaññaṃ’.
atk-abh02a:1618_1: Taṃ āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1619_3: sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā nando puratthimaṃ disaṃ āloketi –
atk-abh02a:1619_4: ‘evaṃ me puratthimaṃ disaṃ ālokayato na abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssavissantī’ti.
atk-abh02a:1619_11: sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā nando anudisaṃ anuviloketi –
atk-abh02a:1620_0: Apica idhāpi pubbe vuttacetiyadassanādivaseneva sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1621_2: kasiṇādikammaṭṭhānikehi vā pana kammaṭṭhānasīseneva ālokanavilokanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1622_0: Abbhantare attā nāma āloketā vā viloketā vā natthi.
atk-abh02a:1622_1: ‘Ālokessāmī’ti pana citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1622_2: Iti cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāravasena heṭṭhimaṃ akkhidalaṃ adho sīdati,
atk-abh02a:1622_5: Tato cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dassanakiccaṃ sādhentaṃ uppajjatī’ti evaṃ pajānanaṃ panettha ‘asammohasampajaññaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh02a:1626_0: Tattha bhavaṅgaṃ upapattibhavassa aṅgakiccaṃ sādhayamānaṃ pavattati;
atk-abh02a:1626_8: ayaṃ puriso’ti rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena ālokitavilokitaṃ na hoti;
atk-abh02a:1627_0: Cakkhudvāre pana rūpe āpāthagate bhavaṅgacalanato uddhaṃ sakasakakiccanipphādanavasena āvajjanādīsu uppajjitvā niruddhesu avasāne javanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1627_1: Taṃ pubbe uppannānaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āgantukapuriso viya hoti.
atk-abh02a:1627_2: Tassa yathā paragehe kiñci yācituṃ paviṭṭhassa āgantukapurisassa gehasāmikesupi tuṇhīmāsinesu āṇākaraṇaṃ na yuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1627_3: evaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āvajjanādīsupi arajjantesu adussantesu amuyhantesu ca rajjanadussanamuyhanaṃ ayuttanti.
atk-abh02a:1628_0: Yāni panetāni cakkhudvāre voṭṭhabbanapariyosānāni cittāni uppajjanti,
atk-abh02a:1628_1: tāni saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi tattha tattheva bhijjanti,
atk-abh02a:1628_2: aññamaññaṃ na passantīti ittarāni tāvakālikāni honti.
atk-abh02a:1628_3: Tattha yathā ekasmiṃ ghare sabbesu mānusakesu matesu avasesassa ekakassa taṅkhaṇaṃyeva maraṇadhammassa na yuttā naccagītādīsu abhirati nāma,
atk-abh02a:1628_4: evameva ekadvāre sasampayuttesu āvajjanādīsu tattha tattheva matesu avasesassa taṅkhaṇaṃññeva maraṇadhammassa
atk-abh02a:1628_5: javanassāpi rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena abhirati nāma na yuttāti.
atk-abh02a:1629_1: Ettha hi cakkhu ceva rūpāni ca rūpakkhandho,
atk-abh02a:1629_6: Evametesaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-abh02a:1630_4: Evametesaṃ catunnaṃ āyatanānaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-abh02a:1631_4: Evametāsaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-abh02a:1633_1: Tattha cittavaseneva samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ akatvā hatthapādānaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇapaccayā atthānatthaṃ pariggahetvā
atk-abh02a:1633_3: Tattha hatthapāde aticiraṃ samiñjitvā vā pasāretvā eva vā ṭhitassa khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjanti,
atk-abh02a:1633_7: kāle samiñjantassa kāle pasārentassa pana tā vedanā nuppajjanti,
atk-abh02a:1634_0: Atthe pana satipi sappāyāsappāyaṃ pariggahetvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṃ ‘sappāyasampajaññaṃ’.
atk-abh02a:1635_3: Tatreko daharo hatthaṃ pasārento kāyasaṃsaggaṃ patvā teneva kāraṇena gihī jāto.
atk-abh02a:1635_4: Aparo bhikkhu pādaṃ pasārento aggimhi pasāresi.
atk-abh02a:1635_10: Tasmā evarūpe asappāye apasāretvā sappāye pasāretabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1636_1: mahāthero kira divāṭṭhāne nisinno antevāsikehi saddhiṃ kathayamāno sahasā hatthaṃ samiñjitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṃ samiñjesi.
atk-abh02a:1636_3: sahasā hatthaṃ samiñjitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṃ samiñjitthā”ti?
atk-abh02a:1636_6: na me kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā hattho samiñjitapubbo.
atk-abh02a:1636_7: Idāni pana me tumhehi saddhiṃ kathayamānena kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā samiñjito.
atk-abh02a:1636_8: Tasmā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā samiñjesi”nti. “Sādhu, bhante,
atk-abh02a:1637_0: ‘Abbhantare attā nāma koci samiñjento vā pasārento vā natthi.
atk-abh02a:1638_0: Saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇeti ettha saṅghāṭicīvarānaṃ nivāsanapārupanavasena pattassa bhikkhāpaṭiggahaṇādivasena paribhogo ‘dhāraṇaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh02a:1638_1: Tattha saṅghāṭicīvaradhāraṇe tāva nivāsetvā pārupitvā ca piṇḍāya carato “āmisalābho sītassa paṭighātāyā”tiādinā
atk-abh02a:1638_2: nayena bhagavatā vuttappakāroyeva ca attho ‘attho’ nāma.
atk-abh02a:1639_0: Uṇhapakatikassa pana dubbalassa ca cīvaraṃ sukhumaṃ sappāyaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1639_6: Tādisañhi araññe ekakassa nivāsantarāyakaraṃ jīvitantarāyakarañcāpi hoti.
atk-abh02a:1640_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci cīvaraṃ pārupanto natthi.
atk-abh02a:1640_10: Tasmā neva sundaraṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā somanassaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1640_12: Nāgavammikacetiyarukkhādīsu hi keci mālāgandhadhūpavatthādīhi sakkāraṃ karonti,
atk-abh02a:1640_14: Na tehi nāgavammikarukkhādayo somanassaṃ vā domanassaṃ vā karonti.
atk-abh02a:1640_15: Evameva neva sundaraṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā somanassaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1641_0: Pattadhāraṇepi pattaṃ sahasāva aggahetvā ‘imaṃ gahetvā piṇḍāya caramāno bhikkhaṃ labhissāmī’ti evaṃ pattaggahaṇapaccayā
atk-abh02a:1641_6: Maṇivaṇṇapatto pana lobhanīyova cīvare vuttanayeneva asappāyo.
atk-abh02a:1642_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci pattaṃ gaṇhanto natthi.
atk-abh02a:1643_0: Apica yathā chinnahatthapāde vaṇamukhehi paggharitapubbalohitakimikule nīlamakkhikasamparikiṇṇe anāthasālāyaṃ
atk-abh02a:1643_1: anāthamanusse disvā dayālukā purisā tesaṃ vaṇabandhapaṭṭacoḷakāni ceva kapālādīhi ca bhesajjāni upanāmenti.
atk-abh02a:1643_2: Tattha coḷakānipi kesañci saṇhāni kesañci thūlāni pāpuṇanti.
atk-abh02a:1643_3: Bhesajjakapālakānipi kesañci susaṇṭhānāni kesañci dussaṇṭhānāni pāpuṇanti.
atk-abh02a:1643_4: Na te tattha sumanā vā honti dummanā vā.
atk-abh02a:1643_7: Evameva yo bhikkhu vaṇacoḷakaṃ viya cīvaraṃ,
atk-abh02a:1643_9: kapāle bhesajjamiva ca patte laddhabhikkhaṃ sallakkheti –
atk-abh02a:1644_4: Tattha “neva davāyā”tiādinā nayena vutto aṭṭhavidhopi attho ‘attho’ nāma.
atk-abh02a:1645_0: Lūkhapaṇītatittamadhurādīsu pana yena bhojanena yassa aphāsu hoti,
atk-abh02a:1646_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci bhuñjako natthi.
atk-abh02a:1646_2: Cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāreneva hatthassa patte otāraṇaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:1646_12: Iti naṃ tattha aggajivhāya tanukakheḷo mūlajivhāya bahalakheḷo makkheti.
atk-abh02a:1646_13: Taṃ heṭṭhādantaudukkhale jivhāhatthaparivattitaṃ kheḷaudakatemitaṃ uparidantamusalasañcuṇṇitaṃ koci kaṭacchunā
atk-abh02a:1646_14: vā dabbiyā vā anto pavesento nāma natthi;
atk-abh02a:1646_16: Paviṭṭhaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ koci palālasanthāraṃ katvā dhārento nāma natthi;
atk-abh02a:1646_18: Ṭhitaṃ ṭhitaṃ koci uddhanaṃ katvā aggiṃ jāletvā pacanto nāma natthi;
atk-abh02a:1646_20: Pakkaṃ pakkaṃ koci daṇḍakena vā yaṭṭhiyā vā bahi nīhārako nāma natthi;
atk-abh02a:1646_22: Iti vāyodhātu atiharati ca vītiharati ca dhāreti ca parivatteti ca sañcuṇṇeti ca visoseti ca nīharati ca.

atk-abh02a:1648_0: Uccārapassāvakammeti uccārassa ca passāvassa ca karaṇe.
atk-abh02a:1648_1: Tattha pakkakāle uccārapassāvaṃ akarontassa sakalasarīrato sedā muccanti,
atk-abh02a:1648_5: karontassa pana sabbaṃ taṃ na hotīti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh02a:1649_0: Aṭṭhāne uccārapassāvaṃ karontassa pana āpatti hoti,
atk-abh02a:1649_3: patirūpe ṭhāne karontassa sabbaṃ taṃ na hotīti idamettha sappāyaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1650_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci uccārapassāvakammaṃ karonto natthi.
atk-abh02a:1650_2: Yathā pana pakke gaṇḍe gaṇḍabhedena pubbalohitaṃ akāmatāya nikkhamati,
atk-abh02a:1650_3: yathā ca atibharitā udakabhājanā udakaṃ akāmatāya nikkhamati,
atk-abh02a:1650_4: evaṃ pakkāsayamuttavatthīsu sannicitā uccārapassāvā vāyuvegasamuppīḷitā akāmatāyapi nikkhamanti.
atk-abh02a:1650_5: So panāyaṃ evaṃ nikkhamanto uccārapassāvo neva tassa bhikkhuno attano hoti na parassa;
atk-abh02a:1650_8: Yathā udakatumbhato purāṇaudakaṃ chaḍḍentassa neva taṃ attano hoti na paresaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1652_1: eko hi bhikkhu gacchanto aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ vitakkento gacchati.
atk-abh02a:1652_5: sayanto aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ vitakkento sayati.
atk-abh02a:1653_0: Ettakena pana na pākaṭaṃ hotīti caṅkamena dīpayiṃsu.
atk-abh02a:1653_1: Yo hi bhikkhu caṅkamanaṃ otaritvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ṭhito pariggaṇhāti;
atk-abh02a:1653_2: ‘pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattā rūpārūpadhammā pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
atk-abh02a:1653_3: pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattāpi pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
atk-abh02a:1653_4: caṅkamanavemajjhe pavattā ubho koṭiyo appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
atk-abh02a:1653_5: caṅkamane pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ṭhānaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
atk-abh02a:1653_7: nisajjāya pavattā sayanaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā’ti evaṃ pariggaṇhanto pariggaṇhantoyeva bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti;
atk-abh02a:1653_9: ayaṃ bhikkhu gatādīsu sampajānakārī nāma hotīti.
atk-abh02a:1654_0: Evaṃ pana sutte kammaṭṭhānaṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1654_2: Tasmā yo bhikkhu yāva sakkoti tāva caṅkamitvā ṭhatvā nisīditvā sayamāno evaṃ pariggahetvā sayati –
atk-abh02a:1654_10: Evaṃ pariggaṇhanto pariggaṇhantoyeva cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti,
atk-abh02a:1655_1: Tattha ‘kiriyāmayapavattassa appavattiyā sati jāgaritaṃ nāma na hoti;
atk-abh02a:1655_2: kiriyāmayapavattavaḷañje pavattante jāgaritaṃ nāma hotī’ti pariggaṇhanto bhikkhu jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:1655_3: Apica rattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pañca koṭṭhāse jaggantopi jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:1656_1: Tattha ‘upādārūpassa saddāyatanassa appavatte sati bhāsitaṃ nāma na hoti;
atk-abh02a:1656_2: tasmiṃ pavattante hotī’ti pariggāhako bhikkhu bhāsite sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:1656_3: Vimuttāyatanasīsena dhammaṃ desentopi bāttiṃsa tiracchānakathā pahāya dasakathāvatthunissitaṃ kathaṃ kathentopi bhāsite sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:1657_1: Tattha ‘upādārūpassa saddāyatanassa pavattiyaṃ sati tuṇhībhāvo nāma natthi;
atk-abh02a:1657_2: appavattiyaṃ hotī’ti pariggāhako bhikkhu tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:1657_3: Aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nisinnopi dutiyajjhānaṃ samāpannopi tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārīyeva nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:1658_0: Ettha ca eko iriyāpatho dvīsu ṭhānesu āgato.
atk-abh02a:1658_1: So heṭṭhā abhikkante paṭikkanteti ettha bhikkhācāragāmaṃ gacchato ca āgacchato ca addhānagamanavasena kathito.
atk-abh02a:1658_2: Gate ṭhite nisinneti ettha vihāre cuṇṇikapāduddhārairiyāpathavasena kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1660_2: Etassa bhikkhuno upāsanaṭṭhānaṃ yogapathaṃ sappāyasenāsanaṃ dasseti.
atk-abh02a:1660_3: Yassa hi abbhantare ettakā guṇā atthi,
atk-abh02a:1660_7: Evarūpassa hi araññavāso kāḷamakkaṭaacchataracchadīpimigādīnaṃ aṭavīvāsasadiso hoti. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:1660_9: Tassa hi araññavāsamūlako koci attho natthi;
atk-abh02a:1660_12: Yassa pana abbhantare ettakā guṇā atthi,
atk-abh02a:1660_14: So hi araññavāsaṃ nissāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhitvā parinibbāti,
atk-abh02a:1660_18: Tasmā satthā evarūpassa bhikkhuno upāsanaṭṭhānaṃ yogapathaṃ sappāyasenāsanaṃ dassento so vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ bhajatītiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:1660_20: Etameva hi atthaṃ dassetuṃ tañca anākiṇṇantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1660_22: Tattha yassa senāsanassa sāmantā gāvutampi aḍḍhayojanampi pabbatagahanaṃ vanagahanaṃ nadīgahanaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:1660_25: Yaṃ pana aḍḍhayojanikaṃ vā yojanikaṃ vā hoti –
atk-abh02a:1660_26: idaṃ dūratāya eva anākiṇṇaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:1661_1: Seti ceva āsati ca etthāti senāsanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1661_2: Tassa pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ mañco pīṭhantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1661_17: Vihāroti samantā parihārapathaṃ antoyeva rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni dassetvā katasenāsanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1661_19: Pāsādoti dve kaṇṇikāni gahetvā kato dīghapāsādo.
atk-abh02a:1661_20: Aṭṭoti paṭirājādipaṭibāhanatthaṃ iṭṭhakāhi kato bahalabhittiko catupañcabhūmiko patissayaviseso.
atk-abh02a:1661_23: Leṇanti pabbataṃ khaṇitvā vā pabbhārassa appahonakaṭṭhāne kuṭṭaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā vā katasenāsanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1661_24: Guhāti bhūmidari vā yattha rattindivaṃ dīpaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-abh02a:1661_26: Rukkhamūlanti rukkhassa heṭṭhā parikkhittaṃ vā aparikkhittaṃ vā.
atk-abh02a:1661_28: Yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantīti ṭhapetvā vā etāni mañcādīni yattha bhikkhū sannipatanti,
atk-abh02a:1662_2: Sambhajatīti tattha abhirativasena anukkaṇṭhito suṭṭhu upeti.
atk-abh02a:1662_3: Sevatīti nivāsanavasena sevati nisevatīti anukkaṇṭhamāno sannisito hutvā sevati.
atk-abh02a:1663_2: tassa pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ araññaṃ rukkhamūlantiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1663_3: Tattha araññanti vinayapariyāyena tāva “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ arañña”nti āgataṃ.
atk-abh02a:1663_4: Suttantapariyāyena āraññikaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya “āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikapacchima”nti āgataṃ.
atk-abh02a:1663_6: Abhidhammo nippariyāyadesanāti abhidhammapariyāyena araññaṃ dassetuṃ nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlāti vuttaṃ;
atk-abh02a:1664_1: Rukkhamūlādīnaṃ pakatiyā ca suviññeyyabhāvato rukkhamūlaṃyeva rukkhamūlantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1664_2: Apicettha rukkhamūlanti yaṃkiñci sītacchāyaṃ vivittaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1664_4: Tattha hi udakasoṇḍīsu udakakiccaṃ katvā sītāya rukkhacchāyāya nisinnassa nānādisāsu khāyamānāsu sītena vātena bījiyamānassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1664_11: Evarūpaṃ kandaraṃ oruyha pānīyaṃ pivitvā gattāni sītaṃ katvā vālikaṃ ussāpetvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ paññapetvā
atk-abh02a:1664_12: nisinnassa samaṇadhammaṃ karoto cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1665_3: Tenevassa niddese “vanapatthanti dūrānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacana”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1665_4: Yasmā vā rukkhamūlādīsu idamevekaṃ bhājetvā dassitaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1665_5: tasmāssa nikkhepapaṭipāṭiyā niddesaṃ akatvā sabbapariyante niddeso katoti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1665_9: Mahāpalālapuñjato hi palālaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā pabbhāraleṇasadise ālaye karonti,
atk-abh02a:1665_10: gacchagumbādīnampi upari palālaṃ pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā nisinnā samaṇadhammaṃ karonti;
atk-abh02a:1665_12: Vanapatthaniddese salomahaṃsānanti yattha paviṭṭhassa lomahaṃso uppajjati;
atk-abh02a:1665_15: Na manussūpacārānanti kasanavapanavasena manussehi upacaritabbaṃ vanantaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1667_3: tasmāssa niddese “yadeva taṃ appasaddaṃ tadeva taṃ appanigghosa”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1667_8: tadeva janasañcaraṇena ca janavādena ca virahitaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:1667_9: tasmāssa niddese “yadeva taṃ appanigghosaṃ tadeva taṃ vijanavāta”nti vuttaṃ.

atk-abh02a:1669_4: Athassa yā tesaṃ paṇamanapaccayā khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-abh02a:1669_6: Tāsu na uppajjamānāsu cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:1670_0: 536. Ujuko hoti kāyo ṭhito paṇihitoti idampi hi imamevatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1671_1: Parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapayitvā,
atk-abh02a:1671_3: Teneva vuttaṃ “ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti sūpaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā”ti.

atk-abh02a:1672_3: abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyāti lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena pañcupādānakkhandhā loko.
atk-abh02a:1672_4: Tasmā pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu rāgaṃ pahāya kāmacchandaṃ vikkhambhetvāti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh02a:1674_1: Abhijjhāya cittaṃ parisodhetīti abhijjhāto cittaṃ parisodheti;
atk-abh02a:1675_1: Byāpādadosaṃ pahāyātiādīnampi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1675_2: Byāpajjati iminā cittaṃ pūtikummāsādayo viya pakatiṃ jahatīti byāpādo.
atk-abh02a:1676_4: Santā hontīti ime dvepi dhammā nirodhasantatāya santā hontīti.
atk-abh02a:1677_1: Ālokasaññīti rattimpi divāpi diṭṭhālokasañjānanasamatthāya vigatanīvaraṇāya parisuddhāya saññāya samannāgato.
atk-abh02a:1678_1: Sato sampajānoti satiyā ca ñāṇena ca samannāgato.
atk-abh02a:1679_1: Vigatathinamiddhatāya pana ālokasaññāya niddesapadesu cattattātiādīni aññamaññavevacanāneva.
atk-abh02a:1679_9: Paṭimuñcato vā nissaṭṭhattā bhāvanābalena abhibhuyya nissaṭṭhattāti attho.
atk-abh02a:1681_2: Niddesepissa tiṇṇoti idaṃ vicikicchāya animuggabhāvadassanavasena vuttaṃ.
