atk-abh02a:1779_2: Dārakā tesaṃ taṃ taṃ bhāsaṃ vavatthāpenti –
atk-abh02a:1779_5: Gacchante gacchante kāle sabbampi bhāsaṃ jānanti.
atk-abh02a:1779_8: Tesaṃ jāto dārako sace mātukathaṃ paṭhamaṃ suṇāti,
atk-abh02a:1779_12: Ubhinnampi pana kathaṃ assuṇanto māgadhabhāsaṃ bhāsissati.
atk-abh02a:1780_2: sopi attano dhammatāya vacanaṃ samuṭṭhāpento māgadhabhāsameva bhāsissati. Niraye,
atk-abh02a:1780_7: Tattha sesā oṭṭakirātaandhakayonakadamiḷabhāsādikā aṭṭhārasa bhāsā parivattanti.
atk-abh02a:1780_9: Sammāsabuddhopi tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ tantiṃ āropento māgadhabhāsāya eva āropesi. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:1780_11: Māgadhabhāsāya hi tantiṃ āruḷhassa buddhavacanassa paṭisambhidāppattānaṃ sotapathāgamanameva papañco;
atk-abh02a:1780_12: sote pana saṅghaṭṭitamatteyeva nayasatena nayasahassena attho upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a:1780_13: Aññāya pana bhāsāya tantiṃ āruḷhaṃ pothetvā pothetvā uggahetabbaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1780_14: Bahumpi uggahetvā pana puthujjanassa paṭisambhidāppatti nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:1781_0: Ñāṇesu ñāṇanti sabbatthakañāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā ñāṇaṃ paccavekkhantassa pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti.
atk-abh02a:1781_1: Imā pana catassopi paṭisambhidā dvīsu ṭhānesu pabhedaṃ gacchanti,
atk-abh02a:1781_5: Tattha sāriputtattherassa mahāmoggallānattherassa mahākassapattherassa mahākaccāyanattherassa mahākoṭṭhitattherassāti
atk-abh02a:1781_6: asītiyāpi mahātherānaṃ paṭisambhidā asekkhabhūmiyaṃ pabhedaṃ gatā.
atk-abh02a:1781_7: Ānandattherassa cittassa gahapatino dhammikassa upāsakassa upālissa gahapatino khujjuttarāya upāsikāyāti
atk-abh02a:1781_8: evamādīnaṃ paṭisambhidā sekkhabhūmiyaṃ pabhedaṃ gatāti imāsu dvīsu bhūmīsu pabhedaṃ gacchanti.
atk-abh02a:1782_0: Katamehi pañcahi kāraṇehi paṭisambhidā visadā hontīti?
atk-abh02a:1782_10: Sakkaccañhi dhammaṃ suṇantassa paṭisambhidā visadā honti.
atk-abh02a:1782_12: Uggahitapāḷiyā atthaṃ kathentassa hi paṭisambhidā visadā honti.
atk-abh02a:1782_16: Tattha arahattappattiyā punabbasukuṭumbikaputtassa tissattherassa paṭisambhidā visadā ahesuṃ.
atk-abh02a:1782_17: So kira tambapaṇṇidīpe buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā paratīraṃ gantvā yonakadhammarakkhitattherassa santike
atk-abh02a:1782_18: buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā āgacchanto nāvaṃ abhiruhanatitthe ekasmiṃ pade uppannakaṅkho yojanasatamaggaṃ
atk-abh02a:1782_19: nivattitvā ācariyassa santikaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge ekassa kuṭumbikassa pañhaṃ kathesi.
atk-abh02a:1782_22: Thero vāsiyā koṭṭetvā nisīdanaṭṭhāne paribhaṇḍaṃ kāresi.
atk-abh02a:1782_26: “amhākaṃ gatamaggaṃ āvajjetvā anāgate sabrahmacārino paṭipattiṃ pūretabbaṃ maññissantī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1782_27: Tissattheropi ācariyassa santike kaṅkhaṃ chinditvā jambukolapaṭṭane oruyha cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjanavelāya vālikavihāraṃ patvā sammajji.
atk-abh02a:1782_28: Tassa sammajjitaṭṭhānaṃ disvā ‘idaṃ vītarāgassa bhikkhuno sammaṭṭhaṭṭhāna’nti therassa vīmaṃsanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-abh02a:1783_0: Pariyattiyā pana tissadattattherassa ceva nāgasenattherassa ca paṭisambhidā visadā ahesuṃ.
atk-abh02a:1783_2: So kira talaṅgaravāsī dhammadinnattherassa bhāgineyyo khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ patto mātulattherassa dhammavinicchayaṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a:1783_3: nisīditvā suṇantoyeva tīṇi piṭakāni paguṇāni akāsi.
atk-abh02a:1783_4: Uggahitapāḷiyā atthaṃ kathentassa pana tissadattattherassa eva paṭisambhidā visadā ahesuṃ.
atk-abh02a:1783_5: Gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pana pūretvā yāva anulomaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ ussukkāpetvā āgatānaṃ visadabhāvappattapaṭisambhidānaṃ pubbayogāvacarānaṃ anto natthi.
atk-abh02a:1784_5: Pariyattisavanaparipucchā hi pubbe hontu vā mā vā,
atk-abh02a:1784_6: pubbayogena pubbe ceva etarahi ca saṅkhārasammasanaṃ vinā paṭisambhidā nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:1784_7: Ime pana dvepi ekato hutvā paṭisambhidā upatthambhetvā visadā karontīti.
atk-abh02a:1787_1: Idāni ye saṅgahavāre pañca atthā ca dhammā ca saṅgahitā,
atk-abh02a:1787_2: tesaṃ pabhedadassananayena paṭisambhidā vibhajituṃ puna catassotiādinā nayena pabhedavāro āraddho.
atk-abh02a:1787_4: Tattha paccayasamuppannassa dukkhasaccassa paccayena pattabbassa nibbānassa ca atthabhāvaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1787_5: phalanibbattakassa samudayassa nibbānasampāpakassa ariyamaggassa ca dhammabhāvañca dassetuṃ ‘saccavāro’ vutto.
atk-abh02a:1787_6: Yassa kassaci pana hetuphalanibbattakassa hetuno dhammabhāvaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1787_8: Tattha ca hetuphalakkamavasena uppaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā niddiṭṭhā.
atk-abh02a:1787_9: Ye pana dhammā tamhā tamhā rūpārūpappabhedā hetuto jātā,
atk-abh02a:1787_11: tassa tassa ca rūpārūpadhammappabhedassa hetuno dhammabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ‘dhammavāro’ vutto.
atk-abh02a:1787_14: Tato pariyattisaṅkhātassa tassa tassa bhāsitassa dhammabhāvaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1787_15: bhāsitasaṅkhātena paccayena pattabbassa bhāsitatthassa ca atthabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ‘pariyattivāro’ vutto.
atk-abh02a:1788_0: Tattha ca yasmā bhāsitaṃ ñatvā tassattho ñāyati,
atk-abh02a:1788_1: tasmā bhāsitabhāsitatthakkamena uppaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā niddiṭṭhā.
atk-abh02a:1788_2: Pariyattidhammassa ca pabhedadassanatthaṃ “tattha katamā dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti pucchāpubbaṅgamo paṭiniddesavāro vutto.
atk-abh02a:1788_3: Tattha suttantiādīhi navahi aṅgehi nippadesato tanti gahitā.
atk-abh02a:1788_5: ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa atthoti imasmimpi ṭhāne bhāsitavasena nippadesato tanti eva gahitāti.
atk-abh02a:1791_3: Sā hi nibbānārammaṇānaṃ maggaphalañāṇānaṃ vasena lokuttarāpi hoti.
atk-abh02a:1791_4: Abhidhammabhājanīye kusalākusalavipākakiriyānaṃ vasena catūhi vārehi vibhattaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1791_5: Tattha yattakāni heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalacittāni vibhattāni,
atk-abh02a:1791_6: tesaṃ sabbesampi vasena ekekasmiṃ cittaniddese catasso catasso paṭisambhidā vibhattāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1791_10: ekekasmiṃ vipākacitte ca kiriyacitte ca tisso tissova paṭisambhidā vibhattā.
atk-abh02a:1792_0: Kasmā pana yathā kusalākusalavāresu “tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1792_2: tesu ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti evaṃ na vuttanti?
atk-abh02a:1792_5: “tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti heṭṭhā vuttattā ayaṃ atthapaṭisambhidāpi idha na vattabbā siyāti?
atk-abh02a:1792_8: Kiriyavāre ca “yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ime kiriyā”ti vacanameva na yujjatīti dvīsupi imesu vāresu tisso tissova paṭisambhidā vibhattā.
atk-abh02a:1793_0: Tattha yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hotīti yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ phasso hotītiādinā nayena vuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ “ayaṃ phasso,
atk-abh02a:1793_2: Tattha dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇanti tasmiṃ atthe dhamme ca pavattamānāya tassā dhammaniruttiyā sabhāvapaññattiyā abhilāpe ñāṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1793_3: Abhilāpasaddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannañāṇameva idhāpi kathitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1793_5: Tāni ñāṇāni jānātīti itarāni tīṇi paṭisambhidāñāṇāni jānāti.
atk-abh02a:1794_0: Idāni yathā yaṃ ñāṇaṃ tāni ñāṇāni jānāti,
atk-abh02a:1794_1: tathā tassa tesu pavattiṃ dassetuṃ imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānīti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1794_2: Tattha idamatthajotakānīti imassa atthassa jotakāni pakāsakāni;
atk-abh02a:1794_3: imaṃ nāma atthaṃ jotenti pakāsenti paricchindantīti attho.
atk-abh02a:1794_4: Iti ñāṇesu ñāṇanti iminā ākārena pavattaṃ tīsu ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā nāma.
atk-abh02a:1795_0: Tattha kiñcāpi ayaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā ‘imissā idaṃ kiccaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1795_1: imissā idaṃ kicca’nti itarāsaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ kiccaṃ jānāti,
atk-abh02a:1795_2: sayaṃ pana tāsaṃ kiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh02a:1795_10: Tesu appassuto gatagataṭṭhāne attano sarasampattiyā sakalaparisaṃ khobhetvā dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-abh02a:1795_15: ‘dhammasavane jānissatha ayaṃ tipiṭakadharo vā no vā’ti āha.
atk-abh02a:1795_17: yathā pana sakalaparisaṃ khobhetvā dhammaṃ kathetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh02a:1795_22: sayaṃ pana taṃ kiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1796_1: Evaṃ kusalacittuppādādivasena paṭisambhidā vibhajitvā idāni tāsaṃ uppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ khettaṃ dassetuṃ puna catasso paṭisambhidātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:1796_2: Tattha tisso paṭisambhidā kāmāvacarakusalato catūsu ñāṇasampayuttesu cittuppādesūti idaṃ sekkhānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1796_3: Tesañhipi dhammapaccavekkhaṇakāle heṭṭhā vuttaṃ pañcappakāraṃ dhammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakusalacittesu dhammapaṭisambhidā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1796_4: Tathā niruttipaccavekkhaṇakāle saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā niruttipaṭisambhidā;
atk-abh02a:1796_5: ñāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle sabbatthakañāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti.
atk-abh02a:1797_0: Kiriyato catūsūti idaṃ pana asekkhānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1797_1: Tesañhi dhammaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle heṭṭhā vuttaṃ pañcappakāraṃ dhammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakiriyacittesu dhammapaṭisambhidā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1797_2: Tathā niruttipaccavekkhaṇakāle saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā niruttipaṭisambhidā;
atk-abh02a:1797_3: ñāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle sabbatthakañāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti.
atk-abh02a:1798_0: Atthapaṭisambhidā etesu ceva uppajjatīti idaṃ pana sekkhāsekkhānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1798_1: Tathā hi sekkhānaṃ atthapaccavekkhaṇakāle heṭṭhā vuttappabhedaṃ atthaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakusalacittesu ayaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:1798_3: Asekkhassa pana atthaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle heṭṭhā vuttappabhedameva atthaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakiriyacittesu uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:1798_5: Evametā sekkhāsekkhānaṃ uppajjamānā imāsu bhūmīsu uppajjantīti bhūmidassanatthaṃ ayaṃ nayo dassitoti.
atk-abh02a:1801_1: Pañhāpucchake pāḷianusāreneva catunnaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ kusalādibhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1801_2: Ārammaṇattikesu pana niruttipaṭisambhidā saddameva ārammaṇaṃ karotīti parittārammaṇā.
atk-abh02a:1801_3: Atthapaṭisambhidā kāmāvacaravipākakiriyasaṅkhātañceva paccayasamuppannañca atthaṃ paccavekkhantassa parittārammaṇā;
atk-abh02a:1801_6: Dhammapaṭisambhidā kāmāvacaraṃ kusaladhammaṃ akusaladhammaṃ paccayadhammañca paccavekkhantassa parittārammaṇā;
atk-abh02a:1801_7: rūpāvacarārūpāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayadhammañca paccavekkhantassa mahaggatārammaṇā;
atk-abh02a:1801_8: lokuttaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayadhammañca paccavekkhantassa appamāṇārammaṇā.
atk-abh02a:1801_10: rūpāvacarārūpāvacarāni kusalavipākakiriyañāṇāni paccavekkhantassa tesaṃ ārammaṇāni vijānantassa mahaggatārammaṇā;
atk-abh02a:1802_5: maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa ārammaṇādhipativasena maggādhipati.
atk-abh02a:1802_9: Niruttipaṭisambhidā paccuppannameva saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotīti paccuppannārammaṇā.
atk-abh02a:1803_0: Atthapaṭisambhidā atītaṃ vipākatthaṃ kiriyatthaṃ paccayasamuppannañca paccavekkhantassa atītārammaṇā,
atk-abh02a:1803_4: Dhammapaṭisambhidā atītaṃ kusalaṃ akusalaṃ paccayadhammañca paccavekkhantassa atītārammaṇā,
atk-abh02a:1803_7: Paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā atītaṃ kusalañāṇaṃ vipākañāṇaṃ kiriyañāṇañca paccavekkhantassa atītārammaṇā,
atk-abh02a:1804_1: Itarāsu tīsu atthapaṭisambhidā ajjhattaṃ vipākatthaṃ kiriyatthaṃ paccayasamuppannañca paccavekkhantassa ajjhattārammaṇā,
atk-abh02a:1804_5: Dhammapaṭisambhidā ajjhattaṃ kusalākusalaṃ paccayadhammaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle ajjhattārammaṇā,
atk-abh02a:1805_2: Imasmiñhi paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge sammāsambuddhena tayopi nayā lokiyalokuttaramissakattā ekaparicchedāva kathitā.
atk-abh02a:1805_3: Tīsupi hi etāsu tisso paṭisambhidā lokiyā,
atk-abh02a:1805_5: Evamayaṃ paṭisambhidāvibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṃ nīharitvāva bhājetvā dassitoti.
atk-abh02a:1810_1: Idāni tadanantare ñāṇavibhaṅge ekavidhena ñāṇavatthūtiādinā nayena paṭhamaṃ ekavidhādīhi dasavidhapariyosānehi
atk-abh02a:1810_2: dasahi paricchedehi mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā nikkhittapadānukkamena niddeso kato.
atk-abh02a:1811_2: Ñāṇavatthūti ettha pana ñāṇañca taṃ vatthu ca nānappakārānaṃ sampattīnanti ñāṇavatthu;
atk-abh02a:1811_8: Na hetūtiādīni heṭṭhā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a:1811_9: Saṅkhepato panettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ niddesavāre āvi bhavissati.
atk-abh02a:1811_11: evaṃ dukamātikādipadesupi yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ tattheva āvi bhavissati.
atk-abh02a:1811_13: Ettha hi “na hetu ahetukā”tiādīhi tāva dhammasaṅgahamātikāvasena,
atk-abh02a:1811_14: “aniccā jarābhibhūtā”tiādīhi amātikāvasenāti saṅkhepato duvidhehi pabhedato aṭṭhasattatiyā padehi ekakamātikā nikkhittā.
atk-abh02a:1812_0: Dukānurūpehi pana pañcatiṃsāya dukehi dukamātikā nikkhittā.
atk-abh02a:1813_5: pītittike ca paṭhamapadena niyamitapaññāvasena vuttehi terasahi,
atk-abh02a:1813_7: tatiyapadena niyamitapaññāvasena vuttehi dvādasahīti aṭṭhāsītiyā tikehi tikamātikā nikkhittā.
atk-abh02a:1814_3: sattakamātikā “sattasattati ñāṇavatthūnī”ti evaṃ saṅkhepato vuttehi ekādasahi sattakehi,
atk-abh02a:1816_1: Dasakamātikā “dasa tathāgatassa tathāgatabalānī”tiādinā ekeneva dasakena nikkhittā.
atk-abh02a:1816_3: Tathāgatassāti yathā vipassīādayo pubbakā isayo āgatā tathā āgatassa;
atk-abh02a:1816_4: yathā ca te gatā tathā gatassa.
atk-abh02a:1816_6: yathā vā pubbabuddhānaṃ balāni puññussayasampattiyā āgatāni tathā āgatabalānītipi attho.

atk-abh02a:1821_0: Ñāṇabalaṃ pana idha tāva pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva dasabalañāṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1821_7: sattasattati ñāṇānīti evaṃ aññānipi anekāni ñāṇasahassāni –
atk-abh02a:1821_9: Idhāpi ñāṇabalameva adhippetaṃ ñāṇañhi akampiyaṭṭhena upatthambhakaṭṭhena ca balanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1822_0: Yehi balehi samannāgatoti yehi dasahi ñāṇabalehi upeto samupeto.
atk-abh02a:1822_8: sabbagavaseṭṭho sabbaparissayasaho seto pāsādiko mahābhāravaho asanisatasaddehipi akampanīyo nisabho.
atk-abh02a:1822_12: Ṭhānanti catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā acalaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1822_14: Yatheva hi nisabhasaṅkhāto usabho usabhabalena samannāgato catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh02a:1822_15: evaṃ tathāgatopi dasahi tathāgatabalehi samannāgato catūhi vesārajjapādehi aṭṭhaparisapathaviṃ uppīḷetvā
atk-abh02a:1822_16: sadevake loke kenaci paccatthikena paccāmittena akampiyo acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh02a:1822_17: Evaṃ tiṭṭhamāno ca taṃ āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,
atk-abh02a:1823_4: Yathā vā sīho sahanato ca hananato ca sīhoti vuccati,
atk-abh02a:1823_5: evaṃ tathāgato lokadhammānaṃ sahanato parappavādānañca hananato sīhoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1823_7: Tattha yathā sīho sīhabalena samannāgato sabbattha visārado vigatalomahaṃso sīhanādaṃ nadati,
atk-abh02a:1823_8: evaṃ tathāgatasīhopi tathāgatabalehi samannāgato aṭṭhasu parisāsu visārado vigatalomahaṃso “iti rūpa”ntiādinā
atk-abh02a:1824_0: Brahmacakkaṃ pavattetīti ettha brahmanti seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ visuddhaṃ. Cakkasaddo ca panāyaṃ –
atk-abh02a:1827_0: Dhammacakke idha mato, tañca dvedhā vibhāvaye.
atk-abh02a:1828_2: cakkāni yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussāna”ntiādīsu hi ayaṃ sampattiyaṃ dissati.
atk-abh02a:1828_10: “Icchāhatassa posassa cakkaṃ bhamati matthake”ti ettha uracakke.
atk-abh02a:1829_7: tusitabhavanato vā yāva mahābodhipallaṅke arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1829_9: dīpaṅkarabyākaraṇato paṭṭhāya vā yāva arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1829_16: Ubhayampi panetaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ buddhānaṃyeva orasañāṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1830_0: Idāni yehi dasahi balehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,
atk-abh02a:1830_5: Kāraṇañhi yasmā tattha phalaṃ tiṭṭhati tadāyattavuttitāya uppajjati ceva pavattati ca,
atk-abh02a:1830_7: Taṃ bhagavā “ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ hetū paccayā uppādāya taṃ taṃ ṭhāna”nti ca ‘ye ye dhammā
atk-abh02a:1830_8: yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ na hetū na paccayā uppādāya taṃ taṃ aṭṭhāna’nti ca pajānanto ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca
atk-abh02a:1830_11: Idampi tathāgatassāti idampi ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇaṃ tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ nāma hotīti attho.
atk-abh02a:1831_2: Ṭhānaso hetusoti paccayato ceva hetuto ca.
atk-abh02a:1832_2: Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti bahūsupi manussesu ekameva pāṇaṃ ghātentesu ‘imassa cetanā nirayagāminī bhavissati,
atk-abh02a:1832_3: imassa tiracchānayonigāminī’ti iminā nayena ekavatthusmimpi kusalākusalacetanāsaṅkhātānaṃ paṭipattīnaṃ aviparītato sabhāvaṃ pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1833_0: Anekadhātunti cakkhudhātuādīhi kāmadhātuādīhi vā dhātūhi bahudhātuṃ.
atk-abh02a:1833_3: Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti tāsaṃ tāsaṃ dhātūnaṃ aviparītato sabhāvaṃ paṭivijjhati.
atk-abh02a:1835_2: ekatthameva vā etaṃ padadvayaṃ veneyyavasena pana dvedhā vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1835_3: Indriyaparopariyattanti saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ parabhāvañca aparabhāvañca vuḍḍhiñca hāniñcāti attho.
atk-abh02a:1839_0: Āsavānaṃ khayanti kāmāsavādīnaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ āsavanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1840_0: Imānīti yāni heṭṭhā “dasa tathāgatassa tathāgatabalānī”ti avoca,
atk-abh02a:1840_2: Evamettha anupubbapadavaṇṇanaṃ ñatvā idāni yasmā tathāgato paṭhamaṃyeva ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇena veneyyasattānaṃ
atk-abh02a:1840_3: āsavakkhayādhigamassa ceva anadhigamassa ca ṭhānāṭṭhānabhūtaṃ kilesāvaraṇābhāvaṃ passati,
atk-abh02a:1840_9: Evaṃ anāvaraṇānaṃ anekadhātunānādhātuñāṇena anukūladhammadesanatthaṃ cariyāvisesaṃ passati,
atk-abh02a:1840_13: Athevaṃ diṭṭhādhimuttīnaṃ yathāsatti yathābalaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ indriyaparopariyattañāṇena indriyaparopariyattaṃ passati,
atk-abh02a:1840_15: Evaṃ pariññātindriyaparopariyattāpi panete sace dūre honti,
atk-abh02a:1840_16: atha jhānādipariññāṇena jhānādīsu vasībhūtattā iddhivisesena khippaṃ upagacchati.
atk-abh02a:1840_18: dibbacakkhānubhāvato pattabbena cetopariyañāṇena sampatticittavisesaṃ passanto āsavakkhayañāṇānubhāvena
atk-abh02a:1840_19: āsavakkhayagāminiyā paṭipadāya vigatasammohattā āsavakkhayāya dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-abh02a:1840_20: Tasmā iminā anukkamena imāni dasabalāni vuttānīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a:1842_1: Idāni yathānikkhittāya mātikāya “pañcaviññāṇā na hetumevā”tiādinā nayena āraddhe niddesavāre na hetumevāti sādhāraṇahetupaṭikkhepaniddeso.
atk-abh02a:1842_5: sādhāraṇahetūti catubbidho hetū”tiādinā nayena yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-abh02a:1842_6: taṃ sabbaṃ rūpakaṇḍe “sabbaṃ rūpaṃ na hetumevā”tiādīnaṃ atthavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva.
atk-abh02a:1842_10: Apica “hetū dhammā nahetū dhammā”tiādīsu dhammakoṭṭhāsesu pañcaviññāṇāni hetū dhammāti vā sahetukā dhammāti vā na honti.
atk-abh02a:1842_12: ahetukā yevāti imānipi nayenettha sabbapadesu attho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1842_19: nibbānanti tīsu acetasikesu cittameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1842_23: Uppannaṃ manoviññāṇaviññeyyamevāti rūpakaṇḍe cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ paccuppannāneva rūpādīni ārabbha pavattito
atk-abh02a:1842_24: atītādivisayaṃ manoviññāṇampi pañcaviññāṇasotapatitameva katvā “upapannaṃ chahi viññāṇehi viññeyya”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1842_25: Pañcaviññāṇā pana yasmā paccuppannāpi cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ ārammaṇā na honti,
atk-abh02a:1843_2: Na hi te anāgatesu vatthārammaṇesu uppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:1844_1: Na hi te sahuppannaṃ vatthuṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ vā paṭicca uppajjanti,
atk-abh02a:1844_2: sayaṃ pana pacchājātā hutvā purejātesu vatthārammaṇesu uppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:1845_1: Tāni hi ajjhattike pañca pasāde vatthuṃ katvā uppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:1845_5: manoviññāṇaṃ hadayarūpaṃ vatthuṃ katvā uppajjanakāle ajjhattikaṃ bāhiravatthukaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1845_7: manoviññāṇasampayuttā tayo khandhā hadayarūpaṃ vatthuṃ katvā uppajjanakāle bāhirā bāhiravatthukā.
atk-abh02a:1846_1: Na hi te niruddhaṃ atītaṃ vatthuṃ paṭicca uppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:1847_0: Aññaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthu ca ārammaṇañcātiādīsu cakkhuviññāṇassa hi aññaṃ vatthu,
atk-abh02a:1847_4: saddādīsu vā aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kappato kappaṃ gantvāpi na uppajjati;
atk-abh02a:1847_5: cakkhupasādameva pana vatthuṃ katvā rūpañca ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1847_7: aññaṃ vatthuṃ vā dvāraṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ vā na saṅkamati,
atk-abh02a:1848_1: Na aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhontīti ettha aññamaññassa cakkhu sotassa,
atk-abh02a:1848_2: sotaṃ vā cakkhussāti evaṃ ekaṃ ekassa gocaravisayaṃ na paccanubhotīti attho.
atk-abh02a:1848_3: Sace hi nīlādibhedaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ samodhānetvā sotindriyassa upaneyya ‘iṅgha tāva naṃ vavatthāpehi vibhāvehi –
atk-abh02a:1848_5: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ vināpi mukhena attano dhammatāya evaṃ vadeyya –
atk-abh02a:1848_7: vassasatampi vassasahassampi paridhāvamāno aññatra mayā kuhiṃ etassa jānanakaṃ labhissasi;
atk-abh02a:1848_10: yadi vā nīlaṃ yadi vā pītakaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1848_14: Evamete aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ na paccanubhonti nāma.
atk-abh02a:1850_1: Etāni hi cittāni āvajjanena samannāhaṭakāle manasikatakāleyeva ca uppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:1851_0: Na abbokiṇṇāti aññena viññāṇena abbokiṇṇā nirantarāva nuppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:1852_1: Na apubbaṃ acarimanti etena sabbesampi sahuppatti paṭikkhittā.
atk-abh02a:1852_2: Na aññamaññassa samanantarāti etena samanantaratā paṭikkhittā.
atk-abh02a:1853_6: Evamettha saṅkhepato pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ āvajjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā āvajjanādikiccaṃ kātuṃ samatthabhāvo paṭikkhitto.
atk-abh02a:1854_0: Na kañci dhammaṃ paṭivijānātīti “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ ekampi kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā na paṭivijānāti.
atk-abh02a:1855_4: aññaṃ kusalākusalesu ekadhammampi pañcahi viññāṇehi na paṭivijānāti.
atk-abh02a:1855_7: Dassanādimattato pana muttā aññā etesaṃ kusalādipaṭiviññatti nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:1856_2: Tasmā manodhātuyāpi tato parāhi manoviññāṇadhātūhipīti sabbehipi pañcadvārikaviññāṇehi na kañci kusalākusalaṃ
atk-abh02a:1857_0: Na kañci iriyāpathaṃ kappetītiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:1857_1: Na hi pañcadvārikaviññāṇehi gamanādīsu kañci iriyāpathaṃ kappeti,
atk-abh02a:1857_4: na samādhiṃ samāpajjati lokiyaṃ vā lokuttaraṃ vā,
atk-abh02a:1857_5: na samādhito vuṭṭhāti lokiyā vā lokuttarā vā,
atk-abh02a:1857_9: na pañcadvārikenāti sabbassāpetassa kiccassa karaṇe sahajavanakāni vīthicittāni paṭikkhittāni.
atk-abh02a:1858_0: Na supati na paṭibujjhati na supinaṃ passatīti sabbenāpi ca pañcadvārikacittena neva niddaṃ okkamati,
atk-abh02a:1858_3: na kiñca supinaṃ passatīti imesu tīsu ṭhānesu saha javanena vīthicittaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1859_0: Niddāyantassa hi mahāvaṭṭiṃ jāletvā dīpe cakkhusamīpe upanīte paṭhamaṃ cakkhudvārikaṃ āvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ na āvaṭṭeti,
atk-abh02a:1859_6: Tatiyavāre manodvārikaāvajjanena bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite manodvārikajavanaṃ javati.
atk-abh02a:1859_7: Tena cittena ñatvā ‘kiṃ ayaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne āloko’ti jānāti.
atk-abh02a:1860_1: ghānasamīpe sugandhesu vā duggandhesu vā pupphesu upanītesu,
atk-abh02a:1860_2: mukhe sappimhi vā phāṇite vā pakkhitte,
atk-abh02a:1860_3: piṭṭhiyaṃ pāṇinā pahāre dinne paṭhamaṃ sotadvārikādīni āvajjanāni bhavaṅgaṃ na āvaṭṭenti,
atk-abh02a:1860_9: Tatiyavāre manodvārikaāvajjanena bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite manodvārikajavanaṃ javati.
atk-abh02a:1860_10: Tena cittena ñatvā ‘kiṃ ayaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne saddo –
atk-abh02a:1860_12: bherisaddo’ti vā ‘kiṃ ayaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne gandho –
atk-abh02a:1860_14: sāragandho’ti vā ‘kiṃ idaṃ mayhaṃ mukhe pakkhittarasaṃ –
atk-abh02a:1860_15: sappīti vā phāṇita’nti vā ‘kenamhi piṭṭhiyaṃ pahato,
atk-abh02a:1860_16: atithaddho me pahāro’ti vā vattāro honti.
atk-abh02a:1861_0: Tañca panetaṃ supinaṃ passanto catūhi kāraṇehi passati –
atk-abh02a:1861_1: dhātukkhobhato vā anubhūtapubbato vā devatopasaṃhārato vā pubbanimittato vāti.
atk-abh02a:1861_2: Tattha pittādīnaṃ khobhakaraṇapaccayayogena khubhitadhātuko ‘dhātukkhobhato’ supinaṃ passati.
atk-abh02a:1861_8: ‘Devatopasaṃhārato’ passantassa devatā atthakāmatāya vā anatthakāmatāya vā atthāya vā anatthāya vā nānāvidhāni ārammaṇāni upasaṃharanti.
atk-abh02a:1861_9: So tāsaṃ devatānaṃ ānubhāvena tāni ārammaṇāni passati.
atk-abh02a:1861_10: Pubbanimittato passanto puññāpuññavasena uppajjitukāmassa atthassa vā anatthassa vā pubbanimittabhūtaṃ
atk-abh02a:1862_0: Tattha yaṃ dhātukkhobhato anubhūtapubbato ca supinaṃ passati,
atk-abh02a:1862_3: taṃ saccaṃ vā hoti alikaṃ vā.
atk-abh02a:1862_4: Kuddhā hi devatā upāyena vināsetukāmā viparītampi katvā dassenti.
atk-abh02a:1862_6: rohaṇe kira nāgamahāvihāre mahāthero bhikkhusaṅghaṃ anapaloketvāva ekaṃ nāgarukkhaṃ chindāpesi.
atk-abh02a:1862_7: Rukkhe adhivatthā devatā therassa kuddhā paṭhamameva naṃ palobhetvā pacchā ‘ito te sattadivasamatthake upaṭṭhāko rājā marissatī’ti supine ārocesi.
atk-abh02a:1862_8: Thero naṃ kathaṃ āharitvā rājorodhānaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-abh02a:1862_12: Rājā divase gaṇāpetvā sattāhe vītivatte kujjhitvā therassa hatthapāde chindāpesi.
atk-abh02a:1863_0: Yaṃ pana pubbanimittato passati taṃ ekantasaccameva hoti.
atk-abh02a:1863_1: Etesañca catunnaṃ mūlakāraṇānaṃ saṃsaggabhedatopi supinabhedo hotiyeva.
atk-abh02a:1863_2: Tañca panetaṃ catubbidhaṃ supinaṃ sekkhaputhujjanāva passanti appahīnavipallāsattā;
atk-abh02a:1864_0: Kiṃ pana taṃ passanto sutto passati,
atk-abh02a:1864_2: Udāhu neva sutto passati na paṭibuddhoti?
atk-abh02a:1864_6: Tañca rūpanimittādiārammaṇaṃ rāgādisampayuttaṃ vā na hoti.
atk-abh02a:1864_7: Supinaṃ passantassa ca īdisāni cittāni uppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:1864_12: Sabbohārikacittena ca kate vītikkame anāpatti nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:1864_13: Supinaṃ passantena pana kate vītikkame ekantaṃ anāpatti eva.
atk-abh02a:1864_14: Atha neva sutto na paṭibuddho passati,
atk-abh02a:1864_23: Yathā hi makkaṭassa niddā lahuparivattā hoti,
atk-abh02a:1864_24: evaṃ yā niddā punappunaṃ kusalādicittavokiṇṇattā lahuparivattā;
atk-abh02a:1864_25: yassā pavattiyaṃ punappunaṃ bhavaṅgato uttaraṇaṃ hoti,
atk-abh02a:1864_27: Tenāyaṃ supino kusalopi hoti akusalopi abyākatopi 386.
atk-abh02a:1864_30: dvīhi antehi mutto āvajjanatadārammaṇakkhaṇe abyākatoti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1865_0: Kiṃ pana supine kataṃ kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ savipākaṃ avipākanti?
atk-abh02a:1865_2: dubbalattā pana paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh02a:1865_3: dinnāya aññakammena paṭisandhiyā pavatte vedanīyaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1866_0: Evaṃ yāthāvakavatthuvibhāvanā paññāti pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ na hetvaṭṭho yāthāvaṭṭho.
atk-abh02a:1866_7: Iti yā heṭṭhā “yāthāvakavatthuvibhāvanā paññā”ti mātikāya nikkhittā,
atk-abh02a:1866_9: Tassā eva ca vasena evaṃ ekavidhena ñāṇavatthūti evaṃ ekekakoṭṭhāsena ñāṇagaṇanā ekena vā ākārena ñāṇaparicchedo hoti.
atk-abh02a:1869_1: Duvidhena ñāṇavatthuniddese catūsu bhūmīsu kusaleti sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ catubhūmakakusalapaññā.
atk-abh02a:1869_2: Paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge vuttesu pañcasu atthesu attano attano bhūmipariyāpannaṃ vipākasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ jāpeti janeti pavattetīti atthajāpikā.
atk-abh02a:1869_3: Arahato abhiññaṃ uppādentassa samāpattiṃ uppādentassa kiriyābyākateti abhiññāya ceva samāpattiyā ca parikammasamaye kāmāvacarakiriyapaññā.
atk-abh02a:1869_4: Sā hi abhiññāsamāpattipabhedaṃ kiriyasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ jāpeti janeti pavattetīti atthajāpikā paññāti vuttā.
atk-abh02a:1869_6: yāpi hi purimā kāmāvacarakiriyā pacchimāya kāmāvacarakiriyāya anantarādivasena paccayo hoti,
atk-abh02a:1869_7: sāpi taṃ kiriyatthaṃ jāpetīti atthajāpikā paññā nāma.
atk-abh02a:1870_0: Dutiyapadaniddese catūsu bhūmīsu vipāketi kāmāvacaravipāke paññā sahajātādipaccayavasena kāmāvacaravipākatthaṃ jāpetvā ṭhitāti jāpitatthā.
atk-abh02a:1870_2: Sabbāpi vā esā attano attano kāraṇehi jāpitā janitā pavattitā sayampi atthabhūtātipi jāpitatthā.
atk-abh02a:1870_3: Arahato uppannāya abhiññāya uppannāya samāpattiyāti vuttakiriyapaññāyapi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a:1870_5: kāmāvacarakiriyapaññāpi hi sahajātādivasena kāmāvacarakiriyasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ jāpetvā ṭhitāti jāpitatthā.
atk-abh02a:1870_7: Sabbāpi vā esā attano attano kāraṇehi jāpitā janitā pavattitā sayañca atthabhūtātipi jāpitatthā.
atk-abh02a:1873_1: Tividhena ñāṇavatthuniddese yogavihitesūti yogo vuccati paññā;
atk-abh02a:1873_4: atha vā kammañca taṃ āyatanañca ājīvādīnantipi kammāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1873_25: sippaṃ sikkhitu”nti sippāyatane paviṭṭhattā na gahitāni.
atk-abh02a:1874_0: Tattha eko paṇḍito manussānaṃ phāsuvihāratthāya attano ca dhammatāya gehapāsādayānanāvādīni uppādeti.
atk-abh02a:1874_1: So hi ‘ime manussā vasanaṭṭhānena vinā dukkhitā’ti hitakiriyāya ṭhatvā dīghacaturassādibhedaṃ gehaṃ uppādeti,
atk-abh02a:1874_3: ‘yāne asati anusañcaraṇaṃ nāma dukkha’nti jaṅghākilamathapaṭivinodanatthāya vayhasakaṭasandamānikādīni uppādeti,
atk-abh02a:1874_4: ‘nāvāya asati samuddādīsu sañcāro nāma natthī’ti nānappakāraṃ nāvaṃ uppādeti.
atk-abh02a:1874_5: So sabbampetaṃ neva aññehi kayiramānaṃ passati,
atk-abh02a:1874_9: Paññavatā hi attano dhammatāya katampi aññehi uggaṇhitvā karontehi katasadisameva hoti.
atk-abh02a:1875_0: Ukkaṭṭhakammepi ‘kasikamme asati manussānaṃ jīvitaṃ na pavattatī’ti eko paṇḍito manussānaṃ phāsuvihāratthāya yuganaṅgalādīni kasibhaṇḍāni uppādeti;
atk-abh02a:1875_2: So sabbampetaṃ neva aññehi kariyamānaṃ passati…pe…
atk-abh02a:1876_0: Duvidhepi pana sippāyatane eko paṇḍito manussānaṃ phāsuvihāratthāya naḷakārasippādīni hīnasippāni,
atk-abh02a:1876_4: So sabbampetaṃ neva aññehi kariyamānaṃ passati…pe…
atk-abh02a:1877_0: Ekacco pana paṇḍito amanussasarīsapādīhi upaddutānaṃ manussānaṃ tikicchanatthāya dhammikāni nāgamaṇḍalamantādīni vijjāṭṭhānāni uppādeti,
atk-abh02a:1877_5: Paññavatā hi attano dhammatāya katampi aññehi uggaṇhitvā karontehi katasadisameva hoti.
atk-abh02a:1878_3: Tañhi catunnaṃ saccānaṃ anulomanato saccānulomikanti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1878_4: Idānissa pavattanākāraṃ dassetuṃ rūpaṃ aniccanti vātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1879_0: Yaṃ evarūpinti yaṃ evaṃ heṭṭhā niddiṭṭhasabhāvaṃ anulomikaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1879_2: Sā hi heṭṭhā vuttānaṃ kammāyatanādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ kāraṇānaṃ apaccanīkadassanena anulometīti anulomikā.
atk-abh02a:1879_6: Sabbānipi etāni kāraṇāni khamati sahati daṭṭhuṃ sakkotīti khanti,
atk-abh02a:1879_11: Sabbepissā te kammāyatanādayo dhammā nijjhānaṃ khamanti,
atk-abh02a:1879_12: visesato ca pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātā dhammā punappunaṃ aniccadukkhānattavasena nijjhāyamānā taṃ nijjhānaṃ khamantīti dhammanijjhānakhantī.
atk-abh02a:1880_0: Parato assutvā paṭilabhatīti aññassa upadesavacanaṃ assutvā sayameva cintento paṭilabhati.
atk-abh02a:1880_1: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ cintāmayā paññā nāma vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1880_2: Sā panesā na yesaṃ kesañci uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:1880_5: Sesapaññā sabbesampi pūritapāramīnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ uppajjatīti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1881_0: Parato sutvā paṭilabhatīti ettha kammāyatanādīni parena kariyamānāni vā katāni vā disvāpi yassa kassaci
atk-abh02a:1881_1: kathayamānassa vacanaṃ sutvāpi ācariyassa santike uggahetvāpi paṭiladdhā sabbā parato sutvāyeva paṭiladdhā
atk-abh02a:1882_0: Samāpannassāti samāpattisamaṅgissa; antosamāpattiyaṃ pavattā paññā bhāvanāmayā nāmāti attho.
atk-abh02a:1883_5: Yā uppajjatīti yā evaṃ dānacetanāsampayuttā paññā uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:1884_0: Sīlaṃ ārabbha sīlādhigacchāti idhāpi sīlacetanāsampayuttāva sīlamayā paññāti adhippetā.
atk-abh02a:1885_5: Tattha “uppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ anuppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatā”ti
atk-abh02a:1885_6: imāya tantiyā saṅgahitavasena pañcapi sīlāni dasapi sīlāni sīlaṃ nāma.
atk-abh02a:1885_15: Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ pana sabbasīlehi adhikaṃ uppanneyeva tathāgate uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:1885_18: “Imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ vītikkame idaṃ nāma hotī”ti paññāpanañhi aññesaṃ avisayo,
atk-abh02a:1885_22: tasmā taṃ adhisīlapaññaṃ dassetuṃ pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ saṃvarantassātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1886_0: Heṭṭhā vuttāya eva pana tantiyā saṅgahitavasena vaṭṭapādikā aṭṭha samāpattiyo cittaṃ nāma.
atk-abh02a:1886_3: Tāpasaparibbājakā ceva sabbaññubodhisattā ca cakkavattirājāno ca.
atk-abh02a:1886_5: Vipassanāpādikā pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo sabbacittehi adhikā,
atk-abh02a:1886_10: tasmā adhicittapaññaṃ dassetuṃ rūpāvacarārūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ samāpajjantassātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1887_0: Heṭṭhā vuttāya eva pana tantiyā saṅgahitavasena kammassakatañāṇaṃ paññā nāma.
atk-abh02a:1887_3: uppanne tena ñāṇena mahādānaṃ pavattentānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi.
atk-abh02a:1887_8: tasmā atirekapaññāya paññaṃ dassetuṃ catūsu maggesūtiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1888_3: adhipaññāti imesu chasu koṭṭhāsesu vipassanā paññā katarasannissitāti?
atk-abh02a:1888_5: Tasmā yathā omakatarappamāṇaṃ chattaṃ vā dhajaṃ vā upādāya atirekappamāṇaṃ atichattaṃ atidhajoti vuccati,
atk-abh02a:1888_6: evamidampi pañcasīlaṃ dasasīlaṃ upādāya pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ ‘adhisīlaṃ’ nāma;
atk-abh02a:1888_7: vaṭṭapādikā aṭṭha samāpattiyo upādāya vipassanāpādikā aṭṭha samāpattiyo ‘adhicittaṃ’ nāma,
atk-abh02a:1888_8: kammassakatapaññaṃ upādāya vipassanāpaññā ca maggapaññā ca phalapaññā ca ‘adhipaññā’ nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1889_5: tasmā taṃ dassetuṃ ime dhamme manasikarototiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1889_6: Idaṃ vuccatīti yā imesaṃ akusaladhammānaṃ anuppattippahānesu kusaladhammānañca uppattiṭṭhitīsu paññā –
atk-abh02a:1889_8: Yā panesā kusaladhammānaṃ anuppajjananirujjhanesu akusaladhammānañca uppattiṭṭhitīsu paññā –
atk-abh02a:1889_12: Paññavāyeva hi ‘mayhaṃ evaṃ manasikaroto anuppannā kusalā dhammā nuppajjanti uppannā ca nirujjhanti;
atk-abh02a:1889_15: So evaṃ ñatvā anuppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppajjituṃ na deti,
atk-abh02a:1889_20: Sabbāpi tatrūpāyā paññā upāyakosallanti idaṃ pana accāyikakicce vā bhaye vā uppanne tassa tikicchanatthaṃ
atk-abh02a:1892_1: Catubbidhena ñāṇavatthuniddese atthi dinnantiādīsu dinnapaccayā phalaṃ atthīti iminā upāyena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1892_2: Idaṃ vuccatīti yaṃ ñāṇaṃ ‘idaṃ kammaṃ sakaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1892_7: tividhaṃ manoduccaritanti idaṃ na sakakammaṃ nāma.
atk-abh02a:1892_8: Tīsu dvāresu dasavidhampi sucaritaṃ sakakammaṃ nāma.
atk-abh02a:1892_9: Attano vāpi hotu parassa vā sabbampi akusalaṃ na sakakammaṃ nāma. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:1892_11: Attano vā hotu parassa vā sabbampi kusalaṃ sakakammaṃ nāma. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:1892_13: Evaṃ jānanasamatthe imasmiṃ kammassakatañāṇe ṭhatvā bahuṃ dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ pūretvā uposathaṃ samādiyitvā
atk-abh02a:1892_14: sukhena sukhaṃ sampattiyā sampattiṃ anubhavitvā nibbānaṃ pattānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo natthi.
atk-abh02a:1892_15: Yathā hi sadhano puriso pañcasu sakaṭasatesu sappimadhuphāṇitādīni ceva loṇatilataṇḍulādīni ca āropetvā
atk-abh02a:1892_16: kantāramaggaṃ paṭipanno kenacideva karaṇīyena atthe uppanne sabbesaṃ upakaraṇānaṃ gahitattā na cinteti,
atk-abh02a:1892_19: evameva imasmimpi kammassakatañāṇe ṭhatvā bahuṃ dānaṃ datvā…pe…
atk-abh02a:1892_21: Ṭhapetvā saccānulomikaṃ ñāṇanti maggasaccassa paramatthasaccassa ca anulomanato saccānulomikanti laddhanāmaṃ
atk-abh02a:1892_22: vipassanāñāṇaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā sabbāpi sāsavā kusalā paññā kammassakatañāṇamevāti attho.
atk-abh02a:1893_1: Maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇaṃ dukkhepetaṃ ñāṇanti ettha ekameva maggañāṇaṃ catūsu saccesu ekapaṭivedhavasena catūsu ṭhānesu saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1894_1: Dhamme ñāṇanti ettha maggapaññā tāva catunnaṃ saccānaṃ ekapaṭivedhavasena dhamme ñāṇaṃ nāma hotu;
atk-abh02a:1894_4: Duvidhāpi hesā paññā aparappaccaye atthapaccakkhe ariyasaccadhamme kiccato ca ārammaṇato ca pavattattā dhamme ñāṇanti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1894_5: So iminā dhammenāti ettha maggañāṇaṃ dhammagocarattā gocaravohārena dhammoti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1894_8: catusaccadhammaṃ jānitvā ṭhitena maggañāṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1894_11: Pattenāti cattāri ariyasaccāni patvā ṭhitattā dhammaṃ pattena.
atk-abh02a:1894_12: Viditenāti maggañāṇena cattāri ariyasaccāni viditāni pākaṭāni katāni.
atk-abh02a:1894_13: Tasmā taṃ dhammaṃ viditaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:1894_16: Nayaṃ netīti atīte ca anāgate ca nayaṃ neti harati peseti.
atk-abh02a:1894_19: Satthārā pana maggañāṇaṃ atītānāgate nayaṃ nayanasadisaṃ kataṃ. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a:1894_22: Tasmā satthā maggañāṇameva nayaṃ nayanasadisaṃ akāsi.
atk-abh02a:1894_25: tena ñāṇena kāraṇabhūtena atītānāgate paccavekkhaṇañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ nayaṃ neti.
atk-abh02a:1895_1: taṃ ākāraṃ dassetuṃ ye hi keci atītamaddhānantiādimāha.
atk-abh02a:1895_7: Atītepi hi ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ tebhūmakakkhandheyeva dukkhasaccanti paṭivijjhiṃsu,
atk-abh02a:1895_8: taṇhaṃyeva samudayasaccanti nibbānameva nirodhasaccanti ariyamaggameva maggasaccanti paṭivijjhiṃsu,
atk-abh02a:1895_11: Idaṃ vuccati anvaye ñāṇanti idaṃ anugamanañāṇaṃ nayanañāṇaṃ kāraṇañāṇanti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1896_3: Cetasā ceto paricca pajānātīti attano cittena tesaṃ cittaṃ sarāgādivasena paricchinditvā nānappakārato jānāti.
atk-abh02a:1896_7: idha anuttaraṃ vā cittaṃ vimuttaṃ vā cittanti ettha lokuttarampi labbhati.
atk-abh02a:1897_0: Avasesā paññāti dhamme ñāṇādikā tisso paññā ṭhapetvā sesā sabbāpi paññā ñāṇanti sammatattā sammutiñāṇaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:1898_1: Kāmāvacarakusale paññāti ayañhi ekantena vaṭṭasmiṃ cutipaṭisandhiṃ ācinateva,
atk-abh02a:1898_6: vikkhambhanavasena kilese ceva kilesamūlake ca dhamme apacinati,
atk-abh02a:1898_8: Sesā neva cutipaṭisandhiṃ ācinati na apacinati,
atk-abh02a:1899_1: Na ca abhiññāyo paṭivijjhatīti idaṃ paṭhamajjhānapaññaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1899_2: Sā hissa kāmavivekena pattabbattā kilesanibbidāya saṃvattati.
atk-abh02a:1899_4: abhiññāpādakabhāvaṃ pana appattatāya neva pañca abhiññāyo paṭivijjhati,
atk-abh02a:1899_6: Evamayaṃ paññā nibbidāya hoti no paṭivedhāya.
atk-abh02a:1899_8: Kāmesu vītarāgo samānoti tathā vikkhambhitānaṃyeva kāmānaṃ vasena vītarāgo.
atk-abh02a:1899_11: Catutthajjhānapaññā hi abhiññāpādakabhāvenāpi pañca abhiññāyo paṭivijjhati,
atk-abh02a:1899_14: Paṭhamajjhānapaññāya eva pana kilesesupi nibbindattā no nibbidāya.
atk-abh02a:1899_19: Evamesā paṭhamajjhānasannissitā vā catutthajjhānasannissitā vā kātabbā.
atk-abh02a:1899_20: Nibbidāya ceva paṭivedhāya cāti maggapaññā sabbasmimpi vaṭṭe nibbindanato nibbidāya,
atk-abh02a:1899_21: chaṭṭhaṃ abhiññaṃ paṭivijjhanato paṭivedhāya ca hoti.
atk-abh02a:1900_1: Paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhītiādīsu yvāyaṃ appaguṇassa paṭhamajjhānassa lābhī.
atk-abh02a:1900_2: Taṃ tato vuṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇavasena kāmasahagatā hutvā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti tudanti codenti.
atk-abh02a:1900_3: Tassa kāmānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā hāyati parihāyati;
atk-abh02a:1900_6: Sati santiṭṭhatīti idaṃ micchāsatiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1900_8: Yassa hi paṭhamajjhānānurūpasabhāvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ santato paṇītato disvā assādayamānā abhinandamānā nikanti uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:1900_9: tassa nikantivasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā neva hāyati,
atk-abh02a:1900_13: Avitakkasahagatāti avitakkaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ santato paṇītato manasikaroto ārammaṇavasena avitakkasahagatā.
atk-abh02a:1900_14: Samudācarantīti paguṇato paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhitaṃ dutiyajjhānādhigamatthāya tudanti codenti.
atk-abh02a:1900_15: Tassa upari dutiyajjhānānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā visesabhūtassa
atk-abh02a:1900_17: Nibbidāsahagatāti tameva paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhitaṃ nibbidāsaṅkhātena vipassanāñāṇena sahagatā.
atk-abh02a:1900_22: Vipassanāñāṇamhi sakkā iminā maggena virāgaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikātunti pavattito “virāgūpasañhita”nti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1900_24: Tassa tesaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā ariyamaggapaṭivedhassa padaṭṭhānatāya nibbedhabhāginīti vuttā.
atk-abh02a:1901_1: Kicchena kasirena samādhiṃ uppādentassāti lokuttarasamādhiṃ uppādentassa pubbabhāge āgamanakāle kicchena
atk-abh02a:1901_2: kasirena dukkhena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamantassa kilese vikkhambhetvā āgatassa.
atk-abh02a:1901_3: Dandhaṃ taṇṭhānaṃ abhijānantassāti vikkhambhitesu kilesesu vipassanāparivāse ciraṃ vasitvā taṃ lokuttarasamādhisaṅkhātaṃ
atk-abh02a:1901_6: Ayaṃ vuccatīti yā esā evaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh02a:1901_8: vipassanāparivāsapaññāya ca dandhattā maggakāle ekacittakkhaṇe uppannāpi paññā āgamanavasena dukkhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāmāti vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1901_9: Upari tīsu padesupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1902_1: Samādhissa na nikāmalābhissāti yo samādhissa na nikāmalābhī hoti,
atk-abh02a:1902_3: Yassa samādhi uparūpari samāpajjanatthāya ussakkituṃ paccayo na hoti,
atk-abh02a:1902_5: Ārammaṇaṃ thokaṃ pharantassāti paritte suppamatte vā sarāvamatte vā ārammaṇe parikammaṃ katvā tattheva
atk-abh02a:1902_6: appanaṃ patvā taṃ avaḍḍhitaṃ thokameva ārammaṇaṃ pharantassāti attho.
atk-abh02a:1902_8: Nanikāmalābhīpaṭipakkhato hi paguṇajjhānalābhī ettha nikāmalābhīti vutto.
atk-abh02a:1903_0: Jarāmaraṇepetaṃ ñāṇanti nibbānameva ārammaṇaṃ katvā catunnaṃ saccānaṃ ekapaṭivedhavasena etaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1904_0: Jarāmaraṇaṃ ārabbhātiādīni pana ekekaṃ vatthuṃ ārabbha pavattikāle pubbabhāge saccavavatthāpanavasena vuttāni.
atk-abh02a:1907_1: Pañcavidhena ñāṇavatthuniddese pītipharaṇatādīsu pītiṃ pharamānā uppajjatīti dvīsu jhānesu paññā pītipharaṇatā nāma.
atk-abh02a:1907_2: Sukhaṃ pharamānā uppajjatīti tīsu jhānesu paññā sukhapharaṇatā nāma.
atk-abh02a:1907_3: Paresaṃ cetopharamānā uppajjatīti cetopariyapaññā cetopharaṇatā nāma.
atk-abh02a:1907_4: Ālokaṃ pharamānā uppajjatīti dibbacakkhupaññā ālokapharaṇatā nāma.
atk-abh02a:1907_7: Tattha ca pītipharaṇatā sukhapharaṇatā dve pādā viya,
atk-abh02a:1907_11: Iti bhagavā pañcaṅgikaṃ sammāsamādhiṃ aṅgapaccaṅgasampannaṃ purisaṃ viya katvā dassesi.
atk-abh02a:1907_12: Ayaṃ pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhīti ayaṃ hatthapādasīsasadisehi pañcahi aṅgehi yutto sammāsamādhīti pādakajjhānasamādhiṃ kathesi.
atk-abh02a:1908_0: Ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho cevātiādīsu arahattaphalasamādhi adhippeto.
atk-abh02a:1908_2: Purimo purimo pacchimassa pacchimassa samādhisukhassa paccayattā āyatiṃ sukhavipāko.
atk-abh02a:1908_3: Santaṃ sukhumaṃ phalacittaṃ paṇītaṃ madhurarūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-abh02a:1908_4: Phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhitassa hi sabbakāyānugataṃ sukhasamphassaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1908_11: Kilesapaṭippassaddhiyā laddhattā kilesapaṭippassaddhibhāvassa vā laddhattā paṭippassaddhiladdho.
atk-abh02a:1908_12: Paṭippassaddhaṃ paṭippassaddhīti hi idaṃ atthato ekaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1908_14: Ekodibhāvena adhigatattā ekodibhāvameva vā adhigatattā ekodibhāvādhigato.
atk-abh02a:1908_15: Appaguṇasāsavasamādhi viya sasaṅkhārena sappayogena cittena paccanīkadhamme niggayha kilese vāretvā anadhigatattā na sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato.
atk-abh02a:1908_16: Tañca samādhiṃ samāpajjanto tato vā vuṭṭhahanto sativepullappattattā satova samāpajjati satova vuṭṭhahati.
atk-abh02a:1908_17: Yathāparicchinnakālavasena vā sato samāpajjati sato vuṭṭhahati.
atk-abh02a:1908_18: Tasmā yadettha “ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko”ti evaṃ paccavekkhamānassa paccattaṃyeva aparappaccayaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati –
atk-abh02a:1908_21: Evamimehi pañcahi paccavekkhaṇañāṇehi ayaṃ samādhi pañcañāṇiko sammāsamādhi nāma vuttoti.
atk-abh02a:1911_1: Chabbidhena ñāṇavatthuniddese iddhividhe ñāṇanti “ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī”tiādinayappavatte iddhividhe ñāṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1911_2: Iminā avitakkāvicārā upekkhāsahagatā rūpāvacarā bahudhābhāvādisādhikā ekacittakkhaṇikā appanāpaññāva kathitā.
atk-abh02a:1911_4: Imināpi avitakkāvicārā upekkhāsahagatā rūpāvacarā pakatisotavisayātītasaddārammaṇā ekacittakkhaṇikā appanāpaññāva kathitā.
atk-abh02a:1911_6: Imināpi yathāvuttappakārā paresaṃ sarāgādicittārammaṇā ekacittakkhaṇikā appanāpaññāva kathitā.
atk-abh02a:1911_8: Imināpi yathāvuttappakārā pubbe nivutthakkhandhānussaraṇasatisampayuttā ekacittakkhaṇikā appanāpaññāva kathitā.
atk-abh02a:1911_9: Sattānaṃ cutūpapāte ñāṇanti sattānaṃ cutiyañca upapāte ca ñāṇaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1911_10: Imināpi yathāvuttappakārā cavanakaupapajjanakānaṃ sattānaṃ vaṇṇadhātuārammaṇā ekacittakkhaṇikā appanāpaññāva kathitā.
atk-abh02a:1914_1: Sattavidhena ñāṇavatthuniddese jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇantiādinā nayena pavattinivattivasena ekādasasu paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu
atk-abh02a:1914_2: ekekasmiṃ kālattayabhedato paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ vatvā puna “yampissa taṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti evaṃ tadeva
atk-abh02a:1914_5: asati jātiyā natthi jarāmaraṇanti ñāṇadvayaṃ paccuppannaddhānavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1914_11: Paccayākāro hi dhammānaṃ pavattiṭṭhitikāraṇattā dhammaṭṭhitīti vuccati;
atk-abh02a:1914_14: Evaṃ ekekasmiṃ aṅge imāni satta satta katvā ekādasasu aṅgesu sattasattati honti.
atk-abh02a:1914_23: Paṭhamañāṇena hi sabbasaṅkhāre aniccā dukkhā anattāti disvā taṃ ñāṇaṃ dutiyena daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-abh02a:1916_1: Aṭṭhavidhena ñāṇavatthuniddese sotāpattimagge paññāti sotāpattimaggamhi paññā.
atk-abh02a:1918_4: Tattha paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiyā paññātiādayo aṭṭha sampayuttapaññā veditabbā.
atk-abh02a:1918_6: Sā hi nirodhasamāpattiṃ santato paṇītato paccavekkhamānassa pavattati.
atk-abh02a:1922_4: Kāraṇañhi tadāyattavuttitāya attano phalassa ṭhānanti ca avakāsoti ca vuccati.
atk-abh02a:1922_7: Kañci saṅkhāranti catubhūmakesu saṅkhatasaṅkhāresu kañci ekaṃ saṅkhārampi.
atk-abh02a:1922_9: Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti etaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthi,
atk-abh02a:1922_13: sassatadiṭṭhiyā hi so tebhūmakesu saṅkhāresu kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato gaṇheyyāti attho.
atk-abh02a:1922_14: Catutthabhūmakasaṅkhāro pana tejussadattā divasaṃ santatto ayoguḷo viya makkhikānaṃ diṭṭhiyā vā aññesaṃ vā akusalānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na hoti.
atk-abh02a:1922_15: Iminā nayena kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhatotiādīsupi attho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a:1922_16: Sukhato upagaccheyyāti “ekantasukhī attā hoti arogo parammaraṇā”ti evaṃ attadiṭṭhivasena sukhato gāhaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1922_19: sucikāmo pokkhabrāhmaṇo gūthaṃ kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhato upagacchati.
atk-abh02a:1922_20: Attavāde kasiṇādipaṇṇattisaṅgahatthaṃ saṅkhāranti avatvā kañci dhammanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1922_23: sabbavāresu vā ariyasāvakassāpi tebhūmakavaseneva paricchedo vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:1922_26: Puthujjano hi yaṃ yaṃ niccaṃ sukhaṃ attāti gaṇhāti,
atk-abh02a:1922_27: taṃ taṃ ariyasāvako aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti gaṇhanto gāhaṃ viniveṭheti.
atk-abh02a:1923_2: Kiṃ pana ariyasāvako aññaṃ jīvitā voropeyyāti?
atk-abh02a:1923_4: Sacepi bhavantaragataṃ ariyasāvakaṃ attano ariyasāvakabhāvaṃ ajānantampi koci evaṃ vadeyya –
atk-abh02a:1923_5: ‘imaṃ kunthakipillikaṃ jīvitā voropetvā sakalacakkavāḷagabbhe cakkavattirajjaṃ paṭipajjāhī’ti,
atk-abh02a:1923_12: Puthujjanabhāvassa pana mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthaṃ ariyasāvakassa ca baladīpanatthametaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1923_15: yatra hi nāma puthujjano mātughātādīnipi ānantariyāni karissati.
atk-abh02a:1924_1: Lohitaṃ uppādeyyāti jīvamānakasarīre khuddakamakkhikāya pivanamattampi lohitaṃ uppādeyya.
atk-abh02a:1924_2: Saṅghaṃ bhindeyyāti samānasaṃvāsakaṃ samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhitaṃ pañcahi kāraṇehi saṅghaṃ bhindeyya,
atk-abh02a:1925_0: Tattha ‘kammenā’ti apalokanādīsu catūsu kammesu aññatarena kammena.
atk-abh02a:1925_3: tāhi tāhi uppattīhi ‘adhammaṃ dhammo’tiādīni aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni dīpento.
atk-abh02a:1925_4: ‘Anussāvanenā’ti ‘nanu tumhe jānātha mayhaṃ uccākulā pabbajitabhāvaṃ bahussutabhāvañca! Mādiso nāma uddhammaṃ
atk-abh02a:1925_5: ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ gāheyyāti cittampi uppādetuṃ tumhākaṃ na yuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1925_6: Kiṃ mayhaṃ avīci nīluppalavanaṃ viya sītalo?
atk-abh02a:1925_7: Kimahaṃ apāyato na bhāyāmī’tiādinā nayena kaṇṇamūle vacībhedaṃ katvā anussāvanena.
atk-abh02a:1925_8: ‘Salākaggāhenā’ti evaṃ anussāvetvā tesaṃ cittaṃ upatthambhetvā anivattanadhamme katvā “gaṇhatha imaṃ salāka”nti salākaggāhena.
atk-abh02a:1925_9: Ettha ca kammameva uddeso vā pamāṇaṃ vohārānussāvanasalākaggāhā pana pubbabhāgā.
atk-abh02a:1925_10: Aṭṭhārasavatthudīpanavasena hi voharantena tattha rucijananatthaṃ anussāvetvā salākāya gāhitāyapi abhinnova hoti saṅgho.
atk-abh02a:1925_11: Yadā pana evaṃ cattāro vā atirekā vā salākaṃ gāhetvā āveṇikaṃ kammaṃ vā uddesaṃ vā karonti,
atk-abh02a:1926_0: Evaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo saṅghaṃ bhindeyyāti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
atk-abh02a:1926_1: Ettāvatā mātughātādīni pañca ānantariyakammāni dassitāni honti,
atk-abh02a:1929_1: ettha hi manussabhūtasseva manussabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā api parivattaliṅgaṃ jīvitā voropentassa kammaṃ ānantariyaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1929_2: Tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhissāmī’ti sakalacakkavāḷaṃ mahācetiyappamāṇehi kañcanathūpehi pūretvāpi,
atk-abh02a:1929_6: Yo pana sayaṃ manussabhūto tiracchānabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā,
atk-abh02a:1929_12: Manussajātikānaṃ pana vasena ayaṃ pañho kathito.
atk-abh02a:1930_3: ‘Eḷakaṃ māremī’ti abhisandhināpi hi eḷakaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ manusso manussabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā mārento ānantariyaṃ phusati.
atk-abh02a:1930_4: Eḷakābhisandhinā pana mātāpitiabhisandhinā vā eḷakaṃ mārento ānantariyaṃ na phusati.
atk-abh02a:1930_12: Manussaarahantassa ca puthujjanakāleyeva satthappahāre vā vise vā dinnepi yadi so arahattaṃ patvā teneva marati,
atk-abh02a:1930_14: Yaṃ pana puthujjanakāle dinnaṃ dānaṃ arahattaṃ patvā paribhuñjati,
atk-abh02a:1931_0: Lohituppāde tathāgatassa abhejjakāyatāya parūpakkamena cammacchedaṃ katvā lohitapaggharaṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:1931_1: Sarīrassa pana antoyeva ekasmiṃ ṭhāne lohitaṃ samosarati.
atk-abh02a:1931_2: Devadattena paṭividdhasilāto bhijjitvā gatā sakalikāpi tathāgatassa pādantaṃ pahari.
atk-abh02a:1931_3: Pharasunā pahaṭo viya pādo antolohitoyeva ahosi.
atk-abh02a:1931_5: Jīvako pana tathāgatassa ruciyā satthakena cammaṃ chinditvā tamhā ṭhānā duṭṭhalohitaṃ nīharitvā phāsukamakāsi.
atk-abh02a:1932_0: Atha ye ca parinibbute tathāgate cetiyaṃ bhindanti,
atk-abh02a:1932_5: Sadhātukaṃ pana thūpaṃ vā paṭimaṃ vā bādhayamānaṃ bodhisākhañca chindituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:1932_6: Sacepi tattha nilīnā sakuṇā cetiye vaccaṃ pātenti,
atk-abh02a:1932_9: Cetiyavatthuṃ bhinditvā gacchantaṃ bodhimūlampi chinditvā harituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a:1932_15: Yasmiṃ pana āsanaghare dhātu nihitā hoti,
atk-abh02a:1932_17: Bodhijagganatthaṃ ojoharaṇasākhaṃ vā pūtiṭṭhānaṃ vā chindituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva;
atk-abh02a:1933_0: Saṅghabhede sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghe asannipatite visuṃ parisaṃ gahetvā katavohārānussāvanasalākaggāhassa kammaṃ
atk-abh02a:1933_1: vā karontassa uddesaṃ vā uddisantassa bhedo ca hoti ānantariyakammañca.
atk-abh02a:1933_3: Samaggasaññāya hi karontassa neva bhedo hoti na ānantariyakammaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1933_5: Sabbantimena pana paricchedena navannaṃ janānaṃ yo saṅghaṃ bhindati,
atk-abh02a:1933_9: Tattha navannameva saṅghabhede idaṃ suttaṃ – “ekato, upāli,
atk-abh02a:1933_20: atirekanavannaṃ vā saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo cā”ti.
atk-abh02a:1934_0: Etesu ca pana pañcasu saṅghabhedo vacīkammaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1935_1: Purimāni panettha cattāri āṇattikavijjāmayapayogavasena vacīdvārato samuṭṭhahitvāpi kāyadvārameva pūrenti.
atk-abh02a:1935_2: Saṅghabhedo hatthamuddāya bhedaṃ karontassa kāyadvārato samuṭṭhahitvāpi vacīdvārameva pūretīti.
atk-abh02a:1936_1: Saṇṭhahante hi kappe kappavemajjhe vā saṅghabhedaṃ katvā kappavināseyeva muccati.
atk-abh02a:1936_2: Sacepi hi ‘sve kappo vinassissatī’ti ajja saṅghabhedaṃ karoti,
atk-abh02a:1937_0: ‘Pākato’ti yena ca pañcapetāni kammāni katāni honti,
atk-abh02a:1937_2: Sesāni “ahosi kammaṃ nāhosi kammavipāko”ti evamādīsu saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
atk-abh02a:1937_6: mātā dussīlā no vā tathā sīlavatī,
atk-abh02a:1937_9: Dvīsupi sīlena vā dussīlena vā samānesu mātughātova paṭisandhivasena vipaccati;
atk-abh02a:1937_10: mātā hi dukkarakāriṇī bahūpakārā ca puttānanti.
atk-abh02a:1938_9: pakatatto samānasaṃvāsako samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhito saṅghaṃ bhindatī”ti vacanato vuttappakārassa bhikkhunova hoti,
atk-abh02a:1938_12: Ādisaddena sabbepete dukkhavedanāsahagatā dosamohasampayuttā cāti evamettha sādhāraṇādīhipi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a:1939_0: Aññaṃ satthāranti ‘ayaṃ me satthā satthukiccaṃ kātuṃ samattho’ti bhavantarepi aññaṃ titthakaraṃ ‘ayaṃ me satthā’ti evaṃ gaṇheyya –
atk-abh02a:1939_2: Aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ nibbatteyyāti sabbamandapaññopi sattamaṃ bhavaṃ atikkamitvā aṭṭhamaṃ nibbatteyya –
atk-abh02a:1939_4: Uttamakoṭiyā hi sattamaṃ bhavaṃ sandhāyevesa “niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti vutto.
atk-abh02a:1939_6: Kiṃ pubbahetu niyāmeti udāhu paṭiladdhamaggo udāhu upari tayo maggāti?
atk-abh02a:1939_9: “Pubbahetu niyāmetī”ti vutte hi upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ upanissayo vutto hoti,
atk-abh02a:1939_12: “Paṭiladdhamaggo niyāmetī”ti vutte upari tayo maggā akiccakā honti,
atk-abh02a:1939_15: “Upari tayo maggā niyāmentī”ti vutte paṭhamamaggo akiccako hoti,
atk-abh02a:1939_17: paṭhamamaggaṃ anibbattetvā upari tayo maggā nibbattetabbā honti,
atk-abh02a:1939_18: paṭhamamaggena ca anuppajjitvāva kilesā khepetabbā honti.
atk-abh02a:1939_21: Sace hi tesaṃ vipassanā tikkhā sūrā hutvā vahati,
atk-abh02a:1939_22: ekaṃyeva bhavaṃ nibbattetvā arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāti.
atk-abh02a:1939_23: Tato mandatarapañño dutiye vā tatiye vā catutthe vā pañcame vā chaṭṭhe vā bhave arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāti.
atk-abh02a:1939_24: Sabbamandapañño sattamaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh02a:1939_27: Satthā hi buddhatulāya tuletvā sabbaññutañāṇena paricchinditvā ‘ayaṃ puggalo sabbamahāpañño tikkhavipassako
atk-abh02a:1939_28: ekameva bhavaṃ nibbattetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhissatī’ti ‘ekabījī’ti nāmaṃ akāsi;
atk-abh02a:1939_31: chaṭṭhaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhissatī’ti ‘kolaṃkolo’ti nāmaṃ akāsi;
atk-abh02a:1939_32: ‘ayaṃ puggalo sattamaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhissatī’ti ‘sattakkhattuparamo’ti nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-abh02a:1940_0: Koci pana puggalo sattannaṃ bhavānaṃ niyato nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:1940_1: Ariyasāvako pana yena kenacipi ākārena mandapañño samāno aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ appatvā antarāva parinibbāti.
atk-abh02a:1940_3: Sattame bhave sabbakārena pamādavihārinopi vipassanāñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh02a:1940_5: Sacepi hissa sattame bhave niddaṃ vā okkamantassa,
atk-abh02a:1940_7: pacchato ṭhatvā tikhiṇena asinā kocideva sīsaṃ pāteyya,
atk-abh02a:1940_10: evarūpepi kāle sappaṭisandhikā kālaṃkiriyā nāma na hoti,
atk-abh02a:1941_18: ñeyyapariyantikaṃ ñāṇa”nti vacanato avisayo nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a:1942_2: aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhā uppajjantīti suttaṃ natthi,
atk-abh02a:1942_12: Imā tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhe tepiṭake buddhavacane imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ muñcitvā aññattha buddhā uppajjantīti suttaṃ natthi,
atk-abh02a:1943_2: pure vā pacchā vā uppajjantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1943_3: Tattha bodhipallaṅke “bodhiṃ appatvā na uṭṭhahissāmī”ti nisinnakālato paṭṭhāya yāva mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ tāva pubbenti na veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1943_4: Bodhisattassa hi paṭisandhiggahaṇe dasasahassacakkavāḷakampaneneva jātikkhettapariggaho kato,
atk-abh02a:1943_6: Parinibbānato paṭṭhāya ca yāva sāsapamattāpi dhātuyo tiṭṭhanti tāva pacchāti na veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1943_7: Dhātūsu hi ṭhitāsu buddhā ṭhitāva honti.
atk-abh02a:1943_8: Tasmā etthantare aññassa buddhassa uppatti nivāritāva hoti,
atk-abh02a:1943_9: dhātuparinibbāne pana jāte aññassa buddhassa uppatti na nivāritā.
atk-abh02a:1944_7: Tattha paṭivedho ca paṭipatti ca hotipi na hotipi.
atk-abh02a:1944_8: Ekasmiñhi kāle paṭivedhakarā bhikkhū bahū honti;
atk-abh02a:1944_9: ‘esa bhikkhu puthujjano’ti aṅguliṃ pasāretvā dassetabbo hoti.
atk-abh02a:1944_10: Imasmiṃyeva dīpe ekavāraṃ kira puthujjanabhikkhu nāma nāhosi.
atk-abh02a:1944_13: Iti paṭivedho ca paṭipatti ca hotipi na hotipi.
atk-abh02a:1945_1: Paṇḍito hi tepiṭakaṃ sutvā dvepi pūreti.
atk-abh02a:1945_2: Yathā amhākaṃ bodhisatto āḷārassa santike pañcābhiññā satta ca samāpattiyo nibbattetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā parikammaṃ pucchi,
atk-abh02a:1945_4: tato udakassa santikaṃ gantvā adhigatavisesaṃ saṃsandetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa parikammaṃ pucchi;
atk-abh02a:1945_7: evameva paññavā bhikkhu pariyattiṃ sutvā dvepi pūreti.
atk-abh02a:1945_8: Tasmā pariyattiyā ṭhitāya sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ hoti.
atk-abh02a:1945_9: Yadā pana sā antaradhāyati tadā paṭhamaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ nassati.
atk-abh02a:1945_12: Tasmiṃ antarahite itaresu dvīsu piṭakesu ṭhitesu sāsanaṃ ṭhitameva hoti.
atk-abh02a:1946_0: Tattha suttantapiṭake antaradhāyamāne paṭhamaṃ aṅguttaranikāyo ekādasakato paṭṭhāya yāva ekakā antaradhāyati.
atk-abh02a:1946_1: Tadanantaraṃ saṃyuttanikāyo cakkapeyyālato paṭṭhāya yāva oghataraṇā antaradhāyati.
atk-abh02a:1946_2: Tadanantaraṃ majjhimanikāyo indriyabhāvanato paṭṭhāya yāva mūlapariyāyā antaradhāyati.
atk-abh02a:1946_3: Tadanantaraṃ dīghanikāyo dasuttarato paṭṭhāya yāva brahmajālā antaradhāyati.
atk-abh02a:1946_4: Ekissāpi dvinnampi gāthānaṃ pucchā addhānaṃ gacchati;
atk-abh02a:1946_5: sāsanaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkoti sabhiyapucchā viya āḷavakapucchā viya ca.
atk-abh02a:1946_6: Etā kira kassapabuddhakālikā antarā sāsanaṃ dhāretuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-abh02a:1947_0: Dvīsu pana piṭakesu antarahitesupi vinayapiṭake ṭhite sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh02a:1947_1: Parivārakhandhakesu antarahitesu ubhatovibhaṅge ṭhite ṭhitameva hoti.
atk-abh02a:1947_2: Ubhatovibhaṅge antarahite mātikāya ṭhitāyapi ṭhitameva hoti.
atk-abh02a:1947_3: Mātikāya antarahitāya pātimokkhapabbajjāupasampadāsu ṭhitāsu sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh02a:1947_5: Setavatthasamaṇavaṃso pana kassapabuddhakālato paṭṭhāya sāsanaṃ dhāretuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-abh02a:1947_6: Pacchimakassa pana saccapaṭivedhato pacchimakassa sīlabhedato ca paṭṭhāya sāsanaṃ osakkitaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:1947_7: Tato paṭṭhāya aññassa buddhassa uppatti na vāritā.
atk-abh02a:1948_7: Sāsanassa kira osakkanakāle imasmiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe dhātuyo sannipatitvā mahācetiyaṃ gamissanti,
atk-abh02a:1948_10: Nāgabhavanatopi devalokatopi brahmalokatopi dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅkameva gamissanti.
atk-abh02a:1948_12: Sabbā dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅke rāsibhūtā suvaṇṇakkhandho viya ekaghanā hutvā chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo vissajjessanti.
atk-abh02a:1948_16: pacchimadassanaṃ dāni idaṃ amhāka”nti dasabalassa parinibbutadivasato mahantataraṃ kāruññaṃ karissanti.
atk-abh02a:1948_17: Ṭhapetvā anāgāmikhīṇāsave avasesā sakabhāvena sandhāretuṃ na sakkhissanti.
atk-abh02a:1948_18: Dhātūsu tejodhātu uṭṭhahitvā yāva brahmalokā uggacchissati.
atk-abh02a:1948_21: Evaṃ mahantaṃ ānubhāvaṃ dassetvā dhātūsu antarahitāsu sāsanaṃ antarahitaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:1948_22: Yāva evaṃ na antaradhāyati tāva acarimaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a:1949_0: Kasmā pana apubbaṃ acarimaṃ na uppajjantīti?
atk-abh02a:1949_10: Yadi ca dve vā cattāro vā aṭṭha vā soḷasa vā ekato uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-abh02a:1949_12: Ekasmiñhi vihāre dvinnaṃ cetiyānampi lābhasakkāro uḷāro na hoti,
atk-abh02a:1949_20: Ekasmiṃ pana dhammaṃ desente desanāpi acchariyā hoti.
atk-abh02a:1949_22: Bahūsu ca buddhesu uppannesu bahūnaṃ ācariyānaṃ antevāsikā viya ‘amhākaṃ buddho pāsādiko,
atk-abh02a:1949_23: amhākaṃ buddho madhurassaro lābhī puññavā’ti vivadeyyuṃ;
atk-abh02a:1950_0: Apicetaṃ kāraṇaṃ milindaraññā puṭṭhena nāgasenattherena vitthāritameva. Vuttañhi tattha –
atk-abh02a:1951_4: anavakāso yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyuṃ –
atk-abh02a:1951_13: sabbesampi tathāgatānaṃ ekā desanā ekā kathā ekā sikkhā ekānusiṭṭhi,
atk-abh02a:1951_14: kena kāraṇena dve tathāgatā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti?
atk-abh02a:1951_15: Ekenapi tāva buddhuppādena ayaṃ loko obhāsajāto.
atk-abh02a:1951_17: dvinnaṃ pabhāya ayaṃ loko bhiyyoso mattāya obhāsajāto bhaveyya.
atk-abh02a:1951_18: Ovadantā ca dve tathāgatā sukhaṃ ovadeyyuṃ,
atk-abh02a:1951_20: Tattha me kāraṇaṃ dassehi yathāhaṃ nissaṃsayo bhaveyya”nti.
atk-abh02a:1952_5: caleyya kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya vikireyya vidhameyya viddhaṃseyya,
atk-abh02a:1953_2: ekasmiṃ purise abhirūḷhe sā nāvā samupādikā bhaveyya.
atk-abh02a:1953_3: Atha dutiyo puriso āgaccheyya tādiso āyunā vaṇṇena vayena pamāṇena kisathūlena sabbaṅgapaccaṅgena.
atk-abh02a:1953_4: So taṃ nāvaṃ abhirūheyya. Apinu sā, mahārāja,
atk-abh02a:1953_6: caleyya kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya vikireyya vidhameyya viddhaṃseyya,
atk-abh02a:1953_10: ayaṃ dasasahassī lokadhātu ekabuddhadhāraṇī ekasseva tathāgatassa guṇaṃ dhāreti.
atk-abh02a:1954_1: puriso yāvadatthaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjeyya chādentaṃ yāvakaṇṭhamabhipūrayitvā.
atk-abh02a:1954_2: So tato pīṇito paripuṇṇo nirantaro tandīgato anonamitadaṇḍajāto punadeva tattakaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjeyya.
atk-abh02a:1955_3: dve sakaṭā ratanaparipūritā bhaveyyuṃ yāvasmā mukhasamā.
atk-abh02a:1955_4: Eka sakaṭato ratanaṃ gahetvā ekamhi sakaṭe ākireyyuṃ.
atk-abh02a:1955_6: sakaṭaṃ dvinnampi sakaṭānaṃ ratanaṃ dhāreyyā”ti? “Na hi, bhante,
atk-abh02a:1956_2: Aññampi tattha patirūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ suṇohi yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti. Yadi, mahārāja,
atk-abh02a:1956_6: amhākaṃ buddho’ti ubhatopakkhajātā bhaveyyuṃ. Yathā, mahārāja,
atk-abh02a:1956_15: Idaṃ tāva mahārāja ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:1957_0: “Aparampi uttariṃ kāraṇaṃ suṇohi yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti. Yadi, mahārāja,
atk-abh02a:1957_1: dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe uppajjeyyuṃ ‘aggo buddho’ti yaṃ vacanaṃ taṃ micchā bhaveyya,
atk-abh02a:1957_2: ‘jeṭṭho buddho’ti ‘seṭṭho buddho’ti ‘visiṭṭho buddho’ti ‘uttamo buddho’ti ‘pavaro buddho’ti ‘asamo buddho’ti
atk-abh02a:1957_3: ‘asamasamo buddho’ti ‘appaṭisamo buddho’ti ‘appaṭibhāgī buddho’ti ‘appaṭipuggalo buddho’ti yaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-abh02a:1957_6: kāraṇaṃ tathato sampaṭiccha yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:1958_1: buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sabhāvapakati esā yaṃ ekoyeva buddho loke uppajjati.
atk-abh02a:1958_4: yaṃ loke mahantaṃ taṃ ekaṃyeva hoti. Pathavī, mahārāja, mahantā,
atk-abh02a:1958_18: Yattha te uppajjanti tattha aññesaṃ okāso na hoti. Tasmā, mahārāja,
atk-abh02a:1958_19: tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho ekoyeva loke uppajjatī”ti.
atk-abh02a:1960_1: Heṭṭhā imināva padena dasa cakkavāḷasahassāni gahitāni.
atk-abh02a:1960_3: Buddhā hi uppajjamānā imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe uppajjanti;
atk-abh02a:1960_4: uppajjanaṭṭhāne pana vārite ito aññesu cakkavāḷesu na uppajjantīti vāritameva hoti.
atk-abh02a:1960_5: Apubbaṃ acarimanti ettha cakkaratanapātubhāvato pubbe pubbaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1960_9: Antaradhāyamānañca pana taṃ kālakiriyato vā pabbajjato vā sattame divase antaradhāyati.
atk-abh02a:1960_11: Kasmā pana ekacakkavāḷe dve cakkavattino nuppajjantīti?
atk-abh02a:1960_16: ekasmiṃ dīpe cakkavattī’ti ca anacchariyo bhaveyya.
atk-abh02a:1960_17: Yo cāyaṃ cakkaratanassa dvisahassadīpaparivāresu catūsu mahādīpesu issariyānuppadānasamattho mahānubhāvo,
atk-abh02a:1960_19: Iti vivādupacchedato anacchariyabhāvato cakkaratanassa mahānubhāvato ca na ekacakkavāḷe dve uppajjanti.
atk-abh02a:1961_0: Yaṃ ittho arahaṃ assa sammāsambuddhoti ettha tiṭṭhatu tāva sabbaññuguṇe nibbattetvā lokattāraṇasamattho buddhabhāvo,
atk-abh02a:1965_1: Iti paṇidhānampi sampādetuṃ asamatthāya itthiyā kuto buddhabhāvoti “aṭṭhānametaṃ,
atk-abh02a:1965_2: anavakāso yaṃ itthī arahaṃ assa sammāsambuddho”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1965_3: Sabbākāraparipūro vā puññussayo sabbākāraparipūrameva attabhāvaṃ nibbattetīti purisova arahaṃ hoti sammāsambuddho.
atk-abh02a:1966_0: Yaṃ itthī rājā assa cakkavattītiādīsupi yasmā itthiyā kosohitavatthaguyhādīnaṃ abhāvena lakkhaṇāni na paripūrenti,
atk-abh02a:1966_2: sabbamanussehi ca adhiko attabhāvo na hoti,
atk-abh02a:1966_3: tasmā “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso yaṃ itthī rājā assa cakkavattī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh02a:1966_4: Yasmā ca sakkattādīnipi tīṇi ṭhānāni uttamāni,
atk-abh02a:1966_7: Nanu ca yathā itthiliṅgaṃ evaṃ purisaliṅgampi brahmaloke natthi,
atk-abh02a:1966_13: Itthī ca idha jhānaṃ bhāvetvā kālaṃ katvā brahmapārisajjānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati,
atk-abh02a:1966_15: Puriso pana tattha na uppajjatīti na vattabbo.
atk-abh02a:1967_0: Kāyaduccaritassātiādīsu yathā nimbabījakosātakībījādīni madhuraṃ phalaṃ na nibbattenti,
atk-abh02a:1967_2: evaṃ kāyaduccaritādīni madhuraṃ vipākaṃ na nibbattenti,
atk-abh02a:1967_4: Yathā ca ucchubījasālibījādīni madhuraṃ sādhurasameva phalaṃ nibbattenti,
atk-abh02a:1971_8: Yāva pana arahattaṃ na pāpuṇanti tāva sabbepi sattā pubbe upacitaṃ vipākārahaṃ kammaṃ sandhāya kammasamaṅginoti vuccanti –
atk-abh02a:1971_11: Yāva pana sattā arahattaṃ na pāpuṇanti tāva tesaṃ tato tato cavitvā niraye tāva uppajjamānānaṃ aggijālalohakumbhīādīhi upaṭṭhānākārehi nirayo,
atk-abh02a:1971_13: devesu uppajjamānānaṃ kapparukkhavimānādīhi upaṭṭhānākārehi devalokoti evaṃ upapattinimittaṃ upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a:1971_14: Iti nesaṃ iminā uppattinimittūpaṭṭhānena aparimuttattā ‘upaṭṭhānasamaṅgitā’ nāma.
atk-abh02a:1972_1: soṇagiripāde kira acelavihāre soṇatthero nāma eko dhammakathiko.
atk-abh02a:1972_2: Tassa pitā sunakhavājiko nāma luddako ahosi.
atk-abh02a:1972_3: Thero taṃ paṭibāhantopi saṃvare ṭhapetuṃ asakkonto ‘mā nassi varāko’ti mahallakakāle akāmakaṃ pabbājesi.
atk-abh02a:1972_5: Soṇagiripādato mahantā mahantā sunakhā āgantvā khāditukāmā viya samparivāresuṃ.
atk-abh02a:1972_12: Soṇatthero ‘kathañhi nāma mādisassa pitā niraye nibbattissati,
atk-abh02a:1972_13: patiṭṭhāhamassa bhavissāmī’ti sāmaṇerehi nānāpupphāni āharāpetvā cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇesu mālāsanthārapūjañca
atk-abh02a:1972_14: āsanapūjañca kāretvā pitaraṃ mañcena cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ haritvā mañce nipajjāpetvā “ayaṃ me,
atk-abh02a:1972_16: pūjā tumhākaṃ atthāya katā; ‘ayaṃ me, bhagavā,
atk-abh02a:1972_17: duggatapaṇṇākāro’ti vatvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā cittaṃ pasādehī”ti āha.
atk-abh02a:1972_18: So mahāthero pūjaṃ disvā tathākaronto cittaṃ pasādesi.
atk-abh02a:1972_20: nandavanacittalatāvanamissakavanaphārusakavanavimānāni ceva devanāṭakāni ca parivāretvā ṭhitāni viya ahesuṃ.
atk-abh02a:1975_1: Dutiyabalaniddese gatisampattipaṭibāḷhānīti gatisampattiyā paṭibāhitāni nivāritāni paṭisedhitāni.
atk-abh02a:1975_3: Ettha ca gatisampattīti sampannā gati devaloko ca manussaloko ca.
atk-abh02a:1976_2: So pana ekena kalyāṇakammena gatisampattiyaṃ devesu vā manussesu vā nibbatto.
atk-abh02a:1976_3: Tādise ca ṭhāne akusalassa vāro natthi,
atk-abh02a:1976_5: Evamassa tāni kammāni gatisampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccantīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1977_2: So pana ekena kalyāṇakammena upadhisampattiyaṃ ṭhito susaṇṭhitaṅgapaccaṅgo abhirūpo dassanīyo brahmavacchasadiso.
atk-abh02a:1977_3: Sacepi dāsiyā kucchismiṃ dāsajāto hoti ‘evarūpo attabhāvo kiliṭṭhakammassa nānucchaviko’ti hatthimeṇḍaassabandhakagopālakakammādīni taṃ na kārenti;
atk-abh02a:1977_7: vatthālaṅkāraṃ datvā sayanapālikaṃ vā naṃ karonti,
atk-abh02a:1977_9: Bhātikarājakāle kira gomaṃsakhādake bahujane gahetvā rañño dassesuṃ.
atk-abh02a:1977_10: Te ‘daṇḍaṃ dātuṃ sakkothā’ti puṭṭhā ‘na sakkomā’ti vadiṃsu.
atk-abh02a:1977_12: Tesaṃ ekā dhītā abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā.
atk-abh02a:1977_13: Taṃ disvā rājā antepuraṃ abhinetvā vallabhaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-abh02a:1977_15: Tādisasmiñhi attabhāve pāpakammānipi vipākaṃ dātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-abh02a:1978_2: So pana ekena kalyāṇakammena paṭhamakappikānaṃ vā cakkavattirañño vā buddhānaṃ vā uppattisamaye surājasumanussakāle nibbatto.
atk-abh02a:1978_3: Tādise ca kāle nibbattassa akusalassa vipākaṃ dātuṃ okāso natthi,
atk-abh02a:1979_2: So pana ekena kalyāṇakammena payogasampattiyaṃ ṭhito pāṇātipātādīhi virato kāyavacīmanosucaritāni pūreti.
atk-abh02a:1980_3: Tatthassa tāni kammāni upagantvā vārena vārena vipākaṃ denti –
atk-abh02a:1980_8: dīghenāpi addhunā apāyato sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na denti.
atk-abh02a:1980_9: Evaṃ gatisampattipaṭibāhitattā vipākaṃ dātuṃ asakkontāni gativipattiṃ āgamma vipaccantīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1981_2: So pana ekena pāpakammena upadhivipattiyaṃyeva patiṭṭhito dubbaṇṇo durūpo dussaṇṭhito bībhaccho pisācasadiso.
atk-abh02a:1981_3: So sace dāsiyā kucchiyaṃ dāsajāto ‘imāni etassa anucchavikānī’ti sabbāni naṃ kiliṭṭhakammāni kārenti antamaso pupphachaḍḍakakammaṃ upādāya.
atk-abh02a:1981_4: Sace itthī hoti ‘imāni etissā anucchavikānī’ti sabbāni naṃ hatthibhattapacanādīni kiliṭṭhakammāni kārenti.
atk-abh02a:1981_5: Kulagehe jātampi baliṃ sādhayamānā rājapurisā ‘gehadāsī’ti saññaṃ katvā bandhitvā gacchanti,
atk-abh02a:1981_7: Evaṃ upadhisampattipaṭibāhitattā vipākaṃ dātuṃ asakkontāni upadhivipattiṃ āgamma vipaccantīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1982_2: So pana ekena pāpakammena kālavipattiyaṃ durājadumanussakāle kasaṭe niroje dasavassāyukakāle nibbatto,
atk-abh02a:1982_9: Evaṃ kālasampattipaṭibāhitattā vipākaṃ dātuṃ asakkontāni kālavipattiṃ āgamma vipaccantīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1983_2: So pana payogavipattiyaṃ ṭhito pāṇātipātādīni dasa akusalakammāni karoti.
atk-abh02a:1983_5: Evaṃ payogasampattipaṭibāhitattā vipākaṃ dātuṃ asakkontāni payogavipattiṃ āgamma vipaccantīti pajānāti.
atk-abh02a:1983_6: Evaṃ catūhi sampattīhi paṭibāhitaṃ pāpakammaṃ vipākaṃ adatvā catasso vipattiyo āgamma deti.
atk-abh02a:1984_0: Yathā hi kocideva puriso kenacideva kammena rājānaṃ ārādheyya.
atk-abh02a:1984_1: Athassa rājā ṭhānantaraṃ datvā janapadaṃ dadeyya.
atk-abh02a:1984_2: So taṃ sammā paribhuñjituṃ asakkonto makkaṭena gahitabhattapuṭaṃ viya bhindeyya;
atk-abh02a:1984_3: yassa yaṃ yānaṃ vā vāhanaṃ vā dāsaṃ vā dāsiṃ vā ārāmaṃ vā vatthuṃ vā sampannarūpaṃ passati,
atk-abh02a:1984_7: So taṃ gahetvā supothitaṃ pothāpetvā bhūmiṃ piṭṭhiyā ghaṃsāpento nikkaḍḍhāpetvā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ‘asuko nāma te, deva,
atk-abh02a:1984_9: Rājā bandhanāgāre bandhāpetvā ‘asukena nāma kassa kiṃ avahaṭa’nti nagare bheriṃ carāpeyya.
atk-abh02a:1984_12: Rājā bhiyyoso mattāya kuddho nānappakārena taṃ bandhanāgāre kilametvā ghātāpetvā ‘gacchatha naṃ susāne chaḍḍetvā saṅkhalikā āharathā’ti vadeyya.
atk-abh02a:1985_0: Tassa hi purisassa hi kenacideva kammena rājānaṃ ārādhetvā ṭhānantaraṃ laddhakālo viya puthujjanassāpi kenacideva puññakammena sagge nibbattakālo.
atk-abh02a:1985_1: Tasmiṃ janapadaṃ bhinditvā manussānaṃ santakaṃ gaṇhante kassaci kiñci vattuṃ avisahanakālo viya imasmimpi
atk-abh02a:1985_3: Tassa ekadivasaṃ ekasmiṃ rājavallabhatare virajjhitvā tena kuddhena naṃ pothāpetvā rañño ārocetvā bandhanāgāre
atk-abh02a:1985_4: bandhāpitakālo viya imassa saggato cavitvā niraye nibbattakālo.
atk-abh02a:1985_6: mayhaṃ idaṃ gahita’nti viravakālo viya tasmiṃ niraye nibbatte sabbākusalakammānaṃ sannipatitvā gahaṇakālo.
